h4.p: [03] 1^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^M1.0001^ea^ ^a^V1.0001^ea^ ^a^P1.0001^ea^ ^a^T1.0001^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa ukka.t.thaaya.m viharati subhagavane saalaraajamuule. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``sabbadhammamuulapariyaaya.m vo, bhikkhave, desessaami. ta.m su.naatha, saadhuka.m manasi karotha, bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] 2^b^.^eb^ ``idha, bhikkhave, assutavaa puthujjano ariyaana.m adassaavii ariyadhammassa akovido ^a^V1.0002^ea^ ariyadhamme aviniito, sappurisaana.m adassaavii sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme aviniito -- pathavi.m {pa.thavi.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} pathavito sa~njaanaati; pathavi.m pathavito sa~n~natvaa pathavi.m ma~n~nati, pathaviyaa ma~n~nati, pathavito ma~n~nati, pathavi.m meti ma~n~nati ^a^T1.0002^ea^, pathavi.m abhinandati. ta.m kissa hetu? `apari~n~naata.m tassaa'ti vadaami.

[03] ``aapa.m aapato sa~njaanaati; aapa.m aapato sa~n~natvaa aapa.m ma~n~nati, aapasmi.m ma~n~nati, aapato ma~n~nati, aapa.m meti ma~n~nati, aapa.m abhinandati. ta.m kissa hetu? `apari~n~naata.m tassaa'ti vadaami.

[03] ``teja.m ^a^M1.0002^ea^ tejato sa~njaanaati; teja.m tejato sa~n~natvaa teja.m ma~n~nati, tejasmi.m ma~n~nati, tejato ma~n~nati, teja.m meti ma~n~nati, teja.m abhinandati. ta.m kissa hetu? `apari~n~naata.m tassaa'ti vadaami.

[03] ``vaaya.m vaayato sa~njaanaati; vaaya.m vaayato sa~n~natvaa vaaya.m ma~n~nati, vaayasmi.m ma~n~nati, vaayato ma~n~nati, vaaya.m meti ma~n~nati, vaaya.m abhinandati. ta.m kissa hetu? `apari~n~naata.m tassaa'ti ^a^P1.0002^ea^ vadaami.

[03] 3^b^.^eb^ ``bhuute bhuutato sa~njaanaati; bhuute bhuutato sa~n~natvaa bhuute ma~n~nati, bhuutesu ma~n~nati, bhuutato ma~n~nati, bhuute meti ma~n~nati, bhuute abhinandati. ta.m kissa hetu? `apari~n~naata.m tassaa'ti vadaami.

[01] ``deve devato sa~njaanaati; deve devato sa~n~natvaa deve ma~n~nati, devesu ma~n~nati, devato ma~n~nati, deve meti ma~n~nati, deve abhinandati. ta.m kissa hetu? `apari~n~naata.m tassaa'ti vadaami.

[03] ``pajaapati.m pajaapatito sa~njaanaati; pajaapati.m pajaapatito sa~n~natvaa pajaapati.m ma~n~nati, pajaapatismi.m ma~n~nati, pajaapatito ma~n~nati, pajaapati.m meti ma~n~nati, pajaapati.m abhinandati. ta.m kissa hetu? `apari~n~naata.m tassaa'ti vadaami.

[03] ``brahma.m ^a^V1.0003^ea^ brahmato sa~njaanaati; brahma.m brahmato sa~n~natvaa brahma.m ma~n~nati ^a^T1.0003^ea^, brahmasmi.m ma~n~nati, brahmato ma~n~nati, brahma.m meti ma~n~nati, brahma.m abhinandati. ta.m kissa hetu? `apari~n~naata.m tassaa'ti vadaami.

[03] ``aabhassare aabhassarato sa~njaanaati; aabhassare aabhassarato sa~n~natvaa aabhassare ma~n~nati, aabhassaresu ma~n~nati, aabhassarato ma~n~nati, aabhassare meti ma~n~nati, aabhassare abhinandati. ta.m kissa hetu? `apari~n~naata.m tassaa'ti vadaami.

[03] ``subhaki.nhe subhaki.nhato sa~njaanaati; subhaki.nhe subhaki.nhato sa~n~natvaa subhaki.nhe ma~n~nati, subhaki.nhesu ma~n~nati, subhaki.nhato ma~n~nati, subhaki.nhe meti ma~n~nati, subhaki.nhe abhinandati. ta.m kissa hetu? `apari~n~naata.m tassaa'ti vadaami.

[03] ``vehapphale ^a^M1.0003^ea^ vehapphalato sa~njaanaati; vehapphale vehapphalato sa~n~natvaa vehapphale ma~n~nati, vehapphalesu ma~n~nati, vehapphalato ma~n~nati, vehapphale meti ma~n~nati, vehapphale abhinandati. ta.m kissa hetu? `apari~n~naata.m tassaa'ti vadaami.

[03] ``abhibhu.m abhibhuuto sa~njaanaati; abhibhu.m abhibhuuto sa~n~natvaa abhibhu.m ma~n~nati, abhibhusmi.m ma~n~nati, abhibhuuto ma~n~nati, abhibhu.m meti ma~n~nati, abhibhu.m abhinandati. ta.m kissa hetu? `apari~n~naata.m tassaa'ti vadaami.

[03] 4^b^.^eb^ ``aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m aakaasaana~ncaayatanato sa~njaanaati; aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m aakaasaana~ncaayatanato sa~n~natvaa aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m ma~n~nati, aakaasaana~ncaayatanasmi.m ma~n~nati, aakaasaana~ncaayatanato ma~n~nati, aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m meti ma~n~nati, aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m abhinandati. ta.m ^a^T1.0004^ea^ kissa hetu? `apari~n~naata.m tassaa'ti vadaami.

[03] ``vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanato sa~njaanaati; vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanato sa~n~natvaa vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m ^a^P1.0003^ea^ ma~n~nati, vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanasmi.m ma~n~nati, vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanato ^a^V1.0004^ea^ ma~n~nati, vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m meti ma~n~nati, vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m abhinandati. ta.m kissa hetu? `apari~n~naata.m tassaa'ti vadaami.

[03] ``aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m aaki~nca~n~naayatanato sa~njaanaati; aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m aaki~nca~n~naayatanato sa~n~natvaa aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m ma~n~nati, aaki~nca~n~naayatanasmi.m ma~n~nati, aaki~nca~n~naayatanato ma~n~nati, aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m meti ma~n~nati, aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m abhinandati. ta.m kissa hetu? `apari~n~naata.m tassaa'ti vadaami.

[03] ``nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanato sa~njaanaati; nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanato sa~n~natvaa nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m ma~n~nati, nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanasmi.m ma~n~nati, nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanato ma~n~nati, nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m meti ma~n~nati, nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m abhinandati. ta.m kissa hetu? `apari~n~naata.m tassaa'ti vadaami.

[03] 5^b^.^eb^ ``di.t.tha.m ^a^M1.0004^ea^ di.t.thato sa~njaanaati; di.t.tha.m di.t.thato sa~n~natvaa di.t.tha.m ma~n~nati, di.t.thasmi.m ma~n~nati, di.t.thato ma~n~nati, di.t.tha.m meti ma~n~nati, di.t.tha.m abhinandati. ta.m kissa hetu? `apari~n~naata.m tassaa'ti vadaami.

[03] ``suta.m sutato sa~njaanaati; suta.m sutato sa~n~natvaa suta.m ^a^T1.0005^ea^ ma~n~nati, sutasmi.m ma~n~nati, sutato ma~n~nati, suta.m meti ma~n~nati, suta.m abhinandati. ta.m kissa hetu? `apari~n~naata.m tassaa'ti vadaami.

[03] ``muta.m mutato sa~njaanaati; muta.m mutato sa~n~natvaa muta.m ma~n~nati, mutasmi.m ma~n~nati, mutato ma~n~nati, muta.m meti ma~n~nati, muta.m abhinandati. ta.m kissa hetu? `apari~n~naata.m tassaa'ti vadaami.

[03] ``vi~n~naata.m vi~n~naatato sa~njaanaati; vi~n~naata.m vi~n~naatato sa~n~natvaa vi~n~naata.m ma~n~nati, vi~n~naatasmi.m ma~n~nati, vi~n~naatato ma~n~nati, vi~n~naata.m meti ma~n~nati, vi~n~naata.m abhinandati. ta.m kissa hetu? `apari~n~naata.m tassaa'ti vadaami.

[03] 6^b^.^eb^ ``ekatta.m ^a^V1.0005^ea^ ekattato sa~njaanaati; ekatta.m ekattato sa~n~natvaa ekatta.m ma~n~nati, ekattasmi.m ma~n~nati, ekattato ma~n~nati, ekatta.m meti ma~n~nati, ekatta.m abhinandati. ta.m kissa hetu? `apari~n~naata.m tassaa'ti vadaami.

[03] ``naanatta.m naanattato sa~njaanaati; naanatta.m naanattato sa~n~natvaa naanatta.m ma~n~nati, naanattasmi.m ma~n~nati, naanattato ma~n~nati, naanatta.m meti ma~n~nati, naanatta.m abhinandati. ta.m kissa hetu? `apari~n~naata.m tassaa'ti vadaami.

[03] ``sabba.m sabbato sa~njaanaati; sabba.m sabbato sa~n~natvaa sabba.m ma~n~nati, sabbasmi.m ^a^P1.0004^ea^ ma~n~nati, sabbato ma~n~nati, sabba.m meti ma~n~nati, sabba.m abhinandati. ta.m kissa hetu? `apari~n~naata.m tassaa'ti vadaami.

[03] ``nibbaana.m nibbaanato sa~njaanaati; nibbaana.m nibbaanato sa~n~natvaa nibbaana.m ma~n~nati, nibbaanasmi.m ma~n~nati ^a^T1.0006^ea^, nibbaanato ma~n~nati, nibbaana.m meti ma~n~nati, nibbaana.m abhinandati. ta.m kissa hetu? `apari~n~naata.m tassaa'ti vadaami.
[06] puthujjanavasena pa.thamanayabhuumiparicchedo ni.t.thito.

[03] 7^b^.^eb^ ``yopi ^a^M1.0005^ea^ so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sekkho {sekho (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} appattamaanaso anuttara.m yogakkhema.m patthayamaano viharati, sopi pathavi.m pathavito abhijaanaati; pathavi.m pathavito abhi~n~naaya {abhi~n~natvaa (ka0)} pathavi.m maa ma~n~ni {vaa ma~n~nati}, pathaviyaa maa ma~n~ni, pathavito maa ma~n~ni, pathavi.m meti maa ma~n~ni, pathavi.m maabhinandi {vaa abhinandati (sii0) .tiikaa oloketabbaa}. ta.m kissa hetu? `pari~n~neyya.m tassaa'ti vadaami.

[03] ``aapa.m...pe0... teja.m... vaaya.m... bhuute... deve... pajaapati.m... brahma.m... aabhassare... subhaki.nhe... vehapphale... abhibhu.m... aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m... vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m... aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m... nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m... di.t.tha.m... suta.m... muta.m... vi~n~naata.m... ekatta.m... naanatta.m... sabba.m... nibbaana.m nibbaanato abhijaanaati; nibbaana.m nibbaanato abhi~n~naaya ^a^V1.0006^ea^ nibbaana.m maa ma~n~ni, nibbaanasmi.m maa ma~n~ni, nibbaanato maa ma~n~ni, nibbaana.m meti maa ma~n~ni, nibbaana.m maabhinandi. ta.m kissa hetu? `pari~n~neyya.m tassaa'ti vadaami.
[06] sekkhavasena {satthaaravasena (sii0), satthuvasena (syaa0 ka0)} dutiyanayabhuumiparicchedo ni.t.thito.

[03] 8^b^.^eb^ ``yopi so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu araha.m khii.naasavo vusitavaa katakara.niiyo ohitabhaaro anuppattasadattho parikkhii.nabhavasa.myojano sammada~n~naa vimutto, sopi pathavi.m pathavito abhijaanaati; pathavi.m pathavito ^a^T1.0007^ea^ abhi~n~naaya pathavi.m na ma~n~nati, pathaviyaa na ma~n~nati, pathavito na ma~n~nati, pathavi.m meti na ma~n~nati, pathavi.m naabhinandati. ta.m kissa hetu? `pari~n~naata.m tassaa'ti vadaami.

[03] ``aapa.m...pe0... teja.m... vaaya.m... bhuute... deve... pajaapati.m... brahma.m... aabhassare... subhaki.nhe... vehapphale... abhibhu.m... aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m... vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m... aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m... nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m... di.t.tha.m... suta.m... muta.m... vi~n~naata.m... ekatta.m... naanatta.m... sabba.m... nibbaana.m nibbaanato abhijaanaati; nibbaana.m nibbaanato abhi~n~naaya nibbaana.m na ma~n~nati, nibbaanasmi.m na ma~n~nati, nibbaanato na ma~n~nati, nibbaana.m meti na ma~n~nati, nibbaana.m naabhinandati. ta.m kissa hetu? `pari~n~naata.m tassaa'ti vadaami.
[06] khii.naasavavasena tatiyanayabhuumiparicchedo ni.t.thito.

[03] 9^b^.^eb^ ``yopi ^a^M1.0006^ea^ so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu araha.m khii.naasavo vusitavaa katakara.niiyo ohitabhaaro anuppattasadattho parikkhii.nabhavasa.myojano sammada~n~naa vimutto, sopi pathavi.m pathavito ^a^P1.0005^ea^ abhijaanaati; pathavi.m pathavito abhi~n~naaya pathavi.m na ma~n~nati, pathaviyaa na ma~n~nati, pathavito na ma~n~nati, pathavi.m meti na ma~n~nati, pathavi.m naabhinandati. ta.m kissa hetu? khayaa raagassa, viitaraagattaa.

[03] ``aapa.m...pe0... teja.m... vaaya.m... bhuute... deve... pajaapati.m... brahma.m... aabhassare... subhaki.nhe... vehapphale... abhibhu.m... aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m... vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m... aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m ^a^V1.0007^ea^... nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m ^a^T1.0008^ea^... di.t.tha.m... suta.m... muta.m... vi~n~naata.m... ekatta.m... naanatta.m... sabba.m... nibbaana.m nibbaanato abhijaanaati; nibbaana.m nibbaanato abhi~n~naaya nibbaana.m na ma~n~nati, nibbaanasmi.m na ma~n~nati, nibbaanato na ma~n~nati, nibbaana.m meti na ma~n~nati, nibbaana.m naabhinandati. ta.m kissa hetu? khayaa raagassa, viitaraagattaa.
[06] khii.naasavavasena catutthanayabhuumiparicchedo ni.t.thito.

[03] 10^b^.^eb^ ``yopi so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu araha.m khii.naasavo vusitavaa katakara.niiyo ohitabhaaro anuppattasadattho parikkhii.nabhavasa.myojano sammada~n~naa vimutto, sopi pathavi.m pathavito abhijaanaati; pathavi.m pathavito abhi~n~naaya pathavi.m na ma~n~nati, pathaviyaa na ma~n~nati, pathavito na ma~n~nati, pathavi.m meti na ma~n~nati, pathavi.m naabhinandati. ta.m kissa hetu? khayaa dosassa, viitadosattaa.

[03] ``aapa.m...pe0... teja.m... vaaya.m... bhuute... deve... pajaapati.m... brahma.m... aabhassare... subhaki.nhe... vehapphale... abhibhu.m... aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m... vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m... aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m... nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m... di.t.tha.m... suta.m... muta.m... vi~n~naata.m... ekatta.m... naanatta.m... sabba.m... nibbaana.m nibbaanato abhijaanaati; nibbaana.m nibbaanato abhi~n~naaya nibbaana.m na ma~n~nati, nibbaanasmi.m na ma~n~nati, nibbaanato na ma~n~nati, nibbaana.m meti na ma~n~nati, nibbaana.m naabhinandati. ta.m kissa hetu? khayaa dosassa, viitadosattaa.
[06] khii.naasavavasena pa~ncamanayabhuumiparicchedo ni.t.thito.

[03] 11^b^.^eb^ ``yopi ^a^T1.0009^ea^ ^a^M1.0007^ea^ so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu araha.m khii.naasavo vusitavaa katakara.niiyo ohitabhaaro anuppattasadattho parikkhii.nabhavasa.myojano sammada~n~naa vimutto, sopi pathavi.m pathavito abhijaanaati; pathavi.m pathavito abhi~n~naaya pathavi.m na ma~n~nati, pathaviyaa na ma~n~nati, pathavito na ma~n~nati, pathavi.m meti na ma~n~nati, pathavi.m naabhinandati. ta.m kissa hetu? khayaa mohassa, viitamohattaa.

[03] ``aapa.m...pe0... teja.m... vaaya.m... bhuute... deve... pajaapati.m... brahma.m... aabhassare... subhaki.nhe... vehapphale... abhibhu.m... aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m... vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m... aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m ^a^V1.0008^ea^... nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m... di.t.tha.m... suta.m... muta.m... vi~n~naata.m... ekatta.m... naanatta.m... sabba.m... nibbaana.m nibbaanato abhijaanaati; nibbaana.m nibbaanato abhi~n~naaya nibbaana.m na ma~n~nati, nibbaanasmi.m na ma~n~nati, nibbaanato na ma~n~nati, nibbaana.m meti na ma~n~nati, nibbaana.m naabhinandati. ta.m kissa hetu? khayaa mohassa, viitamohattaa.
[06] khii.naasavavasena cha.t.thanayabhuumiparicchedo ni.t.thito.

[03] 12^b^.^eb^ ``tathaagatopi, bhikkhave, araha.m sammaasambuddho pathavi.m pathavito abhijaanaati; pathavi.m pathavito abhi~n~naaya pathavi.m na ma~n~nati, pathaviyaa na ma~n~nati, pathavito na ma~n~nati, pathavi.m meti na ma~n~nati, pathavi.m naabhinandati ^a^P1.0006^ea^. ta.m kissa hetu? `pari~n~naatanta.m tathaagatassaa'ti vadaami.

[03] ``aapa.m...pe0... teja.m... vaaya.m... bhuute... deve... pajaapati.m... brahma.m... aabhassare... subhaki.nhe... vehapphale... abhibhu.m... aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m... vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m ^a^T1.0010^ea^... aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m... nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m... di.t.tha.m... suta.m... muta.m... vi~n~naata.m... ekatta.m... naanatta.m... sabba.m... nibbaana.m nibbaanato abhijaanaati; nibbaana.m nibbaanato abhi~n~naaya nibbaana.m na ma~n~nati, nibbaanasmi.m na ma~n~nati, nibbaanato na ma~n~nati, nibbaana.m meti na ma~n~nati, nibbaana.m naabhinandati. ta.m kissa hetu? `pari~n~naatanta.m tathaagatassaa'ti vadaami.
[06] tathaagatavasena sattamanayabhuumiparicchedo ni.t.thito.

[03] 13^b^.^eb^ ``tathaagatopi ^a^M1.0008^ea^, bhikkhave, araha.m sammaasambuddho pathavi.m pathavito abhijaanaati; pathavi.m pathavito abhi~n~naaya pathavi.m na ma~n~nati, pathaviyaa na ma~n~nati, pathavito na ma~n~nati, pathavi.m meti na ma~n~nati, pathavi.m naabhinandati. ta.m kissa hetu? `nandii {nandi (sii0 syaa0)} dukkhassa muula'nti -- iti viditvaa `bhavaa jaati bhuutassa jaraamara.na'nti. tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, `tathaagato sabbaso ta.nhaana.m khayaa viraagaa nirodhaa caagaa pa.tinissaggaa anuttara.m sammaasambodhi.m abhisambuddho'ti vadaami.

[03] ``aapa.m ^a^V1.0009^ea^ ...pe0... teja.m... vaaya.m... bhuute... deve... pajaapati.m... brahma.m... aabhassare... subhaki.nhe... vehapphale... abhibhu.m... aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m... vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m... aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m... nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m... di.t.tha.m... suta.m... muta.m... vi~n~naata.m... ekatta.m... naanatta.m... sabba.m... nibbaana.m nibbaanato abhijaanaati; nibbaana.m nibbaanato abhi~n~naaya nibbaana.m na ma~n~nati, nibbaanasmi.m na ma~n~nati, nibbaanato na ma~n~nati, nibbaana.m meti na ma~n~nati, nibbaana.m naabhinandati. ta.m ^a^T1.0011^ea^ kissa hetu? `nandii dukkhassa muula'nti -- iti viditvaa `bhavaa jaati bhuutassa jaraamara.na'nti. tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, `tathaagato sabbaso ta.nhaana.m khayaa viraagaa nirodhaa caagaa pa.tinissaggaa anuttara.m sammaasambodhi.m abhisambuddho'ti vadaamii''ti.
[06] tathaagatavasena a.t.thamanayabhuumiparicchedo ni.t.thito.
[01] idamavoca bhagavaa. na te bhikkhuu {na attamanaa tebhikkhuu (syaa0), te bhikkhuu (pii0 ka0)} bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandunti.
[06] muulapariyaayasutta.m ni.t.thita.m pa.thama.m.

[03] 14^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T1.0012^ea^ ^a^V1.0010^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``sabbaasavasa.mvarapariyaaya.m vo, bhikkhave, desessaami. ta.m su.naatha ^a^M1.0009^ea^ ^a^P1.0007^ea^, saadhuka.m manasi karotha, bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] 15^b^.^eb^ ``jaanato aha.m, bhikkhave, passato aasavaana.m khaya.m vadaami, no ajaanato no apassato. ki~nca, bhikkhave, jaanato ki~nca passato aasavaana.m khaya.m vadaami? yoniso ca manasikaara.m ayoniso ca manasikaara.m. ayoniso, bhikkhave, manasikaroto anuppannaa ceva aasavaa uppajjanti, uppannaa ca aasavaa pava.d.dhanti; yoniso ca kho, bhikkhave, manasikaroto anuppannaa ceva aasavaa na uppajjanti, uppannaa ca aasavaa pahiiyanti.

[03] 16^b^.^eb^ ``atthi, bhikkhave, aasavaa dassanaa pahaatabbaa, atthi aasavaa sa.mvaraa pahaatabbaa, atthi aasavaa pa.tisevanaa pahaatabbaa, atthi aasavaa adhivaasanaa pahaatabbaa, atthi aasavaa parivajjanaa pahaatabbaa, atthi aasavaa vinodanaa pahaatabbaa, atthi aasavaa bhaavanaa pahaatabbaa.

[03] 17^b^.^eb^ ``katame ca, bhikkhave, aasavaa dassanaa pahaatabbaa? idha, bhikkhave ^a^T1.0013^ea^, assutavaa puthujjano -- ariyaana.m adassaavii ariyadhammassa akovido ariyadhamme aviniito, sappurisaana.m adassaavii sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme aviniito -- manasikara.niiye dhamme nappajaanaati, amanasikara.niiye dhamme nappajaanaati. so manasikara.niiye dhamme appajaananto amanasikara.niiye dhamme appajaananto, ye dhammaa na manasikara.niiyaa, te dhamme manasi karoti, ye dhammaa manasikara.niiyaa te dhamme na manasi karoti.

[03] ``katame ^a^V1.0011^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, dhammaa na manasikara.niiyaa ye dhamme manasi karoti? yassa, bhikkhave, dhamme manasikaroto anuppanno vaa kaamaasavo uppajjati, uppanno vaa kaamaasavo pava.d.dhati; anuppanno vaa bhavaasavo uppajjati, uppanno vaa bhavaasavo pava.d.dhati; anuppanno vaa avijjaasavo uppajjati, uppanno vaa avijjaasavo pava.d.dhati -- ime dhammaa na manasikara.niiyaa ye dhamme manasi karoti.

[03] ``katame ^a^M1.0010^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, dhammaa manasikara.niiyaa ye dhamme na manasi karoti? yassa, bhikkhave, dhamme manasikaroto anuppanno vaa kaamaasavo na uppajjati, uppanno vaa kaamaasavo pahiiyati; anuppanno vaa bhavaasavo na uppajjati, uppanno vaa bhavaasavo pahiiyati; anuppanno vaa avijjaasavo na uppajjati, uppanno vaa avijjaasavo pahiiyati -- ime dhammaa manasikara.niiyaa ye dhamme na manasi karoti.

[03] ``tassa amanasikara.niiyaana.m ^a^P1.0008^ea^ dhammaana.m manasikaaraa manasikara.niiyaana.m dhammaana.m amanasikaaraa anuppannaa ceva aasavaa uppajjanti uppannaa ca aasavaa ^a^T1.0014^ea^ pava.d.dhanti.

[03] 18^b^.^eb^ ``so eva.m ayoniso manasi karoti -- `ahosi.m nu kho aha.m atiitamaddhaana.m? na nu kho ahosi.m atiitamaddhaana.m? ki.m nu kho ahosi.m atiitamaddhaana.m? katha.m nu kho ahosi.m atiitamaddhaana.m? ki.m hutvaa ki.m ahosi.m nu kho aha.m atiitamaddhaana.m? bhavissaami nu kho aha.m anaagatamaddhaana.m? na nu kho bhavissaami anaagatamaddhaana.m? ki.m nu kho bhavissaami anaagatamaddhaana.m? katha.m nu kho bhavissaami anaagatamaddhaana.m? ki.m hutvaa ki.m bhavissaami nu kho aha.m anaagatamaddhaana'nti? etarahi vaa paccuppannamaddhaana.m {paccuppannamaddhaana.m aarabbha (syaa0)} ajjhatta.m katha.mkathii hoti -- `aha.m nu khosmi? no nu khosmi? ki.m nu khosmi? katha.m nu khosmi? aya.m nu kho satto kuto aagato? so kuhi.m gaamii bhavissatii'ti?

[03] 19^b^.^eb^ ``tassa eva.m ayoniso manasikaroto channa.m di.t.thiina.m a~n~nataraa di.t.thi uppajjati. `atthi me attaa'ti vaa assa {vaassa (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} saccato thetato di.t.thi uppajjati; `natthi me attaa'ti vaa assa saccato thetato di.t.thi uppajjati; `attanaava attaana.m sa~njaanaamii'ti vaa assa saccato thetato ^a^V1.0012^ea^ di.t.thi uppajjati; `attanaava anattaana.m sa~njaanaamii'ti vaa assa saccato thetato di.t.thi uppajjati; `anattanaava attaana.m sa~njaanaamii'ti vaa assa saccato thetato di.t.thi uppajjati; atha vaa panassa eva.m di.t.thi hoti -- `yo me aya.m attaa vado vedeyyo tatra tatra kalyaa.napaapakaana.m kammaana.m vipaaka.m pa.tisa.mvedeti so kho pana me aya.m attaa nicco dhuvo sassato avipari.naamadhammo ^a^M1.0011^ea^ sassatisama.m tatheva .thassatii'ti. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave ^a^T1.0015^ea^, di.t.thigata.m di.t.thigahana.m di.t.thikantaara.m di.t.thivisuuka.m di.t.thivipphandita.m di.t.thisa.myojana.m. di.t.thisa.myojanasa.myutto, bhikkhave, assutavaa puthujjano na parimuccati jaatiyaa jaraaya mara.nena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upaayaasehi; `na parimuccati dukkhasmaa'ti vadaami.

[03] 20^b^.^eb^ ``sutavaa ca kho, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako -- ariyaana.m dassaavii ariyadhammassa kovido ariyadhamme suviniito, sappurisaana.m dassaavii sappurisadhammassa kovido sappurisadhamme suviniito -- manasikara.niiye dhamme pajaanaati amanasikara.niiye dhamme pajaanaati. so manasikara.niiye dhamme pajaananto amanasikara.niiye dhamme pajaananto ye dhammaa na ^a^P1.0009^ea^ manasikara.niiyaa te dhamme na manasi karoti, ye dhammaa manasikara.niiyaa te dhamme manasi karoti.

[03] ``katame ca, bhikkhave, dhammaa na manasikara.niiyaa ye dhamme na manasi karoti? yassa, bhikkhave, dhamme manasikaroto anuppanno vaa kaamaasavo uppajjati, uppanno vaa kaamaasavo pava.d.dhati; anuppanno vaa bhavaasavo uppajjati, uppanno vaa bhavaasavo pava.d.dhati; anuppanno vaa avijjaasavo uppajjati, uppanno vaa avijjaasavo pava.d.dhati -- ime dhammaa na manasikara.niiyaa, ye dhamme na manasi karoti.

[03] ``katame ca, bhikkhave, dhammaa manasikara.niiyaa ye dhamme manasi karoti? yassa, bhikkhave, dhamme manasikaroto anuppanno vaa kaamaasavo na uppajjati, uppanno vaa kaamaasavo pahiiyati; anuppanno vaa bhavaasavo na uppajjati ^a^T1.0016^ea^, uppanno vaa bhavaasavo pahiiyati; anuppanno vaa avijjaasavo na uppajjati, uppanno vaa avijjaasavo pahiiyati -- ime dhammaa manasikara.niiyaa ye dhamme manasi karoti.
[03] ``tassa amanasikara.niiyaana.m dhammaana.m amanasikaaraa manasikara.niiyaana.m dhammaana.m manasikaaraa anuppannaa ceva aasavaa na uppajjanti, uppannaa ca aasavaa pahiiyanti.

[03] 21^b^.^eb^ ``so ^a^V1.0013^ea^ `ida.m dukkha'nti yoniso manasi karoti, `aya.m dukkhasamudayo'ti yoniso manasi karoti, `aya.m dukkhanirodho'ti yoniso ^a^M1.0012^ea^ manasi karoti, `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yoniso manasi karoti. tassa eva.m yoniso manasikaroto tii.ni sa.myojanaani pahiiyanti -- sakkaayadi.t.thi, vicikicchaa, siilabbataparaamaaso. ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, aasavaa dassanaa pahaatabbaa.

[03] 22^b^.^eb^ ``katame ca, bhikkhave, aasavaa sa.mvaraa pahaatabbaa? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pa.tisa"nkhaa yoniso cakkhundriyasa.mvarasa.mvuto viharati. ya~nhissa, bhikkhave, cakkhundriyasa.mvara.m asa.mvutassa viharato uppajjeyyu.m aasavaa vighaatapari.laahaa, cakkhundriyasa.mvara.m sa.mvutassa viharato eva.msa te aasavaa vighaatapari.laahaa na honti. pa.tisa"nkhaa yoniso sotindriyasa.mvarasa.mvuto viharati...pe0... ghaanindriyasa.mvarasa.mvuto viharati...pe0... jivhindriyasa.mvarasa.mvuto viharati...pe0... kaayindriyasa.mvarasa.mvuto viharati...pe0... manindriyasa.mvarasa.mvuto viharati. ya~nhissa, bhikkhave ^a^T1.0017^ea^, manindriyasa.mvara.m asa.mvutassa viharato uppajjeyyu.m aasavaa vighaatapari.laahaa, manindriyasa.mvara.m sa.mvutassa viharato eva.msa te aasavaa vighaatapari.laahaa na honti.

[03] ``ya~nhissa, bhikkhave, sa.mvara.m asa.mvutassa viharato uppajjeyyu.m aasavaa vighaatapari.laahaa ^a^P1.0010^ea^, sa.mvara.m sa.mvutassa viharato eva.msa te aasavaa vighaatapari.laahaa na honti. ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, aasavaa sa.mvaraa pahaatabbaa.

[03] 23^b^.^eb^ ``katame ca, bhikkhave, aasavaa pa.tisevanaa pahaatabbaa? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pa.tisa"nkhaa yoniso ciivara.m pa.tisevati -- `yaavadeva siitassa pa.tighaataaya, u.nhassa pa.tighaataaya, .da.msamakasavaataatapasarii.msapa- {siri.msapa (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} samphassaana.m pa.tighaataaya, yaavadeva hirikopiinappa.ticchaadanattha.m'.

[03] ``pa.tisa"nkhaa yoniso pi.n.dapaata.m pa.tisevati -- `neva davaaya, na madaaya, na ma.n.danaaya, na ^a^V1.0014^ea^ vibhuusanaaya, yaavadeva imassa kaayassa .thitiyaa yaapanaaya, vihi.msuuparatiyaa, brahmacariyaanuggahaaya, iti puraa.na~nca vedana.m pa.tiha"nkhaami nava~nca ^a^M1.0013^ea^ vedana.m na uppaadessaami, yaatraa ca me bhavissati anavajjataa ca phaasuvihaaro ca' {caati (sii0)}.

[03] ``pa.tisa"nkhaa yoniso senaasana.m pa.tisevati -- `yaavadeva siitassa pa.tighaataaya, u.nhassa pa.tighaataaya, .da.msamakasavaataatapasarii.msapasamphassaana.m pa.tighaataaya, yaavadeva utuparissayavinodanapa.tisallaanaaraamattha.m'.

[03] ``pa.tisa"nkhaa yoniso gilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaara.m pa.tisevati -- `yaavadeva uppannaana.m veyyaabaadhikaana.m vedanaana.m pa.tighaataaya, abyaabajjhaparamataaya' {abyaapajjhaparamataaya (sii0 syaa0 pii0), abyaapajjaparamataaya (ka0)}.

[03] ``ya~nhissa, bhikkhave, appa.tisevato uppajjeyyu.m aasavaa ^a^T1.0018^ea^ vighaatapari.laahaa, pa.tisevato eva.msa te aasavaa vighaatapari.laahaa na honti. ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, aasavaa pa.tisevanaa pahaatabbaa.

[03] 24^b^.^eb^ ``katame ca, bhikkhave, aasavaa adhivaasanaa pahaatabbaa? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pa.tisa"nkhaa yoniso khamo hoti siitassa u.nhassa, jighacchaaya pipaasaaya. .da.msamakasavaataatapasarii.msapasamphassaana.m, duruttaana.m duraagataana.m vacanapathaana.m, uppannaana.m saariirikaana.m vedanaana.m dukkhaana.m tibbaana.m {tippaana.m (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} kharaana.m ka.tukaana.m asaataana.m amanaapaana.m paa.naharaana.m adhivaasakajaatiko hoti.

[03] ``ya~nhissa, bhikkhave, anadhivaasayato uppajjeyyu.m aasavaa vighaatapari.laahaa, adhivaasayato eva.msa te aasavaa vighaatapari.laahaa na honti. ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, aasavaa adhivaasanaa pahaatabbaa.

[03] 25^b^.^eb^ ``katame ca, bhikkhave, aasavaa parivajjanaa pahaatabbaa? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ^a^V1.0015^ea^ pa.tisa"nkhaa yoniso ca.n.da.m hatthi.m parivajjeti, ca.n.da.m assa.m parivajjeti, ca.n.da.m go.na.m parivajjeti, ca.n.da.m kukkura.m parivajjeti, ahi.m khaa.nu.m ka.n.taka.t.thaana.m ^a^P1.0011^ea^ sobbha.m papaata.m candanika.m o.ligalla.m. yathaaruupe anaasane nisinna.m ^a^M1.0014^ea^ yathaaruupe agocare caranta.m yathaaruupe paapake mitte bhajanta.m vi~n~nuu sabrahmacaarii paapakesu .thaanesu okappeyyu.m, so ta~nca anaasana.m ta~nca agocara.m te ca ^a^T1.0019^ea^ paapake mitte pa.tisa"nkhaa yoniso parivajjeti.

[03] ``ya~nhissa, bhikkhave, aparivajjayato uppajjeyyu.m aasavaa vighaatapari.laahaa, parivajjayato eva.msa te aasavaa vighaatapari.laahaa na honti. ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, aasavaa parivajjanaa pahaatabbaa.

[03] 26^b^.^eb^ ``katame ca, bhikkhave, aasavaa vinodanaa pahaatabbaa? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pa.tisa"nkhaa yoniso uppanna.m kaamavitakka.m naadhivaaseti pajahati vinodeti byantiikaroti anabhaava.m gameti, uppanna.m byaapaadavitakka.m...pe0... uppanna.m vihi.msaavitakka.m...pe0... uppannuppanne paapake akusale dhamme naadhivaaseti pajahati vinodeti byantiikaroti anabhaava.m gameti.
[03] ``ya~nhissa, bhikkhave, avinodayato uppajjeyyu.m aasavaa vighaatapari.laahaa, vinodayato eva.msa te aasavaa vighaatapari.laahaa na honti. ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, aasavaa vinodanaa pahaatabbaa.

[03] 27^b^.^eb^ ``katame ca, bhikkhave, aasavaa bhaavanaa pahaatabbaa? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pa.tisa"nkhaa yoniso satisambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m; pa.tisa"nkhaa yoniso dhammavicayasambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti...pe0... viiriyasambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti... piitisambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti... ^a^V1.0016^ea^ passaddhisambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti... samaadhisambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti... upekkhaasambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m.

[01] ``ya~nhissa, bhikkhave ^a^T1.0020^ea^, abhaavayato uppajjeyyu.m aasavaa vighaatapari.laahaa, bhaavayato eva.msa te aasavaa vighaatapari.laahaa na honti. ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, aasavaa bhaavanaa pahaatabbaa.

[03] 28^b^.^eb^ ``yato kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ye aasavaa dassanaa pahaatabbaa te dassanaa pahiinaa honti, ye aasavaa sa.mvaraa pahaatabbaa ^a^M1.0015^ea^ te sa.mvaraa pahiinaa honti, ye aasavaa pa.tisevanaa pahaatabbaa te pa.tisevanaa pahiinaa honti, ye aasavaa adhivaasanaa pahaatabbaa te adhivaasanaa pahiinaa honti, ye aasavaa parivajjanaa pahaatabbaa ^a^P1.0012^ea^ te parivajjanaa pahiinaa honti, ye aasavaa vinodanaa pahaatabbaa te vinodanaa pahiinaa honti, ye aasavaa bhaavanaa pahaatabbaa te bhaavanaa pahiinaa honti; aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave -- `bhikkhu sabbaasavasa.mvarasa.mvuto viharati, acchecchi {acchejji (ka0)} ta.nha.m, vivattayi {vaavattayi (sii0 pii0)} sa.myojana.m, sammaa maanaabhisamayaa antamakaasi dukkhassaa'''ti.
[03] idamavoca bhagavaa. attamanaa te bhikkhuu bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandunti.
[06] sabbaasavasutta.m ni.t.thita.m dutiya.m.

[03] 29^b^.^eb^ ^a^T1.0021^ea^ ^a^V1.0017^ea^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``dhammadaayaadaa me, bhikkhave, bhavatha, maa aamisadaayaadaa. atthi me tumhesu anukampaa -- `kinti me saavakaa dhammadaayaadaa bhaveyyu.m, no aamisadaayaadaa'ti. tumhe ca me, bhikkhave, aamisadaayaadaa bhaveyyaatha no dhammadaayaadaa, tumhepi tena aadiyaa {aadissaa (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} bhaveyyaatha -- `aamisadaayaadaa satthusaavakaa viharanti, no dhammadaayaadaa'ti; ahampi tena aadiyo bhaveyya.m -- `aamisadaayaadaa satthusaavakaa viharanti, no dhammadaayaadaa'ti. tumhe ca me, bhikkhave, dhammadaayaadaa bhaveyyaatha, no aamisadaayaadaa, tumhepi tena na aadiyaa bhaveyyaatha -- `dhammadaayaadaa satthusaavakaa viharanti, no aamisadaayaadaa'ti; ahampi tena na aadiyo bhaveyya.m -- `dhammadaayaadaa satthusaavakaa viharanti, no aamisadaayaadaa'ti. tasmaatiha me, bhikkhave, dhammadaayaadaa bhavatha, maa aamisadaayaadaa. atthi me ^a^M1.0016^ea^ tumhesu anukampaa -- `kinti me saavakaa dhammadaayaadaa bhaveyyu.m, no aamisadaayaadaa'ti.

[03] 30^b^.^eb^ ``idhaaha.m, bhikkhave, bhuttaavii assa.m pavaarito paripu.n.no pariyosito ^a^T1.0022^ea^ suhito yaavadattho; siyaa ca me pi.n.dapaato atirekadhammo cha.d.daniiyadhammo {cha.d.diyadhammo (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}. atha dve bhikkhuu aagaccheyyu.m jighacchaadubbalya- {jighacchaadubballa (sii0 pii0)} paretaa ^a^P1.0013^ea^. tyaaha.m eva.m vadeyya.m -- `aha.m khomhi, bhikkhave, bhuttaavii pavaarito paripu.n.no pariyosito suhito yaavadattho; atthi ca me aya.m pi.n.dapaato atirekadhammo cha.d.daniiyadhammo. sace aaka"nkhatha, bhu~njatha, no ce tumhe bhu~njissatha {sace tumhe na bhu~njissatha (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}, idaanaaha.m appaharite vaa cha.d.dessaami, appaa.nake vaa udake opilaapessaamii'ti. tatrekassa bhikkhuno evamassa -- `bhagavaa kho bhuttaavii pavaarito paripu.n.no pariyosito suhito yaavadattho; atthi caaya.m bhagavato pi.n.dapaato atirekadhammo cha.d.daniiyadhammo. sace maya.m na bhu~njissaama, idaani bhagavaa appaharite vaa cha.d.dessati, appaa.nake vaa udake opilaapessati' ^a^V1.0018^ea^. vutta.m kho paneta.m bhagavataa -- `dhammadaayaadaa me, bhikkhave, bhavatha, maa aamisadaayaadaa'ti. aamisa~n~natara.m kho paneta.m, yadida.m pi.n.dapaato. ya.mnuunaaha.m ima.m pi.n.dapaata.m abhu~njitvaa iminaava jighacchaadubbalyena eva.m ima.m rattindiva.m {rattidiva.m (ka0)} viitinaameyya''nti. so ta.m pi.n.dapaata.m abhu~njitvaa teneva jighacchaadubbalyena eva.m ta.m rattindiva.m viitinaameyya. atha dutiyassa bhikkhuno evamassa -- `bhagavaa kho bhuttaavii pavaarito paripu.n.no pariyosito suhito yaavadattho; atthi caaya.m bhagavato pi.n.dapaato atirekadhammo cha.d.daniiyadhammo. sace maya.m na bhu~njissaama, idaani bhagavaa appaharite vaa cha.d.dessati, appaa.nake ^a^T1.0023^ea^ vaa udake opilaapessati. ya.mnuunaaha.m ima.m pi.n.dapaata.m bhu~njitvaa jighacchaadubbalya.m pa.tivinodetvaa {pa.tivinetvaa (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} eva.m ima.m rattindiva.m viitinaameyya'nti. so ta.m pi.n.dapaata.m bhu~njitvaa jighacchaadubbalya.m pa.tivinodetvaa eva.m ta.m rattindiva.m viitinaameyya. ki~ncaapi so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ta.m pi.n.dapaata.m bhu~njitvaa jighacchaadubbalya.m pa.tivinodetvaa eva.m ta.m rattindiva.m viitinaameyya, atha kho asuyeva me purimo bhikkhu pujjataro ca paasa.msataro ca. ta.m kissa hetu? ta~nhi tassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno diigharatta.m ^a^M1.0017^ea^ appicchataaya santu.t.thiyaa sallekhaaya subharataaya viiriyaarambhaaya sa.mvattissati. tasmaatiha me, bhikkhave, dhammadaayaadaa bhavatha, maa aamisadaayaadaa. atthi me tumhesu anukampaa -- `kinti me saavakaa dhammadaayaadaa bhaveyyu.m, no aamisadaayaadaa'''ti.
[03] idamavoca bhagavaa. ida.m vatvaana {vatvaa (sii0 pii0) evamiidisesu .thaanesu} sugato u.t.thaayaasanaa vihaara.m paavisi.

[03] 31^b^.^eb^ tatra kho aayasmaa saariputto acirapakkantassa bhagavato bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``aavuso bhikkhave''ti. ``aavuso''ti kho te ^a^P1.0014^ea^ bhikkhuu aayasmato saariputtassa paccassosu.m. aayasmaa saariputto etadavoca --

[01] ``kittaavataa nu kho, aavuso, satthu pavivittassa viharato saavakaa viveka.m naanusikkhanti, kittaavataa ca pana satthu pavivittassa viharato saavakaa vivekamanusikkhantii''ti? ``duuratopi kho maya.m, aavuso, aagacchaama ^a^T1.0024^ea^ aayasmato saariputtassa santike etassa bhaasitassa atthama~n~naatu.m. saadhu vataayasmanta.myeva saariputta.m pa.tibhaatu etassa bhaasitassa attho; aayasmato saariputtassa sutvaa bhikkhuu dhaaressantii''ti. ``tena ^a^V1.0019^ea^ haavuso, su.naatha, saadhuka.m manasi karotha, bhaasissaamii''ti. ``evamaavuso''ti kho te bhikkhuu aayasmato saariputtassa paccassosu.m. aayasmaa saariputto etadavoca --

[01] ``kittaavataa nu kho, aavuso, satthu pavivittassa viharato saavakaa viveka.m naanusikkhanti? idhaavuso, satthu pavivittassa viharato saavakaa viveka.m naanusikkhanti, yesa~nca dhammaana.m satthaa pahaanamaaha, te ca dhamme nappajahanti, baahulikaa {baahullikaa (syaa0)} ca honti, saathalikaa, okkamane pubba"ngamaa, paviveke nikkhittadhuraa. tatraavuso, theraa bhikkhuu tiihi .thaanehi gaarayhaa bhavanti. `satthu pavivittassa viharato saavakaa viveka.m naanusikkhantii'ti -- iminaa pa.thamena .thaanena theraa bhikkhuu gaarayhaa bhavanti. `yesa~nca dhammaana.m satthaa pahaanamaaha te ca dhamme nappajahantii'ti -- iminaa dutiyena ^a^M1.0018^ea^ .thaanena theraa bhikkhuu gaarayhaa bhavanti. `baahulikaa ca, saathalikaa, okkamane pubba"ngamaa, paviveke nikkhittadhuraa'ti -- iminaa tatiyena .thaanena theraa bhikkhuu gaarayhaa bhavanti. theraa, aavuso, bhikkhuu imehi tiihi .thaanehi gaarayhaa bhavanti. tatraavuso, majjhimaa bhikkhuu...pe0... navaa bhikkhuu tiihi .thaanehi gaarayhaa bhavanti. `satthu pavivittassa viharato ^a^T1.0025^ea^ saavakaa viveka.m naanusikkhantii'ti -- iminaa pa.thamena .thaanena navaa bhikkhuu gaarayhaa bhavanti. `yesa~nca dhammaana.m satthaa pahaanamaaha te ca dhamme nappajahantii'ti -- iminaa dutiyena .thaanena navaa bhikkhuu gaarayhaa bhavanti. `baahulikaa ca honti, saathalikaa, okkamane pubba"ngamaa, paviveke nikkhittadhuraa'ti -- iminaa tatiyena .thaanena navaa bhikkhuu gaarayhaa bhavanti. navaa, aavuso, bhikkhuu imehi tiihi .thaanehi gaarayhaa bhavanti. ettaavataa kho, aavuso, satthu pavivittassa viharato saavakaa viveka.m naanusikkhanti.

[03] 32^b^.^eb^ ``kittaavataa ca, panaavuso, satthu pavivittassa viharato saavakaa vivekamanusikkhanti ^a^P1.0015^ea^? idhaavuso, satthu pavivittassa viharato saavakaa vivekamanusikkhanti -- yesa~nca dhammaana.m satthaa pahaanamaaha te ca dhamme pajahanti; na ca baahulikaa honti, na saathalikaa okkamane nikkhittadhuraa paviveke pubba"ngamaa. tatraavuso, theraa bhikkhuu tiihi .thaanehi paasa.msaa bhavanti. `satthu pavivittassa viharato saavakaa vivekamanusikkhantii'ti -- iminaa pa.thamena .thaanena theraa bhikkhuu paasa.msaa bhavanti. `yesa~nca dhammaana.m satthaa pahaanamaaha te ca dhamme pajahantii'ti -- iminaa dutiyena .thaanena theraa bhikkhuu paasa.msaa ^a^V1.0020^ea^ bhavanti. `na ca baahulikaa, na saathalikaa okkamane nikkhittadhuraa paviveke pubba"ngamaa'ti -- iminaa tatiyena .thaanena theraa bhikkhuu paasa.msaa bhavanti. theraa, aavuso, bhikkhuu imehi tiihi .thaanehi paasa.msaa bhavanti ^a^T1.0026^ea^. tatraavuso, majjhimaa bhikkhuu...pe0... navaa bhikkhuu tiihi .thaanehi paasa.msaa bhavanti. `satthu pavivittassa viharato saavakaa vivekamanusikkhantii'ti -- iminaa pa.thamena .thaanena navaa bhikkhuu paasa.msaa bhavanti. `yesa~nca dhammaana.m satthaa pahaanamaaha te ca dhamme pajahantii'ti -- iminaa dutiyena .thaanena navaa bhikkhuu paasa.msaa bhavanti. `na ca baahulikaa, na saathalikaa okkamane nikkhittadhuraa paviveke pubba"ngamaa'ti -- iminaa tatiyena .thaanena navaa bhikkhuu paasa.msaa bhavanti. navaa, aavuso, bhikkhuu imehi ^a^M1.0019^ea^ tiihi .thaanehi paasa.msaa bhavanti. ettaavataa kho, aavuso, satthu pavivittassa viharato saavakaa vivekamanusikkhanti.

[03] 33^b^.^eb^ ``tatraavuso, lobho ca paapako doso ca paapako. lobhassa ca pahaanaaya dosassa ca pahaanaaya atthi majjhimaa pa.tipadaa cakkhukara.nii ~naa.nakara.nii upasamaaya abhi~n~naaya sambodhaaya nibbaanaaya sa.mvattati. katamaa ca saa, aavuso, majjhimaa pa.tipadaa cakkhukara.nii ~naa.nakara.nii upasamaaya abhi~n~naaya sambodhaaya nibbaanaaya sa.mvattati? ayameva ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo, seyyathida.m {seyyathiida.m (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} -- sammaadi.t.thi sammaasa"nkappo sammaavaacaa sammaakammanto sammaaaajiivo sammaavaayaamo sammaasati sammaasamaadhi. aya.m kho saa, aavuso, majjhimaa pa.tipadaa cakkhukara.nii ~naa.nakara.nii upasamaaya abhi~n~naaya sambodhaaya nibbaanaaya sa.mvattati.

[01] ``tatraavuso, kodho ca paapako upanaaho ca ^a^T1.0027^ea^ paapako...pe0... makkho ca paapako pa.laaso ca paapako, issaa ca paapikaa macchera~nca paapaka.m, maayaa ca paapikaa saa.theyya~nca paapaka.m, thambho ca paapako saarambho ^a^P1.0016^ea^ ca paapako, maano ca paapako atimaano ca paapako, mado ca paapako pamaado ca paapako. madassa ca pahaanaaya pamaadassa ca pahaanaaya atthi majjhimaa pa.tipadaa cakkhukara.nii ~naa.nakara.nii upasamaaya abhi~n~naaya sambodhaaya nibbaanaaya sa.mvattati. katamaa ca saa, aavuso, majjhimaa pa.tipadaa cakkhukara.nii ~naa.nakara.nii upasamaaya abhi~n~naaya sambodhaaya nibbaanaaya sa.mvattati? ayameva ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo, seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi sammaasa"nkappo sammaavaacaa sammaakammanto sammaaaajiivo sammaavaayaamo sammaasati sammaasamaadhi. aya.m kho saa, aavuso, majjhimaa ^a^V1.0021^ea^ pa.tipadaa cakkhukara.nii ~naa.nakara.nii upasamaaya abhi~n~naaya sambodhaaya nibbaanaaya sa.mvattatii''ti.
[03] idamavocaayasmaa saariputto. attamanaa te bhikkhuu aayasmato saariputtassa bhaasita.m abhinandunti.
[06] dhammadaayaadasutta.m ni.t.thita.m tatiya.m.

[03] 34^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^M1.0020^ea^ ^a^V1.0022^ea^ ^a^T1.0028^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. atha kho jaa.nusso.ni braahma.no yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m {saaraa.niiya.m (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho jaa.nusso.ni braahma.no bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``yeme, bho gotama, kulaputtaa bhavanta.m gotama.m uddissa saddhaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitaa, bhava.m tesa.m gotamo pubba"ngamo, bhava.m tesa.m gotamo bahukaaro, bhava.m tesa.m gotamo samaadapetaa {samaadaapetaa (?)}; bhoto ca pana gotamassa saa janataa di.t.thaanugati.m aapajjatii''ti. ``evameta.m, braahma.na, evameta.m, braahma.na! ye te, braahma.na, kulaputtaa mama.m uddissa saddhaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitaa, aha.m tesa.m pubba"ngamo, aha.m tesa.m bahukaaro, aha.m tesa.m samaadapetaa; mama ca pana saa janataa di.t.thaanugati.m aapajjatii''ti. ``durabhisambhavaani hi kho, bho gotama, ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani, dukkara.m paviveka.m, durabhirama.m ekatte, haranti ma~n~ne mano vanaani samaadhi.m alabhamaanassa bhikkhuno''ti ^a^P1.0017^ea^. ``evameta.m, braahma.na, evameta.m, braahma.na! durabhisambhavaani hi kho, braahma.na, ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani ^a^T1.0029^ea^ senaasanaani, dukkara.m paviveka.m, durabhirama.m ekatte, haranti ma~n~ne mano vanaani samaadhi.m alabhamaanassa bhikkhuno''ti.

[03] 35^b^.^eb^ ``mayhampi kho, braahma.na, pubbeva sambodhaa anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato etadahosi -- `durabhisambhavaani hi kho ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani, dukkara.m paviveka.m, durabhirama.m ekatte, haranti ma~n~ne mano vanaani samaadhi.m alabhamaanassa bhikkhuno'ti. tassa mayha.m braahma.na, etadahosi -- `ye kho keci sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa aparisuddhakaayakammantaa ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevanti, aparisuddhakaayakammantasandosahetu have te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa akusala.m bhayabherava.m avhaayanti. na kho panaaha.m aparisuddhakaayakammanto ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevaami; parisuddhakaayakammantohamasmi. ye hi vo ariyaa parisuddhakaayakammantaa ^a^M1.0021^ea^ ara~n~navanapatthaani ^a^V1.0023^ea^ pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevanti tesamaha.m a~n~nataro'ti. etamaha.m, braahma.na, parisuddhakaayakammata.m attani sampassamaano bhiyyo pallomamaapaadi.m ara~n~ne vihaaraaya.

[03] 36^b^.^eb^ ``tassa mayha.m, braahma.na, etadahosi -- `ye kho keci sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa aparisuddhavaciikammantaa...pe0... aparisuddhamanokammantaa ^a^T1.0030^ea^ ...pe0... aparisuddhaajiivaa ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevanti, aparisuddhaajiivasandosahetu have te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa akusala.m bhayabherava.m avhaayanti. na kho panaaha.m aparisuddhaajiivo ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevaami; parisuddhaajiivohamasmi. ye hi vo ariyaa parisuddhaajiivaa ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevanti tesamaha.m a~n~nataro'ti. etamaha.m, braahma.na, parisuddhaajiivata.m attani sampassamaano bhiyyo pallomamaapaadi.m ara~n~ne vihaaraaya.

[03] 37^b^.^eb^ ``tassa mayha.m, braahma.na, etadahosi -- `ye kho keci sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa abhijjhaaluu kaamesu tibbasaaraagaa ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevanti, abhijjhaalukaamesutibbasaaraagasandosahetu have te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa akusala.m bhayabherava.m avhaayanti. na kho panaaha.m abhijjhaalu kaamesu tibbasaaraago ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevaami; anabhijjhaaluuhamasmi. ye hi vo ariyaa anabhijjhaaluu ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevanti ^a^P1.0018^ea^, tesamaha.m a~n~nataro'ti. etamaha.m, braahma.na, anabhijjhaaluta.m attani sampassamaano bhiyyo pallomamaapaadi.m ara~n~ne vihaaraaya.

[03] 38^b^.^eb^ ``tassa mayha.m, braahma.na, etadahosi -- `ye kho keci sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa byaapannacittaa padu.t.thamanasa"nkappaa ara~n~navanapatthaani ^a^T1.0031^ea^ pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevanti, byaapannacittapadu.t.thamanasa"nkappasandosahetu have te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa akusala.m bhayabherava.m avhaayanti. na kho panaaha.m byaapannacitto padu.t.thamanasa"nkappo ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevaami; mettacittohamasmi. ye hi vo ariyaa mettacittaa ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevanti tesamaha.m a~n~nataro'ti. etamaha.m, braahma.na, mettacittata.m attani sampassamaano bhiyyo pallomamaapaadi.m ara~n~ne vihaaraaya.

[03] 39^b^.^eb^ ``tassa ^a^M1.0022^ea^ ^a^V1.0024^ea^ mayha.m, braahma.na, etadahosi -- `ye kho keci sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa thiinamiddhapariyu.t.thitaa ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevanti, thiinamiddhapariyu.t.thaanasandosahetu have te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa akusala.m bhayabherava.m avhaayanti. na kho panaaha.m thiinamiddhapariyu.t.thito ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevaami; vigatathiinamiddhohamasmi. ye hi vo ariyaa vigatathiinamiddhaa ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevanti tesamaha.m a~n~nataro'ti. etamaha.m, braahma.na, vigatathiinamiddhata.m attani sampassamaano bhiyyo pallomamaapaadi.m ara~n~ne vihaaraaya.

[03] 40^b^.^eb^ ``tassa mayha.m, braahma.na, etadahosi -- `ye kho keci sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa uddhataa avuupasantacittaa ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevanti, uddhataavuupasantacittasandosahetu ^a^T1.0032^ea^ have te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa akusala.m bhayabherava.m avhaayanti. na kho panaaha.m uddhato avuupasantacitto ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevaami; vuupasantacittohamasmi. ye hi vo ariyaa vuupasantacittaa ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevanti, tesamaha.m a~n~nataro'ti. etamaha.m, braahma.na, vuupasantacittata.m attani sampassamaano bhiyyo pallomamaapaadi.m ara~n~ne vihaaraaya.

[03] 41^b^.^eb^ ``tassa mayha.m, braahma.na, etadahosi -- `ye kho keci sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa ka"nkhii vicikicchii ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevanti, ka"nkhivicikicchisandosahetu have te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa akusala.m bhayabherava.m avhaayanti. na kho panaaha.m ka"nkhii vicikicchii ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevaami; ti.n.navicikicchohamasmi. ye hi vo ariyaa ti.n.navicikicchaa ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevanti tesamaha.m a~n~nataro'ti. etamaha.m, braahma.na, ti.n.navicikicchata.m attani sampassamaano ^a^P1.0019^ea^ bhiyyo pallomamaapaadi.m ara~n~ne vihaaraaya.

[03] 42^b^.^eb^ ``tassa mayha.m, braahma.na, etadahosi -- `ye kho keci sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa attukka.msakaa paravambhii ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevanti, attukka.msanaparavambhanasandosahetu have te bhonto ^a^M1.0023^ea^ sama.nabraahma.naa akusala.m bhayabherava.m avhaayanti ^a^T1.0033^ea^. na kho panaaha.m attukka.msako paravambhii ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevaami ^a^V1.0025^ea^; anattukka.msako aparavambhiihamasmi. ye hi vo ariyaa anattukka.msakaa aparavambhii ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevanti tesamaha.m a~n~nataro'ti. etamaha.m, braahma.na, anattukka.msakata.m aparavambhita.m attani sampassamaano bhiyyo pallomamaapaadi.m ara~n~ne vihaaraaya.

[03] 43^b^.^eb^ ``tassa mayha.m, braahma.na, etadahosi -- `ye kho keci sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa chambhii bhiirukajaatikaa ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevanti, chambhibhiirukajaatikasandosahetu have te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa akusala.m bhayabherava.m avhaayanti. na kho panaaha.m chambhii bhiirukajaatiko ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevaami; vigatalomaha.msohamasmi. ye hi vo ariyaa vigatalomaha.msaa ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevanti tesamaha.m a~n~nataro'ti. etamaha.m, braahma.na, vigatalomaha.msata.m attani sampassamaano bhiyyo pallomamaapaadi.m ara~n~ne vihaaraaya.

[03] 44^b^.^eb^ ``tassa mayha.m, braahma.na, etadahosi -- `ye kho keci sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa laabhasakkaarasiloka.m nikaamayamaanaa ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevanti, laabhasakkaarasilokanikaamana {nikaamayamaana (sii0 syaa0)} sandosahetu have te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa akusala.m bhayabherava.m avhaayanti. na kho panaaha.m laabhasakkaarasiloka.m nikaamayamaano ^a^T1.0034^ea^ ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevaami; appicchohamasmi. ye hi vo ariyaa appicchaa ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevanti tesamaha.m a~n~nataro'ti. etamaha.m, braahma.na, appicchata.m attani sampassamaano bhiyyo pallomamaapaadi.m ara~n~ne vihaaraaya.

[03] 45^b^.^eb^ ``tassa mayha.m, braahma.na, etadahosi -- `ye kho keci sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa kusiitaa hiinaviiriyaa ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevanti ^a^M1.0024^ea^, kusiitahiinaviiriyasandosahetu have te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa akusala.m bhayabherava.m avhaayanti. na kho panaaha.m kusiito hiinaviiriyo ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevaami; aaraddhaviiriyohamasmi. ye hi vo ariyaa aaraddhaviiriyaa ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevanti tesamaha.m a~n~nataro'ti. etamaha.m, braahma.na, aaraddhaviiriyata.m attani sampassamaano bhiyyo pallomamaapaadi.m ara~n~ne vihaaraaya.

[03] 46^b^.^eb^ ``tassa ^a^V1.0026^ea^ mayha.m, braahma.na, etadahosi -- `ye ^a^P1.0020^ea^ kho keci sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa mu.t.thassatii asampajaanaa ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevanti, mu.t.thassatiasampajaanasandosahetu have te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa akusala.m bhayabherava.m avhaayanti. na kho panaaha.m mu.t.thassati asampajaano ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevaami; upa.t.thitassatihamasmi. ye ^a^T1.0035^ea^ hi vo ariyaa upa.t.thitassatii ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevanti tesamaha.m a~n~nataro'ti. etamaha.m, braahma.na, upa.t.thitassatita.m attani sampassamaano bhiyyo pallomamaapaadi.m ara~n~ne vihaaraaya.

[03] 47^b^.^eb^ ``tassa mayha.m, braahma.na, etadahosi -- `ye kho keci sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa asamaahitaa vibbhantacittaa ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevanti, asamaahitavibbhantacittasandosahetu have te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa akusala.m bhayabherava.m avhaayanti. na kho panaaha.m asamaahito vibbhantacitto ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevaami; samaadhisampannohamasmi. ye hi vo ariyaa samaadhisampannaa ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevanti tesamaha.m a~n~nataro'ti. etamaha.m, braahma.na, samaadhisampada.m attani sampassamaano bhiyyo pallomamaapaadi.m ara~n~ne vihaaraaya.

[03] 48^b^.^eb^ ``tassa mayha.m, braahma.na, etadahosi -- `ye kho keci sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa duppa~n~naa e.lamuugaa ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevanti, duppa~n~nae.lamuugasandosahetu have te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa akusala.m bhayabherava.m avhaayanti. na kho panaaha.m duppa~n~no e.lamuugo ^a^M1.0025^ea^ ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevaami; pa~n~naasampannohamasmi. ye hi vo ariyaa pa~n~naasampannaa ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevanti tesamaha.m ^a^T1.0036^ea^ a~n~nataro'ti. etamaha.m, braahma.na, pa~n~naasampada.m attani sampassamaano bhiyyo pallomamaapaadi.m ara~n~ne vihaaraaya.
[06] so.lasapariyaaya.m ni.t.thita.m.

[03] 49^b^.^eb^ ``tassa ^a^V1.0027^ea^ mayha.m, braahma.na, etadahosi -- `ya.mnuunaaha.m yaa taa rattiyo abhi~n~naataa abhilakkhitaa -- caatuddasii pa~ncadasii a.t.thamii ca pakkhassa -- tathaaruupaasu rattiisu yaani taani aaraamacetiyaani vanacetiyaani rukkhacetiyaani bhi.msanakaani salomaha.msaani tathaaruupesu senaasanesu vihareyya.m appeva naamaaha.m bhayabherava.m passeyya'nti. so kho aha.m, braahma.na, aparena samayena yaa taa rattiyo abhi~n~naataa abhilakkhitaa -- caatuddasii pa~ncadasii a.t.thamii ca pakkhassa -- tathaaruupaasu rattiisu yaani taani aaraamacetiyaani vanacetiyaani rukkhacetiyaani bhi.msanakaani salomaha.msaani tathaaruupesu senaasanesu viharaami. tattha ca me, braahma.na, viharato mago vaa aagacchati, moro vaa ka.t.tha.m ^a^P1.0021^ea^ paateti, vaato vaa pa.n.nakasa.ta.m {pa.n.nasa.ta.m (sii0 pii0)} ereti; tassa mayha.m braahma.na etadahosi {tassa mayha.m eva.m hoti (sii0 syaa0)} -- `eta.m nuuna ta.m bhayabherava.m aagacchatii'ti. tassa mayha.m, braahma.na, etadahosi -- `ki.m nu kho aha.m a~n~nadatthu bhayapa.tika"nkhii {bhayapaa.tika"nkhii (sii0)} viharaami? ya.mnuunaaha.m yathaabhuuta.m yathaabhuutassa {yathaabhuutassa yathaabhuutassa (sii0 syaa0)} me ta.m bhayabherava.m aagacchati, tathaabhuuta.m tathaabhuutova {yathaabhuuto yathaabhuutova (sii0 syaa0)} ta.m bhayabherava.m pa.tivineyya'nti. tassa mayha.m, braahma.na, ca"nkamantassa ta.m bhayabherava.m aagacchati. so kho aha.m, braahma.na, neva taava ti.t.thaami ^a^T1.0037^ea^ na nisiidaami na nipajjaami, yaava ca"nkamantova ta.m bhayabherava.m pa.tivinemi. tassa mayha.m, braahma.na, .thitassa ta.m bhayabherava.m aagacchati. so kho aha.m, braahma.na, neva taava ca"nkamaami na nisiidaami na nipajjaami. yaava .thitova ta.m bhayabherava.m pa.tivinemi. tassa mayha.m, braahma.na, nisinnassa ta.m bhayabherava.m aagacchati. so kho aha.m, braahma.na, neva taava nipajjaami na ti.t.thaami ^a^M1.0026^ea^ na ca"nkamaami, yaava nisinnova ta.m bhayabherava.m pa.tivinemi. tassa mayha.m, braahma.na, nipannassa ta.m bhayabherava.m aagacchati. so kho aha.m, braahma.na, neva taava nisiidaami na ti.t.thaami na ca"nkamaami, yaava nipannova ta.m bhayabherava.m pa.tivinemi.

[03] 50^b^.^eb^ ``santi kho pana, braahma.na, eke sama.nabraahma.naa ratti.myeva samaana.m divaati sa~njaananti, divaayeva samaana.m rattiiti sa~njaananti. idamaha.m tesa.m sama.nabraahma.naana.m sammohavihaarasmi.m vadaami. aha.m kho pana, braahma.na, ratti.myeva samaana.m rattiiti sa~njaanaami, divaayeva samaana.m divaati sa~njaanaami. ya.m kho ta.m, braahma.na, sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `asammohadhammo satto loke uppanno bahujanahitaaya bahujanasukhaaya lokaanukampaaya atthaaya hitaaya sukhaaya devamanussaana'nti, mameva ta.m sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `asammohadhammo satto loke uppanno bahujanahitaaya bahujanasukhaaya lokaanukampaaya atthaaya hitaaya sukhaaya devamanussaana'nti.

[03] 51^b^.^eb^ ``aaraddha.m ^a^T1.0038^ea^ ^a^V1.0028^ea^ kho pana me, braahma.na, viiriya.m ahosi asalliina.m, upa.t.thitaa sati asammu.t.thaa {appammu.t.thaa (syaa0)}, passaddho kaayo asaaraddho, samaahita.m citta.m ekagga.m. so kho aha.m, braahma.na, vivicceva kaamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja vihaasi.m. vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa ajjhatta.m sampasaadana.m cetaso ekodibhaava.m avitakka.m ^a^P1.0022^ea^ avicaara.m samaadhija.m piitisukha.m dutiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja vihaasi.m. piitiyaa ca viraagaa upekkhako ca vihaasi.m, sato ca sampajaano sukha~nca kaayena pa.tisa.mvedesi.m; ya.m ta.m ariyaa aacikkhanti -- `upekkhako satimaa sukhavihaarii'ti tatiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja vihaasi.m. sukhassa ca pahaanaa dukkhassa ca pahaanaa pubbeva somanassadomanassaana.m attha"ngamaa adukkhamasukha.m upekkhaasatipaarisuddhi.m catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja vihaasi.m.

[03] 52^b^.^eb^ ``so eva.m samaahite citte parisuddhe pariyodaate ana"nga.ne vigatuupakkilese mudubhuute kammaniye .thite aane~njappatte pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.naaya citta.m abhininnaamesi.m. so anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m ^a^M1.0027^ea^ anussaraami, seyyathida.m -- ekampi jaati.m dvepi jaatiyo tissopi jaatiyo catassopi jaatiyo pa~ncapi jaatiyo dasapi jaatiyo viisampi jaatiyo ti.msampi jaatiyo cattaaliisampi jaatiyo pa~n~naasampi jaatiyo jaatisatampi jaatisahassampi jaatisatasahassampi anekepi sa.mva.t.takappe ^a^T1.0039^ea^ anekepi viva.t.takappe anekepi sa.mva.t.taviva.t.takappe -- `amutraasi.m eva.mnaamo eva.mgotto eva.mva.n.no evamaahaaro eva.msukhadukkhappa.tisa.mvedii evamaayupariyanto, so tato cuto amutra udapaadi.m; tatraapaasi.m eva.mnaamo eva.mgotto eva.mva.n.no evamaahaaro eva.msukhadukkhappa.tisa.mvedii evamaayupariyanto, so tato cuto idhuupapanno'ti. iti saakaara.m sauddesa.m anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussaraami. aya.m kho me, braahma.na, rattiyaa pa.thame yaame pa.thamaa vijjaa adhigataa, avijjaa vihataa vijjaa uppannaa, tamo vihato aaloko uppanno, yathaa ta.m appamattassa aataapino pahitattassa viharato.

[03] 53^b^.^eb^ ``so eva.m samaahite citte parisuddhe pariyodaate ana"nga.ne vigatuupakkilese mudubhuute kammaniye .thite aane~njappatte sattaana.m cutuupapaata~naa.naaya citta.m abhininnaamesi.m. so dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena satte passaami cavamaane upapajjamaane hiine pa.niite suva.n.ne dubba.n.ne sugate duggate yathaakammuupage satte pajaanaami -- `ime vata bhonto sattaa kaayaduccaritena samannaagataa vaciiduccaritena samannaagataa manoduccaritena samannaagataa ariyaana.m ^a^V1.0029^ea^ upavaadakaa micchaadi.t.thikaa micchaadi.t.thikammasamaadaanaa; te kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapannaa. ime vaa pana bhonto sattaa kaayasucaritena samannaagataa ^a^P1.0023^ea^ vaciisucaritena samannaagataa manosucaritena samannaagataa ariyaana.m anupavaadakaa sammaadi.t.thikaa ^a^T1.0040^ea^ sammaadi.t.thikammasamaadaanaa; te kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapannaa'ti. iti dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena satte passaami cavamaane upapajjamaane hiine pa.niite suva.n.ne dubba.n.ne sugate duggate yathaakammuupage satte pajaanaami. aya.m kho me, braahma.na, rattiyaa majjhime yaame dutiyaa vijjaa adhigataa, avijjaa vihataa vijjaa uppannaa, tamo vihato aaloko uppanno, yathaa ta.m appamattassa aataapino pahitattassa viharato.

[03] 54^b^.^eb^ ``so ^a^M1.0028^ea^ eva.m samaahite citte parisuddhe pariyodaate ana"nga.ne vigatuupakkilese mudubhuute kammaniye .thite aane~njappatte aasavaana.m khaya~naa.naaya citta.m abhininnaamesi.m. so `ida.m dukkha'nti yathaabhuuta.m abbha~n~naasi.m, `aya.m dukkhasamudayo'ti yathaabhuuta.m abbha~n~naasi.m, `aya.m dukkhanirodho'ti yathaabhuuta.m abbha~n~naasi.m, `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m abbha~n~naasi.m. `ime aasavaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m abbha~n~naasi.m, `aya.m aasavasamudayo'ti yathaabhuuta.m abbha~n~naasi.m, `aya.m aasavanirodho'ti yathaabhuuta.m abbha~n~naasi.m, `aya.m aasavanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m abbha~n~naasi.m. tassa me eva.m jaanato eva.m passato kaamaasavaapi citta.m vimuccittha, bhavaasavaapi citta.m vimuccittha, avijjaasavaapi citta.m vimuccittha. vimuttasmi.m vimuttamiti ~naa.na.m ahosi. `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti abbha~n~naasi.m. aya.m ^a^T1.0041^ea^ kho me, braahma.na, rattiyaa pacchime yaame tatiyaa vijjaa adhigataa, avijjaa vihataa vijjaa uppannaa, tamo vihato aaloko uppanno, yathaa ta.m appamattassa aataapino pahitattassa viharato.

[03] 55^b^.^eb^ ``siyaa kho pana te, braahma.na, evamassa -- `ajjaapi nuuna sama.no gotamo aviitaraago aviitadoso aviitamoho, tasmaa ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevatii'ti. na kho paneta.m, braahma.na, eva.m da.t.thabba.m. dve kho aha.m, braahma.na, atthavase sampassamaano ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevaami -- attano ca di.t.thadhammasukhavihaara.m sampassamaano, pacchima~nca janata.m anukampamaano''ti.

[03] 56^b^.^eb^ ``anukampitaruupaa ^a^V1.0030^ea^ vataaya.m bhotaa gotamena pacchimaa janataa ^a^P1.0024^ea^, yathaa ta.m arahataa sammaasambuddhena. abhikkanta.m, bho gotama! abhikkanta.m, bho gotama! seyyathaapi, bho gotama, nikkujjita.m vaa ukkujjeyya, pa.ticchanna.m vaa vivareyya, muu.lhassa vaa magga.m aacikkheyya, andhakaare vaa telapajjota.m dhaareyya -- `cakkhumanto ruupaani dakkhantii'ti; evameva.m bhotaa gotamena anekapariyaayena dhammo pakaasito. esaaha.m bhavanta.m gotama.m sara.na.m gacchaami dhamma~nca bhikkhusa"ngha~nca. upaasaka.m ma.m bhava.m gotamo dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gata''nti.
[06] bhayabheravasutta.m ni.t.thita.m catuttha.m.

[03] 57^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^M1.0029^ea^ ^a^V1.0031^ea^ ^a^T1.0042^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tatra kho aayasmaa saariputto bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``aavuso, bhikkhave''ti. ``aavuso''ti kho te bhikkhuu aayasmato saariputtassa paccassosu.m. aayasmaa saariputto etadavoca --

[03] ``cattaarome, aavuso, puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m. katame cattaaro? idhaavuso, ekacco puggalo saa"nga.nova samaano `atthi me ajjhatta.m a"nga.na'nti yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati. idha panaavuso, ekacco puggalo saa"nga.nova samaano `atthi me ajjhatta.m a"nga.na'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. idhaavuso, ekacco puggalo ana"nga.nova samaano `natthi me ajjhatta.m a"nga.na'nti yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati. idha panaavuso, ekacco puggalo ana"nga.nova samaano `natthi me ajjhatta.m a"nga.na'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. tatraavuso, yvaaya.m puggalo saa"nga.nova samaano `atthi me ajjhatta.m a"nga.na'nti yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati, aya.m imesa.m dvinna.m puggalaana.m saa"nga.naana.myeva sata.m hiinapuriso akkhaayati. tatraavuso, yvaaya.m puggalo saa"nga.nova samaano `atthi me ajjhatta.m a"nga.na'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, aya.m imesa.m dvinna.m puggalaana.m saa"nga.naana.myeva sata.m se.t.thapuriso akkhaayati ^a^T1.0043^ea^. tatraavuso, yvaaya.m puggalo ana"nga.nova ^a^P1.0025^ea^ samaano `natthi me ajjhatta.m a"nga.na'nti yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati, aya.m imesa.m dvinna.m puggalaana.m ana"nga.naana.myeva sata.m hiinapuriso akkhaayati. tatraavuso, yvaaya.m puggalo ana"nga.nova samaano `natthi me ajjhatta.m a"nga.na'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, aya.m imesa.m dvinna.m puggalaana.m ana"nga.naana.myeva sata.m se.t.thapuriso akkhaayatii''ti.
[03] 58^b^.^eb^ eva.m vutte, aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano aayasmanta.m saariputta.m etadavoca --

[03] ``ko nu kho, aavuso saariputta, hetu ko paccayo yenimesa.m dvinna.m puggalaana.m saa"nga.naana.myeva sata.m eko hiinapuriso akkhaayati, eko se.t.thapuriso akkhaayati? ko panaavuso ^a^V1.0032^ea^ saariputta, hetu ko ^a^M1.0030^ea^ paccayo yenimesa.m dvinna.m puggalaana.m ana"nga.naana.myeva sata.m eko hiinapuriso akkhaayati, eko se.t.thapuriso akkhaayatii''ti?

[03] 59^b^.^eb^ ``tatraavuso, yvaaya.m puggalo saa"nga.nova samaano `atthi me ajjhatta.m a"nga.na'nti yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati, tasseta.m paa.tika"nkha.m -- na chanda.m janessati na vaayamissati na viiriya.m aarabhissati tassa"nga.nassa pahaanaaya; so saraago sadoso samoho saa"nga.no sa.mkili.t.thacitto kaala.m karissati. seyyathaapi, aavuso, ka.msapaati aabhataa aapa.naa vaa kammaarakulaa vaa rajena ca malena ca pariyonaddhaa. tamena.m saamikaa na ceva paribhu~njeyyu.m na ca pariyodapeyyu.m {pariyodaapeyyu.m (?)}, rajaapathe ca na.m nikkhipeyyu.m. eva~nhi saa, aavuso, ka.msapaati aparena samayena sa.mkili.t.thataraa ^a^T1.0044^ea^ assa malaggahitaa''ti? ``evamaavuso''ti. ``evameva kho, aavuso, yvaaya.m puggalo saa"nga.nova samaano `atthi me ajjhatta.m a"nga.na'nti yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati, tasseta.m paa.tika"nkha.m -- na chanda.m janessati na vaayamissati na viiriya.m aarabhissati tassa"nga.nassa pahaanaaya; so saraago sadoso samoho saa"nga.no sa.mkili.t.thacitto kaala.m karissati.

[03] ``tatraavuso, yvaaya.m puggalo saa"nga.nova samaano `atthi me ajjhatta.m a"nga.na'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, tasseta.m paa.tika"nkha.m -- chanda.m janessati vaayamissati viiriya.m aarabhissati tassa"nga.nassa pahaanaaya; so araago adoso amoho ana"nga.no asa.mkili.t.thacitto kaala.m karissati. seyyathaapi, aavuso, ka.msapaati aabhataa aapa.naa vaa kammaarakulaa vaa rajena ca malena ca pariyonaddhaa. tamena.m saamikaa paribhu~njeyyu~nceva pariyodapeyyu~nca, na ca na.m rajaapathe nikkhipeyyu.m. eva~nhi ^a^P1.0026^ea^ saa, aavuso, ka.msapaati aparena samayena parisuddhataraa assa pariyodaataa''ti? ``evamaavuso''ti. ``evameva kho, aavuso, yvaaya.m puggalo saa"nga.nova samaano `atthi me ajjhatta.m a"nga.na'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, tasseta.m paa.tika"nkha.m -- chanda.m janessati vaayamissati viiriya.m aarabhissati tassa"nga.nassa pahaanaaya; so araago adoso amoho ana"nga.no asa.mkili.t.thacitto kaala.m karissati.

[03] ``tatraavuso ^a^M1.0031^ea^, yvaaya.m puggalo ana"nga.nova samaano `natthi me ajjhatta.m a"nga.na'nti yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati, tasseta.m paa.tika"nkha.m ^a^T1.0045^ea^ -- subhanimitta.m manasi karissati, tassa subhanimittassa manasikaaraa raago citta.m anuddha.msessati; so saraago sadoso samoho saa"nga.no sa.mkili.t.thacitto ^a^V1.0033^ea^ kaala.m karissati. seyyathaapi, aavuso, ka.msapaati aabhataa aapa.naa vaa kammaarakulaa vaa parisuddhaa pariyodaataa. tamena.m saamikaa na ceva paribhu~njeyyu.m na ca pariyodapeyyu.m, rajaapathe ca na.m nikkhipeyyu.m. eva~nhi saa, aavuso, ka.msapaati aparena samayena sa.mkili.t.thataraa assa malaggahitaa''ti? ``evamaavuso''ti. ``evameva kho, aavuso, yvaaya.m puggalo ana"nga.nova samaano `natthi me ajjhatta.m a"nga.na'nti yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati, tasseta.m paa.tika"nkha.m -- subhanimitta.m manasi karissati, tassa subhanimittassa manasikaaraa raago citta.m anuddha.msessati;so saraago sadoso samoho saa"nga.no sa.mkili.t.thacittokaala.mkarissati.

[03] ``tatraavuso, yvaaya.m puggalo ana"nga.nova samaano `natthi me ajjhatta.m a"nga.na'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, tasseta.m paa.tika"nkha.m -- subhanimitta.m na manasi karissati, tassa subhanimittassa amanasikaaraa raago citta.m naanuddha.msessati; so araago adoso amoho ana"nga.no asa.mkili.t.thacitto kaala.m karissati. seyyathaapi, aavuso, ka.msapaati aabhataa aapa.naa vaa kammaarakulaa vaa parisuddhaa pariyodaataa. tamena.m saamikaa paribhu~njeyyu~nceva pariyodapeyyu~nca, na ca na.m rajaapathe nikkhipeyyu.m. eva~nhi saa, aavuso, ka.msapaati aparena samayena parisuddhataraa assa pariyodaataa''ti? ``evamaavuso''ti. ``evameva ^a^T1.0046^ea^ kho, aavuso, yvaaya.m puggalo ana"nga.nova samaano `natthi me ajjhatta.m a"nga.na'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, tasseta.m paa.tika"nkha.m -- subhanimitta.m na manasi karissati, tassa subhanimittassa amanasikaaraa raago citta.m naanuddha.msessati; so araago adoso amoho ana"nga.no asa.mkili.t.thacitto kaala.m karissati.

[03] ``aya.m kho, aavuso moggallaana ^a^P1.0027^ea^, hetu aya.m paccayo yenimesa.m dvinna.m puggalaana.m saa"nga.naana.myeva sata.m eko hiinapuriso akkhaayati, eko se.t.thapuriso akkhaayati. aya.m panaavuso moggallaana, hetu aya.m ^a^M1.0032^ea^ paccayo yenimesa.m dvinna.m puggalaana.m ana"nga.naana.myeva sata.m eko hiinapuriso akkhaayati, eko se.t.thapuriso akkhaayatii''ti.

[03] 60^b^.^eb^ ``a"nga.na.m a"nga.nanti, aavuso, vuccati. kissa nu kho eta.m, aavuso, adhivacana.m yadida.m a"nga.na''nti? ``paapakaana.m kho eta.m, aavuso, akusalaana.m icchaavacaraana.m adhivacana.m, yadida.m a"nga.na''nti.

[03] ``.thaana.m ^a^V1.0034^ea^ kho paneta.m, aavuso, vijjati ya.m idhekaccassa bhikkhuno eva.m icchaa uppajjeyya -- `aapatti~nca vata aapanno assa.m, na ca ma.m bhikkhuu jaaneyyu.m aapatti.m aapanno'ti. .thaana.m kho paneta.m, aavuso, vijjati ya.m ta.m bhikkhu.m bhikkhuu jaaneyyu.m -- `aapatti.m aapanno'ti. `jaananti ma.m bhikkhuu aapatti.m aapanno'ti -- iti so kupito hoti appatiito. yo ceva kho, aavuso, kopo yo ca appaccayo -- ubhayameta.m a"nga.na.m.

[03] ``.thaana.m ^a^T1.0047^ea^ kho paneta.m, aavuso, vijjati ya.m idhekaccassa bhikkhuno eva.m icchaa uppajjeyya -- `aapatti~nca vata aapanno assa.m, anuraho ma.m bhikkhuu codeyyu.m, no sa"nghamajjhe'ti. .thaana.m kho paneta.m, aavuso, vijjati ya.m ta.m bhikkhu.m bhikkhuu sa"nghamajjhe codeyyu.m, no anuraho. `sa"nghamajjhe ma.m bhikkhuu codenti, no anuraho'ti -- iti so kupito hoti appatiito. yo ceva kho, aavuso, kopo yo ca appaccayo -- ubhayameta.m a"nga.na.m.

[03] 61^b^.^eb^ ``yassa kassaci, aavuso, bhikkhuno ime paapakaa akusalaa icchaavacaraa appahiinaa dissanti ceva suuyanti ca, ki~ncaapi so hoti aara~n~niko pantasenaasano pi.n.dapaatiko ^a^V1.0038^ea^ sapadaanacaarii pa.msukuuliko luukhaciivaradharo, atha kho na.m sabrahmacaarii na ceva sakkaronti na garu.m karonti na maanenti na puujenti. ta.m kissa hetu? te hi tassa ^a^T1.0053^ea^ aayasmato paapakaa akusalaa icchaavacaraa appahiinaa dissanti ceva suuyanti ca. seyyathaapi, aavuso, ka.msapaati aabhataa aapa.naa vaa kammaarakulaa vaa parisuddhaa pariyodaataa. tamena.m saamikaa ahiku.napa.m vaa kukkuraku.napa.m vaa manussaku.napa.m vaa racayitvaa a~n~nissaa ka.msapaatiyaa pa.tikujjitvaa antaraapa.na.m pa.tipajjeyyu.m. tamena.m jano disvaa eva.m vadeyya -- `ambho, kimevida.m hariiyati ja~n~naja~n~na.m viyaa'ti? tamena.m u.t.thahitvaa apaapuritvaa {avaapuritvaa (sii0)} olokeyya. tassa sahadassanena amanaapataa ca sa.n.thaheyya, paa.tikulyataa {pa.tikuulataa (ka0), paa.tikuulyataa (syaa0)} ca sa.n.thaheyya, jegucchataa ca {jegucchitaa ca (pii0 ka0)} sa.n.thaheyya; jighacchitaanampi na bhottukamyataa assa, pageva suhitaana.m. evameva kho, aavuso, yassa kassaci bhikkhuno ime paapakaa akusalaa icchaavacaraa appahiinaa dissanti ceva suuyanti ca, ki~ncaapi so hoti aara~n~niko pantasenaasano pi.n.dapaatiko sapadaanacaarii pa.msukuuliko luukhaciivaradharo, atha kho na.m sabrahmacaarii na ceva sakkaronti na garu.m karonti ^a^P1.0031^ea^ na maanenti na puujenti. ta.m kissa hetu? te hi tassa aayasmato paapakaa akusalaa icchaavacaraa appahiinaa dissanti ceva suuyanti ca.

[03] 62^b^.^eb^ ``yassa kassaci, aavuso, bhikkhuno ime paapakaa akusalaa icchaavacaraa pahiinaa dissanti ceva suuyanti ca, ki~ncaapi so hoti gaamantavihaarii ^a^M1.0037^ea^ nemantaniko gahapaticiivaradharo, atha kho na.m sabrahmacaarii sakkaronti garu.m karonti maanenti puujenti. ta.m kissa hetu ^a^T1.0054^ea^? te hi tassa aayasmato paapakaa akusalaa icchaavacaraa pahiinaa dissanti ceva suuyanti ca. seyyathaapi, aavuso, ka.msapaati aabhataa aapa.naa vaa kammaarakulaa vaa parisuddhaa pariyodaataa. tamena.m saamikaa saaliina.m odana.m vicitakaa.laka.m {vicinitakaa.laka.m (ka0)} anekasuupa.m anekabya~njana.m racayitvaa a~n~nissaa ka.msapaatiyaa pa.tikujjitvaa antaraapa.na.m pa.tipajjeyyu.m. tamena.m jano disvaa eva.m vadeyya -- `ambho, kimevida.m hariiyati ja~n~naja~n~na.m viyaa'ti? tamena.m u.t.thahitvaa apaapuritvaa olokeyya. tassa saha dassanena manaapataa ca sa.n.thaheyya, appaa.tikulyataa ca sa.n.thaheyya, ajegucchataa ca sa.n.thaheyya; suhitaanampi bhottukamyataa assa, pageva jighacchitaana.m. evameva kho, aavuso, yassa kassaci bhikkhuno ime paapakaa akusalaa icchaavacaraa pahiinaa dissanti ceva suuyanti ca, ki~ncaapi so hoti gaamantavihaarii nemantaniko gahapaticiivaradharo, atha kho na.m sabrahmacaarii sakkaronti garu.m karonti maanenti puujenti ^a^V1.0039^ea^. ta.m kissa hetu? te hi tassa aayasmato paapakaa akusalaa icchaavacaraa pahiinaa dissanti ceva suuyanti caa''ti.

[03] 63^b^.^eb^ eva.m vutte, aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano aayasmanta.m saariputta.m etadavoca -- ``upamaa ma.m, aavuso saariputta, pa.tibhaatii''ti. ``pa.tibhaatu ta.m, aavuso moggallaanaa''ti. ``ekamidaaha.m, aavuso, samaya.m raajagahe viharaami giribbaje. atha khvaaha.m, aavuso, pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa ^a^T1.0055^ea^ pattaciivaramaadaaya raajagaha.m pi.n.daaya paavisi.m. tena kho pana samayena samiiti yaanakaaraputto rathassa nemi.m tacchati. tamena.m pa.n.duputto aajiivako puraa.nayaanakaaraputto paccupa.t.thito hoti. atha kho, aavuso, pa.n.duputtassa aajiivakassa puraa.nayaanakaaraputtassa eva.m cetaso parivitakko udapaadi -- `aho vataaya.m samiiti yaanakaaraputto imissaa nemiyaa ima~nca va"nka.m ima~nca jimha.m ima~nca dosa.m taccheyya, evaaya.m nemi apagatava"nkaa apagatajimhaa apagatadosaa suddhaa assa {suddhaassa (sii0 pii0), suddhaa (ka0)} saare pati.t.thitaa'ti ^a^P1.0032^ea^. yathaa yathaa kho, aavuso, pa.n.duputtassa aajiivakassa puraa.nayaanakaaraputtassa cetaso parivitakko hoti, tathaa tathaa ^a^M1.0038^ea^ samiiti yaanakaaraputto tassaa nemiyaa ta~nca va"nka.m ta~nca jimha.m ta~nca dosa.m tacchati. atha kho, aavuso, pa.n.duputto aajiivako puraa.nayaanakaaraputto attamano attamanavaaca.m nicchaaresi -- `hadayaa hadaya.m ma~n~ne a~n~naaya tacchatii'ti.

[03] ``evameva kho, aavuso, ye te puggalaa assaddhaa, jiivikatthaa na saddhaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitaa, sa.thaa maayaavino ketabino {ke.tubhino (bahuusu)} uddhataa unna.laa capalaa mukharaa viki.n.navaacaa, indriyesu aguttadvaaraa, bhojane amatta~n~nuno, jaagariya.m ananuyuttaa, saama~n~ne anapekkhavanto, sikkhaaya na tibbagaaravaa, baahulikaa saathalikaa, okkamane pubba"ngamaa, paviveke nikkhittadhuraa, kusiitaa hiinaviiriyaa mu.t.thassatii asampajaanaa asamaahitaa ^a^T1.0056^ea^ vibbhantacittaa duppa~n~naa e.lamuugaa, tesa.m aayasmaa saariputto iminaa dhammapariyaayena hadayaa hadaya.m ma~n~ne a~n~naaya tacchati.

[03] ``ye pana te kulaputtaa saddhaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitaa, asa.thaa amaayaavino aketabino anuddhataa anunna.laa acapalaa amukharaa aviki.n.navaacaa, indriyesu guttadvaaraa, bhojane matta~n~nuno, jaagariya.m anuyuttaa, saama~n~ne apekkhavanto, sikkhaaya tibbagaaravaa, na baahulikaa ^a^V1.0040^ea^ na saathalikaa, okkamane nikkhittadhuraa, paviveke pubba"ngamaa, aaraddhaviiriyaa pahitattaa upa.t.thitassatii sampajaanaa samaahitaa ekaggacittaa pa~n~navanto ane.lamuugaa, te aayasmato saariputtassa ima.m dhammapariyaaya.m sutvaa pivanti ma~n~ne, ghasanti ma~n~ne vacasaa ceva manasaa ca -- `saadhu vata, bho, sabrahmacaarii akusalaa vu.t.thaapetvaa kusale pati.t.thaapetii'ti. seyyathaapi, aavuso, itthii vaa puriso vaa daharo yuvaa ma.n.danakajaatiko siisa.mnhaato uppalamaala.m vaa vassikamaala.m vaa atimuttakamaala.m {adhimuttakamaala.m (syaa0)} vaa labhitvaa ubhohi hatthehi pa.tiggahetvaa uttama"nge sirasmi.m pati.t.thapeyya, evameva kho, aavuso, ye te kulaputtaa saddhaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitaa, asa.thaa amaayaavino aketabino anuddhataa anunna.laa acapalaa amukharaa aviki.n.navaacaa, indriyesu guttadvaaraa, bhojane matta~n~nuno, jaagariya.m anuyuttaa, saama~n~ne apekkhavanto, sikkhaaya tibbagaaravaa, na ^a^T1.0057^ea^ baahulikaa na saathalikaa, okkamane nikkhittadhuraa, paviveke pubba"ngamaa, aaraddhaviiriyaa pahitattaa upa.t.thitassatii ^a^M1.0039^ea^ sampajaanaa samaahitaa ekaggacittaa pa~n~navanto ane.lamuugaa, te aayasmato saariputtassa ima.m dhammapariyaaya.m sutvaa pivanti ma~n~ne, ghasanti ma~n~ne vacasaa ceva manasaa ca -- `saadhu vata, bho, sabrahmacaarii akusalaa vu.t.thaapetvaa kusale pati.t.thaapetii'ti. itiha te ubho mahaanaagaa a~n~nama~n~nassa subhaasita.m samanumodi.msuu''ti.
