puutimuulaani lomaani kaayasmaa patanti taayevappaahaarataaya.

[03] ``taayapi kho aha.m, saariputta, iriyaaya taaya pa.tipadaaya taaya dukkarakaarikaaya naajjhagama.m uttari.m manussadhammaa alamariya~naa.nadassanavisesa.m. ta.m kissa hetu? imissaayeva ariyaaya pa~n~naaya anadhigamaa, yaaya.m ariyaa pa~n~naa adhigataa ariyaa niyyaanikaa, niyyaati takkarassa sammaa dukkhakkhayaaya.

[03] 160^b^.^eb^ ``santi kho pana, saariputta, eke sama.nabraahma.naa eva.mvaadino eva.mdi.t.thino -- `sa.msaarena suddhii'ti. na kho pana so {na kho paneso (sii0 syaa0)}, saariputta, sa.msaaro sulabharuupo ^a^M1.0116^ea^ yo mayaa asa.msaritapubbo ^a^P1.0082^ea^ iminaa diighena addhunaa, a~n~natra suddhaavaasehi devehi. suddhaavaase caaha.m, saariputta, deve sa.msareyya.m, nayima.m loka.m punaraagaccheyya.m.

[03] ``santi kho pana, saariputta, eke sama.nabraahma.naa eva.mvaadino eva.mdi.t.thino -- `upapattiyaa ^a^V1.0116^ea^ suddhii'ti. na kho pana saa, saariputta ^a^T1.0163^ea^, upapatti sulabharuupaa yaa mayaa anupapannapubbaa iminaa diighena addhunaa, a~n~natra suddhaavaasehi devehi. suddhaavaase caaha.m, saariputta, deve upapajjeyya.m, nayima.m loka.m punaraagaccheyya.m.

[03] ``santi kho pana, saariputta, eke sama.nabraahma.naa eva.mvaadino eva.mdi.t.thino -- `aavaasena suddhii'ti. na kho pana so, saariputta, aavaaso sulabharuupo yo mayaa anaavu.t.thapubbo {anaavutthapubbo (sii0 pii0)} iminaa diighena addhunaa, a~n~natra suddhaavaasehi devehi. suddhaavaase caaha.m, saariputta, deve aavaseyya.m, nayima.m loka.m punaraagaccheyya.m.

[01] ``santi kho pana, saariputta, eke sama.nabraahma.naa eva.mvaadino eva.mdi.t.thino -- `ya~n~nena suddhii'ti. na kho pana so, saariputta, ya~n~no sulabharuupo yo mayaa ayi.t.thapubbo iminaa diighena addhunaa, ta~nca kho ra~n~naa vaa sataa khattiyena muddhaavasittena braahma.nena vaa mahaasaalena.

[03] ``santi kho pana, saariputta, eke sama.nabraahma.naa eva.mvaadino eva.mdi.t.thino -- `aggiparicariyaaya suddhii'ti. na kho pana so, saariputta, aggi sulabharuupo yo mayaa aparici.n.napubbo iminaa diighena addhunaa, ta~nca kho ra~n~naa vaa sataa khattiyena muddhaavasittena braahma.nena vaa mahaasaalena.

[03] 161^b^.^eb^ ``santi kho pana, saariputta, eke sama.nabraahma.naa eva.mvaadino eva.mdi.t.thino -- `yaavadevaaya.m bhava.m puriso daharo hoti yuvaa ^a^T1.0164^ea^ susukaa.lakeso bhadrena yobbanena samannaagato pa.thamena vayasaa taavadeva paramena pa~n~naaveyyattiyena samannaagato hoti. yato ca kho aya.m bhava.m puriso ji.n.no hoti vuddho mahallako addhagato vayoanuppatto, aasiitiko vaa naavutiko vaa vassasatiko vaa jaatiyaa, atha tamhaa pa~n~naaveyyattiyaa, parihaayatii'ti. na kho paneta.m, saariputta ^a^M1.0117^ea^, eva.m da.t.thabba.m. aha.m kho pana, saariputta, etarahi ji.n.no vuddho mahallako addhagato vayoanuppatto, aasiitiko me vayo vattati. idha me assu, saariputta, cattaaro saavakaa vassasataayukaa vassasatajiivino, paramaaya satiyaa ca gatiyaa ca dhitiyaa ca samannaagataa paramena ca pa~n~naaveyyattiyena. seyyathaapi, saariputta, da.lhadhammaa {da.lhadhammo (bahuusu) .tiikaa ca moggallaanabyaakara.na.m ca oloketabba.m} dhanuggaho sikkhito katahattho katuupaasano lahukena asanena appakasireneva tiriya.m taalacchaaya.m atipaateyya, eva.m adhimattasatimanto ^a^V1.0117^ea^ eva.m adhimattagatimanto eva.m ^a^P1.0083^ea^ adhimattadhitimanto eva.m paramena pa~n~naaveyyattiyena samannaagataa. te ma.m catunna.m satipa.t.thaanaana.m upaadaayupaadaaya pa~nha.m puccheyyu.m, pu.t.tho pu.t.tho caaha.m tesa.m byaakareyya.m, byaakata~nca me byaakatato dhaareyyu.m, na ca ma.m dutiyaka.m uttari pa.tipuccheyyu.m. a~n~natra asitapiitakhaayitasaayitaa a~n~natra uccaarapassaavakammaa, a~n~natra niddaakilamathapa.tivinodanaa apariyaadinnaayevassa, saariputta, tathaagatassa dhammadesanaa, apariyaadinna.myevassa tathaagatassa dhammapadabya~njana.m, apariyaadinna.myevassa tathaagatassa pa~nhapa.tibhaana.m ^a^T1.0165^ea^. atha me te cattaaro saavakaa vassasataayukaa vassasatajiivino vassasatassa accayena kaala.m kareyyu.m. ma~ncakena cepi ma.m, saariputta, pariharissatha, nevatthi tathaagatassa pa~n~naaveyyattiyassa a~n~nathatta.m. ya.m kho ta.m {ya.m kho paneta.m (sii0)}, saariputta, sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `asammohadhammo satto loke uppanno bahujanahitaaya bahujanasukhaaya lokaanukampaaya atthaaya hitaaya sukhaaya devamanussaana'nti, mameva ta.m sammaa vadamaano vadeyya `asammohadhammo satto loke uppanno bahujanahitaaya bahujanasukhaaya lokaanukampaaya atthaaya hitaaya sukhaaya devamanussaana'''nti.

[03] 162^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa naagasamaalo bhagavato pi.t.thito .thito hoti bhagavanta.m biijayamaano. atha kho aayasmaa naagasamaalo bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``acchariya.m, bhante, abbhuta.m, bhante! api hi me, bhante, ima.m dhammapariyaaya.m sutvaa lomaani ha.t.thaani. konaamo aya.m, bhante, dhammapariyaayo''ti? ``tasmaatiha tva.m, naagasamaala, ima.m dhammapariyaaya.m lomaha.msanapariyaayo tveva na.m dhaarehii''ti.
[03] idamavoca ^a^M1.0118^ea^ bhagavaa. attamano aayasmaa naagasamaalo bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandiiti.
[06] mahaasiihanaadasutta.m ni.t.thita.m dutiya.m.

[03] 163^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T1.0166^ea^ ^a^V1.0118^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. atha kho sambahulaa bhikkhuu pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya ^a^P1.0084^ea^ saavatthi.m pi.n.daaya paavisi.msu. atha kho tesa.m bhikkhuuna.m etadahosi -- ``atippago kho taava saavatthiya.m pi.n.daaya caritu.m, ya.m nuuna maya.m yena a~n~natitthiyaana.m paribbaajakaana.m aaraamo tenupasa"nkameyyaamaa''ti. atha kho te bhikkhuu yena a~n~natitthiyaana.m paribbaajakaana.m aaraamo tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa tehi a~n~natitthiyehi paribbaajakehi saddhi.m sammodi.msu; sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinne kho te bhikkhuu te a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa etadavocu.m -- ``sama.no, aavuso, gotamo kaamaana.m pari~n~na.m pa~n~napeti, mayampi kaamaana.m pari~n~na.m pa~n~napema; sama.no, aavuso, gotamo ruupaana.m pari~n~na.m pa~n~napeti, mayampi ruupaana.m pari~n~na.m pa~n~napema; sama.no, aavuso, gotamo vedanaana.m pari~n~na.m pa~n~napeti, mayampi vedanaana.m pari~n~na.m pa~n~napema; idha no, aavuso, ko viseso, ko adhippayaaso, ki.m naanaakara.na.m sama.nassa vaa gotamassa amhaaka.m vaa -- yadida.m dhammadesanaaya vaa dhammadesana.m, anusaasaniyaa vaa anusaasani''nti? atha kho te bhikkhuu tesa.m a~n~natitthiyaana.m paribbaajakaana.m bhaasita.m neva ^a^T1.0167^ea^ abhinandi.msu, nappa.tikkosi.msu; anabhinanditvaa appa.tikkositvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkami.msu -- ``bhagavato santike etassa bhaasitassa attha.m aajaanissaamaa''ti.

[03] 164^b^.^eb^ atha kho te bhikkhuu saavatthiya.m pi.n.daaya caritvaa pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkantaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinnaa kho te bhikkhuu bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``idha maya.m, bhante, pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya saavatthi.m ^a^M1.0119^ea^ pi.n.daaya paavisimha. tesa.m no, bhante, amhaaka.m etadahosi -- `atippago kho taava saavatthiya.m pi.n.daaya caritu.m, ya.m nuuna maya.m yena a~n~natitthiyaana.m paribbaajakaana.m aaraamo tenupasa"nkameyyaamaa'ti. atha kho maya.m, bhante, yena a~n~natitthiyaana.m paribbaajakaana.m aaraamo tenupasa"nkamimha; upasa"nkamitvaa tehi a~n~natitthiyehi ^a^V1.0119^ea^ paribbaajakehi saddhi.m sammodimha; sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidimha. ekamanta.m nisinne kho amhe, bhante, te a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa etadavocu.m -- `sama.no, aavuso, gotamo kaamaana.m pari~n~na.m pa~n~napeti, mayampi kaamaana.m pari~n~na.m pa~n~napema ^a^P1.0085^ea^. sama.no, aavuso, gotamo ruupaana.m pari~n~na.m pa~n~napeti, mayampi ruupaana.m pari~n~na.m pa~n~napema. sama.no, aavuso, gotamo vedanaana.m pari~n~na.m pa~n~napeti, mayampi vedanaana.m pari~n~na.m pa~n~napema. idha no, aavuso, ko viseso, ko adhippayaaso, ki.m naanaakara.na.m ^a^T1.0168^ea^ sama.nassa vaa gotamassa amhaaka.m vaa, yadida.m dhammadesanaaya vaa dhammadesana.m anusaasaniyaa vaa anusaasani'nti. atha kho maya.m, bhante, tesa.m a~n~natitthiyaana.m paribbaajakaana.m bhaasita.m neva abhinandimha, nappa.tikkosimha; anabhinanditvaa appa.tikkositvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkamimha -- `bhagavato santike etassa bhaasitassa attha.m aajaanissaamaa'''ti.

[03] 165^b^.^eb^ ``eva.mvaadino, bhikkhave, a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa evamassu vacaniiyaa -- `ko panaavuso, kaamaana.m assaado, ko aadiinavo, ki.m nissara.na.m? ko ruupaana.m assaado, ko aadiinavo, ki.m nissara.na.m? ko vedanaana.m assaado, ko aadiinavo, ki.m nissara.na'nti? eva.m pu.t.thaa, bhikkhave, a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa na ceva sampaayissanti, uttari~nca vighaata.m aapajjissanti. ta.m kissa hetu? yathaa ta.m, bhikkhave, avisayasmi.m. naaha.m ta.m, bhikkhave, passaami sadevake loke samaarake sabrahmake sassama.nabraahma.niyaa pajaaya sadevamanussaaya yo imesa.m pa~nhaana.m veyyaakara.nena citta.m aaraadheyya, a~n~natra tathaagatena vaa tathaagatasaavakena vaa, ito vaa pana sutvaa.

[03] 166^b^.^eb^ ``ko ca, bhikkhave, kaamaana.m assaado? pa~ncime, bhikkhave, kaamagu.naa. katame pa~nca? cakkhuvi~n~neyyaa ruupaa i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa piyaruupaa kaamuupasa.mhitaa rajaniiyaa, sotavi~n~neyyaa saddaa...pe0... ghaanavi~n~neyyaa gandhaa ^a^M1.0120^ea^... jivhaavi~n~neyyaa rasaa... kaayavi~n~neyyaa pho.t.thabbaa i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa piyaruupaa kaamuupasa.mhitaa rajaniiyaa -- ime ^a^T1.0169^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca kaamagu.naa. ya.m kho, bhikkhave, ime pa~nca kaamagu.ne pa.ticca uppajjati sukha.m somanassa.m -- aya.m kaamaana.m assaado.

[03] 167^b^.^eb^ ``ko ca, bhikkhave, kaamaana.m aadiinavo? idha, bhikkhave, kulaputto yena sippa.t.thaanena ^a^V1.0120^ea^ jiivika.m kappeti -- yadi muddaaya yadi ga.nanaaya yadi sa"nkhaanena {sa"nkhaaya (ka0)} yadi kasiyaa yadi va.nijjaaya yadi gorakkhena yadi issatthena yadi raajaporisena yadi sippa~n~natarena -- siitassa purakkhato u.nhassa purakkhato .da.msamakasavaataatapasarii.msapasamphassehi rissamaano {iirayamaano (ka0), samphassamaano (cuu.lani0 khaggavisaa.nasutta 136)} khuppipaasaaya miiyamaano; ayampi, bhikkhave, kaamaana.m aadiinavo sandi.t.thiko, dukkhakkhandho kaamahetu kaamanidaana.m kaamaadhikara.na.m ^a^P1.0086^ea^ kaamaanameva hetu.

[03] ``tassa ce, bhikkhave, kulaputtassa eva.m u.t.thahato gha.tato vaayamato te bhogaa naabhinipphajjanti. so socati kilamati paridevati urattaa.li.m kandati, sammoha.m aapajjati -- `mogha.m vata me u.t.thaana.m, aphalo vata me vaayaamo'ti. ayampi, bhikkhave, kaamaana.m aadiinavo sandi.t.thiko dukkhakkhandho kaamahetu kaamanidaana.m kaamaadhikara.na.m kaamaanameva hetu.

[03] ``tassa ce, bhikkhave, kulaputtassa eva.m u.t.thahato gha.tato vaayamato te bhogaa abhinipphajjanti. so tesa.m bhogaana.m aarakkhaadhikara.na.m dukkha.m domanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedeti -- `kinti me bhoge neva raajaano hareyyu.m, na coraa hareyyu.m, na aggi daheyya, na udaka.m vaheyya {vaaheyya (ka0)}, na appiyaa daayaadaa hareyyu'nti. tassa ^a^T1.0170^ea^ eva.m aarakkhato gopayato te bhoge raajaano vaa haranti, coraa vaa haranti, aggi vaa dahati, udaka.m vaa vahati, appiyaa vaa daayaadaa haranti. so socati kilamati paridevati urattaa.li.m kandati, sammoha.m aapajjati -- `yampi me ahosi tampi no natthii'ti. ayampi, bhikkhave, kaamaana.m aadiinavo sandi.t.thiko, dukkhakkhandho kaamahetu kaamanidaana.m kaamaadhikara.na.m kaamaanameva hetu.

[03] 168^b^.^eb^ ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, kaamahetu kaamanidaana.m kaamaadhikara.na.m kaamaanameva hetu raajaanopi raajuuhi vivadanti, khattiyaapi khattiyehi vivadanti ^a^M1.0121^ea^, braahma.naapi braahma.nehi vivadanti, gahapatiipi gahapatiihi vivadanti, maataapi puttena vivadati, puttopi maataraa vivadati, pitaapi puttena vivadati, puttopi pitaraa vivadati, bhaataapi bhaataraa vivadati, bhaataapi bhaginiyaa vivadati, bhaginiipi bhaataraa vivadati, sahaayopi sahaayena vivadati. te tattha kalahaviggahavivaadaapannaa a~n~nama~n~na.m paa.niihipi upakkamanti, le.d.duuhipi upakkamanti, da.n.dehipi upakkamanti, satthehipi upakkamanti. te tattha mara.nampi nigacchanti, mara.namattampi dukkha.m ^a^V1.0121^ea^. ayampi, bhikkhave, kaamaana.m aadiinavo sandi.t.thiko, dukkhakkhandho kaamahetu kaamanidaana.m kaamaadhikara.na.m kaamaanameva hetu.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, kaamahetu kaamanidaana.m kaamaadhikara.na.m kaamaanameva hetu asicamma.m gahetvaa, dhanukalaapa.m sannayhitvaa, ubhatobyuu.lha.m sa"ngaama.m pakkhandanti usuusupi khippamaanesu ^a^T1.0171^ea^, sattiisupi khippamaanaasu, asiisupi vijjotalantesu. te tattha usuuhipi vijjhanti, sattiyaapi vijjhanti, asinaapi siisa.m chindanti. te tattha mara.nampi nigacchanti, mara.namattampi dukkha.m. ayampi, bhikkhave, kaamaana.m aadiinavo sandi.t.thiko, dukkhakkhandho kaamahetu kaamanidaana.m kaamaadhikara.na.m kaamaanameva hetu.

[01] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, kaamahetu kaamanidaana.m kaamaadhikara.na.m kaamaanameva hetu asicamma.m gahetvaa, dhanukalaapa.m sannayhitvaa, addaavalepanaa {a.t.taavalepanaa (syaa0 ka0)} upakaariyo pakkhandanti usuusupi khippamaanesu, sattiisupi khippamaanaasu ^a^P1.0087^ea^, asiisupi vijjotalantesu. te tattha usuuhipi vijjhanti, sattiyaapi vijjhanti, chaka.nakaayapi {paka.t.thiyaapi (sii0)} osi~ncanti, abhivaggenapi omaddanti, asinaapi siisa.m chindanti. te tattha mara.nampi nigacchanti, mara.namattampi dukkha.m. ayampi, bhikkhave, kaamaana.m aadiinavo sandi.t.thiko, dukkhakkhandho kaamahetu kaamanidaana.m kaamaadhikara.na.m kaamaanameva hetu.

[03] 169^b^.^eb^ ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, kaamahetu kaamanidaana.m kaamaadhikara.na.m kaamaanameva hetu sandhimpi chindanti, nillopampi haranti, ekaagaarikampi karonti, paripanthepi ti.t.thanti, paradaarampi gacchanti. tamena.m raajaano gahetvaa vividhaa kammakaara.naa kaarenti -- kasaahipi taa.lenti, vettehipi taa.lenti, a.d.dhada.n.dakehipi taa.lenti; hatthampi chindanti, paadampi chindanti, hatthapaadampi ^a^T1.0172^ea^ chindanti, ka.n.nampi chindanti, naasampi chindanti, ka.n.nanaasampi chindanti; bila"ngathaalikampi karonti ^a^M1.0122^ea^, sa"nkhamu.n.dikampi karonti, raahumukhampi karonti, jotimaalikampi karonti, hatthapajjotikampi karonti, erakavattikampi karonti, ciirakavaasikampi karonti, e.neyyakampi karonti, ba.lisama.msikampi karonti, kahaapa.nikampi karonti, khaaraapatacchikampi karonti, palighaparivattikampi karonti, palaalapii.thakampi karonti, tattenapi telena osi~ncanti, sunakhehipi khaadaapenti, jiivantampi suule uttaasenti, asinaapi siisa.m chindanti ^a^V1.0122^ea^. te tattha mara.nampi nigacchanti, mara.namattampi dukkha.m. ayampi, bhikkhave, kaamaana.m aadiinavo sandi.t.thiko, dukkhakkhandho kaamahetu kaamanidaana.m kaamaadhikara.na.m kaamaanameva hetu.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, kaamahetu kaamanidaana.m kaamaadhikara.na.m kaamaanameva hetu kaayena duccarita.m caranti, vaacaaya duccarita.m caranti, manasaa duccarita.m caranti. te kaayena duccarita.m caritvaa, vaacaaya duccarita.m caritvaa, manasaa duccarita.m caritvaa, kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjanti. ayampi, bhikkhave, kaamaana.m aadiinavo samparaayiko, dukkhakkhandho kaamahetu kaamanidaana.m kaamaadhikara.na.m kaamaanameva hetu.
[03] 170^b^.^eb^ ``ki~nca, bhikkhave, kaamaana.m nissara.na.m? yo kho, bhikkhave, kaamesu chandaraagavinayo chandaraagappahaana.m -- ida.m kaamaana.m nissara.na.m.

[03] ``ye hi keci, bhikkhave, sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa eva.m ^a^T1.0173^ea^ kaamaana.m assaada~nca assaadato aadiinava~nca aadiinavato nissara.na~nca nissara.nato yathaabhuuta.m nappajaananti te vata saama.m vaa kaame parijaanissanti, para.m vaa tathattaaya samaadapessanti yathaa pa.tipanno kaame parijaanissatiiti -- neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. ye ca kho keci, bhikkhave, sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa ^a^P1.0088^ea^ eva.m kaamaana.m assaada~nca assaadato aadiinava~nca aadiinavato nissara.na~nca nissara.nato yathaabhuuta.m pajaananti, te vata saama.m vaa kaame parijaanissanti para.m vaa tathattaaya samaadapessanti yathaa pa.tipanno kaame parijaanissatiiti -- .thaanameta.m vijjati.

[03] 171^b^.^eb^ ``ko ca, bhikkhave, ruupaana.m assaado? seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, khattiyaka~n~naa vaa braahma.naka~n~naa vaa gahapatika~n~naa vaa pannarasavassuddesikaa vaa so.lasavassuddesikaa vaa, naatidiighaa naatirassaa naatikisaa naatithuulaa naatikaa.lii naaccodaataa paramaa saa, bhikkhave, tasmi.m samaye subhaa ^a^M1.0123^ea^ va.n.nanibhaati? `eva.m, bhante'. ya.m kho, bhikkhave, subha.m va.n.nanibha.m pa.ticca uppajjati sukha.m somanassa.m -- aya.m ruupaana.m assaado.

[03] ``ko ca, bhikkhave, ruupaana.m aadiinavo? idha, bhikkhave, tameva bhagini.m passeyya aparena samayena aasiitika.m vaa naavutika.m vaa vassasatika.m vaa jaatiyaa, ji.n.na.m gopaanasiva"nka.m ^a^V1.0123^ea^ bhogga.m da.n.daparaayana.m pavedhamaana.m gacchanti.m aatura.m gatayobbana.m kha.n.dadanta.m {kha.n.dadanti.m (sii0 pii0)} palitakesa.m {palitakesi.m}, viluuna.m khalitasira.m valina.m tilakaahatagatta.m {tilakaahatagatti.m (bahuusu) a.t.thakathaa .tiikaa oloketabbaa}. ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, yaa purimaa subhaa va.n.nanibhaa ^a^T1.0174^ea^ saa antarahitaa, aadiinavo paatubhuutoti? `eva.m, bhante'. ayampi, bhikkhave, ruupaana.m aadiinavo.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, tameva bhagini.m passeyya aabaadhika.m dukkhita.m baa.lhagilaana.m, sake muttakariise palipanna.m semaana.m {seyyamaana.m (ka0)}, a~n~nehi vu.t.thaapiyamaana.m, a~n~nehi sa.mvesiyamaana.m. ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, yaa purimaa subhaa va.n.nanibhaa saa antarahitaa, aadiinavo paatubhuutoti? `eva.m, bhante'. ayampi, bhikkhave, ruupaana.m aadiinavo.

[03] 172^b^.^eb^ ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, tameva bhagini.m passeyya sariira.m sivathikaaya cha.d.dita.m -- ekaahamata.m vaa dviihamata.m vaa tiihamata.m vaa, uddhumaataka.m viniilaka.m vipubbakajaata.m. ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, yaa purimaa subhaa va.n.nanibhaa saa antarahitaa, aadiinavo paatubhuutoti? `eva.m, bhante'. ayampi, bhikkhave, ruupaana.m aadiinavo.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, tameva bhagini.m passeyya sariira.m sivathikaaya cha.d.dita.m -- kaakehi vaa khajjamaana.m, kulalehi vaa khajjamaana.m, gijjhehi vaa khajjamaana.m, ka"nkehi vaa khajjamaana.m, sunakhehi vaa khajjamaana.m, byagghehi vaa khajjamaana.m, diipiihi vaa khajjamaana.m, si"ngaalehi vaa khajjamaana.m, vividhehi vaa paa.nakajaatehi khajjamaana.m. ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave ^a^P1.0089^ea^, yaa purimaa subhaa va.n.nanibhaa saa antarahitaa, aadiinavo paatubhuutoti? `eva.m, bhante'. ayampi, bhikkhave, ruupaana.m aadiinavo.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, tameva bhagini.m passeyya sariira.m sivathikaaya cha.d.dita.m -- a.t.thikasa"nkhalika.m sama.msalohita.m nhaarusambandha.m, a.t.thikasa"nkhalika.m ^a^T1.0175^ea^ nima.msalohitamakkhita.m ^a^M1.0124^ea^ nhaarusambandha.m, a.t.thikasa"nkhalika.m apagatama.msalohita.m nhaarusambandha.m, a.t.thikaani apagatasambandhaani disaavidisaavikkhittaani -- a~n~nena hattha.t.thika.m, a~n~nena paada.t.thika.m, a~n~nena gopphaka.t.thika.m, a~n~nena ja"ngha.t.thika.m, a~n~nena uuru.t.thika.m, a~n~nena ka.ti.t.thika.m, a~n~nena phaasuka.t.thika.m, a~n~nena pi.t.thi.t.thika.m, a~n~nena khandha.t.thika.m, a~n~nena giiva.t.thika.m, a~n~nena hanuka.t.thika.m, a~n~nena danta.t.thika.m, a~n~nena ^a^V1.0124^ea^ siisaka.taaha.m. ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, yaa purimaa subhaa va.n.nanibhaa saa antarahitaa, aadiinavo paatubhuutoti? `eva.m, bhante'. ayampi, bhikkhave, ruupaana.m aadiinavo.

[01] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, tameva bhagini.m passeyya sariira.m sivathikaaya cha.d.dita.m -- a.t.thikaani setaani sa"nkhava.n.napa.tibhaagaani, a.t.thikaani pu~njakitaani terovassikaani, a.t.thikaani puutiini cu.n.nakajaataani. ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, yaa purimaa subhaa va.n.nanibhaa saa antarahitaa, aadiinavo paatubhuutoti? `eva.m, bhante'. ayampi, bhikkhave, ruupaana.m aadiinavo.
[03] ``ki~nca, bhikkhave, ruupaana.m nissara.na.m? yo, bhikkhave, ruupesu chandaraagavinayo chandaraagappahaana.m -- ida.m ruupaana.m nissara.na.m.

[03] ``ye hi keci, bhikkhave, sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa eva.m ruupaana.m assaada~nca assaadato aadiinava~nca aadiinavato nissara.na~nca nissara.nato yathaabhuuta.m nappajaananti te vata saama.m vaa ruupe parijaanissanti, para.m vaa tathattaaya samaadapessanti yathaa pa.tipanno ruupe parijaanissatiiti -- neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. ye ca kho keci, bhikkhave, sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa eva.m ruupaana.m assaada~nca assaadato aadiinava~nca aadiinavato nissara.na~nca nissara.nato yathaabhuuta.m pajaananti te vata saama.m vaa ruupe parijaanissanti para.m vaa tathattaaya samaadapessanti yathaa pa.tipanno ruupe parijaanissatiiti ^a^T1.0176^ea^ -- .thaanameta.m vijjati.

[03] 173^b^.^eb^ ``ko ca, bhikkhave, vedanaana.m assaado? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vivicceva kaamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. yasmi.m samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vivicceva kaamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati, neva tasmi.m samaye attabyaabaadhaayapi ceteti, na parabyaabaadhaayapi ceteti, na ubhayabyaabaadhaayapi ^a^P1.0090^ea^ ceteti ^a^M1.0125^ea^; abyaabajjha.myeva tasmi.m samaye vedana.m vedeti. abyaabajjhaparamaaha.m, bhikkhave, vedanaana.m assaada.m vadaami.

[01] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa ajjhatta.m sampasaadana.m cetaso ekodibhaava.m ^a^V1.0125^ea^ avitakka.m avicaara.m samaadhija.m piitisukha.m dutiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati...pe0... yasmi.m samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhu piitiyaa ca viraagaa, upekkhako ca viharati, sato ca sampajaano sukha~nca kaayena pa.tisa.mvedeti ya.m ta.m ariyaa ^a^T1.0177^ea^ aacikkhanti -- `upekkhako satimaa sukhavihaarii'ti tatiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati...pe0... yasmi.m samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahaanaa dukkhassa ca pahaanaa pubbeva somanassadomanassaana.m attha"ngamaa adukkhamasukha.m upekkhaasatipaarisuddhi.m catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati, neva tasmi.m samaye attabyaabaadhaayapi ceteti, na parabyaabaadhaayapi ceteti, na ubhayabyaabaadhaayapi ceteti; abyaabajjha.myeva tasmi.m samaye vedana.m vedeti. abyaabajjhaparamaaha.m, bhikkhave, vedanaana.m assaada.m vadaami.
[03] 174^b^.^eb^ ``ko ca, bhikkhave, vedanaana.m aadiinavo? ya.m, bhikkhave, vedanaa aniccaa dukkhaa vipari.naamadhammaa -- aya.m vedanaana.m aadiinavo.
[03] ``ki~nca, bhikkhave, vedanaana.m nissara.na.m? yo, bhikkhave, vedanaasu chandaraagavinayo, chandaraagappahaana.m -- ida.m vedanaana.m nissara.na.m.

[03] ``ye hi keci, bhikkhave, sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa eva.m vedanaana.m assaada~nca assaadato aadiinava~nca aadiinavato nissara.na~nca nissara.nato yathaabhuuta.m nappajaananti, te vata saama.m vaa vedana.m parijaanissanti, para.m vaa tathattaaya samaadapessanti yathaa pa.tipanno vedana.m parijaanissatiiti -- neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. ye ca kho ^a^T1.0178^ea^ keci, bhikkhave, sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa eva.m vedanaana.m assaada~nca assaadato aadiinava~nca aadiinavato nissara.na~nca nissara.nato yathaabhuuta.m pajaananti te vata saama.m vaa vedana.m parijaanissanti, para.m vaa tathattaaya samaadapessanti yathaa pa.tipanno vedana.m parijaanissatiiti -- .thaanameta.m vijjatii''ti.
[03] idamavoca bhagavaa. attamanaa te bhikkhuu bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandunti.
[06] mahaadukkhakkhandhasutta.m ni.t.thita.m tatiya.m.

[03] 175^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^M1.0126^ea^ ^a^P1.0091^ea^ ^a^V1.0126^ea^ ^a^T1.0179^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmi.m nigrodhaaraame. atha kho mahaanaamo sakko yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho mahaanaamo sakko bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``diigharattaaha.m, bhante, bhagavataa eva.m dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaami -- `lobho cittassa upakkileso, doso cittassa upakkileso, moho cittassa upakkileso'ti. eva~ncaaha.m {eva.mpaaha.m (ka0)}, bhante, bhagavataa dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaami -- `lobho cittassa upakkileso, doso cittassa upakkileso, moho cittassa upakkileso'ti. atha ca pana me ekadaa lobhadhammaapi citta.m pariyaadaaya ti.t.thanti, dosadhammaapi citta.m pariyaadaaya ti.t.thanti, mohadhammaapi citta.m pariyaadaaya ti.t.thanti. tassa mayha.m, bhante, eva.m hoti -- `kosu naama me dhammo ajjhatta.m appahiino yena me ekadaa lobhadhammaapi citta.m pariyaadaaya ti.t.thanti, dosadhammaapi citta.m pariyaadaaya ti.t.thanti, mohadhammaapi citta.m pariyaadaaya ti.t.thantii'''ti.

[03] 176^b^.^eb^ ``so eva kho te, mahaanaama, dhammo ajjhatta.m appahiino yena te ekadaa lobhadhammaapi citta.m pariyaadaaya ti.t.thanti, dosadhammaapi citta.m pariyaadaaya ti.t.thanti, mohadhammaapi citta.m pariyaadaaya ti.t.thanti. so ca hi te, mahaanaama, dhammo ajjhatta.m pahiino abhavissa, na tva.m agaara.m ajjhaavaseyyaasi, na kaame paribhu~njeyyaasi. yasmaa ca kho te, mahaanaama, so eva dhammo ajjhatta.m appahiino tasmaa tva.m agaara.m ajjhaavasasi, kaame paribhu~njasi.

[03] 177^b^.^eb^ ```appassaadaa ^a^T1.0180^ea^ kaamaa bahudukkhaa bahupaayaasaa, aadiinavo {bahuupaayaasaa (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} ettha bhiyyo'ti -- iti cepi, mahaanaama, ariyasaavakassa yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya sudi.t.tha.m hoti, so ca {sova (ka0)} a~n~natreva kaamehi a~n~natra akusalehi dhammehi piitisukha.m naadhigacchati, a~n~na.m vaa tato santatara.m; atha kho so neva taava anaava.t.tii kaamesu hoti. yato ca kho, mahaanaama, ariyasaavakassa `appassaadaa kaamaa bahudukkhaa bahupaayaasaa, aadiinavo ^a^M1.0127^ea^ ettha bhiyyo'ti -- evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya ^a^V1.0127^ea^ sudi.t.tha.m hoti, so ca a~n~natreva kaamehi a~n~natra akusalehi dhammehi piitisukha.m adhigacchati a~n~na.m vaa tato santatara.m; atha kho so anaava.t.tii kaamesu hoti.

[03] ``mayhampi kho, mahaanaama ^a^P1.0092^ea^, pubbeva sambodhaa, anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato, `appassaadaa kaamaa bahudukkhaa bahupaayaasaa, aadiinavo ettha bhiyyo'ti -- evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya sudi.t.tha.m hoti, so ca a~n~natreva kaamehi a~n~natra akusalehi dhammehi piitisukha.m naajjhagama.m, a~n~na.m vaa tato santatara.m; atha khvaaha.m neva taava anaava.t.tii kaamesu pacca~n~naasi.m. yato ca kho me, mahaanaama, `appassaadaa kaamaa bahudukkhaa bahupaayaasaa, aadiinavo ettha bhiyyo'ti -- evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya sudi.t.tha.m ahosi, so ca {sova (ka0)} a~n~natreva kaamehi a~n~natra akusalehi dhammehi piitisukha.m ajjhagama.m, a~n~na.m vaa tato santatara.m; athaaha.m anaava.t.tii kaamesu pacca~n~naasi.m.

[03] 178^b^.^eb^ ``ko ca, mahaanaama, kaamaana.m assaado? pa~ncime, mahaanaama, kaamagu.naa. katame pa~nca? cakkhuvi~n~neyyaa ruupaa i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa piyaruupaa kaamuupasa.mhitaa rajaniiyaa; sotavi~n~neyyaa saddaa...pe0... ghaanavi~n~neyyaa gandhaa... jivhaavi~n~neyyaa rasaa... kaayavi~n~neyyaa pho.t.thabbaa i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa piyaruupaa kaamuupasa.mhitaa rajaniiyaa -- ime kho, mahaanaama, pa~nca kaamagu.naa. ya.m kho, mahaanaama, ime pa~nca kaamagu.ne pa.ticca uppajjati sukha.m somanassa.m -- aya.m kaamaana.m assaado.

[03] ``ko ca, mahaanaama, kaamaana.m aadiinavo? idha, mahaanaama, kulaputto yena sippa.t.thaanena jiivika.m kappeti -- yadi muddaaya yadi ga.nanaaya yadi sa"nkhaanena yadi kasiyaa yadi va.nijjaaya yadi gorakkhena yadi issatthena yadi raajaporisena yadi sippa~n~natarena, siitassa purakkhato u.nhassa purakkhato .da.msamakasavaataatapasarii.msapasamphassehi rissamaano khuppipaasaaya miiyamaano; ayampi, mahaanaama, kaamaana.m aadiinavo sandi.t.thiko dukkhakkhandho kaamahetu kaamanidaana.m ^a^T1.0182^ea^ kaamaadhikara.na.m kaamaanameva hetu.

[03] ``tassa ^a^M1.0128^ea^ ce mahaanaama kulaputtassa eva.m u.t.thahato gha.tato vaayamato te bhogaa naabhinipphajjanti, so socati kilamati paridevati urattaa.li.m kandati sammoha.m aapajjati `mogha.m ^a^V1.0128^ea^ vata me u.t.thaana.m, aphalo vata me vaayaamo'ti. ayampi, mahaanaama, kaamaana.m aadiinavo sandi.t.thiko dukkhakkhandho kaamahetu kaamanidaana.m kaamaadhikara.na.m kaamaanameva hetu.

[03] ``tassa ce, mahaanaama, kulaputtassa eva.m u.t.thahato gha.tato vaayamato te bhogaa abhinipphajjanti. so tesa.m bhogaana.m aarakkhaadhikara.na.m dukkha.m domanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedeti -- `kinti me bhoge neva raajaano hareyyu.m, na coraa hareyyu.m, na aggi daheyya, na udaka.m vaheyya, na appiyaa vaa daayaadaa hareyyu'nti. tassa eva.m aarakkhato gopayato te bhoge raajaano vaa haranti, coraa vaa haranti, aggi vaa dahati, udaka.m vaa vahati, appiyaa vaa daayaadaa haranti. so socati kilamati paridevati urattaa.li.m kandati sammoha.m aapajjati -- `yampi me ahosi tampi no natthii'ti. ayampi, mahaanaama, kaamaana.m aadiinavo sandi.t.thiko dukkhakkhandho kaamahetu kaamanidaana.m kaamaadhikara.na.m kaamaanameva hetu.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaanaama, kaamahetu kaamanidaana.m kaamaadhikara.na.m kaamaanameva hetu raajaanopi raajuuhi vivadanti, khattiyaapi khattiyehi vivadanti, braahma.naapi braahma.nehi vivadanti, gahapatiipi gahapatiihi vivadanti, maataapi puttena vivadati, puttopi maataraa vivadati, pitaapi puttena vivadati, puttopi pitaraa vivadati, bhaataapi bhaataraa vivadati, bhaataapi bhaginiyaa vivadati, bhaginiipi bhaataraa vivadati, sahaayopi sahaayena vivadati. te tattha kalahaviggahavivaadaapannaa a~n~nama~n~na.m paa.niihipi upakkamanti, le.d.duuhipi upakkamanti, da.n.dehipi upakkamanti, satthehipi upakkamanti. te tattha mara.nampi nigacchanti, mara.namattampi dukkha.m ^a^T1.0183^ea^. ayampi, mahaanaama, kaamaana.m aadiinavo sandi.t.thiko dukkhakkhandho kaamahetu kaamanidaana.m kaamaadhikara.na.m kaamaanameva hetu.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaanaama, kaamahetu kaamanidaana.m kaamaadhikara.na.m kaamaanameva hetu asicamma.m gahetvaa, dhanukalaapa.m sannayhitvaa, ubhatobyuu.lha.m sa"ngaama.m pakkhandanti usuusupi khippamaanesu, sattiisupi khippamaanaasu, asiisupi vijjotalantesu. te tattha usuuhipi vijjhanti, sattiyaapi vijjhanti, asinaapi siisa.m ^a^M1.0129^ea^ chindanti. te tattha mara.nampi nigacchanti, mara.namattampi dukkha.m. ayampi, mahaanaama, kaamaana.m aadiinavo sandi.t.thiko dukkhakkhandho kaamahetu kaamanidaana.m kaamaadhikara.na.m kaamaanameva hetu.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaanaama, kaamahetu kaamanidaana.m kaamaadhikara.na.m kaamaanameva hetu asicamma.m ^a^V1.0129^ea^ gahetvaa, dhanukalaapa.m sannayhitvaa, addaavalepanaa upakaariyo pakkhandanti usuusupi khippamaanesu, sattiisupi khippamaanaasu, asiisupi vijjotalantesu. te tattha usuuhipi vijjhanti, sattiyaapi vijjhanti, chaka.nakaayapi osi~ncanti, abhivaggenapi omaddanti, asinaapi siisa.m chindanti. te tattha mara.nampi nigacchanti, mara.namattampi dukkha.m. ayampi, mahaanaama, kaamaana.m aadiinavo sandi.t.thiko dukkhakkhandho kaamahetu kaamanidaana.m kaamaadhikara.na.m kaamaanameva hetu.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaanaama, kaamahetu kaamanidaana.m kaamaadhikara.na.m kaamaanameva hetu sandhimpi chindanti, nillopampi haranti, ekaagaarikampi ^a^T1.0184^ea^ karonti, paripanthepi ti.t.thanti, paradaarampi gacchanti. tamena.m raajaano gahetvaa vividhaa kammakaara.naa kaarenti -- kasaahipi taa.lenti, vettehipi taa.lenti, a.d.dhada.n.dakehipi taa.lenti; hatthampi chindanti, paadampi chindanti, hatthapaadampi chindanti, ka.n.nampi chindanti, naasampi chindanti, ka.n.nanaasampi chindanti; bila"ngathaalikampi karonti, sa"nkhamu.n.dikampi karonti, raahumukhampi karonti, jotimaalikampi karonti, hatthapajjotikampi karonti, erakavattikampi karonti, ciirakavaasikampi karonti, e.neyyakampi karonti, ba.lisama.msikampi karonti, kahaapa.nikampi karonti, khaaraapatacchikampi karonti, palighaparivattikampi karonti, palaalapii.thakampi karonti, tattenapi telena osi~ncanti, sunakhehipi khaadaapenti, jiivantampi suule uttaasenti, asinaapi siisa.m chindanti. te tattha mara.nampi nigacchanti, mara.namattampi dukkha.m. ayampi, mahaanaama, kaamaana.m aadiinavo sandi.t.thiko dukkhakkhandho kaamahetu kaamanidaana.m kaamaadhikara.na.m kaamaanameva hetu.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaanaama, kaamahetu kaamanidaana.m kaamaadhikara.na.m kaamaanameva hetu kaayena duccarita.m caranti, vaacaaya duccarita.m caranti, manasaa duccarita.m caranti. te kaayena duccarita.m caritvaa, vaacaaya duccarita.m caritvaa, manasaa duccarita.m caritvaa, kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa, apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjanti. ayampi, mahaanaama, kaamaana.m aadiinavo samparaayiko ^a^M1.0130^ea^, dukkhakkhandho kaamahetu kaamanidaana.m kaamaadhikara.na.m kaamaanameva hetu.

[03] 179^b^.^eb^ ``ekamidaaha.m, mahaanaama, samaya.m raajagahe viharaami gijjhakuu.te pabbate. tena kho pana samayena sambahulaa niga.n.thaa {niganthaa (syaa0 ka0)} isigilipasse kaa.lasilaaya.m ^a^T1.0185^ea^ ubbha.t.thakaa honti aasanapa.tikkhittaa, opakkamikaa dukkhaa tibbaa kharaa ka.tukaa vedanaa vedayanti. atha khvaaha.m, mahaanaama, saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito yena isigilipasse kaa.lasilaa yena te niga.n.thaa ^a^V1.0130^ea^ tenupasa"nkami.m; upasa"nkamitvaa te niga.n.the etadavoca.m -- `kinnu tumhe, aavuso, niga.n.thaa ubbha.t.thakaa aasanapa.tikkhittaa, opakkamikaa dukkhaa tibbaa kharaa ka.tukaa vedanaa vedayathaa'ti? eva.m vutte, mahaanaama, te niga.n.thaa ma.m etadavocu.m -- `niga.n.tho, aavuso, naa.taputto {naathaputto (sii0 pii0)} sabba~n~nuu sabbadassaavii aparisesa.m ~naa.nadassana.m pa.tijaanaati -- ``carato ca me ti.t.thato ca suttassa ca jaagarassa ^a^P1.0093^ea^ ca satata.m samita.m ~naa.nadassana.m paccupa.t.thita''nti. so evamaaha -- ``atthi kho vo {atthi kho bho (syaa0 ka0)}, niga.n.thaa, pubbe paapakamma.m kata.m, ta.m imaaya ka.tukaaya dukkarakaarikaaya nijjiiretha {nijjaretha (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}; ya.m panettha {maya.m panettha (ka0)} etarahi kaayena sa.mvutaa vaacaaya sa.mvutaa manasaa sa.mvutaa ta.m aayati.m paapassa kammassa akara.na.m; iti puraa.naana.m kammaana.m tapasaa byantibhaavaa, navaana.m kammaana.m akara.naa, aayati.m anavassavo; aayati.m anavassavaa kammakkhayo, kammakkhayaa dukkhakkhayo, dukkhakkhayaa vedanaakkhayo, vedanaakkhayaa sabba.m dukkha.m nijji.n.na.m bhavissatii''ti. ta~nca panamhaaka.m ruccati ceva khamati ca, tena camha attamanaa'ti.

[03] 180^b^.^eb^ ``eva.m ^a^T1.0186^ea^ vutte, aha.m, mahaanaama, te niga.n.the etadavoca.m -- `ki.m pana tumhe, aavuso niga.n.thaa, jaanaatha -- ahuvamheva maya.m pubbe na naahuvamhaa'ti? `no hida.m, aavuso'. `ki.m pana tumhe, aavuso niga.n.thaa, jaanaatha -- akaramheva maya.m pubbe paapakamma.m na naakaramhaa'ti? `no hida.m, aavuso'. `ki.m pana tumhe, aavuso niga.n.thaa, jaanaatha -- evaruupa.m vaa evaruupa.m vaa paapakamma.m akaramhaa'ti? `no hida.m, aavuso'. `ki.m pana tumhe, aavuso niga.n.thaa, jaanaatha -- ettaka.m vaa dukkha.m nijji.n.na.m, ettaka.m vaa dukkha.m nijjiiretabba.m ^a^M1.0131^ea^, ettakamhi vaa dukkhe nijji.n.ne sabba.m dukkha.m nijji.n.na.m bhavissatii'ti? `no hida.m, aavuso'. `ki.m pana tumhe, aavuso niga.n.thaa, jaanaatha -- di.t.theva dhamme akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaana.m, kusalaana.m dhammaana.m upasampada'nti? `no hida.m, aavuso'.

[03] ```iti kira tumhe, aavuso niga.n.thaa, na jaanaatha -- ahuvamheva maya.m pubbe na naahuvamhaati, na jaanaatha -- akaramheva maya.m pubbe paapakamma.m na naakaramhaati, na jaanaatha -- evaruupa.m vaa evaruupa.m vaa paapakamma.m akaramhaati, na jaanaatha -- ettaka.m vaa dukkha.m nijji.n.na.m, ettaka.m vaa dukkha.m nijjiiretabba.m, ettakamhi vaa dukkhe nijji.n.ne sabba.m dukkha.m nijji.n.na.m bhavissatiiti. na jaanaatha -- di.t.theva dhamme akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaana.m, kusalaana.m dhammaana.m upasampada.m. eva.m sante, aavuso niga.n.thaa, ye loke luddaa lohitapaa.nino kuruurakammantaa manussesu ^a^V1.0131^ea^ paccaajaataa te niga.n.thesu pabbajantii'ti? `na ^a^T1.0187^ea^ kho, aavuso gotama, sukhena sukha.m adhigantabba.m, dukkhena kho sukha.m adhigantabba.m; sukhena caavuso ^a^P1.0094^ea^ gotama, sukha.m adhigantabba.m abhavissa, raajaa maagadho seniyo bimbisaaro sukha.m adhigaccheyya, raajaa maagadho seniyo bimbisaaro sukhavihaaritaro aayasmataa gotamenaa'ti.

[03] ```addhaayasmantehi niga.n.thehi sahasaa appa.tisa"nkhaa vaacaa bhaasitaa -- na kho, aavuso gotama, sukhena sukha.m adhigantabba.m, dukkhena kho sukha.m adhigantabba.m; sukhena caavuso gotama, sukha.m adhigantabba.m abhavissa, raajaa maagadho seniyo bimbisaaro sukha.m adhigaccheyya, raajaa maagadho seniyo bimbisaaro sukhavihaaritaro aayasmataa gotamenaa''ti. api ca ahameva tattha pa.tipucchitabbo -- ko nu kho aayasmantaana.m sukhavihaaritaro raajaa vaa maagadho seniyo bimbisaaro aayasmaa vaa gotamo'ti? addhaavuso gotama, amhehi sahasaa appa.tisa"nkhaa vaacaa bhaasitaa, na kho, aavuso gotama, sukhena sukha.m adhigantabba.m, dukkhena kho sukha.m adhigantabba.m; sukhena caavuso gotama, sukha.m adhigantabba.m abhavissa, raajaa maagadho seniyo bimbisaaro sukha.m adhigaccheyya, raajaa maagadho seniyo bimbisaaro sukhavihaaritaro aayasmataa gotamenaati. api ca ti.t.thateta.m, idaanipi maya.m aayasmanta.m gotama.m pucchaama -- ko nu kho aayasmantaana.m sukhavihaaritaro raajaa vaa maagadho seniyo bimbisaaro aayasmaa vaa gotamo'ti?

[03] ```tena ^a^M1.0132^ea^ haavuso niga.n.thaa, tumheva tattha pa.tipucchissaami, yathaa vo khameyya tathaa na.m byaakareyyaatha. ta.m ki.m ma~n~nathaavuso niga.n.thaa, pahoti raajaa maagadho seniyo bimbisaaro, ani~njamaano ^a^T1.0188^ea^ kaayena, abhaasamaano vaaca.m, satta rattindivaani ekantasukha.m pa.tisa.mvedii viharitu'nti? `no hida.m, aavuso'.

[03] ```ta.m ki.m ma~n~nathaavuso niga.n.thaa, pahoti raajaa maagadho seniyo bimbisaaro, ani~njamaano kaayena, abhaasamaano vaaca.m, cha rattindivaani...pe0... pa~nca rattindivaani... cattaari rattindivaani... tii.ni rattindivaani... dve rattindivaani... eka.m rattindiva.m ekantasukha.m pa.tisa.mvedii viharitu'nti? `no hida.m, aavuso'.

[03] ```aha.m ^a^V1.0132^ea^ kho, aavuso niga.n.thaa, pahomi ani~njamaano kaayena, abhaasamaano vaaca.m, eka.m rattindiva.m ekantasukha.m pa.tisa.mvedii viharitu.m. aha.m kho, aavuso niga.n.thaa, pahomi ani~njamaano kaayena, abhaasamaano vaaca.m, dve rattindivaani... tii.ni rattindivaani... cattaari rattindivaani... pa~nca rattindivaani... cha rattindivaani... satta rattindivaani ekantasukha.m pa.tisa.mvedii viharitu.m. ta.m ki.m ma~n~nathaavuso niga.n.thaa, eva.m sante ko sukhavihaaritaro raajaa vaa maagadho seniyo bimbisaaro aha.m vaa'ti? `eva.m sante aayasmaava gotamo ^a^P1.0095^ea^ sukhavihaaritaro ra~n~naa maagadhena seniyena bimbisaarenaa'''ti.
[03] idamavoca bhagavaa. attamano mahaanaamo sakko bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandiiti.
[06] cuu.ladukkhakkhandhasutta.m ni.t.thita.m catuttha.m.

[03] 181^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T1.0189^ea^ ^a^V1.0133^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano bhaggesu viharati susumaaragire {su.msumaaragire (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} bhesaka.laavane migadaaye. tatra kho aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``aavuso, bhikkhavo''ti. ``aavuso''ti kho te bhikkhuu aayasmato mahaamoggallaanassa paccassosu.m. aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano etadavoca --

[03] ``pavaareti ^a^M1.0133^ea^ cepi, aavuso, bhikkhu -- `vadantu ma.m aayasmanto, vacaniiyomhi aayasmantehii'ti, so ca hoti dubbaco, dovacassakara.nehi dhammehi samannaagato, akkhamo appadakkhi.naggaahii anusaasani.m, atha kho na.m sabrahmacaarii na ceva vattabba.m ma~n~nanti, na ca anusaasitabba.m ma~n~nanti, na ca tasmi.m puggale vissaasa.m aapajjitabba.m ma~n~nanti.

[03] ``katame caavuso, dovacassakara.naa dhammaa? idhaavuso, bhikkhu paapiccho hoti, paapikaana.m icchaana.m vasa.m gato. yampaavuso, bhikkhu paapiccho hoti, paapikaana.m icchaana.m vasa.m gato -- ayampi dhammo dovacassakara.no.
[03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhu attukka.msako hoti paravambhii. yampaavuso, bhikkhu attukka.msako hoti paravambhii -- ayampi dhammo dovacassakara.no.
[03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhu kodhano hoti kodhaabhibhuuto. yampaavuso, bhikkhu kodhano hoti kodhaabhibhuuto -- ayampi dhammo dovacassakara.no.
[03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso ^a^T1.0190^ea^, bhikkhu kodhano hoti kodhahetu upanaahii. yampaavuso, bhikkhu kodhano hoti kodhahetu upanaahii -- ayampi dhammo dovacassakara.no.
[03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhu kodhano hoti kodhahetu abhisa"ngii. yampaavuso, bhikkhu kodhano hoti kodhahetu abhisa"ngii -- ayampi dhammo dovacassakara.no.

[01] ``puna ^a^V1.0134^ea^ capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhu kodhano hoti kodhasaamantaa {kodhasaamanta.m (syaa0 pii0 ka0)} vaaca.m nicchaaretaa. yampaavuso, bhikkhu kodhano hoti kodhasaamantaa vaaca.m nicchaaretaa -- ayampi dhammo dovacassakara.no.
[03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhu codito {cudito (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} codakena codaka.m pa.tippharati. yampaavuso, bhikkhu codito codakena codaka.m pa.tippharati -- ayampi dhammo dovacassakara.no.
[03] ``puna ^a^M1.0134^ea^ capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhu codito codakena codaka.m apasaadeti. yampaavuso, bhikkhu codito codakena codaka.m apasaadeti -- ayampi dhammo dovacassakara.no.
[01] ``puna capara.m ^a^P1.0096^ea^, aavuso, bhikkhu codito codakena codakassa paccaaropeti. yampaavuso, bhikkhu codito codakena codakassa paccaaropeti -- ayampi dhammo dovacassakara.no.

[03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhu codito codakena a~n~nena~n~na.m pa.ticarati, bahiddhaa katha.m apanaameti, kopa~nca dosa~nca appaccaya~nca paatukaroti. yampaavuso, bhikkhu codito codakena a~n~nena~n~na.m pa.ticarati, bahiddhaa katha.m apanaameti, kopa~nca dosa~nca appaccaya~nca paatukaroti -- ayampi dhammo dovacassakara.no.
[03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhu codito codakena apadaane ^a^T1.0191^ea^ na sampaayati. yampaavuso, bhikkhu codito codakena apadaane na sampaayati -- ayampi dhammo dovacassakara.no.
[03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhu makkhii hoti pa.laasii. yampaavuso, bhikkhu makkhii hoti pa.laasii -- ayampi dhammo dovacassakara.no.
[03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhu issukii hoti maccharii. yampaavuso, bhikkhu issukii hoti maccharii -- ayampi dhammo dovacassakara.no.
[03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhu sa.tho hoti maayaavii. yampaavuso, bhikkhu sa.tho hoti maayaavii -- ayampi dhammo dovacassakara.no.
[03] ``puna ^a^V1.0135^ea^ capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhu thaddho hoti atimaanii. yampaavuso, bhikkhu thaddho hoti atimaanii -- ayampi dhammo dovacassakara.no.

[03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhu sandi.t.thiparaamaasii hoti aadhaanaggaahii duppa.tinissaggii. yampaavuso, bhikkhu sandi.t.thiparaamaasii hoti aadhaanaggaahii duppa.tinissaggii -- ayampi dhammo dovacassakara.no. ime vuccantaavuso, dovacassakara.naa dhammaa.

[03] 182^b^.^eb^ ``no ^a^M1.0135^ea^ cepi, aavuso, bhikkhu pavaareti -- `vadantu ma.m aayasmanto, vacaniiyomhi aayasmantehii'ti, so ca hoti suvaco, sovacassakara.nehi dhammehi samannaagato, khamo padakkhi.naggaahii anusaasani.m, atha kho na.m sabrahmacaarii vattabba~nceva ma~n~nanti, anusaasitabba~nca ma~n~nanti, tasmi~nca puggale vissaasa.m aapajjitabba.m ma~n~nanti.

[03] ``katame caavuso, sovacassakara.naa dhammaa? idhaavuso, bhikkhu na paapiccho hoti, na paapikaana.m icchaana.m vasa.m gato. yampaavuso, bhikkhu na paapiccho hoti na ^a^T1.0192^ea^ paapikaana.m icchaana.m vasa.m gato -- ayampi dhammo sovacassakara.no.
[03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhu anattukka.msako hoti aparavambhii. yampaavuso, bhikkhu anattukka.msako hoti aparavambhii -- ayampi dhammo sovacassakara.no.
[03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhu na kodhano hoti na kodhaabhibhuuto. yampaavuso, bhikkhu na kodhano hoti na kodhaabhibhuuto -- ayampi dhammo sovacassakara.no.
[03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhu na kodhano hoti na kodhahetu upanaahii. yampaavuso, bhikkhu na kodhano hoti na kodhahetu upanaahii -- ayampi dhammo sovacassakara.no.
[03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhu na kodhano hoti na kodhahetu abhisa"ngii. yampaavuso, bhikkhu na kodhano hoti na kodhahetu abhisa"ngii -- ayampi dhammo sovacassakara.no.

[03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhu na kodhano hoti na kodhasaamantaa vaaca.m nicchaaretaa. yampaavuso ^a^V1.0136^ea^, bhikkhu na kodhano hoti na kodhasaamantaa vaaca.m nicchaaretaa -- ayampi dhammo sovacassakara.no.
[03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhu codito codakena codaka.m nappa.tippharati. yampaavuso, bhikkhu codito codakena codaka.m nappa.tippharati -- ayampi dhammo sovacassakara.no ^a^T1.0193^ea^.

[03] ``puna ^a^M1.0136^ea^ capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhu codito codakena codaka.m na apasaadeti. yampaavuso, bhikkhu codito codakena codaka.m na apasaadeti -- ayampi dhammo ^a^P1.0097^ea^ sovacassakara.no.
[03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhu codito codakena codakassa na paccaaropeti. yampaavuso, bhikkhu codito codakena codakassa na paccaaropeti -- ayampi dhammo sovacassakara.no.

[03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhu codito codakena na a~n~nena~n~na.m pa.ticarati, na bahiddhaa katha.m apanaameti, na kopa~nca dosa~nca appaccaya~nca paatukaroti. yampaavuso, bhikkhu codito codakena na a~n~nena~n~na.m pa.ticarati, na bahiddhaa katha.m apanaameti, na kopa~nca dosa~nca appaccaya~nca paatukaroti -- ayampi dhammo sovacassakara.no.
[03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhu codito codakena apadaane sampaayati. yampaavuso, bhikkhu codito codakena apadaane sampaayati -- ayampi dhammo sovacassakara.no.
[03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhu amakkhii hoti apa.laasii. yampaavuso, bhikkhu amakkhii hoti apa.laasii -- ayampi dhammo sovacassakara.no.
[03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhu anissukii hoti amaccharii. yampaavuso, bhikkhu anissukii hoti amaccharii -- ayampi dhammo sovacassakara.no.
[03] ``puna ^a^V1.0137^ea^ capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhu asa.tho hoti amaayaavii. yampaavuso, bhikkhu asa.tho hoti amaayaavii -- ayampi dhammo sovacassakara.no.
[03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhu atthaddho hoti anatimaanii. yampaavuso, bhikkhu atthaddho hoti anatimaanii -- ayampi dhammo sovacassakara.no.

[03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhu asandi.t.thiparaamaasii hoti anaadhaanaggaahii suppa.tinissaggii. yampaavuso, bhikkhu asandi.t.thiparaamaasii hoti, anaadhaanaggaahii suppa.tinissaggii ^a^M1.0137^ea^ -- ayampi dhammo sovacassakara.no. ime vuccantaavuso, sovacassakara.naa dhammaa.

[03] 183^b^.^eb^ ``tatraavuso ^a^T1.0194^ea^, bhikkhunaa attanaava attaana.m eva.m anuminitabba.m {anumaanitabba.m (sii0)} -- `yo khvaaya.m puggalo paapiccho, paapikaana.m icchaana.m vasa.m gato, aya.m me puggalo appiyo amanaapo; aha~nceva kho panassa.m paapiccho paapikaana.m icchaana.m vasa.m gato, aha.mpaassa.m paresa.m appiyo amanaapo'ti. eva.m jaanantenaavuso, bhikkhunaa `na paapiccho bhavissaami, na paapikaana.m icchaana.m vasa.m gato'ti citta.m uppaadetabba.m.

[03] ```yo khvaaya.m puggalo attukka.msako paravambhii, aya.m me puggalo appiyo amanaapo; aha~nceva kho panassa.m attukka.msako paravambhii, aha.mpaassa.m paresa.m appiyo amanaapo'ti. eva.m jaanantenaavuso, bhikkhunaa `anattukka.msako bhavissaami aparavambhii'ti citta.m uppaadetabba.m.

[03] ```yo khvaaya.m puggalo kodhano kodhaabhibhuuto, aya.m me puggalo appiyo amanaapo. aha~nceva kho panassa.m kodhano kodhaabhibhuuto, aha.mpaassa.m paresa.m appiyo amanaapo'ti. eva.m jaanantenaavuso, bhikkhunaa `na kodhano bhavissaami na kodhaabhibhuuto'ti citta.m uppaadetabba.m.

[03] ```yo khvaaya.m puggalo kodhano kodhahetu upanaahii, aya.m me puggalo appiyo amanaapo; aha~nceva kho panassa.m kodhano kodhahetu upanaahii, aha.mpaassa.m paresa.m appiyo amanaapo'ti. eva.m jaanantenaavuso, bhikkhunaa `na kodhano bhavissaami na kodhahetu upanaahii'ti citta.m uppaadetabba.m.

[03] ```yo ^a^V1.0138^ea^ khvaaya.m puggalo kodhano kodhahetu abhisa"ngii, aya.m me puggalo appiyo amanaapo; aha~nceva ^a^T1.0195^ea^ kho panassa.m kodhano kodhahetu abhisa"ngii, aha.mpaassa.m paresa.m appiyo amanaapo'ti. eva.m jaanantenaavuso, bhikkhunaa `na kodhano bhavissaami na kodhahetu abhisa"ngii'ti citta.m uppaadetabba.m.

[03] ```yo ^a^M1.0138^ea^ khvaaya.m puggalo kodhano kodhasaamantaa vaaca.m nicchaaretaa, aya.m me puggalo appiyo amanaapo; aha~nceva kho panassa.m kodhano kodhasaamantaa vaaca.m nicchaaretaa, aha.mpaassa.m paresa.m appiyo amanaapo'ti. eva.m jaanantenaavuso, bhikkhunaa `na kodhano bhavissaami na kodhasaamantaa vaaca.m nicchaaressaamii'ti citta.m uppaadetabba.m.

[03] ```yo khvaaya.m puggalo codito codakena codaka.m pa.tippharati, aya.m me puggalo appiyo amanaapo; aha~nceva kho pana codito codakena codaka.m pa.tipphareyya.m ^a^P1.0098^ea^, aha.mpaassa.m paresa.m appiyo amanaapo'ti. eva.m jaanantenaavuso, bhikkhunaa `codito codakena codaka.m nappa.tippharissaamii'ti citta.m uppaadetabba.m.

[03] ```yo khvaaya.m puggalo codito codakena codaka.m apasaadeti, aya.m me puggalo appiyo amanaapo; aha~nceva kho pana codito codakena codaka.m apasaadeyya.m, aha.mpaassa.m paresa.m appiyo amanaapo'ti. eva.m jaanantenaavuso, bhikkhunaa `codito codakena codaka.m na apasaadessaamii'ti citta.m uppaadetabba.m.

[03] ```yo khvaaya.m puggalo codito codakena codakassa paccaaropeti, aya.m me puggalo appiyo amanaapo; aha~nceva kho pana codito codakena codakassa paccaaropeyya.m, aha.mpaassa.m paresa.m appiyo amanaapo'ti. eva.m ^a^T1.0196^ea^ jaanantenaavuso, bhikkhunaa `codito codakena codakassa na paccaaropessaamii'ti citta.m uppaadetabba.m.

[03] ```yo khvaaya.m puggalo codito codakena a~n~nena~n~na.m pa.ticarati, bahiddhaa katha.m apanaameti, kopa~nca dosa~nca appaccaya~nca paatukaroti, aya.m me puggalo appiyo amanaapo; aha~nceva kho pana codito codakena a~n~nena~n~na.m pa.ticareyya.m, bahiddhaa katha.m apanaameyya.m ^a^V1.0139^ea^, kopa~nca dosa~nca appaccaya~nca paatukareyya.m, aha.mpaassa.m paresa.m appiyo amanaapo'ti. eva.m jaanantenaavuso, bhikkhunaa `codito codakena na a~n~nena~n~na.m pa.ticarissaami, na bahiddhaa katha.m apanaamessaami, na kopa~nca dosa~nca appaccaya~nca paatukarissaamii'ti citta.m uppaadetabba.m.

[03] ```yo ^a^M1.0139^ea^ khvaaya.m puggalo codito codakena apadaane na sampaayati, aya.m me puggalo appiyo amanaapo; aha~nceva kho pana codito codakena apadaane na sampaayeyya.m, aha.mpaassa.m paresa.m appiyo amanaapo'ti. eva.m jaanantenaavuso, bhikkhunaa `codito codakena apadaane sampaayissaamii'ti citta.m uppaadetabba.m.

[03] ```yo khvaaya.m puggalo makkhii pa.laasii, aya.m me puggalo appiyo amanaapo; aha~nceva kho panassa.m makkhii pa.laasii, aha.mpaassa.m paresa.m appiyo amanaapo'ti. eva.m jaanantenaavuso, bhikkhunaa `amakkhii bhavissaami apa.laasii'ti citta.m uppaadetabba.m.

[03] ```yo khvaaya.m puggalo issukii maccharii, aya.m me puggalo appiyo amanaapo; aha~nceva kho panassa.m ^a^T1.0197^ea^ issukii maccharii, aha.mpaassa.m paresa.m appiyo amanaapo'ti. eva.m jaanantenaavuso, bhikkhunaa `anissukii bhavissaami amaccharii'ti citta.m uppaadetabba.m.

[03] ```yo khvaaya.m puggalo sa.tho maayaavii, aya.m me puggalo appiyo amanaapo; aha~nceva kho panassa.m sa.tho maayaavii, aha.mpaassa.m paresa.m appiyo amanaapo'ti. eva.m jaanantenaavuso, bhikkhunaa `asa.tho bhavissaami amaayaavii'ti citta.m uppaadetabba.m.

[03] ```yo khvaaya.m puggalo thaddho atimaanii, aya.m me puggalo appiyo amanaapo; aha~nceva kho panassa.m thaddho atimaanii, aha.mpaassa.m paresa.m appiyo amanaapo'ti. eva.m jaanantenaavuso, bhikkhunaa `atthaddho bhavissaami anatimaanii'ti citta.m uppaadetabba.m.

[03] ```yo khvaaya.m puggalo sandi.t.thiparaamaasii aadhaanaggaahii duppa.tinissaggii, aya.m me puggalo appiyo amanaapo; aha~nceva kho panassa.m sandi.t.thiparaamaasii aadhaanaggaahii duppa.tinissaggii, aha.mpaassa.m paresa.m appiyo amanaapo'ti. eva.m jaanantenaavuso, bhikkhunaa `asandi.t.thiparaamaasii bhavissaami anaadhaanaggaahii suppa.tinissaggii'ti citta.m uppaadetabba.m.

[03] 184^b^.^eb^ ``tatraavuso ^a^V1.0140^ea^, bhikkhunaa attanaava attaana.m eva.m paccavekkhitabba.m -- `ki.m nu khomhi paapiccho, paapikaana.m icchaana.m vasa.m gato'ti? sace, aavuso ^a^M1.0140^ea^, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `paapiccho khomhi, paapikaana.m icchaana.m vasa.m gato'ti, tenaavuso, bhikkhunaa tesa.myeva paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya vaayamitabba.m. sace panaavuso, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano ^a^T1.0198^ea^ eva.m jaanaati -- `na khomhi paapiccho, na paapikaana.m icchaana.m vasa.m gato'ti, tenaavuso, bhikkhunaa teneva piitipaamojjena vihaatabba.m ahorattaanusikkhinaa kusalesu dhammesu.

[03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhunaa attanaava attaana.m eva.m paccavekkhitabba.m -- `ki.m nu khomhi attukka.msako paravambhii'ti? sace, aavuso, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `attukka.msako khomhi paravambhii'ti, tenaavuso, bhikkhunaa tesa.myeva paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya vaayamitabba.m. sace panaavuso, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `anattukka.msako ^a^P1.0099^ea^ khomhi aparavambhii'ti, tenaavuso, bhikkhunaa teneva piitipaamojjena vihaatabba.m ahorattaanusikkhinaa kusalesu dhammesu.

[03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhunaa attanaava attaana.m eva.m paccavekkhitabba.m -- `ki.m nu khomhi kodhano kodhaabhibhuuto'ti? sace, aavuso, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `kodhano khomhi kodhaabhibhuuto'ti, tenaavuso, bhikkhunaa tesa.myeva paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya vaayamitabba.m. sace panaavuso, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `na khomhi kodhano kodhaabhibhuuto'ti, tenaavuso, bhikkhunaa teneva piitipaamojjena vihaatabba.m ahorattaanusikkhinaa kusalesu dhammesu.

[03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhunaa attanaava attaana.m eva.m paccavekkhitabba.m -- `ki.m nu khomhi kodhano kodhahetu upanaahii'ti? sace, aavuso, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati `kodhano khomhi kodhahetu upanaahii'ti, tenaavuso, bhikkhunaa tesa.myeva ^a^T1.0199^ea^ paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya vaayamitabba.m. sace panaavuso, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati `na khomhi kodhano kodhahetu upanaahii'ti, tenaavuso, bhikkhunaa teneva piitipaamojjena vihaatabba.m ahorattaanusikkhinaa kusalesu dhammesu.

[03] ``puna ^a^M1.0141^ea^ ^a^V1.0141^ea^ capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhunaa attanaava attaana.m eva.m paccavekkhitabba.m -- `ki.m nu khomhi kodhano kodhahetu abhisa"ngii'ti? sace, aavuso, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `kodhano khomhi kodhahetu abhisa"ngii'ti, tenaavuso, bhikkhunaa tesa.myeva paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya vaayamitabba.m. sace panaavuso, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `na khomhi kodhano kodhahetu abhisa"ngii'ti, tenaavuso, bhikkhunaa teneva piitipaamojjena vihaatabba.m ahorattaanusikkhinaa kusalesu dhammesu.

[03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhunaa attanaava attaana.m eva.m paccavekkhitabba.m -- `ki.m nu khomhi kodhano kodhasaamantaa vaaca.m nicchaaretaa'ti? sace, aavuso, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `kodhano khomhi kodhasaamantaa vaaca.m nicchaaretaa'ti, tenaavuso, bhikkhunaa tesa.myeva paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya vaayamitabba.m. sace panaavuso, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `na khomhi kodhano kodhasaamantaa vaaca.m nicchaaretaa'ti, tenaavuso, bhikkhunaa teneva piitipaamojjena vihaatabba.m ahorattaanusikkhinaa kusalesu dhammesu.

[03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhunaa attanaava attaana.m eva.m paccavekkhitabba.m -- `ki.m nu khomhi codito codakena codaka.m ^a^T1.0200^ea^ pa.tippharaamii'ti? sace, aavuso, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati `codito khomhi codakena codaka.m pa.tippharaamii'ti, tenaavuso, bhikkhunaa tesa.myeva paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya vaayamitabba.m. sace panaavuso, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `codito khomhi codakena codaka.m nappa.tippharaamii'ti, tenaavuso, bhikkhunaa teneva piitipaamojjena vihaatabba.m ahorattaanusikkhinaa kusalesu dhammesu.

[03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhunaa attanaava attaana.m eva.m paccavekkhitabba.m -- `ki.m nu khomhi codito codakena codaka.m apasaademii'ti? sace, aavuso, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati `codito khomhi codakena codaka.m apasaademii'ti, tenaavuso, bhikkhunaa tesa.myeva paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya vaayamitabba.m. sace panaavuso, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `codito khomhi codakena codaka.m ^a^M1.0142^ea^ na apasaademii'ti, tenaavuso, bhikkhunaa teneva piitipaamojjena vihaatabba.m ahorattaanusikkhinaa kusalesu dhammesu.

[03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhunaa attanaava attaana.m eva.m paccavekkhitabba.m -- `ki.m nu khomhi codito codakena codakassa paccaaropemii'ti? sace, aavuso, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano ^a^V1.0142^ea^ eva.m jaanaati -- `codito khomhi codakena codakassa paccaaropemii'ti, tenaavuso, bhikkhunaa tesa.myeva paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya vaayamitabba.m. sace panaavuso, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `codito khomhi codakena codakassa na paccaaropemii'ti, tenaavuso, bhikkhunaa teneva piitipaamojjena ^a^T1.0201^ea^ vihaatabba.m ahorattaanusikkhinaa kusalesu dhammesu.

[03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhunaa attanaava attaana.m eva.m paccavekkhitabba.m -- `ki.m nu khomhi codito codakena a~n~nena~n~na.m pa.ticaraami, bahiddhaa katha.m apanaamemi, kopa~nca dosa~nca appaccaya~nca paatukaromii'ti? sace, aavuso, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `codito khomhi codakena a~n~nena~n~na.m pa.ticaraami, bahiddhaa katha.m apanaamemi, kopa~nca dosa~nca appaccaya~nca paatukaromii'ti, tenaavuso, bhikkhunaa tesa.myeva paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya vaayamitabba.m. sace panaavuso, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `codito khomhi codakena na a~n~nena~n~na.m pa.ticaraami, na bahiddhaa katha.m apanaamemi, na kopa~nca dosa~nca appaccaya~nca paatukaromii'ti, tenaavuso, bhikkhunaa teneva piitipaamojjena vihaatabba.m ahorattaanusikkhinaa kusalesu dhammesu.

[03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhunaa attanaava attaana.m eva.m paccavekkhitabba.m -- `ki.m nu khomhi codito codakena apadaane na sampaayaamii'ti? sace, aavuso, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `codito khomhi codakena apadaane na sampaayaamii'ti, tenaavuso, bhikkhunaa tesa.myeva paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya vaayamitabba.m. sace panaavuso, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `codito khomhi codakena apadaane sampaayaamii'ti, tenaavuso, bhikkhunaa teneva piitipaamojjena vihaatabba.m ahorattaanusikkhinaa kusalesu dhammesu.

[03] ``puna ^a^M1.0143^ea^ capara.m ^a^T1.0202^ea^, aavuso, bhikkhunaa attanaava attaana.m eva.m paccavekkhitabba.m -- `ki.m nu khomhi makkhii pa.laasii'ti? sace, aavuso, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `makkhii khomhi pa.laasii'ti, tenaavuso, bhikkhunaa tesa.myeva paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya vaayamitabba.m. sace panaavuso, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `amakkhii khomhi apa.laasii'ti, tenaavuso, bhikkhunaa teneva piitipaamojjena vihaatabba.m ahorattaanusikkhinaa kusalesu dhammesu.

[03] ``puna ^a^V1.0143^ea^ capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhunaa attanaava attaana.m eva.m paccavekkhitabba.m -- `ki.m nu khomhi issukii maccharii'ti? sace, aavuso, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `issukii khomhi maccharii'ti, tenaavuso, bhikkhunaa tesa.myeva paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya vaayamitabba.m. sace panaavuso, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `anissukii khomhi amaccharii'ti, tenaavuso, bhikkhunaa teneva piitipaamojjena vihaatabba.m ahorattaanusikkhinaa kusalesu dhammesu.

[03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhunaa attanaava attaana.m eva.m paccavekkhitabba.m -- `ki.m nu khomhi sa.tho maayaavii'ti? sace, aavuso, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `sa.tho khomhi maayaavii'ti, tenaavuso, bhikkhunaa tesa.myeva paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya vaayamitabba.m. sace panaavuso, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `asa.tho khomhi amaayaavii'ti, tenaavuso, bhikkhunaa teneva piitipaamojjena vihaatabba.m ahorattaanusikkhinaa kusalesu dhammesu.

[03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhunaa attanaava attaana.m eva.m paccavekkhitabba.m ^a^T1.0203^ea^ -- `ki.m nu khomhi thaddho atimaanii'ti? sace, aavuso, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `thaddho khomhi atimaanii'ti, tenaavuso, bhikkhunaa tesa.myeva paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya vaayamitabba.m. sace panaavuso, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `atthaddho khomhi anatimaanii'ti, tenaavuso, bhikkhunaa teneva piitipaamojjena vihaatabba.m ahorattaanusikkhinaa kusalesu dhammesu.

[03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhunaa attanaava attaana.m eva.m paccavekkhitabba.m -- `ki.m nu khomhi sandi.t.thiparaamaasii aadhaanaggaahii duppa.tinissaggii'ti? sace, aavuso ^a^M1.0144^ea^, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `sandi.t.thiparaamaasii khomhi aadhaanaggaahii duppa.tinissaggii'ti, tenaavuso, bhikkhunaa ^a^P1.0100^ea^ tesa.myeva paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya vaayamitabba.m. sace panaavuso, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `asandi.t.thiparaamaasii khomhi anaadhaanaggaahii suppa.tinissaggii'ti, tenaavuso, bhikkhunaa teneva piitipaamojjena vihaatabba.m ahorattaanusikkhinaa kusalesu dhammesu.

[03] ``sace ^a^V1.0144^ea^, aavuso, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano sabbepime paapake akusale dhamme appahiine attani samanupassati, tenaavuso, bhikkhunaa sabbesa.myeva imesa.m paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya vaayamitabba.m. sace panaavuso, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano sabbepime paapake akusale dhamme pahiine attani samanupassati, tenaavuso, bhikkhunaa teneva piitipaamojjena vihaatabba.m, ahorattaanusikkhinaa kusalesu dhammesu.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, aavuso, itthii ^a^T1.0204^ea^ vaa puriso vaa, daharo yuvaa ma.n.danajaatiko, aadaase vaa parisuddhe pariyodaate, acche vaa udakapatte, saka.m mukhanimitta.m paccavekkhamaano, sace tattha passati raja.m vaa a"nga.na.m vaa, tasseva rajassa vaa a"nga.nassa vaa pahaanaaya vaayamati; no ce tattha passati raja.m vaa a"nga.na.m vaa, teneva attamano hoti -- `laabhaa vata me, parisuddha.m vata me'ti. evameva kho, aavuso, sace bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano sabbepime paapake akusale dhamme appahiine attani samanupassati, tenaavuso, bhikkhunaa sabbesa.myeva imesa.m paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya vaayamitabba.m. sace panaavuso, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano sabbepime paapake akusale dhamme pahiine attani samanupassati, tenaavuso, bhikkhunaa teneva piitipaamojjena vihaatabba.m, ahorattaanusikkhinaa kusalesu dhammesuu''ti.
[03] idamavocaayasmaa mahaamoggallaano. attamanaa te bhikkhuu aayasmato mahaamoggallaanassa bhaasita.m abhinandunti.
[06] anumaanasutta.m ni.t.thita.m pa~ncama.m.

[03] 185^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T1.0205^ea^ ^a^M1.0145^ea^ ^a^V1.0145^ea^ ^a^P1.0101^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``yassa kassaci, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno pa~nca cetokhilaa appahiinaa, pa~nca cetasovinibandhaa {cetasovinibaddhaa (sii0), cetovinibaddhaa (saaratthadiipanii.tiikaa)} asamucchinnaa, so vatimasmi.m dhammavinaye vuddhi.m viruu.lhi.m vepulla.m aapajjissatiiti -- neta.m .thaana.m vijjati.

[03] ``katamaassa pa~nca cetokhilaa appahiinaa honti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu satthari ka"nkhati vicikicchati naadhimuccati na sampasiidati. yo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu satthari ka"nkhati vicikicchati naadhimuccati na sampasiidati tassa citta.m na namati aatappaaya anuyogaaya saataccaaya padhaanaaya. yassa citta.m na namati aatappaaya anuyogaaya saataccaaya padhaanaaya, evamassaaya.m pa.thamo cetokhilo appahiino hoti.
[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhamme ka"nkhati vicikicchati naadhimuccati na sampasiidati...pe0... evamassaaya.m dutiyo cetokhilo appahiino hoti.
[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sa"nghe ka"nkhati vicikicchati naadhimuccati na sampasiidati...pe0... evamassaaya.m tatiyo cetokhilo appahiino hoti.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sikkhaaya ka"nkhati vicikicchati naadhimuccati na sampasiidati. yo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sikkhaaya ka"nkhati vicikicchati naadhimuccati na sampasiidati, tassa citta.m na namati ^a^T1.0206^ea^ aatappaaya anuyogaaya saataccaaya padhaanaaya. yassa citta.m ^a^V1.0146^ea^ na namati aatappaaya anuyogaaya saataccaaya padhaanaaya, evamassaaya.m catuttho cetokhilo appahiino hoti.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sabrahmacaariisu kupito hoti anattamano aahatacitto khilajaato. yo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sabrahmacaariisu kupito hoti anattamano aahatacitto khilajaato, tassa citta.m na namati aatappaaya anuyogaaya saataccaaya padhaanaaya. yassa citta.m na namati ^a^M1.0146^ea^ aatappaaya anuyogaaya saataccaaya padhaanaaya, evamassaaya.m pa~ncamo cetokhilo appahiino hoti. imaassa pa~nca cetokhilaa appahiinaa honti.

[03] ``puna ^a^V1.0147^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu a~n~natara.m devanikaaya.m pa.nidhaaya brahmacariya.m carati -- `iminaaha.m siilena vaa vatena vaa tapena vaa brahmacariyena vaa devo vaa bhavissaami deva~n~nataro vaa'ti. yo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu a~n~natara.m devanikaaya.m pa.nidhaaya brahmacariya.m carati -- `iminaaha.m siilena vaa vatena vaa tapena vaa brahmacariyena vaa devo vaa bhavissaami deva~n~nataro vaa'ti, tassa citta.m na namati aatappaaya anuyogaaya saataccaaya padhaanaaya ^a^M1.0147^ea^. yassa citta.m na namati aatappaaya anuyogaaya saataccaaya padhaanaaya, evamassaaya.m pa~ncamo cetasovinibandho asamucchinno hoti. imaassa pa~nca cetasovinibandhaa asamucchinnaa honti.

[03] ``yassa kassaci, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ime pa~nca cetokhilaa appahiinaa, ime pa~nca cetasovinibandhaa asamucchinnaa, so vatimasmi.m dhammavinaye vuddhi.m viruu.lhi.m vepulla.m aapajjissatiiti -- neta.m .thaana.m vijjati.

[03] 189^b^.^eb^ ``so chandasamaadhipadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata.m iddhipaada.m bhaaveti, viiriyasamaadhipadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata.m iddhipaada.m bhaaveti, cittasamaadhipadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata.m ^a^M1.0149^ea^ iddhipaada.m bhaaveti, viima.msaasamaadhipadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata.m iddhipaada.m bhaaveti, usso.lhiiyeva pa~ncamii. sa kho so, bhikkhave, eva.m usso.lhiipannarasa"ngasamannaagato ^a^P1.0104^ea^ bhikkhu bhabbo abhinibbidaaya, bhabbo sambodhaaya, bhabbo anuttarassa yogakkhemassa adhigamaaya. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, kukku.tiyaa a.n.daani a.t.tha vaa dasa vaa dvaadasa vaa. taanassu kukku.tiyaa sammaa adhisayitaani sammaa pariseditaani sammaa paribhaavitaani. ki~ncaapi tassaa kukku.tiyaa na eva.m icchaa uppajjeyya -- `aho vatime kukku.tapotakaa paadanakhasikhaaya vaa mukhatu.n.dakena vaa a.n.dakosa.m ^a^T1.0211^ea^ padaaletvaa sotthinaa abhinibbhijjeyyu'nti. atha kho bhabbaava te kukku.tapotakaa paadanakhasikhaaya vaa mukhatu.n.dakena vaa a.n.dakosa.m padaaletvaa sotthinaa abhinibbhijjitu.m. evameva kho, bhikkhave, eva.m usso.lhipannarasa"ngasamannaagato bhikkhu bhabbo abhinibbidaaya, bhabbo sambodhaaya, bhabbo anuttarassa yogakkhemassa adhigamaayaa''ti.

[03] 190^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^V1.0150^ea^ ^a^T1.0212^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``vanapatthapariyaaya.m vo, bhikkhave, desessaami, ta.m su.naatha, saadhuka.m manasikarotha, bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] 191^b^.^eb^ ``idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu a~n~natara.m vanapattha.m upanissaaya viharati. tassa ta.m vanapattha.m upanissaaya viharato anupa.t.thitaa ceva sati na upa.t.thaati, asamaahita~nca ^a^M1.0150^ea^ citta.m na samaadhiyati, aparikkhii.naa ca aasavaa na parikkhaya.m gacchanti, ananuppatta~nca anuttara.m yogakkhema.m naanupaapu.naati. ye ca kho ime pabbajitena jiivitaparikkhaaraa samudaanetabbaa -- ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraa -- te kasirena samudaagacchanti. tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa iti pa.tisa~ncikkhitabba.m ^a^P1.0105^ea^ -- `aha.m kho ima.m vanapattha.m upanissaaya viharaami, tassa me ima.m vanapattha.m upanissaaya viharato anupa.t.thitaa ceva sati na upa.t.thaati, asamaahita~nca citta.m na samaadhiyati, aparikkhii.naa ca aasavaa na parikkhaya.m gacchanti, ananuppatta~nca anuttara.m yogakkhema.m naanupaapu.naami. ye ca kho ime pabbajitena jiivitaparikkhaaraa ^a^T1.0213^ea^ samudaanetabbaa -- ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraa -- te kasirena samudaagacchantii'ti. tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa rattibhaaga.m vaa divasabhaaga.m vaa tamhaa vanapatthaa pakkamitabba.m, na vatthabba.m.

[03] 192^b^.^eb^ ``idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu a~n~natara.m vanapattha.m upanissaaya viharati. tassa ta.m vanapattha.m upanissaaya viharato anupa.t.thitaa ceva sati na upa.t.thaati, asamaahita~nca citta.m na samaadhiyati, aparikkhii.naa ca aasavaa na parikkhaya.m gacchanti, ananuppatta~nca anuttara.m yogakkhema.m naanupaapu.naati. ye ca kho ime pabbajitena jiivitaparikkhaaraa samudaanetabbaa -- ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraa -- te appakasirena samudaagacchanti. tena ^a^V1.0151^ea^, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa iti pa.tisa~ncikkhitabba.m -- `aha.m kho ima.m vanapattha.m upanissaaya viharaami. tassa me ima.m vanapattha.m upanissaaya viharato anupa.t.thitaa ceva sati na upa.t.thaati asamaahita~nca citta.m na samaadhiyati, aparikkhii.naa ca aasavaa na parikkhaya.m gacchanti, ananuppatta~nca anuttara.m yogakkhema.m naanupaapu.naami. ye ca kho ime pabbajitena jiivitaparikkhaaraa samudaanetabbaa -- ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraa -- te appakasirena samudaagacchanti. na kho panaaha.m ciivarahetu agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito na pi.n.dapaatahetu...pe0... na senaasanahetu...pe0... na gilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaarahetu agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito. atha ca pana me ima.m ^a^T1.0214^ea^ vanapattha.m upanissaaya viharato anupa.t.thitaa ceva sati na upa.t.thaati, asamaahita~nca citta.m na samaadhiyati, aparikkhii.naa ca aasavaa na parikkhaya.m gacchanti, ananuppatta~nca anuttara.m yogakkhema.m naanupaapu.naamii'ti. tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa sa"nkhaapi tamhaa vanapatthaa pakkamitabba.m, na vatthabba.m.
