[03] 195^b^.^eb^ ``idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu a~n~natara.m gaama.m upanissaaya viharati ^a^T1.0216^ea^ ...pe0... a~n~natara.m nigama.m upanissaaya viharati...pe0... a~n~natara.m nagara.m upanissaaya viharati...pe0... a~n~natara.m janapada.m upanissaaya viharati...pe0... a~n~natara.m puggala.m upanissaaya viharati. tassa ta.m puggala.m upanissaaya viharato anupa.t.thitaa ceva sati na upa.t.thaati, asamaahita~nca citta.m na samaadhiyati, aparikkhii.naa ca aasavaa na parikkhaya.m gacchanti, ananuppatta~nca anuttara.m yogakkhema.m naanupaapu.naati. ye ca kho ime pabbajitena jiivitaparikkhaaraa samudaanetabbaa -- ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraa -- te kasirena samudaagacchanti. tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa iti pa.tisa~ncikkhitabba.m -- `aha.m kho ima.m puggala.m upanissaaya viharaami. tassa me ima.m puggala.m upanissaaya viharato anupa.t.thitaa ceva sati na upa.t.thaati, asamaahita~nca citta.m na samaadhiyati, aparikkhii.naa ca aasavaa na parikkhaya.m gacchanti, ananuppatta~nca anuttara.m yogakkhema.m naanupaapu.naami. ye ca kho ime pabbajitena jiivitaparikkhaaraa samudaanetabbaa -- ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraa -- te kasirena samudaagacchantii'ti. tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa rattibhaaga.m vaa divasabhaaga.m vaa so puggalo anaapucchaa pakkamitabba.m, naanubandhitabbo.

[03] 196^b^.^eb^ ``idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu a~n~natara.m puggala.m upanissaaya viharati. tassa ta.m ^a^V1.0153^ea^ puggala.m upanissaaya viharato anupa.t.thitaa ^a^P1.0107^ea^ ceva sati na upa.t.thaati, asamaahita~nca citta.m na samaadhiyati, aparikkhii.naa ca ^a^T1.0217^ea^ aasavaa na parikkhaya.m gacchanti, ananuppatta~nca anuttara.m yogakkhema.m naanupaapu.naati. ye ca kho ime pabbajitena jiivitaparikkhaaraa samudaanetabbaa -- ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraa, te appakasirena samudaagacchanti. tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa iti pa.tisa~ncikkhitabba.m -- `aha.m kho ima.m puggala.m upanissaaya viharaami. tassa me ima.m puggala.m upanissaaya viharato anupa.t.thitaa ceva sati na upa.t.thaati, asamaahita~nca citta.m na samaadhiyati, aparikkhii.naa ca aasavaa na parikkhaya.m gacchanti, ananuppatta~nca anuttara.m yogakkhema.m naanupaapu.naami. ye ca kho ime pabbajitena jiivitaparikkhaaraa samudaanetabbaa -- ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraa ^a^M1.0153^ea^ -- te appakasirena samudaagacchanti. na kho panaaha.m ciivarahetu agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito, na pi.n.dapaatahetu...pe0... na senaasanahetu...pe0... na gilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaarahetu agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito. atha ca pana me ima.m puggala.m upanissaaya viharato anupa.t.thitaa ceva sati na upa.t.thaati, asamaahita~nca citta.m na samaadhiyati, aparikkhii.naa ca aasavaa na parikkhaya.m gacchanti, ananuppatta~nca anuttara.m yogakkhema.m naanupaapu.naamii'ti. tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa sa"nkhaapi so puggalo aapucchaa pakkamitabba.m, naanubandhitabbo.

[03] 197^b^.^eb^ ``idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu a~n~natara.m puggala.m upanissaaya viharati. tassa ta.m puggala.m upanissaaya viharato anupa.t.thitaa ceva sati upa.t.thaati, asamaahita~nca ^a^T1.0218^ea^ citta.m samaadhiyati, aparikkhii.naa ca aasavaa parikkhaya.m gacchanti, ananuppatta~nca anuttara.m yogakkhema.m anupaapu.naati. ye ca kho ime pabbajitena jiivitaparikkhaaraa samudaanetabbaa -- ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraa -- te kasirena samudaagacchanti. tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa iti pa.tisa~ncikkhitabba.m -- `aha.m kho ima.m puggala.m upanissaaya viharaami. tassa me ima.m puggala.m upanissaaya viharato anupa.t.thitaa ceva sati upa.t.thaati, asamaahita~nca citta.m samaadhiyati, aparikkhii.naa ca aasavaa parikkhaya.m gacchanti, ananuppatta~nca anuttara.m yogakkhema.m anupaapu.naami. ye ca kho ime pabbajitena jiivitaparikkhaaraa samudaanetabbaa -- ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraa -- te kasirena samudaagacchanti. na kho panaaha.m ciivarahetu agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito, na pi.n.dapaatahetu...pe0... na senaasanahetu...pe0... na gilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaarahetu agaarasmaa ^a^V1.0154^ea^ anagaariya.m pabbajito. atha ca pana me ima.m puggala.m upanissaaya viharato anupa.t.thitaa ceva sati upa.t.thaati, asamaahita~nca citta.m samaadhiyati, aparikkhii.naa ca aasavaa parikkhaya.m gacchanti, ananuppatta~nca anuttara.m yogakkhema.m anupaapu.naamii'ti. tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa sa"nkhaapi so puggalo anubandhitabbo, na pakkamitabba.m.

[03] 198^b^.^eb^ ``idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu a~n~natara.m puggala.m upanissaaya viharati. tassa ta.m puggala.m upanissaaya viharato anupa.t.thitaa ceva sati ^a^T1.0219^ea^ upa.t.thaati, asamaahita~nca citta.m samaadhiyati, aparikkhii.naa ca aasavaa parikkhaya.m gacchanti ^a^M1.0154^ea^, ananuppatta~nca anuttara.m yogakkhema.m anupaapu.naati. ye ca kho ime pabbajitena jiivitaparikkhaaraa samudaanetabbaa -- ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraa -- te appakasirena samudaagacchanti. tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa iti pa.tisa~ncikkhitabba.m -- `aha.m kho ima.m puggala.m upanissaaya viharaami ^a^P1.0108^ea^. tassa me ima.m puggala.m upanissaaya viharato anupa.t.thitaa ceva sati upa.t.thaati, asamaahita~nca citta.m samaadhiyati, aparikkhii.naa ca aasavaa parikkhaya.m gacchanti, ananuppatta~nca anuttara.m yogakkhema.m anupaapu.naami. ye ca kho ime pabbajitena jiivitaparikkhaaraa samudaanetabbaa -- ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraa -- te appakasirena samudaagacchantii'ti. tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa yaavajiivampi so puggalo anubandhitabbo, na pakkamitabba.m, api panujjamaanenapii''ti {api pa.nujjamaanenaati (?)}.
[01] idamavoca bhagavaa. attamanaa te bhikkhuu bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandunti.
[06] vanapatthasutta.m ni.t.thita.m sattama.m.

[03] 199^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T1.0220^ea^ ^a^V1.0155^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmi.m nigrodhaaraame. atha kho bhagavaa pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya kapilavatthu.m pi.n.daaya paavisi. kapilavatthusmi.m pi.n.daaya caritvaa pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkanto yena mahaavana.m tenupasa"nkami divaavihaaraaya. mahaavana.m ajjhogaahetvaa beluvala.t.thikaaya muule divaavihaara.m nisiidi. da.n.dapaa.nipi kho sakko ja"nghaavihaara.m {ja"nghavihaara.m (ka0)} anuca"nkamamaano anuvicaramaano yena mahaavana.m tenupasa"nkami. mahaavana.m ajjhogaahetvaa yena beluvala.t.thikaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa da.n.damolubbha ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. ekamanta.m .thito kho da.n.dapaa.ni sakko bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``ki.mvaadii sama.no kimakkhaayii''ti? ``yathaavaadii kho, aavuso, sadevake loke samaarake sabrahmake sassama.nabraahma.niyaa pajaaya ^a^M1.0155^ea^ sadevamanussaaya na kenaci loke viggayha ti.t.thati, yathaa ca pana kaamehi visa.myutta.m viharanta.m ta.m braahma.na.m akatha.mkathi.m chinnakukkucca.m bhavaabhave viitata.nha.m sa~n~naa naanusenti -- eva.mvaadii kho aha.m, aavuso, evamakkhaayii''ti.
[03] ``eva.m vutte da.n.dapaa.ni sakko siisa.m okampetvaa ^a^P1.0109^ea^, jivha.m nillaa.letvaa, tivisaakha.m nalaa.tika.m ^a^T1.0221^ea^ nalaa.te vu.t.thaapetvaa da.n.damolubbha pakkaami.

[03] 200^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito yena nigrodhaaraamo tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. nisajja kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``idhaaha.m, bhikkhave, pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya kapilavatthu.m pi.n.daaya paavisi.m. kapilavatthusmi.m pi.n.daaya caritvaa pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkanto yena mahaavana.m tenupasa"nkami.m divaavihaaraaya. mahaavana.m ajjhogaahetvaa beluvala.t.thikaaya muule divaavihaara.m nisiidi.m. da.n.dapaa.nipi kho, bhikkhave, sakko ja"nghaavihaara.m anuca"nkamamaano anuvicaramaano yena mahaavana.m tenupasa"nkami. mahaavana.m ajjhogaahetvaa yena beluvala.t.thikaa yenaaha.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa mayaa saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa da.n.damolubbha ekamanta.m ^a^V1.0156^ea^ a.t.thaasi. ekamanta.m .thito kho, bhikkhave, da.n.dapaa.ni sakko ma.m etadavoca -- `ki.mvaadii sama.no kimakkhaayii'ti?

[03] ``eva.m vutte aha.m, bhikkhave, da.n.dapaa.ni.m sakka.m etadavoca.m -- yathaavaadii kho, aavuso, sadevake loke samaarake sabrahmake sassama.nabraahma.niyaa pajaaya sadevamanussaaya na kenaci loke viggayha ti.t.thati, yathaa ca pana kaamehi visa.myutta.m viharanta.m ta.m braahma.na.m akatha.mkathi.m chinnakukkucca.m bhavaabhave viitata.nha.m sa~n~naa naanusenti -- eva.mvaadii kho aha.m, aavuso, evamakkhaayii''ti. ``eva.m vutte bhikkhave, da.n.dapaa.ni sakko siisa.m ^a^T1.0222^ea^ okampetvaa, jivha.m nillaa.letvaa, tivisaakha.m nalaa.tika.m nalaa.te vu.t.thaapetvaa da.n.damolubbha pakkaamii''ti.

[03] 201^b^.^eb^ eva.m vutte a~n~nataro bhikkhu bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``ki.mvaadii pana, bhante, bhagavaa sadevake loke samaarake sabrahmake sassama.nabraahma.niyaa pajaaya sadevamanussaaya na kenaci loke viggayha ti.t.thati? katha~nca pana, bhante, bhagavanta.m kaamehi visa.myutta.m viharanta.m ta.m ^a^M1.0156^ea^ braahma.na.m akatha.mkathi.m chinnakukkucca.m bhavaabhave viitata.nha.m sa~n~naa naanusentii''ti? ``yatonidaana.m, bhikkhu, purisa.m papa~ncasa~n~naasa"nkhaa samudaacaranti. ettha ce natthi abhinanditabba.m abhivaditabba.m ajjhositabba.m. esevanto raagaanusayaana.m, esevanto pa.tighaanusayaana.m, esevanto di.t.thaanusayaana.m ^a^P1.0110^ea^, esevanto vicikicchaanusayaana.m, esevanto maanaanusayaana.m, esevanto bhavaraagaanusayaana.m, esevanto avijjaanusayaana.m, esevanto da.n.daadaana-satthaadaana-kalaha-viggaha-vivaada-tuva.mtuva.m-pesu~n~na-musaavaadaana.m. etthete paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa aparisesaa nirujjhantii'ti. idamavoca bhagavaa. ida.m vatvaana sugato u.t.thaayaasanaa vihaara.m paavisi.

[03] 202^b^.^eb^ atha kho tesa.m bhikkhuuna.m acirapakkantassa bhagavato etadahosi -- ``ida.m kho no, aavuso, bhagavaa sa.mkhittena uddesa.m uddisitvaa, vitthaarena attha.m avibhajitvaa, u.t.thaayaasanaa vihaara.m pavi.t.tho -- `yatonidaana.m, bhikkhu, purisa.m papa~ncasa~n~naasa"nkhaa samudaacaranti. ettha ce natthtththi abhinanditabba.m ^a^T1.0223^ea^ abhivaditabba.m ajjhositabba.m. esevanto raagaanusayaana.m...pe0... etthete paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa aparisesaa nirujjhantii'ti ^a^V1.0157^ea^. ko nu kho imassa bhagavataa sa.mkhittena uddesassa uddi.t.thassa vitthaarena attha.m avibhattassa vitthaarena attha.m vibhajeyyaa''ti? atha kho tesa.m bhikkhuuna.m etadahosi -- ``aya.m kho aayasmaa mahaakaccaano satthu ceva sa.mva.n.nito sambhaavito ca vi~n~nuuna.m sabrahmacaariina.m. pahoti caayasmaa mahaakaccaano imassa bhagavataa sa.mkhittena uddesassa uddi.t.thassa vitthaarena attha.m avibhattassa vitthaarena attha.m vibhajitu.m. ya.mnuuna maya.m yenaayasmaa mahaakaccaano tenupasa"nkameyyaama; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m mahaakaccaana.m etamattha.m pa.tipuccheyyaamaa''ti.

[03] atha kho te bhikkhuu yenaayasmaa mahaakaccaano tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmataa mahaakaccaanena saddhi.m sammodi.msu. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinnaa kho te bhikkhuu aayasmanta.m mahaakaccaana.m etadavocu.m -- ``ida.m kho no, aavuso kaccaana, bhagavaa sa.mkhittena uddesa.m uddisitvaa vitthaarena attha.m avibhajitvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa vihaara.m pavi.t.tho -- `yatonidaana.m, bhikkhu, purisa.m papa~ncasa~n~naasa"nkhaa samudaacaranti. ettha ce natthi abhinanditabba.m abhivaditabba.m ajjhositabba.m. esevanto ^a^M1.0157^ea^ raagaanusayaana.m...pe0... etthete paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa aparisesaa nirujjhantii'ti. tesa.m no, aavuso kaccaana, amhaaka.m acirapakkantassa bhagavato etadahosi -- `ida.m kho no, aavuso, bhagavaa sa.mkhittena uddesa.m uddisitvaa vitthaarena attha.m avibhajitvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa vihaara.m pavi.t.tho -- ``yatonidaana.m, bhikkhu, purisa.m papa~ncasa~n~naasa"nkhaa samudaacaranti. ettha ^a^T1.0224^ea^ ce natthi abhinanditabba.m abhivaditabba.m ajjhositabba.m. esevanto raagaanusayaana.m...pe0... etthete paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa aparisesaa nirujjhantii''ti. ko nu kho imassa bhagavataa sa.mkhittena uddesassa uddi.t.thassa vitthaarena attha.m avibhattassa vitthaarena attha.m vibhajeyyaati? tesa.m no, aavuso kaccaana, amhaaka.m etadahosi -- `aya.m kho aayasmaa mahaakaccaano satthu ceva sa.mva.n.nito sambhaavito ca vi~n~nuuna.m sabrahmacaariina.m, pahoti ^a^P1.0111^ea^ caayasmaa mahaakaccaano imassa bhagavataa sa.mkhittena ^a^V1.0158^ea^ uddesassa uddi.t.thassa vitthaarena attha.m avibhattassa vitthaarena attha.m vibhajitu.m. ya.mnuuna maya.m yenaayasmaa mahaakaccaano tenupasa"nkameyyaama; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m mahaakaccaana.m etamattha.m pa.tipuccheyyaamaa'ti. vibhajataayasmaa mahaakaccaano''ti.

[03] 203^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, aavuso, puriso saaratthiko saaragavesii saarapariyesana.m caramaano mahato rukkhassa ti.t.thato saaravato atikkammeva muula.m, atikkamma khandha.m, saakhaapalaase saara.m pariyesitabba.m ma~n~neyya; eva.msampadamida.m aayasmantaana.m satthari sammukhiibhuute, ta.m bhagavanta.m atisitvaa ^a^T1.0225^ea^, amhe etamattha.m pa.tipucchitabba.m ma~n~natha. so haavuso, bhagavaa jaana.m jaanaati, passa.m passati, cakkhubhuuto ~naa.nabhuuto dhammabhuuto brahmabhuuto, vattaa pavattaa, atthassa ninnetaa, amatassa daataa, dhammassaamii tathaagato. so ceva panetassa kaalo ahosi, ya.m bhagavanta.myeva etamattha.m pa.tipuccheyyaatha. yathaa vo bhagavaa byaakareyya tathaa na.m dhaareyyaathaa''ti. ``addhaavuso kaccaana, bhagavaa jaana.m jaanaati, passa.m passati, cakkhubhuuto ~naa.nabhuuto dhammabhuuto brahmabhuuto, vattaa pavattaa, atthassa ninnetaa, amatassa daataa, dhammassaamii tathaagato. so ceva panetassa kaalo ahosi, ya.m bhagavanta.myeva etamattha.m pa.tipuccheyyaama. yathaa no bhagavaa byaakareyya tathaa na.m dhaareyyaama. api caayasmaa mahaakaccaano satthu ceva sa.mva.n.nito sambhaavito ca vi~n~nuuna.m sabrahmacaariina.m, pahoti ^a^M1.0158^ea^ caayasmaa mahaakaccaano imassa bhagavataa sa.mkhittena uddesassa uddi.t.thassa vitthaarena attha.m avibhattassa vitthaarena attha.m vibhajitu.m. vibhajataayasmaa mahaakaccaano agaru.m katvaa''ti {agarukatvaa (sii0), agarukaritvaa (syaa0 pii0)}. ``tena haavuso, su.naatha, saadhuka.m manasikarotha, bhaasissaamii''ti. ``evamaavuso''ti kho te bhikkhuu aayasmato mahaakaccaanassa paccassosu.m. aayasmaa mahaakaccaano etadavoca --

[03] 204^b^.^eb^ ``ya.m kho no, aavuso, bhagavaa sa.mkhittena uddesa.m uddisitvaa vitthaarena attha.m avibhajitvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa vihaara.m pavi.t.tho -- `yatonidaana.m, bhikkhu, purisa.m papa~ncasa~n~naasa"nkhaa samudaacaranti ^a^T1.0226^ea^. ettha ce natthi abhinanditabba.m abhivaditabba.m ajjhositabba.m, esevanto raagaanusayaana.m...pe0... etthete paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa aparisesaa nirujjhantii'ti, imassa kho aha.m, aavuso, bhagavataa sa.mkhittena uddesassa uddi.t.thassa vitthaarena attha.m avibhattassa eva.m vitthaarena attha.m aajaanaami --

[03] ``cakkhu~ncaavuso, pa.ticca ruupe ca uppajjati cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m, ti.n.na.m sa"ngati phasso, phassapaccayaa ^a^V1.0159^ea^ vedanaa, ya.m vedeti ta.m sa~njaanaati ^a^P1.0112^ea^, ya.m sa~njaanaati ta.m vitakketi, ya.m vitakketi ta.m papa~nceti, ya.m papa~nceti tatonidaana.m purisa.m papa~ncasa~n~naasa"nkhaa samudaacaranti atiitaanaagatapaccuppannesu cakkhuvi~n~neyyesu ruupesu. sota~ncaavuso, pa.ticca sadde ca uppajjati sotavi~n~naa.na.m...pe0... ghaana~ncaavuso, pa.ticca gandhe ca uppajjati ghaanavi~n~naa.na.m...pe0... jivha~ncaavuso, pa.ticca rase ca uppajjati jivhaavi~n~naa.na.m...pe0... kaaya~ncaavuso, pa.ticca pho.t.thabbe ca uppajjati kaayavi~n~naa.na.m...pe0... mana~ncaavuso, pa.ticca dhamme ca uppajjati manovi~n~naa.na.m, ti.n.na.m sa"ngati phasso, phassapaccayaa vedanaa, ya.m vedeti ta.m sa~njaanaati, ya.m sa~njaanaati ta.m vitakketi, ya.m vitakketi ta.m papa~nceti, ya.m papa~nceti tatonidaana.m purisa.m papa~ncasa~n~naasa"nkhaa samudaacaranti atiitaanaagatapaccuppannesu manovi~n~neyyesu dhammesu.

[01] ``so vataavuso, cakkhusmi.m sati ruupe sati cakkhuvi~n~naa.ne sati phassapa~n~natti.m pa~n~naapessatiiti -- .thaanameta.m vijjati. phassapa~n~nattiyaa sati vedanaapa~n~natti.m pa~n~naapessatiiti -- .thaanameta.m vijjati. vedanaapa~n~nattiyaa sati sa~n~naapa~n~natti.m pa~n~naapessatiiti -- .thaanameta.m vijjati. sa~n~naapa~n~nattiyaa sati ^a^M1.0159^ea^ vitakkapa~n~natti.m pa~n~naapessatiiti -- .thaanameta.m vijjati. vitakkapa~n~nattiyaa sati papa~ncasa~n~naasa"nkhaasamudaacara.napa~n~natti.m pa~n~naapessatiiti -- .thaanameta.m vijjati. so vataavuso, sotasmi.m sati sadde sati...pe0... ^a^V1.0160^ea^ ^a^T1.0227^ea^ ghaanasmi.m sati gandhe sati...pe0... jivhaaya sati rase sati...pe0... kaayasmi.m sati pho.t.thabbe sati...pe0... manasmi.m sati dhamme sati manovi~n~naa.ne sati phassapa~n~natti.m pa~n~naapessatiiti -- .thaanameta.m vijjati. phassapa~n~nattiyaa sati vedanaapa~n~natti.m pa~n~naapessatiiti -- .thaanameta.m vijjati. vedanaapa~n~nattiyaa sati sa~n~naapa~n~natti.m pa~n~naapessatiiti -- .thaanameta.m vijjati. sa~n~naapa~n~nattiyaa sati vitakkapa~n~natti.m pa~n~naapessatiiti -- .thaanameta.m vijjati. vitakkapa~n~nattiyaa sati papa~ncasa~n~naasa"nkhaasamudaacara.napa~n~natti.m pa~n~naapessatiiti -- .thaanameta.m vijjati.

[01] ``so vataavuso, cakkhusmi.m asati ruupe asati cakkhuvi~n~naa.ne asati phassapa~n~natti.m pa~n~naapessatiiti -- neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. phassapa~n~nattiyaa asati vedanaapa~n~natti.m pa~n~naapessatiiti -- neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. vedanaapa~n~nattiyaa asati sa~n~naapa~n~natti.m pa~n~naapessatiiti -- neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. sa~n~naapa~n~nattiyaa asati vitakkapa~n~natti.m pa~n~naapessatiiti -- neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. vitakkapa~n~nattiyaa asati papa~ncasa~n~naasa"nkhaasamudaacara.napa~n~natti.m pa~n~naapessatiiti -- neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. so vataavuso, sotasmi.m ^a^T1.0229^ea^ asati sadde asati...pe0... ghaanasmi.m asati gandhe asati...pe0... jivhaaya asati rase asati...pe0... kaayasmi.m asati pho.t.thabbe asati...pe0... manasmi.m asati dhamme asati manovi~n~naa.ne ^a^V1.0161^ea^ asati phassapa~n~natti.m pa~n~naapessatiiti -- neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. phassapa~n~nattiyaa asati vedanaapa~n~natti.m pa~n~naapessatiiti -- neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. vedanaapa~n~nattiyaa asati sa~n~naapa~n~natti.m pa~n~naapessatiiti -- neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. sa~n~naapa~n~nattiyaa asati vitakkapa~n~natti.m pa~n~naapessatiiti -- neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. vitakkapa~n~nattiyaa asati papa~ncasa~n~naasa"nkhaasamudaacara.napa~n~natti.m pa~n~naapessatiiti -- neta.m .thaana.m vijjati.

[03] ``ya.m kho no, aavuso, bhagavaa sa.mkhittena ^a^P1.0113^ea^ uddesa.m uddisitvaa vitthaarena attha.m avibhajitvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa vihaara.m pavi.t.tho -- `yatonidaana.m, bhikkhu, purisa.m papa~ncasa~n~naasa"nkhaa samudaacaranti ettha ce natthi abhinanditabba.m abhivaditabba.m ajjhositabba.m esevanto raagaanusayaana.m...pe0... etthete paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa aparisesaa nirujjhantii'ti, imassa kho aha.m, aavuso, bhagavataa ^a^M1.0160^ea^ sa.mkhittena uddesassa uddi.t.thassa vitthaarena attha.m avibhattassa eva.m vitthaarena attha.m aajaanaami. aaka"nkhamaanaa ca pana tumhe aayasmanto bhagavanta.myeva upasa"nkamitvaa etamattha.m pa.tipuccheyyaatha. yathaa no bhagavaa byaakaroti tathaa na.m dhaareyyaathaa''ti.

[03] 205^b^.^eb^ atha kho te bhikkhuu aayasmato mahaakaccaanassa bhaasita.m abhinanditvaa anumoditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinnaa kho te bhikkhuu bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``ya.m kho no, bhante, bhagavaa sa.mkhittena uddesa.m uddisitvaa vitthaarena attha.m avibhajitvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa vihaara.m pavi.t.tho -- `yatonidaana.m, bhikkhu, purisa.m papa~ncasa~n~naasa"nkhaa samudaacaranti. ettha ce natthi abhinanditabba.m abhivaditabba.m ajjhositabba.m. esevanto raagaanusayaana.m...pe0... etthete paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa aparisesaa nirujjhantii'ti. tesa.m no, bhante, amhaaka.m acirapakkantassa bhagavato etadahosi -- `ida.m kho no, aavuso, bhagavaa sa.mkhittena uddesa.m uddisitvaa vitthaarena attha.m avibhajitvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa vihaara.m pavi.t.tho -- ``yatonidaana.m, bhikkhu, purisa.m papa~ncasa~n~naasa"nkhaa samudaacaranti. ettha ce natthi abhinanditabba.m abhivaditabba.m ajjhositabba.m. esevanto raagaanusayaana.m, esevanto pa.tighaanusayaana.m, esevanto di.t.thaanusayaana.m, esevanto vicikicchaanusayaana.m, esevanto maanaanusayaana.m, esevanto bhavaraagaanusayaana.m ^a^V1.0162^ea^, esevanto avijjaanusayaana.m, esevanto da.n.daadaana-satthaadaana-kalaha-viggaha-vivaadatuva.mtuva.m-pesu~n~na-musaavaadaana.m. etthete paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa aparisesaa nirujjhantii''ti. ko nu kho imassa bhagavataa sa.mkhittena uddesassa uddi.t.thassa vitthaarena attha.m avibhattassa vitthaarena attha.m vibhajeyyaa'ti? tesa.m no, bhante, amhaaka.m etadahosi -- `aya.m kho aayasmaa mahaakaccaano satthu ceva sa.mva.n.nito sambhaavito ca vi~n~nuuna.m sabrahmacaariina.m, pahoti caayasmaa mahaakaccaano ^a^T1.0230^ea^ imassa bhagavataa sa.mkhittena uddesassa uddi.t.thassa vitthaarena attha.m avibhattassa vitthaarena attha.m vibhajitu.m, ya.mnuuna maya.m yenaayasmaa mahaakaccaano tenupasa"nkameyyaama; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m mahaakaccaana.m etamattha.m pa.tipuccheyyaamaa'ti. atha kho maya.m, bhante, yenaayasmaa mahaakaccaano tenupasa"nkamimha; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m ^a^M1.0161^ea^ mahaakaccaana.m ^a^P1.0114^ea^ etamattha.m pa.tipucchimha. tesa.m no, bhante, aayasmataa mahaakaccaanena imehi aakaarehi imehi padehi imehi bya~njanehi attho vibhatto''ti. ``pa.n.dito, bhikkhave, mahaakaccaano; mahaapa~n~no, bhikkhave, mahaakaccaano. ma.m cepi tumhe, bhikkhave, etamattha.m pa.tipuccheyyaatha, ahampi ta.m evameva.m byaakareyya.m yathaa ta.m mahaakaccaanena byaakata.m. eso cevetassa attho. eva~nca {evemeva ca (ka0)} na.m dhaarethaa''ti.

[03] eva.m vutte aayasmaa aanando bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``seyyathaapi, bhante, puriso jighacchaadubbalyapareto madhupi.n.dika.m adhigaccheyya, so yato yato saayeyya, labhetheva saadurasa.m asecanaka.m. evameva kho, bhante, cetaso bhikkhu dabbajaatiko, yato yato imassa dhammapariyaayassa pa~n~naaya attha.m upaparikkheyya, labhetheva attamanata.m, labhetheva cetaso pasaada.m. ko naamo aya.m {ko naamaaya.m (syaa0)}, bhante, dhammapariyaayo''ti? ``tasmaatiha tva.m, aananda, ima.m dhammapariyaaya.m madhupi.n.dikapariyaayo tveva na.m dhaarehii''ti.
[03] idamavoca ^a^T1.0231^ea^ bhagavaa. attamano aayasmaa aanando bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandiiti.
[06] madhupi.n.dikasutta.m ni.t.thita.m a.t.thama.m.

[03] 206^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^V1.0163^ea^ ^a^T1.0232^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``pubbeva me, bhikkhave, sambodhaa anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato etadahosi -- `ya.mnuunaaha.m dvidhaa katvaa dvidhaa katvaa vitakke vihareyya'nti. so kho aha.m, bhikkhave, yo caaya.m kaamavitakko yo ca byaapaadavitakko yo ca vihi.msaavitakko -- ima.m eka.m bhaagamakaasi.m ^a^M1.0162^ea^; yo caaya.m nekkhammavitakko yo ca abyaapaadavitakko yo ca avihi.msaavitakko -- ima.m dutiya.m bhaagamakaasi.m.

[03] 207^b^.^eb^ ``tassa mayha.m, bhikkhave, eva.m appamattassa aataapino pahitattassa viharato uppajjati ^a^P1.0115^ea^ kaamavitakko. so eva.m pajaanaami -- `uppanno kho me aya.m kaamavitakko. so ca kho attabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati, parabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati, ubhayabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati, pa~n~naanirodhiko vighaatapakkhiko anibbaanasa.mvattaniko' {anibbaanasa.mvattaniko''ti (?)}. `attabyaabaadhaaya sa.mvattatii'tipi me, bhikkhave, pa.tisa~ncikkhato abbhattha.m gacchati; `parabyaabaadhaaya sa.mvattatii'tipi me, bhikkhave, pa.tisa~ncikkhato abbhattha.m gacchati; `ubhayabyaabaadhaaya sa.mvattatii'tipi me, bhikkhave, pa.tisa~ncikkhato abbhattha.m gacchati; ^a^T1.0233^ea^ `pa~n~naanirodhiko vighaatapakkhiko anibbaanasa.mvattaniko'tipi me, bhikkhave, pa.tisa~ncikkhato abbhattha.m gacchati. so kho aha.m, bhikkhave, uppannuppanna.m kaamavitakka.m pajahameva {atiitakaalikakiriyaapadaaniyeva} vinodameva {atiitakaalikakiriyaapadaaniyeva} byantameva {byanteva (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} na.m akaasi.m.

[03] 208^b^.^eb^ ``tassa mayha.m, bhikkhave, eva.m appamattassa aataapino pahitattassa viharato uppajjati byaapaadavitakko...pe0... uppajjati vihi.msaavitakko. so eva.m pajaanaami -- `uppanno kho me aya.m vihi.msaavitakko. so ca kho attabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati, parabyaabaadhaayapi ^a^V1.0164^ea^ sa.mvattati, ubhayabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati, pa~n~naanirodhiko vighaatapakkhiko anibbaanasa.mvattaniko'. `attabyaabaadhaaya sa.mvattatii'tipi me, bhikkhave, pa.tisa~ncikkhato abbhattha.m gacchati; `parabyaabaadhaaya sa.mvattatii'tipi me, bhikkhave, pa.tisa~ncikkhato abbhattha.m gacchati; `ubhayabyaabaadhaaya sa.mvattatii'tipi me, bhikkhave, pa.tisa~ncikkhato abbhattha.m gacchati; `pa~n~naanirodhiko vighaatapakkhiko anibbaanasa.mvattaniko'tipi me, bhikkhave, pa.tisa~ncikkhato abbhattha.m gacchati. so kho aha.m, bhikkhave, uppannuppanna.m vihi.msaavitakka.m pajahameva vinodameva byantameva na.m akaasi.m.

[03] ``ya~n~nadeva, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bahulamanuvitakketi anuvicaareti, tathaa tathaa nati hoti cetaso. kaamavitakka.m ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bahulamanuvitakketi ^a^M1.0163^ea^ anuvicaareti, pahaasi nekkhammavitakka.m, kaamavitakka.m bahulamakaasi, tassa ta.m ^a^T1.0234^ea^ kaamavitakkaaya citta.m namati. byaapaadavitakka.m ce, bhikkhave...pe0... vihi.msaavitakka.m ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bahulamanuvitakketi anuvicaareti, pahaasi avihi.msaavitakka.m, vihi.msaavitakka.m bahulamakaasi, tassa ta.m vihi.msaavitakkaaya citta.m namati. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, vassaana.m pacchime maase saradasamaye ki.t.thasambaadhe gopaalako gaavo rakkheyya. so taa gaavo tato tato da.n.dena aako.teyya pa.tiko.teyya sannirundheyya sannivaareyya. ta.m kissa hetu? passati hi so, bhikkhave, gopaalako tatonidaana.m vadha.m vaa bandhana.m vaa jaani.m vaa garaha.m vaa. evameva kho aha.m, bhikkhave, addasa.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m aadiinava.m okaara.m sa.mkilesa.m, kusalaana.m dhammaana.m nekkhamme aanisa.msa.m vodaanapakkha.m.

[03] 209^b^.^eb^ ``tassa ^a^P1.0116^ea^ mayha.m, bhikkhave, eva.m appamattassa aataapino pahitattassa viharato uppajjati nekkhammavitakko. so eva.m pajaanaami -- `uppanno kho me aya.m nekkhammavitakko. so ca kho nevattabyaabaadhaaya sa.mvattati, na parabyaabaadhaaya sa.mvattati, na ubhayabyaabaadhaaya sa.mvattati, pa~n~naavuddhiko avighaatapakkhiko nibbaanasa.mvattaniko'. ratti.m cepi na.m, bhikkhave, anuvitakkeyya.m anuvicaareyya.m, neva tatonidaana.m bhaya.m samanupassaami. divasa.m cepi na.m, bhikkhave, anuvitakkeyya.m anuvicaareyya.m, neva tatonidaana.m bhaya.m samanupassaami. rattindiva.m cepi na.m, bhikkhave, anuvitakkeyya.m anuvicaareyya.m, neva tatonidaana.m bhaya.m samanupassaami. api ca kho me aticira.m anuvitakkayato anuvicaarayato kaayo kilameyya ^a^V1.0165^ea^. kaaye kilante {kilamante (ka0)} citta.m ^a^T1.0235^ea^ uuha~n~neyya. uuhate citte aaraa citta.m samaadhimhaati. so kho aha.m, bhikkhave, ajjhattameva citta.m sa.n.thapemi sannisaademi ekodi.m karomi {ekodi karomi (pii0)} samaadahaami. ta.m kissa hetu? `maa me citta.m uuha~n~nii'ti {ugghaa.tiiti (syaa0 ka0), uuhaniiti (pii0)}.

[03] 210^b^.^eb^ ``tassa mayha.m, bhikkhave, eva.m appamattassa aataapino pahitattassa viharato uppajjati abyaapaadavitakko...pe0... uppajjati avihi.msaavitakko. so eva.m pajaanaami -- `uppanno kho me aya.m avihi.msaavitakko. so ca kho nevattabyaabaadhaaya sa.mvattati, na parabyaabaadhaaya sa.mvattati, na ubhayabyaabaadhaaya ^a^M1.0164^ea^ sa.mvattati, pa~n~naavuddhiko avighaatapakkhiko nibbaanasa.mvattaniko'. ratti.m cepi na.m, bhikkhave, anuvitakkeyya.m anuvicaareyya.m, neva tatonidaana.m bhaya.m samanupassaami. divasa.m cepi na.m, bhikkhave, anuvitakkeyya.m anuvicaareyya.m, neva tatonidaana.m bhaya.m samanupassaami. rattindiva.m cepi na.m, bhikkhave, anuvitakkeyya.m anuvicaareyya.m, neva tatonidaana.m bhaya.m samanupassaami. api ca kho me aticira.m anuvitakkayato anuvicaarayato kaayo kilameyya. kaaye kilante citta.m uuha~n~neyya. uuhate citte aaraa citta.m samaadhimhaati. so kho aha.m, bhikkhave, ajjhattameva citta.m sa.n.thapemi, sannisaademi, ekodi.m karomi samaadahaami. ta.m kissa hetu? `maa me citta.m uuha~n~nii'ti.

[03] ``ya~n~nadeva, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bahulamanuvitakketi anuvicaareti, tathaa tathaa nati hoti cetaso. nekkhammavitakka~nce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bahulamanuvitakketi anuvicaareti, pahaasi ^a^T1.0236^ea^ kaamavitakka.m, nekkhammavitakka.m bahulamakaasi, tassa.m ta.m nekkhammavitakkaaya citta.m namati. abyaapaadavitakka~nce, bhikkhave...pe0... avihi.msaavitakka~nce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bahulamanuvitakketi anuvicaareti, pahaasi vihi.msaavitakka.m, avihi.msaavitakka.m bahulamakaasi, tassa ta.m avihi.msaavitakkaaya citta.m namati. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, gimhaana.m pacchime maase sabbasassesu gaamantasambhatesu gopaalako gaavo rakkheyya ^a^P1.0117^ea^, tassa rukkhamuulagatassa vaa abbhokaasagatassa vaa satikara.niiyameva hoti -- `etaa {ete (ka0)} gaavo'ti. evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, satikara.niiyameva ahosi -- `ete dhammaa'ti.

[03] 211^b^.^eb^ ``aaraddha.m kho pana me, bhikkhave, viiriya.m ahosi asalliina.m, upa.t.thitaa sati asammu.t.thaa ^a^V1.0166^ea^, passaddho kaayo asaaraddho, samaahita.m citta.m ekagga.m. so kho aha.m, bhikkhave, vivicceva kaamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja vihaasi.m. vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa ajjhatta.m sampasaadana.m cetaso ekodibhaava.m avitakka.m avicaara.m samaadhija.m piitisukha.m dutiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja vihaasi.m. piitiyaa ca viraagaa upekkhako ca vihaasi.m sato ca sampajaano, sukha~nca kaayena pa.tisa.mvedesi.m, ya.m ta.m ariyaa aacikkhanti `upekkhako satimaa ^a^M1.0165^ea^ sukhavihaarii'ti, tatiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja vihaasi.m. sukhassa ca pahaanaa dukkhassa ca pahaanaa pubbeva somanassadomanassaana.m attha"ngamaa adukkhamasukha.m upekkhaasatipaarisuddhi.m catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja vihaasi.m.

[03] 212^b^.^eb^ ``so eva.m samaahite citte parisuddhe pariyodaate ana"nga.ne vigatuupakkilese mudubhuute kammaniye .thite aane~njappatte pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.naaya citta.m abhininnaamesi.m. so anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussaraami. seyyathida.m, ekampi jaati.m...pe0... iti saakaara.m sauddesa.m anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussaraami. aya.m kho ^a^T1.0237^ea^ me, bhikkhave, rattiyaa pa.thame yaame pa.thamaa vijjaa adhigataa; avijjaa vihataa vijjaa uppannaa; tamo vihato aaloko uppanno; yathaa ta.m appamattassa aataapino pahitattassa viharato.

[03] 213^b^.^eb^ ``so eva.m samaahite citte parisuddhe pariyodaate ana"nga.ne vigatuupakkilese mudubhuute kammaniye .thite aane~njappatte sattaana.m cutuupapaata~naa.naaya citta.m abhininnaamesi.m. so dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena satte passaami cavamaane upapajjamaane...pe0... ime vata bhonto sattaa kaayaduccaritena samannaagataa...pe0... iti dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena satte passaami cavamaane upapajjamaane hiine pa.niite suva.n.ne dubba.n.ne sugate duggate, yathaakammuupage satte pajaanaami. aya.m kho me, bhikkhave, rattiyaa majjhime yaame dutiyaa vijjaa adhigataa; avijjaa vihataa vijjaa uppannaa; tamo vihato aaloko uppanno; yathaa ta.m appamattassa aataapino pahitattassa viharato.

[03] 214^b^.^eb^ ``so eva.m samaahite citte parisuddhe pariyodaate ana"nga.ne vigatuupakkilese mudubhuute kammaniye .thite aane~njappatte aasavaana.m khaya~naa.naaya citta.m abhininnaamesi.m. so `ida.m dukkha'nti yathaabhuuta.m abbha~n~naasi.m, `aya.m dukkhasamudayo'ti yathaabhuuta.m abbha~n~naasi.m, `aya.m dukkhanirodho'ti yathaabhuuta.m abbha~n~naasi.m, `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m abbha~n~naasi.m ^a^M1.0166^ea^. `ime aasavaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m abbha~n~naasi.m, `aya.m aasavasamudayo'ti yathaabhuuta.m abbha~n~naasi.m, `aya.m ^a^V1.0167^ea^ aasavanirodho'ti yathaabhuuta.m abbha~n~naasi.m, `aya.m ^a^T1.0238^ea^ aasavanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m abbha~n~naasi.m. tassa me eva.m jaanato eva.m passato kaamaasavaapi citta.m vimuccittha, bhavaasavaapi citta.m vimuccittha, avijjaasavaapi citta.m vimuccittha, vimuttasmi.m vimuttamiti ~naa.na.m ahosi -- `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti abbha~n~naasi.m. aya.m kho me, bhikkhave, rattiyaa pacchime yaame tatiyaa vijjaa adhigataa; avijjaa vihataa vijjaa uppannaa; tamo vihato aaloko uppanno; yathaa ta.m appamattassa aataapino pahitattassa viharato.

[03] 215^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, ara~n~ne pavane mahanta.m ninna.m pallala.m. tamena.m mahaamigasa"ngho upanissaaya vihareyya. tassa kocideva puriso uppajjeyya anatthakaamo ahitakaamo ayogakkhemakaamo. so yvaassa maggo khemo sovatthiko piitigamaniiyo ta.m magga.m pidaheyya, vivareyya kummagga.m, odaheyya okacara.m, .thapeyya okacaarika.m. eva~nhi so, bhikkhave, mahaamigasa"ngho aparena samayena ^a^T1.0239^ea^ anayabyasana.m {anayabyasana.m tanutta.m (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} aapajjeyya. tasseva kho pana, bhikkhave, mahato migasa"nghassa kocideva puriso uppajjeyya atthakaamo hitakaamo yogakkhemakaamo. so yvaassa maggo khemo sovatthiko piitigamaniiyo ta.m magga.m vivareyya, pidaheyya kummagga.m, uuhaneyya okacara.m, naaseyya okacaarika.m. eva~nhi so, bhikkhave, mahaamigasa"ngho aparena samayena vuddhi.m viruu.lhi.m vepulla.m aapajjeyya.

[03] ``upamaa kho me aya.m, bhikkhave, kataa atthassa vi~n~naapanaaya ^a^P1.0118^ea^. aya.m cevettha attho -- mahanta.m ninna.m pallalanti kho, bhikkhave, kaamaanameta.m adhivacana.m. mahaamigasa"nghoti kho, bhikkhave, sattaanameta.m adhivacana.m. puriso anatthakaamo ahitakaamo ayogakkhemakaamoti kho, bhikkhave, maarasseta.m paapimato adhivacana.m. kummaggoti kho, bhikkhave, a.t.tha"ngikasseta.m micchaamaggassa adhivacana.m, seyyathida.m -- micchaadi.t.thiyaa micchaasa"nkappassa micchaavaacaaya micchaakammantassa micchaaaajiivassa micchaavaayaamassa micchaasatiyaa micchaasamaadhissa. okacaroti kho, bhikkhave, nandiiraagasseta.m adhivacana.m. okacaarikaati ^a^M1.0167^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, avijjaayeta.m adhivacana.m. puriso atthakaamo hitakaamo yogakkhemakaamoti kho, bhikkhave, tathaagatasseta.m adhivacana.m arahato sammaasambuddhassa. khemo maggo sovatthiko piitigamaniiyoti kho ^a^V1.0168^ea^, bhikkhave, ariyasseta.m a.t.tha"ngikassa maggassa adhivacana.m, seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thiyaa sammaasa"nkappassa sammaavaacaaya sammaakammantassa sammaaaajiivassa sammaavaayaamassa sammaasatiyaa sammaasamaadhissa.

[03] ``iti kho, bhikkhave, viva.to mayaa khemo maggo sovatthiko piitigamaniiyo, pihito kummaggo, uuhato okacaro, naasitaa okacaarikaa. ya.m, bhikkhave, satthaaraa kara.niiya.m saavakaana.m hitesinaa anukampakena anukampa.m upaadaaya, kata.m vo ta.m mayaa. etaani, bhikkhave ^a^T1.0240^ea^, rukkhamuulaani, etaani su~n~naagaaraani; jhaayatha, bhikkhave, maa pamaadattha; maa pacchaa vippa.tisaarino ahuvattha. aya.m vo amhaaka.m anusaasanii''ti.
[01] idamavoca bhagavaa. attamanaa te bhikkhuu bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandunti.
[06] dvedhaavitakkasutta.m ni.t.thita.m navama.m.

[03] 216^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T1.0241^ea^ ^a^V1.0169^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti ^a^P1.0119^ea^ te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``adhicittamanuyuttena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa pa~nca nimittaani kaalena kaala.m manasi kaatabbaani. katamaani pa~nca? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ya.m nimitta.m aagamma ya.m nimitta.m manasikaroto uppajjanti paapakaa akusalaa vitakkaa chanduupasa.mhitaapi dosuupasa.mhitaapi mohuupasa.mhitaapi, tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa tamhaa nimittaa a~n~na.m nimitta.m manasi kaatabba.m kusaluupasa.mhita.m. tassa tamhaa nimittaa a~n~na.m nimitta.m manasikaroto kusaluupasa.mhita.m ye paapakaa akusalaa ^a^M1.0168^ea^ vitakkaa chanduupasa.mhitaapi dosuupasa.mhitaapi mohuupasa.mhitaapi te pahiiyanti te abbhattha.m gacchanti. tesa.m pahaanaa ajjhattameva citta.m santi.t.thati sannisiidati ekodi hoti {ekodibhoti (syaa0 ka0)} samaadhiyati. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, dakkho palaga.n.do vaa palaga.n.dantevaasii vaa sukhumaaya aa.niyaa o.laarika.m aa.ni.m abhinihaneyya abhiniihareyya abhinivatteyya {abhinivajjeyya (sii0 pii0)}; evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ya.m nimitta.m aagamma ya.m nimitta.m manasikaroto uppajjanti paapakaa akusalaa vitakkaa chanduupasa.mhitaapi dosuupasa.mhitaapi ^a^T1.0242^ea^ mohuupasa.mhitaapi, tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa tamhaa nimittaa a~n~na.m nimitta.m manasi kaatabba.m kusaluupasa.mhita.m. tassa tamhaa nimittaa a~n~na.m nimitta.m manasikaroto kusaluupasa.mhita.m ye paapakaa akusalaa vitakkaa chanduupasa.mhitaapi dosuupasa.mhitaapi mohuupasa.mhitaapi te pahiiyanti te abbhattha.m gacchanti. tesa.m pahaanaa ajjhattameva citta.m santi.t.thati sannisiidati ekodi hoti samaadhiyati.

[03] 217^b^.^eb^ ``tassa ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno tamhaa nimittaa a~n~na.m nimitta.m manasikaroto kusaluupasa.mhita.m uppajjanteva paapakaa akusalaa vitakkaa chanduupasa.mhitaapi dosuupasa.mhitaapi mohuupasa.mhitaapi, tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa tesa.m vitakkaana.m aadiinavo upaparikkhitabbo -- `itipime vitakkaa akusalaa, itipime vitakkaa saavajjaa, itipime vitakkaa ^a^V1.0170^ea^ dukkhavipaakaa'ti. tassa tesa.m vitakkaana.m aadiinava.m upaparikkhato ye paapakaa akusalaa vitakkaa chanduupasa.mhitaapi dosuupasa.mhitaapi mohuupasa.mhitaapi te pahiiyanti te abbhattha.m gacchanti. tesa.m pahaanaa ajjhattameva citta.m santi.t.thati sannisiidati ekodi hoti samaadhiyati. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, itthii vaa puriso vaa daharo yuvaa ma.n.danakajaatiko ahiku.napena vaa kukkuraku.napena vaa manussaku.napena ^a^P1.0120^ea^ vaa ka.n.the aasattena a.t.tiyeyya haraayeyya jiguccheyya; evameva kho, bhikkhave, tassa ce bhikkhuno tamhaapi nimittaa a~n~na.m nimitta.m ^a^T1.0243^ea^ manasikaroto kusaluupasa.mhita.m uppajjanteva paapakaa akusalaa vitakkaa chanduupasa.mhitaapi dosuupasa.mhitaapi mohuupasa.mhitaapi, tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa tesa.m vitakkaana.m aadiinavo upaparikkhitabbo -- `itipime vitakkaa akusalaa, itipime ^a^M1.0169^ea^ vitakkaa saavajjaa, itipime vitakkaa dukkhavipaakaa'ti. tassa tesa.m vitakkaana.m aadiinava.m upaparikkhato ye paapakaa akusalaa vitakkaa chanduupasa.mhitaapi dosuupasa.mhitaapi mohuupasa.mhitaapi te pahiiyanti te abbhattha.m gacchanti. tesa.m pahaanaa ajjhattameva citta.m santi.t.thati sannisiidati ekodi hoti samaadhiyati.

[03] 218^b^.^eb^ ``tassa ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno tesampi vitakkaana.m aadiinava.m upaparikkhato uppajjanteva paapakaa akusalaa vitakkaa chanduupasa.mhitaapi dosuupasa.mhitaapi mohuupasa.mhitaapi, tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa tesa.m vitakkaana.m asatiamanasikaaro aapajjitabbo. tassa tesa.m vitakkaana.m asatiamanasikaara.m aapajjato ye paapakaa akusalaa vitakkaa chanduupasa.mhitaapi dosuupasa.mhitaapi mohuupasa.mhitaapi te pahiiyanti te abbhattha.m gacchanti. tesa.m pahaanaa ajjhattameva citta.m santi.t.thati sannisiidati ekodi hoti samaadhiyati. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, cakkhumaa puriso aapaathagataana.m ruupaana.m adassanakaamo assa; so nimiileyya vaa a~n~nena vaa apalokeyya. evameva kho, bhikkhave, tassa ce bhikkhuno tesampi vitakkaana.m aadiinava.m upaparikkhato uppajjanteva paapakaa akusalaa vitakkaa chanduupasa.mhitaapi dosuupasa.mhitaapi mohuupasa.mhitaapi, te pahiiyanti te abbhattha.m gacchanti. tesa.m pahaanaa ajjhattameva citta.m santi.t.thati sannisiidati ekodi hoti samaadhiyati.

[03] 219^b^.^eb^ ``tassa ^a^T1.0244^ea^ ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno tesampi vitakkaana.m asatiamanasikaara.m aapajjato ^a^V1.0171^ea^ uppajjanteva paapakaa akusalaa vitakkaa chanduupasa.mhitaapi dosuupasa.mhitaapi mohuupasa.mhitaapi, tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa tesa.m vitakkaana.m vitakkasa"nkhaarasa.n.thaana.m manasikaatabba.m. tassa tesa.m vitakkaana.m vitakkasa"nkhaarasa.n.thaana.m manasikaroto ye paapakaa akusalaa vitakkaa chanduupasa.mhitaapi dosuupasa.mhitaapi mohuupasa.mhitaapi te pahiiyanti te abbhattha.m gacchanti. tesa.m pahaanaa ajjhattameva citta.m santi.t.thati sannisiidati ekodi hoti samaadhiyati. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, puriso siigha.m gaccheyya. tassa evamassa -- `ki.m nu kho aha.m siigha.m gacchaami? ya.mnuunaaha.m sa.nika.m gaccheyya'nti. so sa.nika.m gaccheyya. tassa evamassa -- `ki.m nu kho aha.m sa.nika.m gacchaami? ya.mnuunaaha.m ti.t.theyya'nti. so ti.t.theyya ^a^M1.0170^ea^. tassa evamassa -- `ki.m nu kho aha.m .thito? ya.mnuunaaha.m nisiideyya'nti. so nisiideyya. tassa evamassa -- `ki.m nu kho aha.m nisinno? ya.mnuunaaha.m nipajjeyya'nti. so nipajjeyya. eva~nhi so, bhikkhave, puriso o.laarika.m o.laarika.m iriyaapatha.m abhinivajjetvaa {abhinissajjetvaa (syaa0)} sukhuma.m sukhuma.m iriyaapatha.m kappeyya. evameva kho, bhikkhave, tassa ce bhikkhuno tesampi vitakkaana.m asatiamanasikaara.m aapajjato uppajjanteva paapakaa akusalaa vitakkaa chanduupasa.mhitaapi dosuupasa.mhitaapi mohuupasa.mhitaapi te pahiiyanti te abbhattha.m gacchanti. tesa.m pahaanaa ajjhattameva citta.m santi.t.thati sannisiidati ekodi hoti samaadhiyati.

[03] 220^b^.^eb^ ``tassa ^a^T1.0245^ea^ ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno tesampi vitakkaana.m vitakkasa"nkhaarasa.n.thaana.m manasikaroto uppajjanteva paapakaa akusalaa vitakkaa chanduupasa.mhitaapi dosuupasa.mhitaapi mohuupasa.mhitaapi. tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa dantebhidantamaadhaaya {dante + abhidanta.m + aadhaayaati .tiikaaya.m padacchedo, dantebhiiti panettha kara.nattho yutto viya dissati} jivhaaya taalu.m aahacca cetasaa citta.m abhinigga.nhitabba.m abhinippii.letabba.m abhisantaapetabba.m ^a^P1.0121^ea^. tassa dantebhidantamaadhaaya jivhaaya taalu.m aahacca cetasaa citta.m abhinigga.nhato abhinippii.layato abhisantaapayato ye paapakaa akusalaa vitakkaa chanduupasa.mhitaapi dosuupasa.mhitaapi mohuupasa.mhitaapi te pahiiyanti te abbhattha.m gacchanti. tesa.m pahaanaa ajjhattameva citta.m santi.t.thati sannisiidati ekodi hoti samaadhiyati. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, balavaa puriso dubbalatara.m purisa.m siise vaa gale vaa khandhe vaa gahetvaa abhinigga.nheyya abhinippii.leyya abhisantaapeyya; evameva kho, bhikkhave, tassa ce bhikkhuno tesampi vitakkaana.m vitakkasa"nkhaarasa.n.thaana.m manasikaroto uppajjanteva paapakaa akusalaa vitakkaa chanduupasa.mhitaapi dosuupasa.mhitaapi mohuupasa.mhitaapi. tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa dantebhidantamaadhaaya ^a^V1.0172^ea^ jivhaaya taalu.m aahacca cetasaa citta.m abhinigga.nhitabba.m abhinippii.letabba.m abhisantaapetabba.m. tassa dantebhidantamaadhaaya jivhaaya taalu.m aahacca cetasaa citta.m abhinigga.nhato abhinippii.layato abhisantaapayato ye paapakaa akusalaa vitakkaa chanduupasa.mhitaapi dosuupasa.mhitaapi ^a^T1.0246^ea^ mohuupasa.mhitaapi ^a^M1.0171^ea^ te pahiiyanti te abbhattha.m gacchanti. tesa.m pahaanaa ajjhattameva citta.m santi.t.thati sannisiidati ekodi hoti samaadhiyati.
