[22] khilapatthamadhupi.n.dikadvidhaavitakka, pa~ncanimittakathaa puna vaggo..

[03] 222^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T1.0248^ea^ ^a^M1.0173^ea^ ^a^V1.0174^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa mo.liyaphagguno bhikkhuniihi saddhi.m ativela.m sa.msa.t.tho viharati. eva.m sa.msa.t.tho aayasmaa mo.liyaphagguno bhikkhuniihi saddhi.m viharati -- sace koci bhikkhu aayasmato mo.liyaphaggunassa sammukhaa taasa.m bhikkhuniina.m ava.n.na.m bhaasati, tenaayasmaa mo.liyaphagguno kupito anattamano adhikara.nampi karoti. sace pana koci bhikkhu taasa.m bhikkhuniina.m sammukhaa aayasmato mo.liyaphaggunassa ava.n.na.m bhaasati, tena taa bhikkhuniyo kupitaa anattamanaa adhikara.nampi karonti. eva.m sa.msa.t.tho aayasmaa mo.liyaphagguno bhikkhuniihi saddhi.m viharati. atha kho a~n~nataro bhikkhu yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``aayasmaa, bhante, mo.liyaphagguno bhikkhuniihi saddhi.m ativela.m sa.msa.t.tho viharati. eva.m sa.msa.t.tho, bhante, aayasmaa mo.liyaphagguno bhikkhuniihi saddhi.m viharati -- sace koci bhikkhu aayasmato mo.liyaphaggunassa sammukhaa taasa.m bhikkhuniina.m ava.n.na.m bhaasati, tenaayasmaa mo.liyaphagguno kupito anattamano ^a^T1.0249^ea^ adhikara.nampi karoti. sace pana koci bhikkhu taasa.m bhikkhuniina.m sammukhaa aayasmato mo.liyaphaggunassa ava.n.na.m bhaasati, tena taa bhikkhuniyo kupitaa anattamanaa adhikara.nampi karonti. eva.m sa.msa.t.tho, bhante, aayasmaa mo.liyaphagguno bhikkhuniihi saddhi.m viharatii''ti.

[03] 223^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa a~n~natara.m bhikkhu.m aamantesi -- ``ehi tva.m ^a^P1.0123^ea^, bhikkhu, mama vacanena mo.liyaphagguna.m bhikkhu.m aamantehi -- `satthaa ta.m, aavuso phagguna, aamantetii'''ti. ``eva.m ^a^V1.0175^ea^, bhante''ti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato pa.tissutvaa yenaayasmaa mo.liyaphagguno tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m mo.liyaphagguna.m etadavoca -- ``satthaa ta.m, aavuso phagguna, aamantetii''ti. ``evamaavuso''ti kho aayasmaa mo.liyaphagguno tassa ^a^M1.0174^ea^ bhikkhuno pa.tissutvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho aayasmanta.m mo.liyaphagguna.m bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``sacca.m kira tva.m, phagguna, bhikkhuniihi saddhi.m ativela.m sa.msa.t.tho viharasi? eva.m sa.msa.t.tho kira tva.m, phagguna, bhikkhuniihi saddhi.m viharasi -- sace koci bhikkhu tuyha.m sammukhaa taasa.m bhikkhuniina.m ava.n.na.m bhaasati, tena tva.m kupito anattamano adhikara.nampi karosi. sace pana koci bhikkhu taasa.m bhikkhuniina.m sammukhaa tuyha.m ava.n.na.m bhaasati, tena taa bhikkhuniyo kupitaa anattamanaa adhikara.nampi karonti. eva.m sa.msa.t.tho kira tva.m, phagguna, bhikkhuniihi saddhi.m viharasii''ti? ``eva.m, bhante''ti. ``nanu tva.m, phagguna, kulaputto saddhaa ^a^T1.0250^ea^ agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito''ti? ``eva.m, bhante''ti.

[03] 224^b^.^eb^ ``na kho te eta.m, phagguna, patiruupa.m kulaputtassa saddhaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitassa, ya.m tva.m bhikkhuniihi saddhi.m ativela.m sa.msa.t.tho vihareyyaasi. tasmaatiha, phagguna, tava cepi koci sammukhaa taasa.m bhikkhuniina.m ava.n.na.m bhaaseyya, tatraapi tva.m, phagguna, ye gehasitaa {gehassitaa (?)} chandaa ye gehasitaa vitakkaa te pajaheyyaasi. tatraapi te, phagguna, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `na ceva me citta.m vipari.nata.m bhavissati, na ca paapika.m vaaca.m nicchaaressaami, hitaanukampii ca viharissaami mettacitto, na dosantaro'ti. eva~nhi te, phagguna, sikkhitabba.m.

[03] ``tasmaatiha, phagguna, tava cepi koci sammukhaa taasa.m bhikkhuniina.m paa.ninaa pahaara.m dadeyya, le.d.dunaa pahaara.m dadeyya, da.n.dena pahaara.m dadeyya, satthena pahaara.m dadeyya. tatraapi tva.m, phagguna, ye gehasitaa chandaa ye gehasitaa vitakkaa te pajaheyyaasi. tatraapi te, phagguna, eva.m sikkhitabba.m `na ceva me citta.m vipari.nata.m bhavissati, na ca paapika.m vaaca.m nicchaaressaami, hitaanukampii ca viharissaami mettacitto, na dosantaro'ti. eva~nhi te, phagguna, sikkhitabba.m.

[03] ``tasmaatiha, phagguna, tava cepi koci sammukhaa ava.n.na.m bhaaseyya, tatraapi tva.m, phagguna ^a^V1.0176^ea^, ye gehasitaa chandaa ye gehasitaa vitakkaa te ^a^M1.0175^ea^ pajaheyyaasi. tatraapi te, phagguna, eva.m sikkhitabba.m `na ceva me citta.m vipari.nata.m bhavissati, na ca paapika.m vaaca.m nicchaaressaami, hitaanukampii ca viharissaami mettacitto, na dosantaro'ti. eva~nhi ^a^T1.0251^ea^ te, phagguna, sikkhitabba.m.

[01] ``tasmaatiha, phagguna, tava cepi koci paa.ninaa pahaara.m dadeyya, le.d.dunaa pahaara.m dadeyya, da.n.dena pahaara.m dadeyya, satthena pahaara.m ^a^P1.0124^ea^ dadeyya, tatraapi tva.m, phagguna, ye gehasitaa chandaa ye gehasitaa vitakkaa te pajaheyyaasi. tatraapi te, phagguna, eva.m sikkhitabba.m `na ceva me citta.m vipari.nata.m bhavissati, na ca paapika.m vaaca.m nicchaaressaami, hitaanukampii ca viharissaami mettacitto, na dosantaro'ti. eva~nhi te, phagguna, sikkhitabba''nti.

[03] 225^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``aaraadhayi.msu vata me, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu eka.m samaya.m citta.m. idhaaha.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu aamantesi.m -- aha.m kho, bhikkhave, ekaasanabhojana.m bhu~njaami. ekaasanabhojana.m kho aha.m, bhikkhave, bhu~njamaano appaabaadhata~nca sa~njaanaami appaata"nkata~nca lahu.t.thaana~nca bala~nca phaasuvihaara~nca. etha tumhepi, bhikkhave, ekaasanabhojana.m bhu~njatha. ekaasanabhojana.m kho, bhikkhave, tumhepi bhu~njamaanaa appaabaadhata~nca sa~njaanissatha appaata"nkata~nca lahu.t.thaana~nca bala~nca phaasuvihaara~ncaati. na me, bhikkhave, tesu bhikkhuusu anusaasanii kara.niiyaa ahosi; satuppaadakara.niiyameva me, bhikkhave, tesu bhikkhuusu ahosi.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, subhuumiya.m catumahaapathe aaja~n~naratho yutto assa .thito odhastapatodo. tamena.m dakkho yoggaacariyo assadammasaarathi abhiruhitvaa, vaamena hatthena rasmiyo gahetvaa, dakkhi.nena hatthena patoda.m gahetvaa, yenicchaka.m yadicchaka.m ^a^T1.0252^ea^ saareyyapi paccaasaareyyapi. evameva kho, bhikkhave, na me tesu bhikkhuusu anusaasanii kara.niiyaa ahosi, satuppaadakara.niiyameva me, bhikkhave, tesu bhikkhuusu ahosi. tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, tumhepi akusala.m pajahatha, kusalesu dhammesu aayoga.m karotha. eva~nhi tumhepi imasmi.m dhammavinaye vuddhi.m viruu.lhi.m vepulla.m aapajjissatha.

[01] ``seyyathaapi ^a^M1.0176^ea^ ^a^V1.0177^ea^, bhikkhave, gaamassa vaa nigamassa vaa aviduure mahanta.m saalavana.m. ta~ncassa e.la.n.dehi sa~nchanna.m. tassa kocideva puriso uppajjeyya atthakaamo hitakaamo yogakkhemakaamo. so yaa taa saalala.t.thiyo ku.tilaa ojaapahara.niyo {ojahara.niyo (ka0)} taa chetvaa {tacchetvaa (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} bahiddhaa niihareyya, antovana.m suvisodhita.m visodheyya. yaa pana taa saalala.t.thiyo ujukaa sujaataa taa sammaa parihareyya. eva~nheta.m, bhikkhave, saalavana.m aparena samayena vuddhi.m viruu.lhi.m vepulla.m aapajjeyya. evameva kho, bhikkhave, tumhepi akusala.m pajahatha, kusalesu dhammesu aayoga.m karotha. eva~nhi ^a^P1.0125^ea^ tumhepi imasmi.m dhammavinaye vuddhi.m viruu.lhi.m vepulla.m aapajjissatha.

[03] 226^b^.^eb^ ``bhuutapubba.m, bhikkhave, imissaayeva saavatthiyaa vedehikaa naama gahapataanii ahosi. vedehikaaya, bhikkhave, gahapataaniyaa eva.m kalyaa.no kittisaddo abbhuggato -- `sorataa vedehikaa gahapataanii, nivaataa vedehikaa gahapataanii, upasantaa vedehikaa gahapataanii'ti. vedehikaaya kho pana, bhikkhave, gahapataaniyaa kaa.lii naama daasii ahosi dakkhaa analasaa ^a^T1.0253^ea^ susa.mvihitakammantaa.

[03] ``atha kho, bhikkhave, kaa.liyaa daasiyaa etadahosi -- `mayha.m kho ayyaaya eva.m kalyaa.no kittisaddo abbhuggato -- ``sorataa vedehikaa gahapataanii, nivaataa vedehikaa gahapataanii, upasantaa vedehikaa gahapataanii''ti. ki.m nu kho me ayyaa santa.myeva nu kho ajjhatta.m kopa.m na paatukaroti udaahu asanta.m udaahu mayhamevete {mayhevete (sii0 pii0)} kammantaa susa.mvihitaa yena me ayyaa santa.myeva ajjhatta.m kopa.m na paatukaroti, no asanta.m? ya.mnuunaaha.m ayya.m viima.mseyya'nti. atha kho, bhikkhave, kaa.lii daasii divaa u.t.thaasi. atha kho, bhikkhave, vedehikaa gahapataanii kaa.li.m daasi.m etadavoca -- `he je kaa.lii'ti. `ki.m, ayye'ti? `ki.m, je, divaa u.t.thaasii'ti? `na khvayye {na kho ayye (sii0 pii0)}, ki~ncii'ti. `no vata re ki~nci, paapi daasi {paapadaasi (syaa0 ka0)}, divaa u.t.thaasii'ti kupitaa anattamanaa bhaaku.ti.m {bhuuku.ti.m (sii0 pii0), bhaku.tii.m (syaa0)} akaasi. atha kho, bhikkhave, kaa.liyaa daasiyaa ^a^M1.0177^ea^ etadahosi -- `santa.myeva kho me ayyaa ajjhatta.m kopa.m na paatukaroti, no asanta.m; mayhamevete kammantaa susa.mvihitaa, yena me ayyaa santa.myeva ajjhatta.m kopa.m na paatukaroti, no asanta.m. ya.mnuunaaha.m bhiyyosomattaaya ayya.m viima.mseyya'''nti.

[01] ``atha ^a^V1.0178^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, kaa.lii daasii divaatara.myeva u.t.thaasi. atha kho, bhikkhave, vedehikaa gahapataanii kaa.li.m daasi.m etadavoca -- `he je, kaa.lii'ti. `ki.m, ayye'ti? `ki.m, je, divaatara.m u.t.thaasii'ti? `na khvayye, ki~ncii'ti. `no vata re ki~nci, paapi daasi, divaatara.m ^a^T1.0254^ea^ u.t.thaasii'ti kupitaa anattamanaa anattamanavaaca.m nicchaaresi. atha kho, bhikkhave, kaa.liyaa daasiyaa etadahosi -- `santa.myeva kho me ayyaa ajjhatta.m kopa.m na paatukaroti, no asanta.m. mayhamevete kammantaa susa.mvihitaa, yena me ayyaa santa.myeva ajjhatta.m kopa.m na paatukaroti, no asanta.m. ya.mnuunaaha.m bhiyyosomattaaya ayya.m viima.mseyya'nti.

[03] ``atha kho, bhikkhave, kaa.lii daasii divaatara.myeva u.t.thaasi. atha kho, bhikkhave, vedehikaa gahapataanii kaa.li.m daasi.m etadavoca ^a^P1.0126^ea^ -- `he je, kaa.lii'ti. `ki.m, ayye'ti? `ki.m, je, divaa u.t.thaasii'ti? `na khvayye, ki~ncii'ti. `no vata re ki~nci, paapi daasi, divaa u.t.thaasii'ti kupitaa anattamanaa agga.lasuuci.m gahetvaa siise pahaara.m adaasi, siisa.m vobhindi {vi + ava + bhindi = vobhindi}. atha kho, bhikkhave, kaa.lii daasii bhinnena siisena lohitena galantena pa.tivissakaana.m ujjhaapesi -- `passathayye, sorataaya kamma.m; passathayye, nivaataaya kamma.m, passathayye, upasantaaya kamma.m! katha~nhi naama ekadaasikaaya divaa u.t.thaasiiti kupitaa anattamanaa agga.lasuuci.m gahetvaa siise pahaara.m dassati, siisa.m vobhindissatii'ti.

[03] ``atha kho, bhikkhave, vedehikaaya gahapataaniyaa aparena samayena eva.m paapako kittisaddo abbhuggacchi -- `ca.n.dii vedehikaa gahapataanii, anivaataa vedehikaa gahapataanii, anupasantaa vedehikaa gahapataanii'ti.

[03] ``evameva kho, bhikkhave, idhekacco bhikkhu taavadeva soratasorato hoti nivaatanivaato ^a^T1.0255^ea^ hoti upasantuupasanto hoti yaava na amanaapaa vacanapathaa phusanti. yato ca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu.m ^a^M1.0178^ea^ amanaapaa vacanapathaa phusanti, atha bhikkhu `sorato'ti veditabbo, `nivaato'ti veditabbo, `upasanto'ti veditabbo. naaha.m ta.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu.m `suvaco'ti vadaami yo ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaarahetu suvaco hoti, sovacassata.m aapajjati. ta.m kissa hetu? ta~nhi so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaara.m ^a^V1.0179^ea^ alabhamaano na suvaco hoti, na sovacassata.m aapajjati. yo ca kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhamma.myeva sakkaronto, dhamma.m garu.m karonto, dhamma.m maanento, dhamma.m puujento, dhamma.m apacaayamaano {dhamma.m yeva sakkaronto dhamma.m garukaronto dhamma.m apacaayamaano (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} suvaco hoti, sovacassata.m aapajjati, tamaha.m `suvaco'ti vadaami. tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, `dhamma.myeva sakkarontaa, dhamma.m garu.m karontaa, dhamma.m maanentaa, dhamma.m puujentaa, dhamma.m apacaayamaanaa suvacaa bhavissaama, sovacassata.m aapajjissaamaa'ti. eva~nhi vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabba.m.

[03] 227^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, vacanapathaa yehi vo pare vadamaanaa vadeyyu.m -- kaalena vaa akaalena vaa; bhuutena vaa abhuutena vaa; sa.nhena vaa pharusena vaa; atthasa.mhitena vaa anatthasa.mhitena vaa; mettacittaa vaa dosantaraa vaa. kaalena vaa, bhikkhave, pare vadamaanaa vadeyyu.m akaalena vaa; bhuutena vaa, bhikkhave, pare vadamaanaa vadeyyu.m abhuutena vaa; sa.nhena vaa, bhikkhave, pare vadamaanaa vadeyyu.m pharusena vaa; atthasa.mhitena vaa, bhikkhave, pare vadamaanaa vadeyyu.m anatthasa.mhitena ^a^P1.0127^ea^ vaa ^a^T1.0256^ea^; mettacittaa vaa, bhikkhave, pare vadamaanaa vadeyyu.m dosantaraa vaa. tatraapi vo, bhikkhave, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `na ceva no citta.m vipari.nata.m bhavissati, na ca paapika.m vaaca.m nicchaaressaama, hitaanukampii ca viharissaama mettacittaa, na dosantaraa. ta~nca puggala.m mettaasahagatena cetasaa pharitvaa viharissaama, tadaaramma.na~nca sabbaavanta.m loka.m mettaasahagatena cittena vipulena mahaggatena appamaa.nena averena abyaabajjhena {abyaapajjhena (sii0 syaa0 pii0), abyaapajjena (ka0) a"nguttaratikanipaata.tiikaa oloketabbaa} pharitvaa viharissaamaa'ti. eva~nhi vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabba.m.

[03] 228^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, puriso aagaccheyya kudaalapi.taka.m {kuddaalapi.taka.m (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} aadaaya. so eva.m vadeyya -- `aha.m ima.m mahaapathavi.m apathavi.m karissaamii'ti ^a^M1.0179^ea^. so tatra tatra vikha.neyya {kha.neyya (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}, tatra tatra vikireyya, tatra tatra o.t.thubheyya, tatra tatra omutteyya -- `apathavii bhavasi, apathavii bhavasii'ti. ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, api nu so puriso ima.m mahaapathavi.m apathavi.m kareyyaa''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``ta.m kissa hetu''? ``aya~nhi, bhante, mahaapathavii gambhiiraa appameyyaa. saa na sukaraa apathavii kaatu.m; yaavadeva ca pana so puriso kilamathassa vighaatassa bhaagii assaa''ti. ``evameva kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncime vacanapathaa yehi vo pare vadamaanaa vadeyyu.m -- kaalena vaa akaalena vaa; bhuutena vaa abhuutena vaa; sa.nhena vaa pharusena vaa; atthasa.mhitena vaa anatthasa.mhitena vaa; mettacittaa vaa dosantaraa vaa. kaalena vaa ^a^V1.0180^ea^, bhikkhave, pare vadamaanaa vadeyyu.m akaalena ^a^T1.0257^ea^ vaa; bhuutena vaa bhikkhave, pare vadamaanaa vadeyyu.m abhuutena vaa; sa.nhena vaa, bhikkhave, pare vadamaanaa vadeyyu.m pharusena vaa; atthasa.mhitena vaa, bhikkhave, pare vadamaanaa vadeyyu.m anatthasa.mhitena vaa; mettacittaa vaa, bhikkhave, pare vadamaanaa vadeyyu.m dosantaraa vaa. tatraapi vo, bhikkhave, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `na ceva no citta.m vipari.nata.m bhavissati, na ca paapika.m vaaca.m nicchaaressaama, hitaanukampii ca viharissaama mettacittaa na dosantaraa. ta~nca puggala.m mettaasahagatena cetasaa pharitvaa viharissaama, tadaaramma.na~nca sabbaavanta.m loka.m pathavisamena cetasaa vipulena mahaggatena appamaa.nena averena abyaabajjhena pharitvaa viharissaamaa'ti. eva~nhi vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabba.m.

[03] 229^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, puriso aagaccheyya laakha.m vaa haliddi.m vaa niila.m vaa ma~nji.t.tha.m vaa aadaaya. so eva.m vadeyya -- `aha.m imasmi.m aakaase ruupa.m likhissaami, ruupapaatubhaava.m karissaamii'ti. ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, api nu so puriso imasmi.m aakaase ruupa.m likheyya, ruupapaatubhaava.m kareyyaa''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``ta.m kissa hetu''? ``aya~nhi, bhante, aakaaso aruupii anidassano. tattha na sukara.m ruupa.m likhitu.m, ruupapaatubhaava.m kaatu.m; yaavadeva ca pana ^a^P1.0128^ea^ so puriso kilamathassa vighaatassa bhaagii assaa''ti. ``evameva kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncime vacanapathaa yehi vo pare vadamaanaa vadeyyu.m kaalena vaa akaalena vaa ^a^T1.0258^ea^ ...pe0... `na ceva... tadaaramma.na~nca ^a^M1.0180^ea^ sabbaavanta.m loka.m aakaasasamena cetasaa vipulena mahaggatena appamaa.nena averena abyaabajjhena pharitvaa viharissaamaa'ti. eva~nhi vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabba.m.

[03] 230^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, puriso aagaccheyya aaditta.m ti.nukka.m aadaaya. so eva.m vadeyya -- `aha.m imaaya aadittaaya ti.nukkaaya ga"nga.m nadi.m santaapessaami sa.mparitaapessaamii'ti. ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, api nu so puriso aadittaaya ti.nukkaaya ga"nga.m nadi.m santaapeyya sa.mparitaapeyyaa''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``ta.m kissa hetu''? ``ga"ngaa hi, bhante, nadii gambhiiraa appameyyaa. saa na sukaraa aadittaaya ti.nukkaaya santaapetu.m sa.mparitaapetu.m; yaavadeva ca pana so puriso kilamathassa vighaatassa bhaagii assaa''ti. ``evameva kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncime vacanapathaa yehi vo pare vadamaanaa vadeyyu.m kaalena vaa akaalena ^a^V1.0181^ea^ vaa...pe0... `na ceva... tadaaramma.na~nca sabbaavanta.m loka.m ga"ngaasamena cetasaa vipulena mahaggatena appamaa.nena averena abyaabajjhena pharitvaa viharissaamaa''ti. eva~nhi vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabba.m.

[03] 231^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, bi.laarabhastaa madditaa sumadditaa suparimadditaa, mudukaa tuulinii chinnasassaraa chinnabhabbharaa. atha puriso aagaccheyya ka.t.tha.m vaa kathala.m {ka.thala.m (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} vaa aadaaya. so eva.m vadeyya -- `aha.m ima.m bi.laarabhasta.m maddita.m sumaddita.m suparimaddita.m, muduka.m tuulini.m, chinnasassara.m chinnabhabbhara.m ka.t.thena vaa kathalena vaa sarasara.m karissaami bharabhara.m karissaamii'ti ^a^T1.0259^ea^. ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, api nu so puriso amu.m bi.laarabhasta.m maddita.m sumaddita.m suparimaddita.m, muduka.m tuulini.m, chinnasassara.m chinnabhabbhara.m ka.t.thena vaa kathalena vaa sarasara.m kareyya, bharabhara.m kareyyaa''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``ta.m kissa hetu''? ``amu hi, bhante, bi.laarabhastaa madditaa sumadditaa suparimadditaa, mudukaa tuulinii, chinnasassaraa chinnabhabbharaa. saa na sukaraa ka.t.thena vaa kathalena vaa sarasara.m kaatu.m bharabhara.m kaatu.m; yaavadeva ca pana so puriso kilamathassa vighaatassa bhaagii assaa''ti. ``evameva kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncime vacanapathaa yehi vo pare vadamaanaa vadeyyu.m kaalena vaa ^a^P1.0129^ea^ akaalena vaa; bhuutena vaa abhuutena vaa; sa.nhena ^a^M1.0181^ea^ vaa pharusena vaa; atthasa.mhitena vaa anatthasa.mhitena vaa; mettacittaa vaa dosantaraa vaa. kaalena vaa bhikkhave pare vadamaanaa vadeyyu.m akaalena vaa; bhuutena vaa, bhikkhave, pare vadamaanaa vadeyyu.m abhuutena vaa; sa.nhena vaa, bhikkhave, pare vadamaanaa vadeyyu.m pharusena vaa; atthasa.mhitena vaa, bhikkhave, pare vadamaanaa vadeyyu.m anatthasa.mhitena vaa; mettacittaa vaa, bhikkhave, pare vadamaanaa vadeyyu.m dosantaraa vaa. tatraapi vo, bhikkhave, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `na ceva no citta.m vipari.nata.m bhavissati, na ca paapika.m vaaca.m nicchaaressaama hitaanukampii ca viharissaama mettacittaa na dosantaraa. ta~nca puggala.m mettaasahagatena cetasaa pharitvaa viharissaama, tadaaramma.na~nca sabbaavanta.m loka.m bi.laarabhastaasamena cetasaa ^a^T1.0260^ea^ vipulena mahaggatena appamaa.nena averena abyaabajjhena pharitvaa viharissaamaa'ti. eva~nhi vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabba.m.

[03] 232^b^.^eb^ ``ubhatoda.n.dakena cepi, bhikkhave, kakacena coraa ocarakaa a"ngama"ngaani okanteyyu.m, tatraapi yo mano paduuseyya, na me so tena saasanakaro. tatraapi vo, bhikkhave ^a^V1.0182^ea^, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `na ceva no citta.m vipari.nata.m bhavissati, na ca paapika.m vaaca.m nicchaaressaama, hitaanukampii ca viharissaama mettacittaa na dosantaraa. ta~nca puggala.m mettaasahagatena cetasaa pharitvaa viharissaama tadaaramma.na~nca sabbaavanta.m loka.m mettaasahagatena cetasaa vipulena mahaggatena appamaa.nena averena abyaabajjhena pharitvaa viharissaamaa'ti. eva~nhi vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabba.m.

[03] 233^b^.^eb^ ``ima~nca {ima~nce (?)} tumhe, bhikkhave, kakacuupama.m ovaada.m abhikkha.na.m manasi kareyyaatha. passatha no tumhe, bhikkhave, ta.m vacanapatha.m, a.nu.m vaa thuula.m vaa, ya.m tumhe naadhivaaseyyaathaa''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, ima.m kakacuupama.m ovaada.m abhikkha.na.m manasikarotha. ta.m vo bhavissati diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaayaa''ti.
[03] idamavoca bhagavaa. attamanaa te bhikkhuu bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandunti.
[06] kakacuupamasutta.m ni.t.thita.m pa.thama.m.

[03] 234^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T1.0261^ea^ ^a^M1.0182^ea^ ^a^V1.0183^ea^ ^a^P1.0130^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena ari.t.thassa naama bhikkhuno gaddhabaadhipubbassa {gandhabaadhipubbassa (ka0)} evaruupa.m paapaka.m di.t.thigata.m uppanna.m hoti -- ``tathaaha.m bhagavataa dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaami yathaa yeme antaraayikaa dhammaa vuttaa bhagavataa te pa.tisevato naala.m antaraayaayaa''ti. assosu.m kho sambahulaa bhikkhuu -- ``ari.t.thassa kira naama bhikkhuno gaddhabaadhipubbassa evaruupa.m paapaka.m di.t.thigata.m uppanna.m -- `tathaaha.m bhagavataa dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaami yathaa yeme antaraayikaa dhammaa vuttaa bhagavataa te pa.tisevato naala.m antaraayaayaa'''ti. atha kho te bhikkhuu yena ari.t.tho bhikkhu gaddhabaadhipubbo tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa ari.t.tha.m bhikkhu.m gaddhabaadhipubba.m etadavocu.m -- ``sacca.m kira te, aavuso ari.t.tha, evaruupa.m paapaka.m di.t.thigata.m uppanna.m -- `tathaaha.m bhagavataa dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaami yathaa yeme antaraayikaa dhammaa vuttaa bhagavataa te pa.tisevato naala.m antaraayaayaa'''ti. ``eva.mbyaakho {eva.m kho (?) bhagavato sammukhaayevassa ``eva.mbyaakho''ti} aha.m, aavuso, bhagavataa dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaami yathaa yeme antaraayikaa dhammaa vuttaa bhagavataa te pa.tisevato naala.m antaraayaayaa''ti.

[01] atha kho tepi bhikkhuu ari.t.tha.m bhikkhu.m gaddhabaadhipubba.m etasmaa ^a^T1.0262^ea^ paapakaa di.t.thigataa vivecetukaamaa samanuyu~njanti samanugaahanti {samanuggaahanti (syaa0)} samanubhaasanti -- ``maa heva.m, aavuso ari.t.tha, avaca, maa bhagavanta.m abbhaacikkhi; na hi saadhu bhagavato abbhakkhaana.m {abbhaacikkhana.m (ka0)}, na hi bhagavaa eva.m vadeyya. anekapariyaayenaavuso ari.t.tha, antaraayikaa dhammaa antaraayikaa vuttaa bhagavataa, ala~nca pana te pa.tisevato antaraayaaya. appassaadaa kaamaa vuttaa bhagavataa bahudukkhaa bahupaayaasaa,aadiinavo ettha bhiyyo. a.t.thika"nkaluupamaa kaamaa vuttaa bhagavataa...pe0... ma.msapesuupamaa kaamaa vuttaa bhagavataa... ti.nukkuupamaa kaamaa vuttaa bhagavataa... a"ngaarakaasuupamaa kaamaa vuttaa bhagavataa... supinakuupamaa kaamaa vuttaa bhagavataa... yaacitakuupamaa kaamaa vuttaa bhagavataa... rukkhaphaluupamaa kaamaa vuttaa bhagavataa... asisuunuupamaa kaamaa vuttaa bhagavataa... sattisuuluupamaa kaamaa vuttaa bhagavataa... sappasiruupamaa kaamaa vuttaa ^a^M1.0183^ea^ bhagavataa bahudukkhaa bahupaayaasaa, aadiinavo ettha bhiyyo''ti. evampi kho ari.t.tho bhikkhu gaddhabaadhipubbo ^a^V1.0184^ea^ tehi bhikkhuuhi samanuyu~njiyamaano samanugaahiyamaano {samanuggaahiyamaano (syaa0 vinayepi)} samanubhaasiyamaano tadeva {tatheva ta.m (vinaye)} paapaka.m di.t.thigata.m thaamasaa paraamaasaa abhinivissa voharati -- ``eva.mbyaakho aha.m, aavuso, bhagavataa dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaami yathaa yeme antaraayikaa dhammaa vuttaa bhagavataa te pa.tisevato naala.m antaraayaayaa''ti.

[03] 235^b^.^eb^ yato kho te bhikkhuu naasakkhi.msu ari.t.tha.m bhikkhu.m gaddhabaadhipubba.m ^a^T1.0263^ea^ ^a^P1.0131^ea^ etasmaa paapakaa di.t.thigataa vivecetu.m, atha kho te bhikkhuu yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinnaa kho te bhikkhuu bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``ari.t.thassa naama, bhante, bhikkhuno gaddhabaadhipubbassa evaruupa.m paapaka.m di.t.thigata.m uppanna.m -- `tathaaha.m bhagavataa dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaami yathaa yeme antaraayikaa dhammaa vuttaa bhagavataa te pa.tisevato naala.m antaraayaayaa'ti. assumha kho maya.m, bhante -- `ari.t.thassa kira naama bhikkhuno gaddhabaadhipubbassa evaruupa.m paapaka.m di.t.thigata.m uppanna.m -- tathaaha.m bhagavataa dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaami yathaa yeme antaraayikaa dhammaa vuttaa bhagavataa te pa.tisevato naala.m antaraayaayaa'ti. atha kho maya.m, bhante, yena ari.t.tho bhikkhu gaddhabaadhipubbo tenupasa"nkamimha; upasa"nkamitvaa ari.t.tha.m bhikkhu.m gaddhabaadhipubba.m etadavocumha -- `sacca.m kira te, aavuso ari.t.tha, evaruupa.m paapaka.m di.t.thigata.m uppanna.m -- tathaaha.m bhagavataa dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaami yathaa yeme antaraayikaa dhammaa vuttaa bhagavataa te pa.tisevato naala.m antaraayaayaa'ti?

[03] ``eva.m vutte, bhante, ari.t.tho bhikkhu gaddhabaadhipubbo amhe etadavoca -- `eva.mbyaakho aha.m, aavuso, bhagavataa dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaami yathaa yeme antaraayikaa dhammaa vuttaa bhagavataa te pa.tisevato naala.m antaraayaayaa'ti. atha kho maya.m, bhante, ari.t.tha.m bhikkhu.m gaddhabaadhipubba.m etasmaa paapakaa di.t.thigataa vivecetukaamaa samanuyu~njimha samanugaahimha samanubhaasimha ^a^T1.0264^ea^ -- `maa heva.m, aavuso ari.t.tha, avaca, maa bhagavanta.m abbhaacikkhi; na hi saadhu bhagavato abbhakkhaana.m ^a^M1.0184^ea^, na hi bhagavaa eva.m vadeyya. anekapariyaayenaavuso ari.t.tha, antaraayikaa dhammaa antaraayikaa vuttaa bhagavataa, ala~nca pana te pa.tisevato antaraayaaya. appassaadaa kaamaa vuttaa bhagavataa bahudukkhaa bahupaayaasaa, aadiinavo ettha bhiyyo. a.t.thika"nkaluupamaa kaamaa vuttaa bhagavataa...pe0... sappasiruupamaa kaamaa vuttaa bhagavataa bahudukkhaa bahupaayaasaa, aadiinavo ettha bhiyyo'ti. evampi kho, bhante, ari.t.tho bhikkhu gaddhabaadhipubbo amhehi samanuyu~njiyamaano samanugaahiyamaano ^a^V1.0185^ea^ samanubhaasiyamaano tadeva paapaka.m di.t.thigata.m thaamasaa paraamaasaa abhinivissa voharati -- `eva.mbyaakho aha.m, aavuso, bhagavataa dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaami yathaa yeme antaraayikaa dhammaa vuttaa bhagavataa te pa.tisevato naala.m antaraayaayaa'ti. yato kho maya.m, bhante, naasakkhimha ari.t.tha.m bhikkhu.m gaddhabaadhipubba.m etasmaa paapakaa di.t.thigataa vivecetu.m, atha maya.m etamattha.m bhagavato aarocemaa''ti.

[03] 236^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa a~n~natara.m bhikkhu.m aamantesi -- ``ehi tva.m, bhikkhu, mama vacanena ari.t.tha.m bhikkhu.m gaddhabaadhipubba.m aamantehi -- `satthaa ta.m, aavuso ari.t.tha, aamantetii'''ti. ``eva.m ^a^P1.0132^ea^, bhante''ti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato pa.tissutvaa, yena ari.t.tho bhikkhu gaddhabaadhipubbo tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ari.t.tha.m bhikkhu.m gaddhabaadhipubba.m etadavoca -- ``satthaa ^a^T1.0265^ea^ ta.m, aavuso ari.t.tha, aamantetii''ti. ``evamaavuso''ti kho ari.t.tho bhikkhu gaddhabaadhipubbo tassa bhikkhuno pa.tissutvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho ari.t.tha.m bhikkhu.m gaddhabaadhipubba.m bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``sacca.m kira te, ari.t.tha, evaruupa.m paapaka.m di.t.thigata.m uppanna.m -- `tathaaha.m bhagavataa dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaami yathaa yeme antaraayikaa dhammaa vuttaa bhagavataa te pa.tisevato naala.m antaraayaayaa'''ti?

[03] ``eva.mbyaakho aha.m, bhante, bhagavataa dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaami -- `yathaa yeme antaraayikaa dhammaa vuttaa bhagavataa te pa.tisevato naala.m antaraayaayaa'''ti. ``kassa kho naama tva.m, moghapurisa, mayaa eva.m dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaasi? nanu mayaa, moghapurisa, anekapariyaayena antaraayikaa dhammaa antaraayikaa vuttaa? ala~nca pana te pa.tisevato antaraayaaya. appassaadaa kaamaa vuttaa mayaa, bahudukkhaa bahupaayaasaa, aadiinavo ettha bhiyyo. a.t.thika"nkaluupamaa kaamaa vuttaa mayaa... ma.msapesuupamaa ^a^M1.0185^ea^ kaamaa vuttaa mayaa... ti.nukkuupamaa kaamaa vuttaa mayaa... a"ngaarakaasuupamaa kaamaa vuttaa mayaa... supinakuupamaa kaamaa vuttaa mayaa... yaacitakuupamaa kaamaa vuttaa mayaa... rukkhaphaluupamaa kaamaa vuttaa mayaa... asisuunuupamaa kaamaa vuttaa mayaa... sattisuuluupamaa kaamaa vuttaa mayaa... sappasiruupamaa kaamaa vuttaa mayaa, bahudukkhaa bahupaayaasaa, aadiinavo ettha bhiyyo. atha ca pana tva.m, moghapurisa, attanaa duggahitena ^a^T1.0266^ea^ amhe ceva abbhaacikkhasi, attaana~nca khanasi, bahu~nca apu~n~na.m pasavasi. ta~nhi te, moghapurisa, bhavissati diigharatta.m ahitaaya dukkhaayaa''ti.

[03] atha ^a^V1.0186^ea^ kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, api naaya.m ari.t.tho bhikkhu gaddhabaadhipubbo usmiikatopi imasmi.m dhammavinaye''ti? ``ki~nhi {ki.mti (ka0)} siyaa, bhante; no heta.m, bhante''ti. eva.m vutte, ari.t.tho bhikkhu gaddhabaadhipubbo tu.nhiibhuuto ma"nkubhuuto pattakkhandho adhomukho pajjhaayanto appa.tibhaano nisiidi. atha kho bhagavaa ari.t.tha.m bhikkhu.m gaddhabaadhipubba.m tu.nhiibhuuta.m ma"nkubhuuta.m pattakkhandha.m adhomukha.m pajjhaayanta.m appa.tibhaana.m viditvaa ari.t.tha.m bhikkhu.m gaddhabaadhipubba.m etadavoca -- ``pa~n~naayissasi kho tva.m, moghapurisa, etena sakena paapakena di.t.thigatena. idhaaha.m bhikkhuu pa.tipucchissaamii''ti.

[03] 237^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``tumhepi me, bhikkhave ^a^P1.0133^ea^, eva.m dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaatha yathaaya.m ari.t.tho bhikkhu gaddhabaadhipubbo attanaa duggahitena amhe ceva abbhaacikkhati, attaana~nca khanati, bahu~nca apu~n~na.m pasavatii''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante. anekapariyaayena hi no, bhante, antaraayikaa dhammaa antaraayikaa vuttaa bhagavataa; ala~nca pana te pa.tisevato antaraayaaya. appassaadaa kaamaa vuttaa bhagavataa bahudukkhaa bahupaayaasaa, aadiinavo ettha bhiyyo. a.t.thika"nkaluupamaa kaamaa vuttaa bhagavataa...pe0... sappasiruupamaa kaamaa vuttaa bhagavataa bahudukkhaa bahupaayaasaa ^a^T1.0267^ea^, aadiinavo ettha bhiyyo''ti. ``saadhu saadhu, bhikkhave, saadhu, kho me tumhe, bhikkhave, eva.m dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaatha. anekapariyaayena hi kho, bhikkhave, antaraayikaa dhammaa vuttaa mayaa, ala~nca pana te pa.tisevato antaraayaaya. appassaadaa kaamaa vuttaa mayaa ^a^M1.0186^ea^, bahudukkhaa bahupaayaasaa, aadiinavo ettha bhiyyo. a.t.thika"nkaluupamaa kaamaa vuttaa mayaa...pe0... sappasiruupamaa kaamaa vuttaa mayaa, bahudukkhaa bahupaayaasaa, aadiinavo ettha bhiyyo. atha ca panaaya.m ari.t.tho bhikkhu gaddhabaadhipubbo attanaa duggahitena amhe ceva abbhaacikkhati, attaana~nca khanati, bahu~nca apu~n~na.m pasavati. ta~nhi tassa moghapurisassa bhavissati diigharatta.m ahitaaya dukkhaaya. so vata, bhikkhave, a~n~natreva kaamehi a~n~natra kaamasa~n~naaya a~n~natra kaamavitakkehi kaame pa.tisevissatiiti -- neta.m .thaana.m vijjati''.

[03] 238^b^.^eb^ ``idha, bhikkhave, ekacce moghapurisaa dhamma.m pariyaapu.nanti -- sutta.m, geyya.m, veyyaakara.na.m, gaatha.m, udaana.m, itivuttaka.m, jaataka.m, abbhutadhamma.m, vedalla.m. te ta.m dhamma.m pariyaapu.nitvaa tesa.m dhammaana.m pa~n~naaya attha.m na upaparikkhanti. tesa.m te dhammaa pa~n~naaya attha.m anupaparikkhata.m ^a^V1.0187^ea^ na nijjhaana.m khamanti. te upaarambhaanisa.msaa ceva dhamma.m pariyaapu.nanti itivaadappamokkhaanisa.msaa ca. yassa catthaaya dhamma.m pariyaapu.nanti ta~ncassa attha.m ^a^T1.0268^ea^ naanubhonti. tesa.m te dhammaa duggahitaa diigharatta.m ahitaaya dukkhaaya sa.mvattanti. ta.m kissa hetu? duggahitattaa, bhikkhave, dhammaana.m.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, puriso alagaddatthiko alagaddagavesii alagaddapariyesana.m caramaano. so passeyya mahanta.m alagadda.m. tamena.m bhoge vaa na"ngu.t.the vaa ga.nheyya. tassa so alagaddo pa.tiparivattitvaa {pa.tinivattitvaa (syaa0 ka0)} hatthe vaa baahaaya vaa a~n~natarasmi.m vaa a"ngapacca"nge .da.mseyya {.daseyya (sii0 pii0)}. so tatonidaana.m ^a^P1.0134^ea^ mara.na.m vaa nigaccheyya mara.namatta.m vaa dukkha.m. ta.m kissa hetu? duggahitattaa, bhikkhave, alagaddassa. evameva kho, bhikkhave, idhekacce moghapurisaa dhamma.m pariyaapu.nanti -- sutta.m, geyya.m, veyyaakara.na.m, gaatha.m, udaana.m, itivuttaka.m, jaataka.m, abbhutadhamma.m, vedalla.m. te ta.m dhamma.m pariyaapu.nitvaa tesa.m dhammaana.m pa~n~naaya attha.m na upaparikkhanti. tesa.m te dhammaa pa~n~naaya attha.m anupaparikkhata.m na nijjhaana.m khamanti. te upaarambhaanisa.msaa ceva dhamma.m pariyaapu.nanti itivaadappamokkhaanisa.msaa ca. yassa catthaaya dhamma.m pariyaapu.nanti ta~ncassa attha.m naanubhonti. tesa.m te dhammaa duggahitaa diigharatta.m ahitaaya dukkhaaya sa.mvattanti. ta.m kissa hetu? duggahitattaa bhikkhave dhammaana.m.

[03] 239^b^.^eb^ ``idha ^a^M1.0187^ea^ pana, bhikkhave, ekacce kulaputtaa dhamma.m pariyaapu.nanti -- sutta.m, geyya.m, veyyaakara.na.m, gaatha.m, udaana.m, itivuttaka.m, jaataka.m, abbhutadhamma.m, vedalla.m. te ta.m dhamma.m pariyaapu.nitvaa tesa.m dhammaana.m pa~n~naaya attha.m upaparikkhanti. tesa.m te dhammaa pa~n~naaya attha.m upaparikkhata.m nijjhaana.m ^a^T1.0269^ea^ khamanti. te na ceva upaarambhaanisa.msaa dhamma.m pariyaapu.nanti na itivaadappamokkhaanisa.msaa ca {na ca itivaadappamokkhaanisa.msaa (?)}. yassa catthaaya dhamma.m pariyaapu.nanti ta~ncassa attha.m anubhonti. tesa.m te dhammaa suggahitaa diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaaya sa.mvattanti. ta.m kissa hetu? suggahitattaa bhikkhave dhammaana.m.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, puriso alagaddatthiko alagaddagavesii alagaddapariyesana.m caramaano. so passeyya mahanta.m alagadda.m. tamena.m ajapadena da.n.dena suniggahita.m nigga.nheyya. ajapadena da.n.dena suniggahita.m niggahitvaa, giivaaya suggahita.m ga.nheyya. ki~ncaapi so, bhikkhave ^a^V1.0188^ea^, alagaddo tassa purisassa hattha.m vaa baaha.m vaa a~n~natara.m vaa a"ngapacca"nga.m bhogehi palive.theyya, atha kho so neva tatonidaana.m mara.na.m vaa nigaccheyya mara.namatta.m vaa dukkha.m. ta.m kissa hetu? suggahitattaa, bhikkhave, alagaddassa. evameva kho, bhikkhave, idhekacce kulaputtaa dhamma.m pariyaapu.nanti -- sutta.m, geyya.m, veyyaakara.na.m, gaatha.m, udaana.m, itivuttaka.m, jaataka.m, abbhutadhamma.m, vedalla.m. te ta.m dhamma.m pariyaapu.nitvaa tesa.m dhammaana.m pa~n~naaya attha.m upaparikkhanti. tesa.m te dhammaa pa~n~naaya attha.m upaparikkhata.m nijjhaana.m khamanti. te na ceva upaarambhaanisa.msaa dhamma.m pariyaapu.nanti, na itivaadappamokkhaanisa.msaa ca. yassa catthaaya dhamma.m pariyaapu.nanti, ta~ncassa attha.m anubhonti. tesa.m te dhammaa suggahitaa diigharatta.m atthaaya hitaaya sukhaaya sa.mvattanti. ta.m kissa hetu? suggahitattaa, bhikkhave, dhammaana.m. tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, yassa ^a^T1.0270^ea^ me bhaasitassa attha.m aajaaneyyaatha, tathaa na.m dhaareyyaatha. yassa ca pana me bhaasitassa attha.m na aajaaneyyaatha, aha.m vo tattha pa.tipucchitabbo, ye vaa panaassu viyattaa bhikkhuu.

[03] 240^b^.^eb^ ``kulluupama.m vo, bhikkhave, dhamma.m desessaami nitthara.natthaaya, no gaha.natthaaya. ta.m su.naatha, saadhuka.m manasikarotha, bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``seyyathaapi ^a^M1.0188^ea^, bhikkhave, puriso addhaanamaggappa.tipanno. so passeyya mahanta.m udaka.n.nava.m, orima.m tiira.m saasa"nka.m sappa.tibhaya.m, paarima.m tiira.m khema.m appa.tibhaya.m; na cassa naavaa santaara.nii uttarasetu vaa apaaraa paara.m gamanaaya. tassa evamassa ^a^P1.0135^ea^ -- `aya.m kho mahaaudaka.n.navo, orima.m tiira.m saasa"nka.m sappa.tibhaya.m, paarima.m tiira.m khema.m appa.tibhaya.m; natthi ca naavaa santaara.nii uttarasetu vaa apaaraa paara.m gamanaaya. ya.mnuunaaha.m ti.naka.t.thasaakhaapalaasa.m sa.mka.d.dhitvaa, kulla.m bandhitvaa, ta.m kulla.m nissaaya hatthehi ca paadehi ca vaayamamaano sotthinaa paara.m uttareyya'nti. atha kho so, bhikkhave, puriso ti.naka.t.thasaakhaapalaasa.m sa.mka.d.dhitvaa, kulla.m bandhitvaa ta.m kulla.m nissaaya hatthehi ca paadehi ca vaayamamaano sotthinaa paara.m uttareyya. tassa purisassa utti.n.nassa {ti.n.nassa (pii0 ka0)} paara"ngatassa evamassa -- `bahukaaro kho me aya.m kullo; imaaha.m kulla.m nissaaya hatthehi ca paadehi ca vaayamamaano sotthinaa paara.m utti.n.no. ya.mnuunaaha.m ima.m kulla.m siise vaa aaropetvaa khandhe ^a^T1.0271^ea^ vaa uccaaretvaa {uccopetvaa (ka0)} yena kaama.m pakkameyya'nti. ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, api nu so puriso eva.mkaarii tasmi.m kulle kiccakaarii assaa''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``katha.mkaarii ca so, bhikkhave, puriso tasmi.m kulle kiccakaarii assa? idha, bhikkhave, tassa purisassa utti.n.nassa paara"ngatassa evamassa -- `bahukaaro kho me aya.m kullo; imaaha.m kulla.m nissaaya ^a^V1.0189^ea^ hatthehi ca paadehi ca vaayamamaano sotthinaa paara.m utti.n.no. ya.mnuunaaha.m ima.m kulla.m thale vaa ussaadetvaa {ussaaretvaa (ka0)} udake vaa opilaapetvaa yena kaama.m pakkameyya'nti. eva.mkaarii kho so, bhikkhave, puriso tasmi.m kulle kiccakaarii assa. evameva kho, bhikkhave, kulluupamo mayaa dhammo desito nitthara.natthaaya, no gaha.natthaaya. kulluupama.m vo, bhikkhave, dhamma.m desita.m, aajaanantehi dhammaapi vo pahaatabbaa pageva adhammaa.

[03] 241^b^.^eb^ ``chayimaani, bhikkhave, di.t.thi.t.thaanaani. katamaani cha? idha, bhikkhave, assutavaa puthujjano ariyaana.m adassaavii ariyadhammassa akovido ariyadhamme aviniito, sappurisaana.m adassaavii sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme aviniito, ruupa.m `eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso me attaa'ti ^a^M1.0189^ea^ samanupassati; vedana.m `eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso me attaa'ti samanupassati; sa~n~na.m `eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso me attaa'ti samanupassati; sa"nkhaare `eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso ^a^T1.0272^ea^ me attaa'ti samanupassati; yampi ta.m di.t.tha.m suta.m muta.m vi~n~naata.m patta.m pariyesita.m, anuvicarita.m manasaa tampi `eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso me attaa'ti samanupassati; yampi ta.m di.t.thi.t.thaana.m -- so loko so attaa, so pecca bhavissaami nicco dhuvo sassato avipari.naamadhammo ^a^P1.0136^ea^, sassatisama.m tatheva .thassaamiiti -- tampi `eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso me attaa'ti samanupassati. sutavaa ca kho, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako ariyaana.m dassaavii ariyadhammassa kovido ariyadhamme suviniito, sappurisaana.m dassaavii sappurisadhammassa kovido sappurisadhamme suviniito, ruupa.m `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti samanupassati; vedana.m `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti samanupassati; sa~n~na.m `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti samanupassati; sa"nkhaare `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti samanupassati; yampi ta.m di.t.tha.m suta.m muta.m vi~n~naata.m patta.m pariyesita.m, anuvicarita.m manasaa, tampi `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti samanupassati; yampi ta.m di.t.thi.t.thaana.m -- so loko so attaa, so pecca bhavissaami nicco dhuvo sassato avipari.naamadhammo, sassatisama.m tatheva .thassaamiiti -- tampi `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti samanupassati. so eva.m samanupassanto asati na paritassatii''ti.

[03] 242^b^.^eb^ eva.m vutte, a~n~nataro bhikkhu bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``siyaa nu kho, bhante, bahiddhaa asati paritassanaa''ti? ``siyaa, bhikkhuu''ti -- bhagavaa ^a^T1.0273^ea^ avoca. ``idha bhikkhu ekaccassa ^a^V1.0190^ea^ eva.m hoti -- `ahu vata me, ta.m vata me natthi; siyaa vata me, ta.m vataaha.m na labhaamii'ti. so socati kilamati paridevati urattaa.li.m kandati sammoha.m aapajjati. eva.m kho, bhikkhu, bahiddhaa asati paritassanaa hotii''ti.

[03] ``siyaa pana, bhante, bahiddhaa asati aparitassanaa''ti? ``siyaa, bhikkhuu''ti -- bhagavaa avoca. ``idha bhikkhu ekaccassa na eva.m hoti -- `ahu vata me, ta.m vata me natthi; siyaa vata me, ta.m vataaha.m na labhaamii'ti. so na socati ^a^M1.0190^ea^ na kilamati na paridevati na urattaa.li.m kandati na sammoha.m aapajjati. eva.m kho, bhikkhu, bahiddhaa asati aparitassanaa hotii''ti.

[03] ``siyaa nu kho, bhante, ajjhatta.m asati paritassanaa''ti? ``siyaa, bhikkhuu''ti -- bhagavaa avoca. ``idha, bhikkhu, ekaccassa eva.m di.t.thi hoti -- `so loko so attaa, so pecca bhavissaami nicco dhuvo sassato avipari.naamadhammo, sassatisama.m tatheva .thassaamii'ti. so su.naati tathaagatassa vaa tathaagatasaavakassa vaa sabbesa.m di.t.thi.t.thaanaadhi.t.thaanapariyu.t.thaanaabhinivesaanusayaana.m samugghaataaya sabbasa"nkhaarasamathaaya sabbuupadhipa.tinissaggaaya ta.nhaakkhayaaya viraagaaya nirodhaaya nibbaanaaya dhamma.m desentassa. tassa eva.m hoti ^a^P1.0137^ea^ -- `ucchijjissaami naamassu, vinassissaami naamassu, nassu naama bhavissaamii'ti. so socati kilamati paridevati urattaa.li.m kandati sammoha.m aapajjati. eva.m kho, bhikkhu, ajjhatta.m asati paritassanaa hotii''ti.

[03] ``siyaa pana, bhante, ajjhatta.m asati aparitassanaa''ti? ``siyaa, bhikkhuu''ti ^a^T1.0274^ea^ bhagavaa avoca. ``idha, bhikkhu, ekaccassa na eva.m di.t.thi hoti -- `so loko so attaa, so pecca bhavissaami nicco dhuvo sassato avipari.naamadhammo, sassatisama.m tatheva .thassaamii'ti. so su.naati tathaagatassa vaa tathaagatasaavakassa vaa sabbesa.m di.t.thi.t.thaanaadhi.t.thaanapariyu.t.thaanaabhinivesaanusayaana.m samugghaataaya sabbasa"nkhaarasamathaaya sabbuupadhipa.tinissaggaaya ta.nhaakkhayaaya viraagaaya nirodhaaya nibbaanaaya dhamma.m desentassa. tassa na eva.m hoti -- `ucchijjissaami naamassu, vinassissaami naamassu, nassu naama bhavissaamii'ti. so na socati ^a^V1.0191^ea^ na kilamati na paridevati na urattaa.li.m kandati na sammoha.m aapajjati. eva.m kho, bhikkhu, ajjhatta.m asati aparitassanaa hoti''.

[03] 243^b^.^eb^ ``ta.m {ta~nca (ka0)}, bhikkhave, pariggaha.m parigga.nheyyaatha, yvaassa {yvaassu (ka0)} pariggaho nicco dhuvo sassato avipari.naamadhammo, sassatisama.m tatheva ti.t.theyya. passatha no tumhe, bhikkhave, ta.m pariggaha.m yvaassa pariggaho nicco dhuvo sassato avipari.naamadhammo, sassatisama.m tatheva ti.t.theyyaa''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``saadhu, bhikkhave. ahampi kho ta.m, bhikkhave, pariggaha.m na samanupassaami ^a^M1.0191^ea^ yvaassa pariggaho nicco dhuvo sassato avipari.naamadhammo sassatisama.m tatheva ti.t.theyya.

[03] ``ta.m, bhikkhave, attavaadupaadaana.m upaadiyetha, ya.msa {yassa (syaa0 ka0)} attavaadupaadaana.m upaadiyato na uppajjeyyu.m sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa. passatha no tumhe, bhikkhave, ta.m attavaadupaadaana.m ^a^T1.0275^ea^ ya.msa attavaadupaadaana.m upaadiyato na uppajjeyyu.m sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``saadhu, bhikkhave. ahampi kho ta.m, bhikkhave, attavaadupaadaana.m na samanupassaami ya.msa attavaadupaadaana.m upaadiyato na uppajjeyyu.m sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa.

[03] ``ta.m, bhikkhave, di.t.thinissaya.m nissayetha ya.msa di.t.thinissaya.m nissayato na uppajjeyyu.m sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa. passatha no tumhe, bhikkhave, ta.m di.t.thinissaya.m ya.msa di.t.thinissaya.m nissayato na uppajjeyyu.m sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``saadhu, bhikkhave. ahampi kho ta.m, bhikkhave, di.t.thinissaya.m na samanupassaami ya.msa di.t.thinissaya.m nissayato ^a^P1.0138^ea^ na uppajjeyyu.m sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa''.
[03] 244^b^.^eb^ ``attani vaa, bhikkhave, sati attaniya.m me ti assaa''ti?
[03] ``eva.m, bhante''.
[03] ``attaniye vaa, bhikkhave, sati attaa me ti assaa''ti? ``eva.m, bhante''.

[03] ``attani ^a^V1.0192^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, attaniye ca saccato thetato anupalabbhamaane, yampi ta.m di.t.thi.t.thaana.m -- `so loko so attaa, so pecca bhavissaami nicco dhuvo sassato avipari.naamadhammo, sassatisama.m tatheva .thassaamii'ti -- nanaaya.m {na ca khoya.m (ka0)}, bhikkhave, kevalo paripuuro baaladhammo'''ti?
[03] ``ki~nhi no siyaa, bhante, kevalo hi, bhante, paripuuro {kevalo paripuuro (sii0 pii0)} baaladhammo''ti.
[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, ruupa.m nicca.m vaa anicca.m vaa''ti?
[03] ``anicca.m, bhante'' ^a^T1.0276^ea^.
[03] ``ya.m panaanicca.m, dukkha.m vaa ta.m sukha.m vaa''ti?
[03] ``dukkha.m, bhante''.
[03] ``ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vipari.naamadhamma.m, kalla.m nu ta.m samanupassitu.m -- eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso me attaa''ti?
[03] ``no heta.m, bhante''.
[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, vedanaa...pe0... sa~n~naa... sa"nkhaaraa... vi~n~naa.na.m nicca.m vaa anicca.m vaa''ti?
[03] ``anicca.m, bhante''.
[03] ``ya.m panaanicca.m, dukkha.m ^a^M1.0192^ea^ vaa ta.m sukha.m vaa''ti?
[03] ``dukkha.m, bhante''.
[03] ``ya.m ^a^V1.0193^ea^ panaanicca.m dukkha.m vipari.naamadhamma.m, kalla.m nu ta.m samanupassitu.m -- eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso me attaa''ti?
[03] ``no heta.m, bhante''.

[03] ``tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, ya.m ki~nci ruupa.m atiitaanaagatapaccuppanna.m, ajjhatta.m vaa bahiddhaa vaa ^a^P1.0139^ea^, o.laarika.m vaa sukhuma.m vaa, hiina.m vaa pa.niita.m vaa, ya.m duure santike vaa, sabba.m ruupa.m `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti -- evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya da.t.thabba.m. yaa kaaci vedanaa...pe0... yaa kaaci sa~n~naa... ye keci sa"nkhaaraa... ya.m ki~nci vi~n~naa.na.m atiitaanaagatapaccuppanna.m, ajjhatta.m vaa bahiddhaa vaa, o.laarika.m vaa sukhuma.m vaa, hiina.m vaa pa.niita.m vaa, ya.m duure santike vaa, sabba.m vi~n~naa.na.m `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti -- evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya da.t.thabba.m''.

[03] 245^b^.^eb^ ``eva.m passa.m, bhikkhave, sutavaa ariyasaavako ruupasmi.m nibbindati, vedanaaya nibbindati, sa~n~naaya nibbindati, sa"nkhaaresu nibbindati, vi~n~naa.nasmi.m nibbindati, nibbidaa virajjati {nibbinda.m virajjati (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}, viraagaa vimuccati ^a^T1.0277^ea^, vimuttasmi.m vimuttamiti ~naa.na.m hoti. `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti pajaanaati. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ukkhittapaligho itipi, sa.mki.n.naparikkho itipi, abbuu.lhesiko itipi, niragga.lo itipi, ariyo pannaddhajo pannabhaaro visa.myutto itipi.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ukkhittapaligho hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno avijjaa pahiinaa hoti, ucchinnamuulaa taalaavatthukataa anabhaava.mkataa, aayati.m anuppaadadhammaa. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ukkhittapaligho hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sa.mki.n.naparikkho hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ponobbhaviko ^a^V1.0194^ea^ jaatisa.msaaro pahiino hoti, ucchinnamuulo taalaavatthukato anabhaava.mkato, aayati.m anuppaadadhammo. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sa.mki.n.naparikkho hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu abbuu.lhesiko hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ta.nhaa pahiinaa hoti, ucchinnamuulaa taalaavatthukataa anabhaava.mkataa, aayati.m anuppaadadhammaa. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu abbuu.lhesiko hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu niragga.lo hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno pa~nca orambhaagiyaani sa.myojanaani pahiinaani honti, ucchinnamuulaani taalaavatthukataani anabhaava.mkataani, aayati.m anuppaadadhammaani ^a^M1.0193^ea^. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu niragga.lo hoti.

[01] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ariyo pannaddhajo pannabhaaro visa.myutto hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno asmimaano pahiino hoti, ucchinnamuulo taalaavatthukato anabhaava.mkato ^a^T1.0278^ea^, aayati.m anuppaadadhammo ^a^P1.0140^ea^. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ariyo pannaddhajo pannabhaaro visa.myutto hoti.

[03] 246^b^.^eb^ ``eva.m vimuttacitta.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu.m saindaa devaa sabrahmakaa sapajaapatikaa anvesa.m naadhigacchanti -- `ida.m nissita.m tathaagatassa vi~n~naa.na'nti. ta.m kissa hetu? di.t.thevaaha.m, bhikkhave, dhamme tathaagata.m ananuvijjoti vadaami. eva.mvaadi.m kho ma.m, bhikkhave, evamakkhaayi.m eke sama.nabraahma.naa asataa tucchaa musaa abhuutena abbhaacikkhanti -- `venayiko sama.no gotamo, sato sattassa uccheda.m vinaasa.m vibhava.m pa~n~naapetii'ti. yathaa caaha.m na, bhikkhave {bhikkhave na (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}, yathaa caaha.m na vadaami, tathaa ma.m te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa asataa tucchaa musaa abhuutena abbhaacikkhanti -- `venayiko sama.no gotamo, sato sattassa uccheda.m vinaasa.m vibhava.m pa~n~naapetii'ti. pubbe caaha.m bhikkhave, etarahi ca dukkha~nceva pa~n~naapemi, dukkhassa ca nirodha.m. tatra ce, bhikkhave, pare tathaagata.m akkosanti paribhaasanti rosenti vihesenti, tatra, bhikkhave, tathaagatassa na hoti aaghaato na appaccayo na cetaso anabhiraddhi.

[03] ``tatra ce, bhikkhave, pare tathaagata.m sakkaronti garu.m karonti maanenti puujenti, tatra, bhikkhave, tathaagatassa na hoti aanando na somanassa.m na cetaso uppilaavitatta.m. tatra ce, bhikkhave ^a^V1.0195^ea^, pare ^a^T1.0279^ea^ vaa tathaagata.m sakkaronti garu.m karonti maanenti puujenti, tatra, bhikkhave, tathaagatassa eva.m hoti -- `ya.m kho ida.m pubbe pari~n~naata.m tattha me evaruupaa kaaraa {sakkaaraa (ka0)} kariiyantii'ti. tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, tumhe cepi pare akkoseyyu.m paribhaaseyyu.m roseyyu.m viheseyyu.m, tatra tumhe hi na aaghaato na appaccayo na cetaso anabhiraddhi kara.niiyaa. tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, tumhe cepi pare sakkareyyu.m garu.m kareyyu.m maaneyyu.m puujeyyu.m, tatra tumhehi na aanando na somanassa.m na cetaso uppilaavitatta.m kara.niiya.m. tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, tumhe cepi pare sakkareyyu.m garu.m ^a^M1.0194^ea^ kareyyu.m maaneyyu.m puujeyyu.m, tatra tumhaaka.m evamassa -- `ya.m kho ida.m pubbe pari~n~naata.m, tattha me {tattha no (ka0) tattha + imeti padacchedo} evaruupaa kaaraa kariiyantii'ti.

[03] 247^b^.^eb^ ``tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, ya.m na tumhaaka.m ta.m pajahatha; ta.m vo pahiina.m diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaaya bhavissati. ki~nca, bhikkhave, na tumhaaka.m? ruupa.m, bhikkhave, na tumhaaka.m, ta.m pajahatha; ta.m vo pahiina.m diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaaya bhavissati. vedanaa, bhikkhave, na tumhaaka.m, ta.m ^a^P1.0141^ea^ pajahatha; saa vo pahiinaa diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaaya bhavissati. sa~n~naa, bhikkhave, na tumhaaka.m, ta.m pajahatha; saa vo pahiinaa diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaaya bhavissati. sa"nkhaaraa, bhikkhave, na tumhaaka.m, te pajahatha; te vo pahiinaa diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaaya bhavissanti. vi~n~naa.na.m, bhikkhave, na tumhaaka.m, ta.m pajahatha; ta.m vo pahiina.m diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaaya bhavissati. ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, ya.m ^a^T1.0280^ea^ imasmi.m jetavane ti.naka.t.thasaakhaapalaasa.m, ta.m jano hareyya vaa daheyya vaa yathaapaccaya.m vaa kareyya. api nu tumhaaka.m evamassa -- `amhe jano harati vaa dahati vaa yathaapaccaya.m vaa karotii'ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``ta.m kissa hetu''? ``na hi no eta.m, bhante, attaa vaa attaniya.m vaa''ti. ``evameva kho, bhikkhave, ya.m na tumhaaka.m ta.m pajahatha; ta.m vo pahiina.m diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaaya bhavissati. ki~nca, bhikkhave, na tumhaaka.m? ruupa.m, bhikkhave, na tumhaaka.m, ta.m pajahatha; ta.m vo pahiina.m diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaaya bhavissati. vedanaa, bhikkhave...pe0... sa~n~naa, bhikkhave... sa"nkhaaraa, bhikkhave...pe0... vi~n~naa.na.m, bhikkhave, na tumhaaka.m, ta.m pajahatha; ta.m vo pahiina.m diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaaya bhavissati.

[03] 248^b^.^eb^ ``eva.m ^a^V1.0196^ea^ svaakkhaato, bhikkhave, mayaa dhammo uttaano viva.to pakaasito chinnapilotiko. eva.m svaakkhaate, bhikkhave, mayaa dhamme uttaane viva.te pakaasite chinnapilotike ye te bhikkhuu arahanto khii.naasavaa vusitavanto katakara.niiyaa ohitabhaaraa anuppattasadatthaa parikkhii.nabhavasa.myojanaa sammada~n~naa vimuttaa, va.t.ta.m tesa.m natthi pa~n~naapanaaya. eva.m svaakkhaato, bhikkhave, mayaa dhammo uttaano viva.to pakaasito chinnapilotiko. eva.m svaakkhaate, bhikkhave, mayaa dhamme uttaane viva.te pakaasite chinnapilotike yesa.m bhikkhuuna.m pa~ncorambhaagiyaani sa.myojanaani ^a^M1.0195^ea^ pahiinaani, sabbe te opapaatikaa, tattha ^a^T1.0281^ea^ parinibbaayino, anaavattidhammaa tasmaa lokaa. eva.m svaakkhaato, bhikkhave, mayaa dhammo uttaano viva.to pakaasito chinnapilotiko. eva.m svaakkhaate, bhikkhave, mayaa dhamme uttaane viva.te pakaasite chinnapilotike yesa.m bhikkhuuna.m tii.ni sa.myojanaani pahiinaani, raagadosamohaa tanubhuutaa, sabbe te sakadaagaamino, sakideva ima.m loka.m aagantvaa dukkhassanta.m karissanti. eva.m svaakkhaato, bhikkhave, mayaa dhammo uttaano viva.to pakaasito chinnapilotiko. eva.m svaakkhaate, bhikkhave, mayaa dhamme uttaane viva.te pakaasite chinnapilotike yesa.m bhikkhuuna.m tii.ni sa.myojanaani pahiinaani, sabbe te sotaapannaa, avinipaatadhammaa ^a^P1.0142^ea^, niyataa sambodhiparaayanaa. eva.m svaakkhaato, bhikkhave, mayaa dhammo uttaano viva.to pakaasito chinnapilotiko. eva.m svaakkhaate, bhikkhave, mayaa dhamme uttaane viva.te pakaasite chinnapilotike ye te bhikkhuu dhammaanusaarino saddhaanusaarino sabbe te sambodhiparaayanaa. eva.m svaakkhaato, bhikkhave, mayaa dhammo uttaano viva.to pakaasito chinnapilotiko. eva.m svaakkhaate, bhikkhave, mayaa dhamme uttaane viva.te pakaasite chinnapilotike yesa.m mayi saddhaamatta.m pemamatta.m sabbe te saggaparaayanaa''ti.
[03] idamavoca bhagavaa. attamanaa te bhikkhuu bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandunti.
[06] alagadduupamasutta.m ni.t.thita.m dutiya.m.

[03] 249^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T1.0282^ea^ ^a^V1.0197^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa kumaarakassapo andhavane viharati. atha kho a~n~nataraa devataa abhikkantaaya rattiyaa abhikkantava.n.naa kevalakappa.m andhavana.m obhaasetvaa yenaayasmaa kumaarakassapo tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. ekamanta.m .thitaa kho saa devataa aayasmanta.m kumaarakassapa.m etadavoca --

[01] ``bhikkhu ^a^M1.0196^ea^ bhikkhu, aya.m vammiko {vammiiko (katthaci) sakkataanuruupa.m} ratti.m dhuumaayati, divaa pajjalati. braahma.no evamaaha -- `abhikkha.na, sumedha, sattha.m aadaayaa'ti. abhikkha.nanto sumedho sattha.m aadaaya addasa la"ngi.m `la"ngii, bhadante'ti. braahma.no evamaaha -- `ukkhipa la"ngi.m; abhikkha.na, sumedha, sattha.m aadaayaa'ti. abhikkha.nanto sumedho sattha.m aadaaya addasa uddhumaayika.m. `uddhumaayikaa, bhadante'ti. braahma.no evamaaha -- `ukkhipa uddhumaayika.m; abhikkha.na, sumedha, sattha.m aadaayaa'ti. abhikkha.nanto sumedho sattha.m aadaaya addasa dvidhaapatha.m. `dvidhaapatho, bhadante'ti. braahma.no evamaaha -- `ukkhipa dvidhaapatha.m; abhikkha.na, sumedha, sattha.m aadaayaa'ti. abhikkha.nanto sumedho sattha.m aadaaya addasa ca"ngavaara.m {pa"nkavaara.m (syaa0), ca"nkavaara.m (ka0)}. `ca"ngavaaro, bhadante'ti. braahma.no evamaaha -- `ukkhipa ^a^P1.0143^ea^ ca"ngavaara.m; abhikkha.na, sumedha, sattha.m aadaayaa'ti. abhikkha.nanto sumedho sattha.m aadaaya addasa kumma.m. `kummo ^a^T1.0283^ea^, bhadante'ti. braahma.no evamaaha -- `ukkhipa kumma.m; abhikkha.na, sumedha, sattha.m aadaayaa'ti. abhikkha.nanto sumedho sattha.m aadaaya addasa asisuuna.m. `asisuunaa, bhadante'ti. braahma.no evamaaha -- `ukkhipa asisuuna.m; abhikkha.na, sumedha, sattha.m aadaayaa'ti. abhikkha.nanto sumedho sattha.m aadaaya addasa ma.msapesi.m. `ma.msapesi, bhadante'ti. braahma.no evamaaha -- `ukkhipa ma.msapesi.m; abhikkha.na, sumedha, sattha.m aadaayaa'ti. abhikkha.nanto sumedho sattha.m aadaaya addasa naaga.m. `naago, bhadante'ti. braahma.no evamaaha -- `ti.t.thatu naago, maa naaga.m gha.t.tesi; namo karohi naagassaa'''ti.

[03] ``ime ^a^V1.0198^ea^ kho tva.m, bhikkhu, pa~nhe bhagavanta.m upasa"nkamitvaa puccheyyaasi, yathaa ca te bhagavaa byaakaroti tathaa na.m dhaareyyaasi. naaha.m ta.m, bhikkhu, passaami sadevake loke samaarake sabrahmake sassama.nabraahma.niyaa pajaaya sadevamanussaaya, yo imesa.m pa~nhaana.m veyyaakara.nena citta.m aaraadheyya a~n~natra tathaagatena vaa, tathaagatasaavakena vaa, ito vaa pana sutvaa''ti -- idamavoca saa devataa. ida.m vatvaa tatthevantaradhaayi.

[03] 250^b^.^eb^ atha kho aayasmaa kumaarakassapo tassaa rattiyaa accayena yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa kumaarakassapo bhagavanta.m ^a^M1.0197^ea^ etadavoca -- ``ima.m, bhante, ratti.m a~n~nataraa devataa abhikkantaaya rattiyaa abhikkantava.n.naa kevalakappa.m andhavana.m obhaasetvaa ^a^T1.0284^ea^ yenaaha.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. ekamanta.m .thitaa kho, bhante, saa devataa ma.m etadavoca -- `bhikkhu bhikkhu, aya.m vammiko ratti.m dhuumaayati, divaa pajjalati'. braahma.no evamaaha -- `abhikkha.na, sumedha, sattha.m aadaayaa'ti. abhikkha.nanto sumedho sattha.m aadaaya...pe0... ito vaa pana sutvaati. idamavoca, bhante, saa devataa. ida.m vatvaa tatthevantaradhaayi. `ko nu kho, bhante, vammiko, kaa ratti.m dhuumaayanaa, kaa divaa pajjalanaa, ko braahma.no, ko sumedho, ki.m sattha.m, ki.m abhikkha.na.m, kaa la"ngii, kaa uddhumaayikaa, ko dvidhaapatho, ki.m ca"ngavaara.m, ko kummo, kaa asisuunaa ^a^T1.0285^ea^, kaa ma.msapesi, ko naago'''ti?

[03] 251^b^.^eb^ ```vammiko'ti ^a^P1.0144^ea^ kho, bhikkhu, imasseta.m caatumahaabhuutikassa {caatummahaabhuutikassa (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} kaayassa adhivacana.m, maataapettikasambhavassa odanakummaasuupacayassa aniccucchaadana-parimaddanabhedana-viddha.msana-dhammassa.

[03] ``ya.m kho, bhikkhu, divaa kammante {kammanta.m (ka0)} aarabbha ratti.m anuvitakketi anuvicaareti -- aya.m ratti.m dhuumaayanaa. ya.m kho, bhikkhu, ratti.m anuvitakketvaa anuvicaaretvaa divaa kammante payojeti kaayena vaacaaya `manasaa' {( ) natthi (sii0 syaa0)} -- aya.m divaa pajjalanaa.
[03] ```braahma.no'ti ^a^V1.0199^ea^ kho, bhikkhu, tathaagatasseta.m adhivacana.m arahato sammaasambuddhassa. `sumedho'ti kho bhikkhu sekkhasseta.m bhikkhuno adhivacana.m.
[03] ```sattha'nti kho, bhikkhu, ariyaayeta.m pa~n~naaya adhivacana.m. `abhikkha.na'nti kho, bhikkhu, viiriyaarambhasseta.m adhivacana.m.
[03] ```la"ngii'ti kho, bhikkhu, avijjaayeta.m adhivacana.m. ukkhipa la"ngi.m, pajaha avijja.m; abhikkha.na, sumedha, sattha.m aadaayaati ayametassa attho.
[03] ```uddhumaayikaa'ti kho, bhikkhu, kodhuupaayaasasseta.m adhivacana.m. ukkhipa uddhumaayika.m, pajaha kodhuupaayaasa.m; abhikkha.na, sumedha, sattha.m aadaayaati ayametassa attho.
[03] ```dvidhaapatho'ti ^a^M1.0198^ea^ kho, bhikkhu, vicikicchaayeta.m adhivacana.m. ukkhipa dvidhaapatha.m, pajaha vicikiccha.m; abhikkha.na, sumedha, sattha.m aadaayaati ayametassa attho.

[03] ```ca"ngavaara'nti kho, bhikkhu, pa~ncanneta.m niivara.naana.m adhivacana.m, seyyathida.m -- kaamacchandaniivara.nassa, byaapaadaniivara.nassa, thiinamiddhaniivara.nassa, uddhaccakukkuccaniivara.nassa, vicikicchaaniivara.nassa. ukkhipa ca"ngavaara.m, pajaha pa~nca niivara.ne ^a^T1.0286^ea^; abhikkha.na, sumedha, sattha.m aadaayaati ayametassa attho.

[03] ```kummo'ti kho, bhikkhu, pa~ncanneta.m upaadaanakkhandhaana.m adhivacana.m, seyyathida.m -- ruupupaadaanakkhandhassa, vedanupaadaanakkhandhassa, sa~n~nupaadaanakkhandhassa, sa"nkhaarupaadaanakkhandhassa, vi~n~naa.nupaadaanakkhandhassa. ukkhipa kumma.m, pajaha pa~ncupaadaanakkhandhe; abhikkha.na, sumedha, sattha.m aadaayaati ayametassa attho.

[03] ```asisuunaa'ti kho, bhikkhu, pa~ncanneta.m kaamagu.naana.m adhivacana.m -- cakkhuvi~n~neyyaana.m ruupaana.m i.t.thaana.m kantaana.m manaapaana.m piyaruupaana.m kaamuupasa.mhitaana.m rajaniiyaana.m, sotavi~n~neyyaana.m saddaana.m...pe0... ghaanavi~n~neyyaana.m gandhaana.m...pe0... jivhaavi~n~neyyaana.m rasaana.m...pe0... kaayavi~n~neyyaana.m ^a^V1.0200^ea^ pho.t.thabbaana.m i.t.thaana.m kantaana.m manaapaana.m piyaruupaana.m kaamuupasa.mhitaana.m ^a^P1.0145^ea^ rajaniiyaana.m. ukkhipa asisuuna.m, pajaha pa~nca kaamagu.ne; abhikkha.na, sumedha, sattha.m aadaayaati ayametassa attho.
[03] ```ma.msapesii'ti kho, bhikkhu, nandiiraagasseta.m adhivacana.m. ukkhipa ma.msapesi.m, pajaha nandiiraaga.m; abhikkha.na, sumedha, sattha.m aadaayaati ayametassa attho.
[03] ```naago'ti kho, bhikkhu, khii.naasavasseta.m bhikkhuno adhivacana.m. ti.t.thatu naago, maa naaga.m gha.t.tesi; namo karohi naagassaati ayametassa attho''ti.
[03] idamavoca bhagavaa. attamano aayasmaa kumaarakassapo bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandiiti.
[06] vammikasutta.m ni.t.thita.m tatiya.m.

[03] 252^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T1.0287^ea^ ^a^M1.0199^ea^ ^a^V1.0201^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape. atha kho sambahulaa jaatibhuumakaa bhikkhuu jaatibhuumiya.m vassa.mvu.t.thaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinne kho te bhikkhuu bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``ko nu kho, bhikkhave, jaatibhuumiya.m jaatibhuumakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m sabrahmacaariina.m eva.m sambhaavito -- `attanaa ca appiccho appicchakatha~nca bhikkhuuna.m kattaa, attanaa ca santu.t.tho santu.t.thikatha~nca bhikkhuuna.m kattaa, attanaa ca pavivitto pavivekakatha~nca bhikkhuuna.m kattaa, attanaa ca asa.msa.t.tho asa.msaggakatha~nca bhikkhuuna.m kattaa, attanaa ca aaraddhaviiriyo viiriyaarambhakatha~nca bhikkhuuna.m kattaa, attanaa ca siilasampanno siilasampadaakatha~nca bhikkhuuna.m kattaa, attanaa ca samaadhisampanno samaadhisampadaakatha~nca bhikkhuuna.m kattaa, attanaa ca pa~n~naasampanno pa~n~naasampadaakatha~nca bhikkhuuna.m kattaa, attanaa ca vimuttisampanno vimuttisampadaakatha~nca bhikkhuuna.m kattaa, attanaa ca vimutti~naa.nadassanasampanno vimutti~naa.nadassanasampadaakatha~nca bhikkhuuna.m kattaa, ovaadako vi~n~naapako sandassako samaadapako samuttejako ^a^P1.0146^ea^ sampaha.msako sabrahmacaariina'''nti? ``pu.n.no naama, bhante, aayasmaa mantaa.niputto ^a^T1.0288^ea^ jaatibhuumiya.m jaatibhuumakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m sabrahmacaariina.m eva.m sambhaavito -- `attanaa ca appiccho appicchakatha~nca bhikkhuuna.m kattaa, attanaa ca santu.t.tho...pe0... ovaadako vi~n~naapako sandassako samaadapako samuttejako sampaha.msako sabrahmacaariina'''nti.

[03] 253^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa saariputto bhagavato aviduure nisinno hoti. atha kho aayasmato saariputtassa etadahosi -- ``laabhaa aayasmato pu.n.nassa mantaa.niputtassa, suladdhalaabhaa aayasmato pu.n.nassa mantaa.niputtassa, yassa vi~n~nuu sabrahmacaarii satthu sammukhaa anumassa anumassa va.n.na.m bhaasanti, ta~nca satthaa abbhanumodati. appeva naama mayampi kadaaci ^a^V1.0202^ea^ karahaci aayasmataa pu.n.nena mantaa.niputtena saddhi.m samaagaccheyyaama {samaagama.m gaccheyya (ka0)}, appeva naama siyaa kocideva kathaasallaapo''ti.

[03] 254^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^M1.0200^ea^ kho bhagavaa raajagahe yathaabhiranta.m viharitvaa yena saavatthi tena caarika.m pakkaami. anupubbena caarika.m caramaano yena saavatthi tadavasari. tatra suda.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa ^a^T1.0289^ea^ aaraame. assosi kho aayasmaa pu.n.no mantaa.niputto -- ``bhagavaa kira saavatthi.m anuppatto; saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame''ti.

[03] 255^b^.^eb^ atha kho aayasmaa pu.n.no mantaa.niputto senaasana.m sa.msaametvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya yena saavatthi tena caarika.m pakkaami. anupubbena caarika.m caramaano yena saavatthi jetavana.m anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraamo yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho aayasmanta.m pu.n.na.m mantaa.niputta.m bhagavaa dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassesi samaadapesi samuttejesi sampaha.msesi. atha kho aayasmaa pu.n.no mantaa.niputto bhagavataa dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassito samaadapito samuttejito sampaha.msito bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinanditvaa anumoditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa yena andhavana.m tenupasa"nkami divaavihaaraaya.

[03] 256^b^.^eb^ atha kho a~n~nataro bhikkhu yenaayasmaa saariputto tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m saariputta.m etadavoca -- ``yassa kho tva.m, aavuso saariputta, pu.n.nassa naama bhikkhuno mantaa.niputtassa abhi.nha.m kittayamaano ahosi, so bhagavataa ^a^P1.0147^ea^ dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassito samaadapito samuttejito sampaha.msito bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinanditvaa anumoditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa yena andhavana.m tena pakkanto divaavihaaraayaa''ti.

[03] atha ^a^T1.0290^ea^ kho aayasmaa saariputto taramaanaruupo nisiidana.m aadaaya aayasmanta.m pu.n.na.m mantaa.niputta.m pi.t.thito pi.t.thito anubandhi siisaanulokii. atha kho aayasmaa pu.n.no mantaa.niputto andhavana.m ajjhogaahetvaa a~n~natarasmi.m rukkhamuule divaavihaara.m nisiidi. aayasmaapi ^a^V1.0203^ea^ kho saariputto andhavana.m ajjhogaahetvaa a~n~natarasmi.m rukkhamuule divaavihaara.m nisiidi.

[03] atha ^a^M1.0201^ea^ kho aayasmaa saariputto saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito yenaayasmaa pu.n.no mantaa.niputto tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmataa pu.n.nena mantaa.niputtena saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa saariputto aayasmanta.m pu.n.na.m mantaa.niputta.m etadavoca --

[03] ```ki.m nu kho, aavuso, siilavisuddhattha.m bhagavati brahmacariya.m vussatii'ti iti pu.t.tho samaano `no hida.m, aavuso'ti vadesi. `ki.m panaavuso, cittavisuddhattha.m bhagavati brahmacariya.m vussatii'ti iti pu.t.tho samaano `no hida.m, aavuso'ti vadesi. `ki.m nu kho, aavuso, di.t.thivisuddhattha.m...pe0... ka"nkhaavitara.navisuddhattha.m...pe0... maggaamagga~naa.nadassanavisuddhattha.m...pe0... pa.tipadaa~naa.nadassanavisuddhattha.m...pe0... ki.m nu kho, aavuso, ~naa.nadassanavisuddhattha.m bhagavati brahmacariya.m vussatii'ti iti pu.t.tho samaano `no hida.m aavuso'ti vadesi. kimattha.m carahaavuso, bhagavati brahmacariya.m ^a^P1.0148^ea^ vussatii''ti? ``anupaadaaparinibbaanattha.m kho, aavuso, bhagavati brahmacariya.m vussatii''ti.

[03] ```ki.m nu kho, aavuso, siilavisuddhi anupaadaaparinibbaana'nti iti pu.t.tho samaano `no hida.m, aavuso'ti vadesi. `ki.m panaavuso, cittavisuddhi anupaadaaparinibbaana'nti iti pu.t.tho samaano `no hida.m, aavuso'ti vadesi. `ki.m nu kho, aavuso, di.t.thivisuddhi anupaadaaparinibbaana'nti...pe0... ka"nkhaavitara.navisuddhi... maggaamagga~naa.nadassanavisuddhi... pa.tipadaa~naa.nadassanavisuddhi... `ki.m nu kho, aavuso, ~naa.nadassanavisuddhi anupaadaaparinibbaana'nti iti pu.t.tho samaano `no hida.m, aavuso'ti vadesi. `ki.m panaavuso, a~n~natra imehi dhammehi anupaadaaparinibbaana'nti iti pu.t.tho samaano `no hida.m, aavuso'ti vadesi. yathaakatha.m panaavuso, imassa bhaasitassa attho da.t.thabbo''ti?

[03] 258^b^.^eb^ ``siilavisuddhi.m ^a^V1.0206^ea^ ce, aavuso, bhagavaa anupaadaaparinibbaana.m pa~n~napeyya, saupaadaana.myeva samaana.m anupaadaaparinibbaana.m pa~n~napeyya {pa~n~naapessa (sii0 syaa0) evama~n~natthapi}. cittavisuddhi.m ce, aavuso, bhagavaa anupaadaaparinibbaana.m pa~n~napeyya, saupaadaana.myeva samaana.m anupaadaaparinibbaana.m pa~n~napeyya. di.t.thivisuddhi.m ce, aavuso, bhagavaa anupaadaaparinibbaana.m pa~n~napeyya, saupaadaana.myeva samaana.m anupaadaaparinibbaana.m pa~n~napeyya. ka"nkhaavitara.navisuddhi.m ce, aavuso, bhagavaa anupaadaaparinibbaana.m pa~n~napeyya, saupaadaana.myeva samaana.m anupaadaaparinibbaana.m pa~n~napeyya ^a^T1.0293^ea^. maggaamagga~naa.nadassanavisuddhi.m ce, aavuso, bhagavaa anupaadaaparinibbaana.m pa~n~napeyya, saupaadaana.myeva samaana.m anupaadaaparinibbaana.m pa~n~napeyya. pa.tipadaa~naa.nadassanavisuddhi.m ce, aavuso, bhagavaa anupaadaaparinibbaana.m pa~n~napeyya, saupaadaana.myeva samaana.m anupaadaaparinibbaana.m pa~n~napeyya. ~naa.nadassanavisuddhi.m ce, aavuso, bhagavaa anupaadaaparinibbaana.m pa~n~napeyya, saupaadaana.myeva ^a^M1.0203^ea^ samaana.m anupaadaaparinibbaana.m pa~n~napeyya. a~n~natra ce, aavuso, imehi dhammehi anupaadaaparinibbaana.m abhavissa, puthujjano parinibbaayeyya. puthujjano hi, aavuso, a~n~natra imehi dhammehi. tena haavuso, upama.m te karissaami; upamaayapidhekacce vi~n~nuu purisaa bhaasitassa attha.m aajaananti.

[03] 259^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, aavuso, ra~n~no pasenadissa kosalassa saavatthiya.m pa.tivasantassa ^a^P1.0149^ea^ saakete ki~ncideva accaayika.m kara.niiya.m uppajjeyya. tassa antaraa ca saavatthi.m antaraa ca saaketa.m satta rathaviniitaani upa.t.thapeyyu.m. atha kho, aavuso, raajaa pasenadi kosalo saavatthiyaa nikkhamitvaa antepuradvaaraa pa.thama.m rathaviniita.m abhiruheyya, pa.thamena rathaviniitena dutiya.m rathaviniita.m paapu.neyya, pa.thama.m rathaviniita.m vissajjeyya dutiya.m rathaviniita.m abhiruheyya. dutiyena rathaviniitena tatiya.m rathaviniita.m paapu.neyya, dutiya.m rathaviniita.m vissajjeyya, tatiya.m rathaviniita.m ^a^T1.0294^ea^ abhiruheyya. tatiyena rathaviniitena catuttha.m rathaviniita.m paapu.neyya, tatiya.m rathaviniita.m vissajjeyya, catuttha.m rathaviniita.m abhiruheyya. catutthena rathaviniitena pa~ncama.m rathaviniita.m paapu.neyya, catuttha.m rathaviniita.m vissajjeyya, pa~ncama.m rathaviniita.m abhiruheyya. pa~ncamena rathaviniitena cha.t.tha.m rathaviniita.m paapu.neyya, pa~ncama.m rathaviniita.m vissajjeyya, cha.t.tha.m rathaviniita.m abhiruheyya. cha.t.thena rathaviniitena sattama.m rathaviniita.m paapu.neyya, cha.t.tha.m rathaviniita.m vissajjeyya, sattama.m rathaviniita.m abhiruheyya. sattamena rathaviniitena saaketa.m anupaapu.neyya antepuradvaara.m. tamena.m antepuradvaaragata.m samaana.m mittaamaccaa ~naatisaalohitaa eva.m puccheyyu.m -- `iminaa tva.m, mahaaraaja, rathaviniitena saavatthiyaa saaketa.m anuppatto antepuradvaara'nti ^a^V1.0207^ea^? katha.m byaakaramaano nu kho, aavuso, raajaa pasenadi kosalo sammaa byaakaramaano byaakareyyaa''ti?

[03] ``eva.m byaakaramaano kho, aavuso, raajaa pasenadi kosalo sammaa byaakaramaano byaakareyya -- `idha me saavatthiya.m pa.tivasantassa saakete ki~ncideva accaayika.m kara.niiya.m uppajji {uppajjati (ka0)}. tassa me antaraa ca saavatthi.m antaraa ca saaketa.m satta rathaviniitaani upa.t.thapesu.m. atha khvaaha.m saavatthiyaa ^a^M1.0204^ea^ nikkhamitvaa antepuradvaaraa pa.thama.m rathaviniita.m abhiruhi.m. pa.thamena rathaviniitena dutiya.m rathaviniita.m paapu.ni.m, pa.thama.m rathaviniita.m vissajji.m dutiya.m rathaviniita.m abhiruhi.m. dutiyena rathaviniitena tatiya.m rathaviniita.m paapu.ni.m, dutiya.m rathaviniita.m vissajji.m, tatiya.m rathaviniita.m abhiruhi.m. tatiyena rathaviniitena catuttha.m rathaviniita.m paapu.ni.m, tatiya.m rathaviniita.m vissajji.m, catuttha.m rathaviniita.m abhiruhi.m. catutthena rathaviniitena pa~ncama.m rathaviniita.m paapu.ni.m, catuttha.m rathaviniita.m vissajji.m, pa~ncama.m ^a^T1.0295^ea^ rathaviniita.m abhiruhi.m. pa~ncamena rathaviniitena cha.t.tha.m rathaviniita.m paapu.ni.m, pa~ncama.m rathaviniita.m vissajji.m, cha.t.tha.m rathaviniita.m abhiruhi.m. cha.t.thena rathaviniitena sattama.m rathaviniita.m paapu.ni.m, cha.t.tha.m rathaviniita.m vissajji.m, sattama.m rathaviniita.m abhiruhi.m. sattamena rathaviniitena saaketa.m anuppatto antepuradvaara'nti. eva.m byaakaramaano kho, aavuso, raajaa pasenadi kosalo sammaa byaakaramaano byaakareyyaa''ti.

[03] ``evameva kho, aavuso, siilavisuddhi yaavadeva cittavisuddhatthaa, cittavisuddhi yaavadeva di.t.thivisuddhatthaa, di.t.thivisuddhi yaavadeva ka"nkhaavitara.navisuddhatthaa, ka"nkhaavitara.navisuddhi ^a^P1.0150^ea^ yaavadeva maggaamagga~naa.nadassanavisuddhatthaa, maggaamagga~naa.nadassanavisuddhi yaavadeva pa.tipadaa~naa.nadassanavisuddhatthaa, pa.tipadaa~naa.nadassanavisuddhi yaavadeva ~naa.nadassanavisuddhatthaa, ~naa.nadassanavisuddhi yaavadeva anupaadaaparinibbaanatthaa. anupaadaaparinibbaanattha.m kho, aavuso, bhagavati brahmacariya.m vussatii''ti.

[03] 260^b^.^eb^ eva.m vutte, aayasmaa saariputto aayasmanta.m pu.n.na.m mantaa.niputta.m etadavoca -- ``konaamo aayasmaa, katha~nca panaayasmanta.m sabrahmacaarii jaanantii''ti? ``pu.n.noti kho me, aavuso, naama.m; mantaa.niputtoti ca pana ma.m sabrahmacaarii jaanantii''ti. ``acchariya.m, aavuso, abbhuta.m, aavuso! yathaa ta.m sutavataa saavakena sammadeva satthusaasana.m aajaanantena, evameva aayasmataa ^a^V1.0208^ea^ pu.n.nena mantaa.niputtena gambhiiraa ^a^T1.0296^ea^ gambhiirapa~nhaa anumassa anumassa byaakataa. laabhaa sabrahmacaariina.m, suladdhalaabhaa sabrahmacaariina.m, ye aayasmanta.m pu.n.na.m mantaa.niputta.m labhanti dassanaaya, labhanti payiruupaasanaaya. cela.n.dukena {cela.n.dakena (ka0), cela.n.dupekena (?)} cepi sabrahmacaarii aayasmanta.m pu.n.na.m mantaa.niputta.m ^a^M1.0205^ea^ muddhanaa pariharantaa labheyyu.m dassanaaya, labheyyu.m payiruupaasanaaya, tesampi laabhaa tesampi suladdha.m, amhaakampi laabhaa amhaakampi suladdha.m, ye maya.m aayasmanta.m pu.n.na.m mantaa.niputta.m labhaama dassanaaya, labhaama payiruupaasanaayaa''ti.

[01] eva.m vutte, aayasmaa pu.n.no mantaa.niputto aayasmanta.m saariputta.m etadavoca -- ``ko naamo aayasmaa, katha~nca panaayasmanta.m sabrahmacaarii jaanantii''ti? ``upatissoti kho me, aavuso, naama.m; saariputtoti ca pana ma.m sabrahmacaarii jaanantii''ti. ``satthukappena vata kira, bho {kho (ka0)}, saavakena saddhi.m mantayamaanaa na jaanimha -- `aayasmaa saariputto'ti. sace hi maya.m jaaneyyaama `aayasmaa saariputto'ti, ettakampi no nappa.tibhaaseyya {nappa.tibheyya (?)}. acchariya.m, aavuso, abbhuta.m, aavuso! yathaa ta.m sutavataa saavakena sammadeva satthusaasana.m aajaanantena, evameva aayasmataa saariputtena gambhiiraa gambhiirapa~nhaa anumassa anumassa pucchitaa. laabhaa sabrahmacaariina.m suladdhalaabhaa sabrahmacaariina.m, ye aayasmanta.m saariputta.m labhanti dassanaaya, labhanti payiruupaasanaaya. cela.n.dukena cepi sabrahmacaarii aayasmanta.m saariputta.m muddhanaa pariharantaa ^a^T1.0297^ea^ labheyyu.m dassanaaya, labheyyu.m payiruupaasanaaya, tesampi ^a^P1.0151^ea^ laabhaa tesampi suladdha.m, amhaakampi laabhaa amhaakampi suladdha.m, ye maya.m aayasmanta.m saariputta.m labhaama dassanaaya, labhaama payiruupaasanaayaa''ti.
[03] itiha te ubhopi mahaanaagaa a~n~nama~n~nassa subhaasita.m samanumodi.msuuti.
[06] rathaviniitasutta.m ni.t.thita.m catuttha.m.

[03] 261^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T1.0298^ea^ ^a^V1.0209^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``na ^a^M1.0206^ea^, bhikkhave, nevaapiko nivaapa.m nivapati migajaataana.m -- `ima.m me nivaapa.m nivutta.m migajaataa paribhu~njantaa diighaayukaa va.n.navanto cira.m diighamaddhaana.m yaapentuu'ti. eva~nca kho, bhikkhave, nevaapiko nivaapa.m nivapati migajaataana.m -- `ima.m me nivaapa.m nivutta.m migajaataa anupakhajja mucchitaa bhojanaani bhu~njissanti, anupakhajja mucchitaa bhojanaani bhu~njamaanaa mada.m aapajjissanti, mattaa samaanaa pamaada.m aapajjissanti, pamattaa samaanaa yathaakaamakara.niiyaa bhavissanti imasmi.m nivaape'ti.

[03] 262^b^.^eb^ ``tatra, bhikkhave, pa.thamaa migajaataa amu.m nivaapa.m nivutta.m nevaapikassa anupakhajja mucchitaa bhojanaani bhu~nji.msu, te tattha anupakhajja mucchitaa bhojanaani bhu~njamaanaa mada.m aapajji.msu, mattaa samaanaa pamaada.m aapajji.msu, pamattaa samaanaa yathaakaamakara.niiyaa ahesu.m nevaapikassa amusmi.m nivaape. eva~nhi te, bhikkhave, pa.thamaa migajaataa na parimucci.msu nevaapikassa iddhaanubhaavaa.

[03] 263^b^.^eb^ ``tatra, bhikkhave, dutiyaa migajaataa eva.m samacintesu.m -- `ye kho ^a^T1.0299^ea^ te pa.thamaa migajaataa amu.m nivaapa.m nivutta.m nevaapikassa anupakhajja mucchitaa bhojanaani bhu~nji.msu. te tattha anupakhajja mucchitaa bhojanaani bhu~njamaanaa mada.m aapajji.msu, mattaa samaanaa pamaada.m aapajji.msu, pamattaa samaanaa yathaakaamakara.niiyaa ^a^P1.0152^ea^ ahesu.m nevaapikassa amusmi.m nivaape. eva~nhi te pa.thamaa migajaataa na parimucci.msu nevaapikassa iddhaanubhaavaa. ya.mnuuna maya.m sabbaso nivaapabhojanaa pa.tivirameyyaama, bhayabhogaa pa.tivirataa ara~n~naayatanaani ajjhogaahetvaa vihareyyaamaa'ti. te sabbaso nivaapabhojanaa pa.tivirami.msu, bhayabhogaa pa.tivirataa ara~n~naayatanaani ^a^V1.0210^ea^ ajjhogaahetvaa vihari.msu. tesa.m gimhaana.m pacchime maase, ti.nodakasa"nkhaye, adhimattakasimaana.m patto kaayo hoti. tesa.m adhimattakasimaana.m pattakaayaana.m balaviiriya.m parihaayi. balaviiriye parihiine tameva nivaapa.m nivutta.m nevaapikassa paccaagami.msu. te tattha anupakhajja mucchitaa bhojanaani bhu~nji.msu. te tattha anupakhajja mucchitaa bhojanaani bhu~njamaanaa mada.m aapajji.msu, mattaa samaanaa pamaada.m aapajji.msu, pamattaa samaanaa yathaakaamakara.niiyaa ahesu.m nevaapikassa amusmi.m nivaape. eva~nhi te, bhikkhave, dutiyaapi migajaataa na parimucci.msu nevaapikassa iddhaanubhaavaa.

[03] 264^b^.^eb^ ``tatra ^a^M1.0207^ea^, bhikkhave, tatiyaa migajaataa eva.m samacintesu.m -- `ye kho te pa.thamaa migajaataa amu.m nivaapa.m nivutta.m nevaapikassa...pe0... eva~nhi te pa.thamaa migajaataa na parimucci.msu nevaapikassa iddhaanubhaavaa. yepi te dutiyaa migajaataa eva.m samacintesu.m -- ye kho te pa.thamaa migajaataa ^a^T1.0300^ea^ amu.m nivaapa.m nivutta.m nevaapikassa...pe0... eva~nhi te pa.thamaa migajaataa na parimucci.msu nevaapikassa iddhaanubhaavaa. ya.mnuuna maya.m sabbaso nivaapabhojanaa pa.tivirameyyaama, bhayabhogaa pa.tivirataa ara~n~naayatanaani ajjhogaahetvaa vihareyyaamaati. te sabbaso nivaapabhojanaa pa.tivirami.msu, bhayabhogaa pa.tivirataa ara~n~naayatanaani ajjhogaahetvaa vihari.msu. tesa.m gimhaana.m pacchime maase ti.nodakasa"nkhaye adhimattakasimaana.m patto kaayo hoti. tesa.m adhimattakasimaana.m pattakaayaana.m balaviiriya.m parihaayi. balaviiriye parihiine tameva nivaapa.m nivutta.m nevaapikassa [03] ``tatra, bhikkhave, nevaapikassa ca nevaapikaparisaaya ca etadahosi -- `sa.thaassunaamime catutthaa migajaataa ketabino, iddhimantaassunaamime catutthaa migajaataa parajanaa. ima~nca naama nivaapa.m nivutta.m paribhu~njanti, na ca nesa.m jaanaama aagati.m vaa gati.m vaa. ya.mnuuna maya.m ima.m nivaapa.m ^a^V1.0213^ea^ nivutta.m mahatiihi da.n.davaakaraahi samantaa sappadesa.m anuparivaareyyaama, appeva naama catutthaana.m migajaataana.m aasaya.m passeyyaama yattha te gaaha.m gaccheyyu'nti. te ^a^T1.0304^ea^ amu.m nivaapa.m nivutta.m mahatiihi da.n.davaakaraahi samantaa sappadesa.m anuparivaaresu.m. neva kho, bhikkhave, addasa.msu nevaapiko ca nevaapikaparisaa ca catutthaana.m migajaataana.m aasaya.m, yattha te gaaha.m gaccheyyu.m. tatra, bhikkhave, nevaapikassa ca nevaapikaparisaaya ca etadahosi -- `sace kho maya.m catutthe migajaate gha.t.tessaama, te gha.t.titaa a~n~ne gha.t.tissanti te gha.t.titaa a~n~ne gha.t.tissanti. eva.m ima.m nivaapa.m nivutta.m sabbaso migajaataa parimu~ncissanti. ya.mnuuna maya.m catutthe migajaate ajjhupekkheyyaamaa'ti. ajjhupekkhi.msu kho, bhikkhave, nevaapiko ca nevaapikaparisaa ca catutthe migajaate. eva~nhi te, bhikkhave, catutthaa migajaataa parimucci.msu nevaapikassa iddhaanubhaavaa.

[03] 266^b^.^eb^ ``upamaa kho me aya.m, bhikkhave, kataa atthassa vi~n~naapanaaya. aya.m cevettha attho -- nivaapoti kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncanneta.m kaamagu.naana.m adhivacana.m. nevaapikoti kho, bhikkhave, maarasseta.m paapimato adhivacana.m. nevaapikaparisaati kho, bhikkhave, maaraparisaayeta.m adhivacana.m. migajaataati kho, bhikkhave, sama.nabraahma.naanameta.m adhivacana.m.
