[01] ``te amu.m nivaapa.m nivutta.m maarassa amuuni ca lokaamisaani upanissaaya aasaya.m kappayi.msu. tatraasaya.m kappetvaa amu.m nivaapa.m nivutta.m maarassa amuuni ca lokaamisaani ananupakhajja amucchitaa bhojanaani bhu~nji.msu. te tattha ananupakhajja amucchitaa bhojanaani bhu~njamaanaa na mada.m aapajji.msu. amattaa samaanaa ^a^M1.0214^ea^ na pamaada.m aapajji.msu. appamattaa samaanaa na yathaakaamakara.niiyaa ahesu.m maarassa amusmi.m nivaape amusmi~nca lokaamise. api ca kho eva.mdi.t.thikaa ahesu.m sassato loko itipi...pe0... neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa itipi. eva~nhi te tatiyaapi sama.nabraahma.naa na parimucci.msu maarassa iddhaanubhaavaa. ya.mnuuna maya.m yattha agati maarassa ca maaraparisaaya ca tatraasaya.m kappeyaama. tatraasaya.m kappetvaa amu.m nivaapa.m nivutta.m maarassa amuuni ^a^T1.0310^ea^ ca lokaamisaani ananupakhajja amucchitaa bhojanaani bhu~njissaama, ananupakhajja amucchitaa bhojanaani bhu~njamaanaa na mada.m aapajjissaama, amattaa samaanaa na pamaada.m aapajjissaama, appamattaa samaanaa na yathaakaamakara.niiyaa bhavissaama maarassa amusmi.m nivaape amusmi~nca lokaamiseti.

[03] ``te ^a^V1.0217^ea^ yattha agati maarassa ca maaraparisaaya ca tatraasaya.m kappayi.msu. tatraasaya.m kappetvaa amu.m nivaapa.m ^a^P1.0159^ea^ nivutta.m maarassa amuuni ca lokaamisaani ananupakhajja amucchitaa bhojanaani bhu~nji.msu, te tattha ananupakhajja amucchitaa bhojanaani bhu~njamaanaa na mada.m aapajji.msu, amattaa samaanaa na pamaada.m aapajji.msu, appamattaa samaanaa na yathaakaamakara.niiyaa ahesu.m maarassa amusmi.m nivaape amusmi~nca lokaamise. eva~nhi te, bhikkhave, catutthaa sama.nabraahma.naa parimucci.msu maarassa iddhaanubhaavaa. seyyathaapi te, bhikkhave, catutthaa migajaataa tathuupame aha.m ime catutthe sama.nabraahma.ne vadaami.

[03] 271^b^.^eb^ ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, agati maarassa ca maaraparisaaya ca? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vivicceva kaamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu andhamakaasi maara.m, apada.m vadhitvaa maaracakkhu.m adassana.m gato paapimato.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa ajjhatta.m sampasaadana.m cetaso ekodibhaava.m avitakka.m avicaara.m samaadhija.m piitisukha.m dutiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave...pe0... paapimato.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu piitiyaa ca viraagaa upekkhako ca viharati sato ca sampajaano, sukha~nca kaayena pa.tisa.mvedeti ya.m ta.m ariyaa aacikkhanti ^a^M1.0215^ea^ `upekkhako satimaa sukhavihaarii'ti tatiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave...pe0... paapimato.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahaanaa dukkhassa ca pahaanaa, pubbeva somanassadomanassaana.m attha"ngamaa, adukkhamasukha.m upekkhaasatipaarisuddhi.m catuttha.m jhaana.m ^a^T1.0311^ea^ upasampajja viharati. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave...pe0... paapimato.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sabbaso ruupasa~n~naana.m samatikkamaa pa.tighasa~n~naana.m attha"ngamaa ^a^V1.0218^ea^ naanattasa~n~naana.m amanasikaaraa `ananto aakaaso'ti aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m upasampajja viharati. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave...pe0... paapimato.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sabbaso aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m samatikkamma `ananta.m vi~n~naa.na'nti vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m upasampajja viharati. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave...pe0... paapimato.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sabbaso vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m samatikkamma ^a^P1.0160^ea^ `natthi ki~ncii'ti aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m upasampajja viharati. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave...pe0... paapimato.
[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sabbaso aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m samatikkamma nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m upasampajja viharati. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave...pe0... paapimato.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sabbaso nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m samatikkamma sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m upasampajja viharati. pa~n~naaya cassa disvaa aasavaa parikkhii.naa honti. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu andhamakaasi maara.m, apada.m vadhitvaa maaracakkhu.m adassana.m gato paapimato ti.n.no loke visattika''nti.
[03] idamavoca bhagavaa. attamanaa te bhikkhuu bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandunti.
[06] nivaapasutta.m ni.t.thita.m pa~ncama.m.

[03] 272^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^M1.0216^ea^ ^a^V1.0219^ea^ ^a^T1.0312^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. atha kho bhagavaa pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya saavatthi.m pi.n.daaya paavisi. atha kho sambahulaa bhikkhuu yenaayasmaa aanando tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m aananda.m etadavocu.m -- ``cirassutaa no, aavuso aananda, bhagavato sammukhaa dhammii kathaa. saadhu maya.m, aavuso aananda, labheyyaama bhagavato sammukhaa dhammi.m katha.m savanaayaa''ti. ``tena haayasmanto yena rammakassa braahma.nassa assamo tenupasa"nkamatha; appeva naama labheyyaatha bhagavato sammukhaa dhammi.m katha.m savanaayaa''ti. ``evamaavuso''ti kho te bhikkhuu aayasmato aanandassa paccassosu.m.

[03] atha kho bhagavaa saavatthiya.m pi.n.daaya caritvaa pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkanto aayasmanta.m aananda.m aamantesi -- ``aayaamaananda, yena pubbaaraamo migaaramaatupaasaado tenupasa"nkamissaama divaavihaaraayaa''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavato paccassosi. atha ^a^P1.0161^ea^ kho bhagavaa aayasmataa aanandena saddhi.m yena pubbaaraamo migaaramaatupaasaado tenupasa"nkami divaavihaaraaya. atha kho bhagavaa saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito aayasmanta.m aananda.m aamantesi -- ``aayaamaananda, yena ^a^T1.0313^ea^ pubbako.t.thako tenupasa"nkamissaama gattaani parisi~ncitu''nti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavato paccassosi.

[03] 273^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa aayasmataa aanandena saddhi.m yena pubbako.t.thako tenupasa"nkami gattaani parisi~ncitu.m. pubbako.t.thake gattaani parisi~ncitvaa paccuttaritvaa ekaciivaro a.t.thaasi gattaani pubbaapayamaano. atha kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``aya.m, bhante, rammakassa braahma.nassa assamo aviduure. rama.niiyo, bhante, rammakassa braahma.nassa assamo; paasaadiko, bhante, rammakassa braahma.nassa assamo. saadhu, bhante, bhagavaa yena rammakassa braahma.nassa assamo tenupasa"nkamatu anukampa.m upaadaayaa''ti. adhivaasesi bhagavaa tu.nhiibhaavena.

[03] atha ^a^M1.0217^ea^ ^a^V1.0220^ea^ kho bhagavaa yena rammakassa braahma.nassa assamo tenupasa"nkami. tena kho pana samayena sambahulaa bhikkhuu rammakassa braahma.nassa assame dhammiyaa kathaaya sannisinnaa honti. atha kho bhagavaa bahidvaarako.t.thake a.t.thaasi kathaapariyosaana.m aagamayamaano. atha kho bhagavaa kathaapariyosaana.m viditvaa ukkaasitvaa agga.la.m aako.tesi. vivari.msu kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato dvaara.m. atha kho bhagavaa rammakassa braahma.nassa assama.m pavisitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. nisajja kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``kaayanuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathaaya sannisinnaa? kaa ca pana vo antaraakathaa vippakataa''ti ^a^T1.0314^ea^? ``bhagavantameva kho no, bhante, aarabbha dhammii kathaa vippakataa, atha bhagavaa anuppatto''ti. ``saadhu, bhikkhave! eta.m kho, bhikkhave, tumhaaka.m patiruupa.m kulaputtaana.m saddhaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitaana.m ya.m tumhe dhammiyaa kathaaya sannisiideyyaatha. sannipatitaana.m vo, bhikkhave, dvaya.m kara.niiya.m -- dhammii vaa kathaa, ariyo vaa tu.nhiibhaavo''.
[03] 274^b^.^eb^ ``dvemaa, bhikkhave, pariyesanaa -- ariyaa ca pariyesanaa, anariyaa ca pariyesanaa.

[03] ``katamaa ca, bhikkhave, anariyaa pariyesanaa? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco attanaa jaatidhammo samaano jaatidhamma.myeva pariyesati, attanaa jaraadhammo samaano jaraadhamma.myeva ^a^P1.0162^ea^ pariyesati, attanaa byaadhidhammo samaano byaadhidhamma.myeva pariyesati, attanaa mara.nadhammo samaano mara.nadhamma.myeva pariyesati, attanaa sokadhammo samaano sokadhamma.myeva pariyesati, attanaa sa.mkilesadhammo samaano sa.mkilesadhamma.myeva pariyesati.

[03] ``ki~nca, bhikkhave, jaatidhamma.m vadetha? puttabhariya.m, bhikkhave, jaatidhamma.m, daasidaasa.m jaatidhamma.m, aje.laka.m jaatidhamma.m, kukku.tasuukara.m jaatidhamma.m, hatthigavaassava.lava.m jaatidhamma.m, jaataruuparajata.m jaatidhamma.m. jaatidhammaa hete, bhikkhave, upadhayo. etthaaya.m gathito {gadhiito (syaa0 ka0)} mucchito ajjhaapanno attanaa jaatidhammo samaano jaatidhamma.myeva pariyesati.

[03] ``ki~nca, bhikkhave, jaraadhamma.m vadetha? puttabhariya.m, bhikkhave, jaraadhamma.m, daasidaasa.m jaraadhamma.m, aje.laka.m jaraadhamma.m, kukku.tasuukara.m ^a^T1.0315^ea^ jaraadhamma.m, hatthigavaassava.lava.m jaraadhamma.m ^a^M1.0218^ea^, jaataruuparajata.m ^a^V1.0221^ea^ jaraadhamma.m. jaraadhammaa hete, bhikkhave, upadhayo. etthaaya.m gathito mucchito ajjhaapanno attanaa jaraadhammo samaano jaraadhamma.myeva pariyesati.

[03] ``ki~nca, bhikkhave, byaadhidhamma.m vadetha? puttabhariya.m, bhikkhave, byaadhidhamma.m, daasidaasa.m byaadhidhamma.m, aje.laka.m byaadhidhamma.m, kukku.tasuukara.m byaadhidhamma.m, hatthigavaassava.lava.m byaadhidhamma.m. byaadhidhammaa hete, bhikkhave, upadhayo. etthaaya.m gathito mucchito ajjhaapanno attanaa byaadhidhammo samaano byaadhidhamma.myeva pariyesati.

[03] ``ki~nca, bhikkhave, mara.nadhamma.m vadetha? puttabhariya.m, bhikkhave, mara.nadhamma.m, daasidaasa.m mara.nadhamma.m, aje.laka.m mara.nadhamma.m, kukku.tasuukara.m mara.nadhamma.m, hatthigavaassava.lava.m mara.nadhamma.m. mara.nadhammaa hete, bhikkhave, upadhayo. etthaaya.m gathito mucchito ajjhaapanno attanaa mara.nadhammo samaano mara.nadhamma.myeva pariyesati.

[03] ``ki~nca, bhikkhave, sokadhamma.m vadetha? puttabhariya.m, bhikkhave, sokadhamma.m, daasidaasa.m sokadhamma.m, aje.laka.m sokadhamma.m, kukku.tasuukara.m sokadhamma.m, hatthigavaassava.lava.m sokadhamma.m. sokadhammaa hete, bhikkhave, upadhayo. etthaaya.m gathito mucchito ajjhaapanno attanaa sokadhammo samaano sokadhamma.myeva pariyesati.

[03] ``ki~nca, bhikkhave, sa.mkilesadhamma.m vadetha? puttabhariya.m, bhikkhave, sa.mkilesadhamma.m, daasidaasa.m sa.mkilesadhamma.m, aje.laka.m sa.mkilesadhamma.m ^a^T1.0316^ea^, kukku.tasuukara.m sa.mkilesadhamma.m, hatthigavaassava.lava.m sa.mkilesadhamma.m, jaataruuparajata.m sa.mkilesadhamma.m. sa.mkilesadhammaa hete, bhikkhave, upadhayo. etthaaya.m gathito mucchito ajjhaapanno attanaa sa.mkilesadhammo samaano sa.mkilesadhamma.myeva pariyesati. aya.m, bhikkhave, anariyaa pariyesanaa.

[03] 275^b^.^eb^ ``katamaa ca, bhikkhave, ariyaa pariyesanaa? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco attanaa jaatidhammo samaano jaatidhamme aadiinava.m viditvaa ^a^P1.0163^ea^ ajaata.m anuttara.m yogakkhema.m nibbaana.m pariyesati, attanaa jaraadhammo samaano jaraadhamme aadiinava.m viditvaa ajara.m anuttara.m yogakkhema.m nibbaana.m pariyesati, attanaa byaadhidhammo samaano byaadhidhamme aadiinava.m viditvaa abyaadhi.m anuttara.m ^a^V1.0222^ea^ yogakkhema.m nibbaana.m pariyesati, attanaa mara.nadhammo samaano mara.nadhamme ^a^M1.0219^ea^ aadiinava.m viditvaa amata.m anuttara.m yogakkhema.m nibbaana.m pariyesati, attanaa sokadhammo samaano sokadhamme aadiinava.m viditvaa asoka.m anuttara.m yogakkhema.m nibbaana.m pariyesati, attanaa sa.mkilesadhammo samaano sa.mkilesadhamme aadiinava.m viditvaa asa.mkili.t.tha.m anuttara.m yogakkhema.m nibbaana.m pariyesati. aya.m, bhikkhave, ariyaa pariyesanaa.

[03] 276^b^.^eb^ ``ahampi suda.m, bhikkhave, pubbeva sambodhaa anabhisambuddho bodhisattova samaano attanaa jaatidhammo samaano jaatidhamma.myeva pariyesaami, attanaa jaraadhammo samaano jaraadhamma.myeva pariyesaami, attanaa ^a^T1.0317^ea^ byaadhidhammo samaano byaadhidhamma.myeva pariyesaami, attanaa mara.nadhammo samaano mara.nadhamma.myeva pariyesaami, attanaa sokadhammo samaano sokadhamma.myeva pariyesaami, attanaa sa.mkilesadhammo samaano sa.mkilesadhamma.myeva pariyesaami. tassa mayha.m, bhikkhave, etadahosi -- `ki.m nu kho aha.m attanaa jaatidhammo samaano jaatidhamma.myeva pariyesaami, attanaa jaraadhammo samaano...pe0... byaadhidhammo samaano... mara.nadhammo samaano... sokadhammo samaano... attanaa sa.mkilesadhammo samaano sa.mkilesadhamma.myeva pariyesaami? ya.mnuunaaha.m attanaa jaatidhammo samaano jaatidhamme aadiinava.m viditvaa ajaata.m anuttara.m yogakkhema.m nibbaana.m pariyeseyya.m, attanaa jaraadhammo samaano jaraadhamme aadiinava.m viditvaa ajara.m anuttara.m yogakkhema.m nibbaana.m pariyeseyya.m, attanaa byaadhidhammo samaano byaadhidhamme aadiinava.m viditvaa abyaadhi.m anuttara.m yogakkhema.m nibbaana.m pariyeseyya.m, attanaa mara.nadhammo samaano mara.nadhamme aadiinava.m viditvaa amata.m anuttara.m yogakkhema.m nibbaana.m pariyeseyya.m, attanaa sokadhammo samaano sokadhamme aadiinava.m viditvaa asoka.m anuttara.m yogakkhema.m nibbaana.m pariyeseyya.m, attanaa sa.mkilesadhammo samaano sa.mkilesadhamme aadiinava.m viditvaa asa.mkili.t.tha.m anuttara.m yogakkhema.m nibbaana.m pariyeseyya'nti.

[03] 277^b^.^eb^ ``so kho aha.m, bhikkhave, aparena samayena daharova samaano susukaa.lakeso ^a^T1.0318^ea^, bhadrena yobbanena samannaagato pa.thamena vayasaa akaamakaana.m maataapituuna.m assumukhaana.m rudantaana.m kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa kaasaayaani ^a^M1.0220^ea^ vatthaani acchaadetvaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbaji.m. so eva.m pabbajito samaano ki.m kusalagavesii {ki.mkusala.mgavesii (ka0)} anuttara.m santivarapada.m pariyesamaano yena aa.laaro kaalaamo tenupasa"nkami.m. upasa"nkamitvaa aa.laara.m kaalaama.m etadavoca.m -- `icchaamaha.m, aavuso kaalaama, imasmi.m dhammavinaye ^a^V1.0223^ea^ brahmacariya.m caritu'nti. eva.m vutte, bhikkhave, aa.laaro kaalaamo ma.m etadavoca -- `viharataayasmaa; taadiso aya.m dhammo yattha vi~n~nuu puriso ^a^P1.0164^ea^ nacirasseva saka.m aacariyaka.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja vihareyyaa'ti. so kho aha.m, bhikkhave, nacirasseva khippameva ta.m dhamma.m pariyaapu.ni.m. so kho aha.m, bhikkhave, taavatakeneva o.t.thapahatamattena lapitalaapanamattena ~naa.navaada~nca vadaami theravaada~nca, `jaanaami passaamii'ti ca pa.tijaanaami aha~nceva a~n~ne ca. tassa mayha.m, bhikkhave, etadahosi -- `na kho aa.laaro kaalaamo ima.m dhamma.m kevala.m saddhaamattakena saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharaamiiti pavedeti; addhaa aa.laaro kaalaamo ima.m dhamma.m jaana.m passa.m viharatii'ti.

[01] ``atha khvaaha.m, bhikkhave, yena aa.laaro kaalaamo tenupasa"nkami.m; upasa"nkamitvaa aa.laara.m kaalaama.m etadavoca.m -- `kittaavataa no, aavuso kaalaama, ima.m dhamma.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharaamiiti pavedesii'ti {upasampajja pavedesiiti (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}? eva.m vutte, bhikkhave, aa.laaro kaalaamo aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m ^a^T1.0319^ea^ pavedesi. tassa mayha.m, bhikkhave, etadahosi -- `na kho aa.laarasseva kaalaamassa atthi saddhaa, mayha.mpatthi saddhaa; na kho aa.laarasseva kaalaamassa atthi viiriya.m, mayha.mpatthi viiriya.m; na kho aa.laarasseva kaalaamassa atthi sati, mayha.mpatthi sati; na kho aa.laarasseva kaalaamassa atthi samaadhi, mayha.mpatthi samaadhi; na kho aa.laarasseva kaalaamassa atthi pa~n~naa, mayha.mpatthi pa~n~naa. ya.mnuunaaha.m ya.m dhamma.m aa.laaro kaalaamo saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharaamiiti pavedeti, tassa dhammassa sacchikiriyaaya padaheyya'nti. so kho aha.m, bhikkhave, nacirasseva khippameva ta.m dhamma.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja vihaasi.m.
[03] ``atha khvaaha.m, bhikkhave, yena aa.laaro kaalaamo tenupasa"nkami.m; upasa"nkamitvaa aa.laara.m kaalaama.m etadavoca.m --
[03] `ettaavataa no, aavuso kaalaama, ima.m dhamma.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja pavedesii'ti?
[03] `ettaavataa ^a^M1.0221^ea^ kho aha.m, aavuso, ima.m dhamma.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja pavedemii'ti.
[03] `ahampi ^a^V1.0224^ea^ kho, aavuso, ettaavataa ima.m dhamma.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharaamii'ti.

[01] `laabhaa no, aavuso, suladdha.m no, aavuso, ye maya.m aayasmanta.m taadisa.m sabrahmacaari.m passaama. iti yaaha.m dhamma.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja pavedemi ta.m tva.m dhamma.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharasi. ya.m tva.m ^a^P1.0165^ea^ dhamma.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharasi tamaha.m dhamma.m saya.m abhi~n~naa ^a^T1.0320^ea^ sacchikatvaa upasampajja pavedemi. iti yaaha.m dhamma.m jaanaami ta.m tva.m dhamma.m jaanaasi, ya.m tva.m dhamma.m jaanaasi tamaha.m dhamma.m jaanaami. iti yaadiso aha.m taadiso tuva.m, yaadiso tuva.m taadiso aha.m. ehi daani, aavuso, ubhova santaa ima.m ga.na.m pariharaamaa'ti. iti kho, bhikkhave, aa.laaro kaalaamo aacariyo me samaano (attano) {( ) natthi (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} antevaasi.m ma.m samaana.m attanaa {attano (sii0 pii0)} samasama.m .thapesi, u.laaraaya ca ma.m puujaaya puujesi. tassa mayha.m, bhikkhave, etadahosi -- `naaya.m dhammo nibbidaaya na viraagaaya na nirodhaaya na upasamaaya na abhi~n~naaya na sambodhaaya na nibbaanaaya sa.mvattati, yaavadeva aaki~nca~n~naayatanuupapattiyaa'ti. so kho aha.m, bhikkhave, ta.m dhamma.m anala"nkaritvaa tasmaa dhammaa nibbijja apakkami.m.

[03] 278^b^.^eb^ ``so kho aha.m, bhikkhave, ki.m kusalagavesii anuttara.m santivarapada.m pariyesamaano yena udako {uddako (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} raamaputto tenupasa"nkami.m; upasa"nkamitvaa udaka.m raamaputta.m etadavoca.m -- `icchaamaha.m, aavuso {aavuso raama (sii0 syaa0 ka0) mahaasatto raamaputtameva avoca, na raama.m, raamo hi tattha ga.naacariyo bhaveyya, tadaa ca kaala"nkato asanto. tenevettha raamaayattaani kriyapadaani atiitakaalavasena aagataani, udako ca raamaputto mahaasattassa sabrahmacaariitveva vutto, na aacariyoti. .tiikaaya.m ca ``paa.liya.m raamasseva samaapattilaabhitaa aagataa na udakassaa''ti aadi pacchaabhaage pakaasitaa}, imasmi.m dhammavinaye brahmacariya.m caritu'nti. eva.m vutte, bhikkhave, udako raamaputto ma.m etadavoca -- `viharataayasmaa; taadiso aya.m dhammo yattha vi~n~nuu puriso nacirasseva saka.m aacariyaka.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja vihareyyaa'ti. so kho aha.m, bhikkhave, nacirasseva khippameva ta.m dhamma.m pariyaapu.ni.m. so kho ^a^M1.0222^ea^ aha.m, bhikkhave, taavatakeneva o.t.thapahatamattena lapitalaapanamattena ~naa.navaada~nca vadaami ^a^T1.0321^ea^ theravaada~nca, `jaanaami passaamii'ti ca pa.tijaanaami aha~nceva a~n~ne ca. tassa mayha.m, bhikkhave, etadahosi -- `na kho raamo ima.m dhamma.m kevala.m saddhaamattakena saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharaamiiti pavedesi; addhaa raamo ima.m dhamma.m jaana.m passa.m vihaasii'ti.

[03] ``atha khvaaha.m, bhikkhave, yena udako raamaputto tenupasa"nkami.m; upasa"nkamitvaa udaka.m raamaputta.m etadavoca.m -- `kittaavataa no, aavuso, raamo ima.m dhamma.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja ^a^V1.0225^ea^ viharaamiiti pavedesii'ti? eva.m vutte, bhikkhave, udako raamaputto nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m pavedesi. tassa mayha.m, bhikkhave, etadahosi -- `na kho raamasseva ahosi saddhaa, mayha.mpatthi saddhaa; na kho raamasseva ahosi viiriya.m ^a^P1.0166^ea^, mayha.mpatthi viiriya.m; na kho raamasseva ahosi sati, mayha.mpatthi sati; na kho raamasseva ahosi samaadhi, mayha.mpatthi samaadhi, na kho raamasseva ahosi pa~n~naa, mayha.mpatthi pa~n~naa. ya.mnuunaaha.m ya.m dhamma.m raamo saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharaamiiti pavedesi, tassa dhammassa sacchikiriyaaya padaheyya'nti. so kho aha.m, bhikkhave, nacirasseva khippameva ta.m dhamma.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja vihaasi.m.
[03] ``atha khvaaha.m, bhikkhave, yena udako raamaputto tenupasa"nkami.m; upasa"nkamitvaa udaka.m raamaputta.m etadavoca.m --
[03] `ettaavataa no, aavuso, raamo ima.m dhamma.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja pavedesii'ti?
[03] `ettaavataa kho, aavuso, raamo ima.m dhamma.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja pavedesii'ti.
[03] `ahampi kho, aavuso, ettaavataa ima.m ^a^T1.0322^ea^ dhamma.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharaamii'ti.

[03] `laabhaa no, aavuso, suladdha.m no, aavuso, ye maya.m aayasmanta.m taadisa.m sabrahmacaari.m passaama. iti ya.m dhamma.m raamo saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja pavedesi, ta.m tva.m dhamma.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharasi. ya.m tva.m dhamma.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharasi, ta.m dhamma.m raamo saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja pavedesi. iti ya.m dhamma.m raamo abhi~n~naasi ta.m tva.m dhamma.m jaanaasi, ya.m tva.m dhamma.m jaanaasi, ta.m dhamma.m raamo abhi~n~naasi. iti yaadiso raamo ahosi taadiso tuva.m, yaadiso tuva.m taadiso raamo ahosi. ehi daani, aavuso, tuva.m ima.m ga.na.m pariharaa'ti ^a^M1.0223^ea^. iti kho, bhikkhave ^a^V1.0226^ea^, udako raamaputto sabrahmacaarii me samaano aacariya.t.thaane ma.m .thapesi, u.laaraaya ca ma.m puujaaya puujesi. tassa mayha.m, bhikkhave, etadahosi -- `naaya.m dhammo nibbidaaya na viraagaaya na nirodhaaya na upasamaaya na abhi~n~naaya na sambodhaaya na nibbaanaaya sa.mvattati, yaavadeva nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanuupapattiyaa'ti. so kho aha.m, bhikkhave, ta.m dhamma.m anala"nkaritvaa tasmaa dhammaa nibbijja apakkami.m.

[03] 279^b^.^eb^ ``so kho aha.m, bhikkhave, ki.m kusalagavesii anuttara.m santivarapada.m pariyesamaano magadhesu anupubbena caarika.m caramaano yena uruvelaa senaanigamo tadavasari.m. tatthaddasa.m ^a^P1.0167^ea^ rama.niiya.m bhuumibhaaga.m, paasaadika~nca vanasa.n.da.m, nadi~nca sandanti.m setaka.m supatittha.m rama.niiya.m, samantaa {saamantaa (?)} ca gocaragaama.m ^a^T1.0323^ea^. tassa mayha.m, bhikkhave, etadahosi -- `rama.niiyo vata, bho, bhuumibhaago, paasaadiko ca vanasa.n.do, nadii ca sandati setakaa supatitthaa rama.niiyaa, samantaa ca gocaragaamo. ala.m vatida.m kulaputtassa padhaanatthikassa padhaanaayaa'ti. so kho aha.m, bhikkhave, tattheva nisiidi.m -- alamida.m padhaanaayaati.

[03] 280^b^.^eb^ ``so kho aha.m, bhikkhave, attanaa jaatidhammo samaano jaatidhamme aadiinava.m viditvaa ajaata.m anuttara.m yogakkhema.m nibbaana.m pariyesamaano ajaata.m anuttara.m yogakkhema.m nibbaana.m ajjhagama.m, attanaa jaraadhammo samaano jaraadhamme aadiinava.m viditvaa ajara.m anuttara.m yogakkhema.m nibbaana.m pariyesamaano ajara.m anuttara.m yogakkhema.m nibbaana.m ajjhagama.m, attanaa byaadhidhammo samaano byaadhidhamme aadiinava.m viditvaa abyaadhi.m anuttara.m yogakkhema.m nibbaana.m pariyesamaano abyaadhi.m anuttara.m yogakkhema.m nibbaana.m ajjhagama.m, attanaa mara.nadhammo samaano mara.nadhamme aadiinava.m viditvaa amata.m anuttara.m yogakkhema.m nibbaana.m ajjhagama.m, attanaa sokadhammo samaano sokadhamme aadiinava.m viditvaa asoka.m anuttara.m yogakkhema.m nibbaana.m ajjhagama.m, attanaa sa.mkilesadhammo samaano sa.mkilesadhamme aadiinava.m viditvaa asa.mkili.t.tha.m anuttara.m yogakkhema.m nibbaana.m pariyesamaano asa.mkili.t.tha.m anuttara.m yogakkhema.m nibbaana.m ajjhagama.m. ~naa.na~nca pana me dassana.m udapaadi -- `akuppaa me vimutti, ayamantimaa jaati, natthi daani punabbhavo'ti.

[03] 281^b^.^eb^ ``tassa ^a^M1.0224^ea^ mayha.m, bhikkhave, etadahosi -- `adhigato kho myaaya.m dhammo gambhiiro duddaso duranubodho santo pa.niito atakkaavacaro nipu.no pa.n.ditavedaniiyo. aalayaraamaa kho panaaya.m pajaa aalayarataa aalayasammuditaa. aalayaraamaa kho panaaya.m ^a^V1.0227^ea^ pajaa aalayarataaya aalayasammuditaaya duddasa.m ida.m .thaana.m yadida.m -- idappaccayataa pa.ticcasamuppaado. idampi kho .thaana.m duddasa.m yadida.m -- sabbasa"nkhaarasamatho sabbuupadhipa.tinissaggo ta.nhaakkhayo ^a^T1.0324^ea^ viraago nirodho nibbaana.m. aha~nceva ^a^P1.0168^ea^ kho pana dhamma.m deseyya.m, pare ca me na aajaaneyyu.m, so mamassa kilamatho, saa mamassa vihesaa'ti. apissu ma.m, bhikkhave, imaa anacchariyaa gaathaayo pa.tibha.msu pubbe assutapubbaa --
[21] `kicchena me adhigata.m, hala.m daani pakaasitu.m.
[22] raagadosaparetehi, naaya.m dhammo susambudho..
[21] `pa.tisotagaami.m nipu.na.m, gambhiira.m duddasa.m a.nu.m.
[22] raagarattaa na dakkhanti, tamokhandhena aavu.taa'''ti {aava.taati (sii0), aavutaa (syaa0)}..

[03] 282^b^.^eb^ ``itiha me, bhikkhave, pa.tisa~ncikkhato appossukkataaya citta.m namati, no dhammadesanaaya. atha kho, bhikkhave, brahmuno sahampatissa mama cetasaa cetoparivitakkama~n~naaya etadahosi -- `nassati vata bho loko, vinassati vata bho loko, yatra hi naama tathaagatassa arahato sammaasambuddhassa appossukkataaya citta.m namati {namissati (?)}, no dhammadesanaayaa'ti. atha kho, bhikkhave, brahmaa sahampati -- seyyathaapi naama balavaa puriso sami~njita.m vaa baaha.m pasaareyya, pasaarita.m vaa baaha.m sami~njeyya, evameva -- brahmaloke antarahito mama purato paaturahosi. atha kho, bhikkhave, brahmaa sahampati eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m karitvaa yenaaha.m tena~njali.m pa.naametvaa ma.m etadavoca -- `desetu, bhante, bhagavaa dhamma.m, desetu ^a^T1.0325^ea^ sugato dhamma.m. santi sattaa apparajakkhajaatikaa, assavanataa dhammassa parihaayanti. bhavissanti dhammassa a~n~naataaro'ti. idamavoca, bhikkhave, brahmaa sahampati. ida.m vatvaa athaapara.m etadavoca --
[21] `paaturahosi ^a^M1.0225^ea^ magadhesu pubbe,
[27] dhammo asuddho samalehi cintito.
[26] apaapureta.m {avaapureta.m (sii0)} amatassa dvaara.m,
[22] su.nantu dhamma.m vimalenaanubuddha.m..
[21] `sele ^a^V1.0228^ea^ yathaa pabbatamuddhani.t.thito,
[27] yathaapi passe janata.m samantato.
[26] tathuupama.m dhammamaya.m sumedha,
[27] paasaadamaaruyha samantacakkhu.
[26] sokaavati.n.na.m {sokaavaki.n.na.m (syaa0)} janatamapetasoko,
[22] avekkhassu jaatijaraabhibhuuta.m..
[21] `u.t.thehi ^a^P1.0169^ea^ viira vijitasa"ngaama,
[27] satthavaaha a.na.na vicara loke.
[26] desassu {desetu (syaa0 ka0)} bhagavaa dhamma.m,
[22] a~n~naataaro bhavissantii'''ti..

[03] 283^b^.^eb^ ``atha kho aha.m, bhikkhave, brahmuno ca ajjhesana.m viditvaa sattesu ca kaaru~n~nata.m pa.ticca buddhacakkhunaa loka.m volokesi.m. addasa.m kho aha.m, bhikkhave, buddhacakkhunaa loka.m volokento satte apparajakkhe ^a^T1.0326^ea^ mahaarajakkhe, tikkhindriye mudindriye, svaakaare dvaakaare, suvi~n~naapaye duvi~n~naapaye, appekacce paralokavajjabhayadassaavine {dassaavino (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} viharante, appekacce na paralokavajjabhayadassaavine {dassaavino (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} viharante. seyyathaapi naama uppaliniya.m vaa paduminiya.m vaa pu.n.dariikiniya.m vaa appekaccaani uppalaani vaa padumaani vaa pu.n.dariikaani vaa udake jaataani udake sa.mva.d.dhaani udakaanuggataani antonimuggaposiini, appekaccaani uppalaani vaa padumaani vaa pu.n.dariikaani vaa udake jaataani udake sa.mva.d.dhaani udakaanuggataani samodaka.m .thitaani, appekaccaani uppalaani vaa padumaani vaa pu.n.dariikaani vaa udake jaataani udake sa.mva.d.dhaani udaka.m accuggamma .thitaani {ti.t.thanti (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} anupalittaani udakena; evameva kho aha.m, bhikkhave, buddhacakkhunaa ^a^M1.0226^ea^ loka.m volokento addasa.m satte apparajakkhe mahaarajakkhe, tikkhindriye mudindriye, svaakaare dvaakaare, suvi~n~naapaye duvi~n~naapaye, appekacce paralokavajjabhayadassaavine viharante, appekacce na paralokavajjabhayadassaavine viharante. atha khvaaha.m, bhikkhave, brahmaana.m sahampati.m gaathaaya paccabhaasi.m --
[21] `apaarutaa ^a^V1.0229^ea^ tesa.m amatassa dvaaraa,
[27] ye sotavanto pamu~ncantu saddha.m.
[26] vihi.msasa~n~nii pagu.na.m na bhaasi.m,
[22] dhamma.m pa.niita.m manujesu brahme'''ti..
[03] ``atha kho, bhikkhave, brahmaa sahampati `kataavakaaso khomhi bhagavataa dhammadesanaayaa'ti ma.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa tatthevantaradhaayi.

[03] 284^b^.^eb^ ``tassa ^a^T1.0327^ea^ mayha.m, bhikkhave, etadahosi -- `kassa nu kho aha.m pa.thama.m dhamma.m deseyya.m; ko ima.m dhamma.m khippameva aajaanissatii'ti? tassa mayha.m, bhikkhave, etadahosi -- `aya.m kho aa.laaro kaalaamo pa.n.dito viyatto medhaavii diigharatta.m apparajakkhajaatiko. ya.mnuunaaha.m aa.laarassa kaalaamassa ^a^P1.0170^ea^ pa.thama.m dhamma.m deseyya.m. so ima.m dhamma.m khippameva aajaanissatii'ti. atha kho ma.m, bhikkhave, devataa upasa"nkamitvaa etadavoca -- `sattaahakaala"nkato, bhante, aa.laaro kaalaamo'ti. ~naa.na~nca pana me dassana.m udapaadi -- `sattaahakaala"nkato aa.laaro kaalaamo'ti. tassa mayha.m, bhikkhave, etadahosi -- `mahaajaaniyo kho aa.laaro kaalaamo. sace hi so ima.m dhamma.m su.neyya, khippameva aajaaneyyaa'ti.

[03] ``tassa mayha.m, bhikkhave, etadahosi -- `kassa nu kho aha.m pa.thama.m dhamma.m deseyya.m; ko ima.m dhamma.m khippameva aajaanissatii'ti? tassa mayha.m, bhikkhave, etadahosi -- `aya.m kho udako raamaputto pa.n.dito viyatto medhaavii diigharatta.m apparajakkhajaatiko. ya.mnuunaaha.m udakassa raamaputtassa pa.thama.m dhamma.m deseyya.m. so ima.m dhamma.m khippameva aajaanissatii'ti. atha kho ma.m, bhikkhave, devataa upasa"nkamitvaa etadavoca -- `abhidosakaala"nkato, bhante, udako raamaputto'ti. ~naa.na~nca pana me dassana.m udapaadi -- `abhidosakaala"nkato udako raamaputto'ti. tassa mayha.m, bhikkhave, etadahosi -- `mahaajaaniyo kho udako raamaputto. sace hi so ima.m dhamma.m su.neyya ^a^M1.0227^ea^, khippameva aajaaneyyaa'ti.

[01] ``tassa mayha.m ^a^T1.0328^ea^, bhikkhave, etadahosi -- `kassa nu kho aha.m pa.thama.m dhamma.m deseyya.m; ko ima.m dhamma.m khippameva aajaanissatii'ti? tassa mayha.m, bhikkhave, etadahosi -- `bahukaaraa ^a^V1.0230^ea^ kho me pa~ncavaggiyaa bhikkhuu, ye ma.m padhaanapahitatta.m upa.t.thahi.msu. ya.mnuunaaha.m pa~ncavaggiyaana.m bhikkhuuna.m pa.thama.m dhamma.m deseyya'nti. tassa mayha.m, bhikkhave, etadahosi -- `kaha.m nu kho etarahi pa~ncavaggiyaa bhikkhuu viharantii'ti? addasa.m kho aha.m, bhikkhave, dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena pa~ncavaggiye bhikkhuu baaraa.nasiya.m viharante isipatane migadaaye. atha khvaaha.m, bhikkhave, uruvelaaya.m yathaabhiranta.m viharitvaa yena baaraa.nasii tena caarika.m pakkami.m {pakkaami.m (syaa0 pii0 ka0)}.

[03] 285^b^.^eb^ ``addasaa kho ma.m, bhikkhave, upako aajiivako antaraa {aajiiviko (sii0 pii0 ka0)} ca gaya.m antaraa ca bodhi.m addhaanamaggappa.tipanna.m. disvaana ma.m etadavoca -- `vippasannaani kho te, aavuso, indriyaani, parisuddho chaviva.n.no pariyodaato! ka.msi tva.m, aavuso, uddissa pabbajito, ko vaa te satthaa, kassa vaa tva.m dhamma.m rocesii'ti ^a^P1.0171^ea^? eva.m vutte, aha.m, bhikkhave, upaka.m aajiivaka.m gaathaahi ajjhabhaasi.m --
[21] `sabbaabhibhuu sabbaviduuhamasmi, sabbesu dhammesu anuupalitto.
[22] sabba~njaho ta.nhaakkhaye vimutto, saya.m abhi~n~naaya kamuddiseyya.m..
[21] `na ^a^T1.0329^ea^ me aacariyo atthi, sadiso me na vijjati.
[22] sadevakasmi.m lokasmi.m, natthi me pa.tipuggalo..
[21] `aha~nhi arahaa loke, aha.m satthaa anuttaro.
[22] ekomhi sammaasambuddho, siitibhuutosmi nibbuto..
[21] `dhammacakka.m pavattetu.m, gacchaami kaasina.m pura.m.
[22] andhiibhuutasmi.m {andhabhuutasmi.m (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} lokasmi.m, aaha~ncha.m amatadundubhi'nti..
[03] `yathaa kho tva.m, aavuso, pa.tijaanaasi, arahasi anantajino'ti!
[21] `maadisaa ^a^V1.0231^ea^ ve jinaa honti, ye pattaa aasavakkhaya.m.
[22] jitaa me paapakaa dhammaa, tasmaahamupaka jino'ti..
[03] ``eva.m ^a^M1.0228^ea^ vutte, bhikkhave, upako aajiivako `hupeyyapaavuso'ti {huveyyapaavuso (sii0 pii0), huveyyaavuso (syaa0)} vatvaa siisa.m okampetvaa ummagga.m gahetvaa pakkaami.

[03] 286^b^.^eb^ ``atha khvaaha.m, bhikkhave, anupubbena caarika.m caramaano yena baaraa.nasii isipatana.m migadaayo yena pa~ncavaggiyaa bhikkhuu tenupasa"nkami.m. addasa.msu kho ma.m, bhikkhave, pa~ncavaggiyaa bhikkhuu duurato aagacchanta.m. disvaana a~n~nama~n~na.m sa.n.thapesu.m {a~n~nama~n~na.m katika.m sa.n.thapesu.m (vinayapi.take mahaavagge)} -- `aya.m kho, aavuso, sama.no gotamo aagacchati baahulliko {baahuliko (sii0 pii0) saaratthadiipanii.tiikaaya sameti} padhaanavibbhanto aavatto baahullaaya. so neva abhivaadetabbo, na paccu.t.thaatabbo; naassa pattaciivara.m pa.tiggahetabba.m. api ca kho aasana.m .thapetabba.m, sace aaka"nkhissati nisiidissatii'ti. yathaa yathaa kho aha.m, bhikkhave, upasa"nkami.m tathaa ^a^T1.0330^ea^ tathaa pa~ncavaggiyaa bhikkhuu naasakkhi.msu sakaaya katikaaya sa.n.thaatu.m. appekacce ma.m paccuggantvaa pattaciivara.m pa.tiggahesu.m, appekacce aasana.m pa~n~napesu.m, appekacce paadodaka.m upa.t.thapesu.m. api ca kho ma.m naamena ca aavusovaadena ca samudaacaranti.

[03] ``eva.m vutte, aha.m, bhikkhave, pa~ncavaggiye bhikkhuu etadavoca.m -- `maa, bhikkhave, tathaagata.m naamena ca aavusovaadena ca samudaacaratha {samudaacarittha (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}. araha.m, bhikkhave, tathaagato sammaasambuddho ^a^P1.0172^ea^. odahatha, bhikkhave, sota.m, amatamadhigata.m, ahamanusaasaami, aha.m dhamma.m desemi. yathaanusi.t.tha.m tathaa pa.tipajjamaanaa nacirasseva -- yassatthaaya kulaputtaa sammadeva agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajanti tadanuttara.m -- brahmacariyapariyosaana.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharissathaa'ti. eva.m vutte, bhikkhave, pa~ncavaggiyaa bhikkhuu ma.m etadavocu.m -- `taayapi kho tva.m, aavuso gotama, iriyaaya taaya pa.tipadaaya taaya dukkarakaarikaaya naajjhagamaa uttarimanussadhammaa alamariya~naa.nadassanavisesa.m, ki.m pana tva.m etarahi baahulliko padhaanavibbhanto aavatto baahullaaya adhigamissasi uttarimanussadhammaa alamariya~naa.nadassanavisesa'nti? eva.m vutte, aha.m, bhikkhave, pa~ncavaggiye bhikkhuu etadavoca.m -- `na, bhikkhave, tathaagato baahulliko, na padhaanavibbhanto, na aavatto baahullaaya ^a^M1.0229^ea^ ^a^V1.0232^ea^. araha.m, bhikkhave, tathaagato sammaasambuddho. odahatha, bhikkhave, sota.m, amatamadhigata.m, ahamanusaasaami, aha.m dhamma.m desemi. yathaanusi.t.tha.m tathaa pa.tipajjamaanaa nacirasseva -- yassatthaaya kulaputtaa ^a^T1.0331^ea^ sammadeva agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajanti tadanuttara.m -- brahmacariyapariyosaana.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharissathaa'ti. dutiyampi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncavaggiyaa bhikkhuu ma.m etadavocu.m -- `taayapi kho tva.m, aavuso gotama, iriyaaya taaya pa.tipadaaya taaya dukkarakaarikaaya naajjhagamaa uttarimanussadhammaa alamariya~naa.nadassanavisesa.m, ki.m pana tva.m etarahi baahulliko padhaanavibbhanto aavatto baahullaaya adhigamissasi uttarimanussadhammaa alamariya~naa.nadassanavisesa'nti? dutiyampi kho aha.m, bhikkhave, pa~ncavaggiye bhikkhuu etadavoca.m -- `na, bhikkhave, tathaagato baahulliko...pe0... upasampajja viharissathaa'ti. tatiyampi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncavaggiyaa bhikkhuu ma.m etadavocu.m -- `taayapi kho tva.m, aavuso gotama, iriyaaya taaya pa.tipadaaya taaya dukkarakaarikaaya naajjhagamaa uttarimanussadhammaa alamariya~naa.nadassanavisesa.m, ki.m pana tva.m etarahi baahulliko padhaanavibbhanto aavatto baahullaaya adhigamissasi uttarimanussadhammaa alamariya~naa.nadassanavisesa'nti?

[03] ``eva.m vutte, aha.m, bhikkhave, pa~ncavaggiye bhikkhuu etadavoca.m -- `abhijaanaatha me no tumhe, bhikkhave, ito pubbe evaruupa.m pabhaavitameta'nti {bhaasitametanti (sii0 syaa0 vinayepi)}? `no heta.m, bhante'. `araha.m, bhikkhave, tathaagato sammaasambuddho. odahatha, bhikkhave, sota.m, amatamadhigata.m, ahamanusaasaami, aha.m dhamma.m desemi. yathaanusi.t.tha.m tathaa pa.tipajjamaanaa nacirasseva ^a^T1.0332^ea^ -- yassatthaaya kulaputtaa sammadeva agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajanti tadanuttara.m -- brahmacariyapariyosaana.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa ^a^P1.0173^ea^ upasampajja viharissathaa'ti.

[03] ``asakkhi.m kho aha.m, bhikkhave, pa~ncavaggiye bhikkhuu sa~n~naapetu.m. dvepi suda.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu ovadaami, tayo bhikkhuu pi.n.daaya caranti. ya.m tayo bhikkhuu pi.n.daaya caritvaa aaharanti tena chabbaggiyaa {chabbaggaa (sii0 syaa0)} yaapema. tayopi suda.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu ovadaami, dve bhikkhuu pi.n.daaya caranti. ya.m dve bhikkhuu pi.n.daaya caritvaa aaharanti tena chabbaggiyaa yaapema. atha kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncavaggiyaa ^a^M1.0230^ea^ bhikkhuu mayaa eva.m ovadiyamaanaa eva.m anusaasiyamaanaa attanaa jaatidhammaa samaanaa jaatidhamme aadiinava.m viditvaa ajaata.m anuttara.m yogakkhema.m nibbaana.m pariyesamaanaa ajaata.m anuttara.m ^a^V1.0233^ea^ yogakkhema.m nibbaana.m ajjhagama.msu, attanaa jaraadhammaa samaanaa jaraadhamme aadiinava.m viditvaa ajara.m anuttara.m yogakkhema.m nibbaana.m pariyesamaanaa ajara.m anuttara.m yogakkhema.m nibbaana.m ajjhagama.msu, attanaa byaadhidhammaa samaanaa...pe0... attanaa mara.nadhammaa samaanaa... attanaa sokadhammaa samaanaa... attanaa sa.mkilesadhammaa samaanaa sa.mkilesadhamme aadiinava.m viditvaa asa.mkili.t.tha.m anuttara.m yogakkhema.m nibbaana.m pariyesamaanaa asa.mkili.t.tha.m anuttara.m yogakkhema.m nibbaana.m ajjhagama.msu. ~naa.na~nca pana nesa.m dassana.m udapaadi -- `akuppaa no ^a^T1.0333^ea^ vimutti {akuppaa nesa.m vimutti (ka0)}, ayamantimaa jaati, natthi daani punabbhavo'ti.

[03] 287^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, kaamagu.naa. katame pa~nca? cakkhuvi~n~neyyaa ruupaa i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa piyaruupaa kaamuupasa.mhitaa rajaniiyaa, sotavi~n~neyyaa saddaa...pe0... ghaanavi~n~neyyaa gandhaa... jivhaavi~n~neyyaa rasaa... kaayavi~n~neyyaa pho.t.thabbaa i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa piyaruupaa kaamuupasa.mhitaa rajaniiyaa. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca kaamagu.naa. ye hi keci, bhikkhave, sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa ime pa~nca kaamagu.ne gathitaa mucchitaa ajjhopannaa anaadiinavadassaavino anissara.napa~n~naa paribhu~njanti, te evamassu veditabbaa -- `anayamaapannaa byasanamaapannaa yathaakaamakara.niiyaa paapimato' {paapimato''ti (?)}. `seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, aara~n~nako mago baddho paasaraasi.m adhisayeyya. so evamassa veditabbo -- anayamaapanno byasanamaapanno yathaakaamakara.niiyo luddassa. aagacchante ca pana ludde yena kaama.m na pakkamissatii'ti. evameva kho, bhikkhave, ye hi keci sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa ime pa~nca kaamagu.ne gathitaa mucchitaa ajjhopannaa anaadiinavadassaavino anissara.napa~n~naa paribhu~njanti, te evamassu veditabbaa -- `anayamaapannaa byasanamaapannaa yathaakaamakara.niiyaa paapimato'. ye ca kho keci, bhikkhave, sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa ime pa~nca kaamagu.ne agathitaa amucchitaa anajjhopannaa aadiinavadassaavino nissara.napa~n~naa ^a^P1.0174^ea^ paribhu~njanti, te evamassu veditabbaa -- `na anayamaapannaa na byasanamaapannaa na ^a^M1.0231^ea^ yathaakaamakara.niiyaa paapimato'.

[03] ``seyyathaapi ^a^V1.0234^ea^, bhikkhave, aara~n~nako mago abaddho paasaraasi.m adhisayeyya. so evamassa veditabbo -- `na anayamaapanno na byasanamaapanno na yathaakaamakara.niiyo luddassa. aagacchante ca pana ludde yena kaama.m pakkamissatii'ti. evameva kho, bhikkhave, ye hi keci sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa ime pa~nca kaamagu.ne agathitaa amucchitaa anajjhopannaa aadiinavadassaavino nissara.napa~n~naa paribhu~njanti, te evamassu veditabbaa -- `na anayamaapannaa na byasanamaapannaa na ^a^T1.0334^ea^ yathaakaamakara.niiyaa paapimato'.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, aara~n~nako mago ara~n~ne pavane caramaano vissattho gacchati, vissattho ti.t.thati, vissattho nisiidati, vissattho seyya.m kappeti. ta.m kissa hetu? anaapaathagato, bhikkhave, luddassa. evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vivicceva kaamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu andhamakaasi maara.m apada.m, vadhitvaa maaracakkhu.m adassana.m gato paapimato.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa ajjhatta.m sampasaadana.m cetaso ekodibhaava.m avitakka.m avicaara.m samaadhija.m piitisukha.m dutiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave...pe0... paapimato.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu piitiyaa ca viraagaa upekkhako ca viharati, sato ca sampajaano, sukha~nca kaayena pa.tisa.mvedeti ya.m ta.m ariyaa aacikkhanti `upekkhako satimaa sukhavihaarii'ti tatiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave...pe0... paapimato.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahaanaa dukkhassa ca pahaanaa pubbeva somanassadomanassaana.m attha"ngamaa adukkhamasukha.m upekkhaasatipaarisuddhi.m catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave...pe0... paapimato.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sabbaso ruupasa~n~naana.m samatikkamaa pa.tighasa~n~naana.m attha"ngamaa ^a^T1.0335^ea^ naanattasa~n~naana.m amanasikaaraa `ananto aakaaso'ti aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m upasampajja viharati. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave...pe0... paapimato.

[03] ``puna ^a^M1.0232^ea^ ^a^V1.0235^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sabbaso aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m samatikkamma `ananta.m vi~n~naa.na'nti vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m upasampajja viharati. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave...pe0... paapimato.
[01] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sabbaso vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m samatikkamma `natthi ki~ncii'ti aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m upasampajja viharati. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave...pe0... paapimato.
[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sabbaso aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m samatikkamma ^a^P1.0175^ea^ nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m upasampajja viharati. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave...pe0... paapimato.

[01] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sabbaso nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m samatikkamma sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m upasampajja viharati, pa~n~naaya cassa disvaa aasavaa parikkhii.naa honti. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu andhamakaasi maara.m apada.m, vadhitvaa maaracakkhu.m adassana.m gato paapimato. ti.n.no loke visattika.m vissattho gacchati, vissattho ti.t.thati, vissattho nisiidati, vissattho seyya.m kappeti. ta.m kissa hetu? anaapaathagato, bhikkhave, paapimato''ti.
[03] idamavoca bhagavaa. attamanaa te bhikkhuu bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandunti.
[06] paasaraasisutta.m ni.t.thita.m cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 288^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T1.0336^ea^ ^a^V1.0236^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena jaa.nusso.ni braahma.no sabbasetena va.lavaabhirathena {va.labhiirathena (sii0 pii0)} saavatthiyaa niyyaati divaadivassa. addasaa kho jaa.nusso.ni braahma.no pilotika.m paribbaajaka.m duuratova aagacchanta.m. disvaana pilotika.m paribbaajaka.m etadavoca --
[03] ``handa, kuto nu bhava.m vacchaayano aagacchati divaadivassaa''ti?
[03] ``ito hi kho aha.m ^a^M1.0233^ea^, bho, aagacchaami sama.nassa gotamassa santikaa''ti.
[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nati, bhava.m vacchaayano, sama.nassa gotamassa pa~n~naaveyyattiya.m?
[03] ``pa.n.dito ma~n~ne''ti.
[03] ``ko caaha.m, bho, ko ca sama.nassa gotamassa pa~n~naaveyyattiya.m jaanissaami! sopi nuunassa taadisova yo sama.nassa gotamassa pa~n~naaveyyattiya.m jaaneyyaa''ti.
[03] ``u.laaraaya khalu bhava.m vacchaayano sama.na.m gotama.m pasa.msaaya pasa.msatii''ti.
[03] ``ko caaha.m, bho, ko ca sama.na.m gotama.m pasa.msissaami?
[03] ``pasatthapasatthova so bhava.m gotamo se.t.tho devamanussaana''nti.
[03] ``ka.m pana bhava.m vacchaayano atthavasa.m sampassamaano sama.ne gotame eva.m abhippasanno''ti {abhippasanno hotiiti (syaa0)}?

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bho, kusalo naagavaniko naagavana.m paviseyya. so passeyya naagavane ^a^T1.0337^ea^ mahanta.m ^a^V1.0237^ea^ ^a^P1.0176^ea^ hatthipada.m, diighato ca aayata.m, tiriya~nca vitthata.m. so ni.t.tha.m gaccheyya -- `mahaa vata, bho, naago'ti. evameva kho aha.m, bho, yato addasa.m sama.ne gotame cattaari padaani athaaha.m ni.t.thamagama.m -- `sammaasambuddho bhagavaa, svaakkhaato bhagavataa dhammo, suppa.tipanno bhagavato saavakasa"ngho'ti.

[03] 289^b^.^eb^ ``katamaani cattaari? idhaaha.m, bho, passaami ekacce khattiyapa.n.dite nipu.ne kataparappavaade vaalavedhiruupe, te bhindantaa {vobhindantaa (sii0 pii0) vi + ava + bhindantaa} ma~n~ne caranti pa~n~naagatena di.t.thigataani. te su.nanti -- `sama.no khalu, bho, gotamo amuka.m naama gaama.m vaa nigama.m vaa osarissatii'ti. te pa~nha.m abhisa"nkharonti -- `ima.m maya.m pa~nha.m sama.na.m gotama.m upasa"nkamitvaa pucchissaama. eva.m ce no pu.t.tho eva.m byaakarissati, evamassa maya.m vaada.m aaropessaama. eva.m cepi no pu.t.tho eva.m byaakarissati, evampissa maya.m vaada.m aaropessaamaa'ti. te su.nanti -- `sama.no khalu, bho, gotamo amuka.m naama gaama.m vaa nigama.m vaa osa.to'ti. te yena sama.no gotamo tenupasa"nkamanti. te sama.no gotamo dhammiyaa kathaaya sandasseti samaadapeti samuttejeti sampaha.mseti. te sama.nena gotamena dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassitaa samaadapitaa samuttejitaa sampaha.msitaa na ceva sama.na.m gotama.m pa~nha.m pucchanti, kutossa {kutassa (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} vaada.m aaropessanti? a~n~nadatthu ^a^M1.0234^ea^ sama.nasseva gotamassa saavakaa sampajjanti. yadaaha.m, bho, sama.ne gotame ima.m pa.thama.m ^a^T1.0338^ea^ pada.m addasa.m athaaha.m ni.t.thamagama.m -- `sammaasambuddho bhagavaa, svaakkhaato bhagavataa dhammo, suppa.tipanno bhagavato saavakasa"ngho'ti.

[03] ``puna caparaaha.m, bho, passaami idhekacce braahma.napa.n.dite...pe0... gahapatipa.n.dite...pe0... sama.napa.n.dite nipu.ne kataparappavaade vaalavedhiruupe te bhindantaa ma~n~ne caranti pa~n~naagatena di.t.thigataani. te su.nanti -- `sama.no khalu bho gotamo amuka.m naama ^a^P1.0177^ea^ gaama.m vaa nigama.m vaa osarissatii'ti. te pa~nha.m abhisa"nkharonti `ima.m maya.m pa~nha.m sama.na.m gotama.m upasa"nkamitvaa pucchissaama. eva.m ce no pu.t.tho eva.m byaakarissati, evamassa maya.m vaada.m aaropessaama. eva.m cepi no pu.t.tho eva.m byaakarissati, eva.mpissa maya.m vaada.m aaropessaamaa'ti. te su.nanti `sama.no khalu bho gotamo amuka.m naama gaama.m vaa nigama.m vaa osa.to'ti. te yena sama.no gotamo tenupasa"nkamanti. te sama.no gotamo dhammiyaa kathaaya sandasseti samaadapeti samuttejeti sampaha.mseti. te sama.nena gotamena dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassitaa samaadapitaa samuttejitaa sampaha.msitaa na ceva sama.na.m gotama.m pa~nha.m pucchanti, kutossa ^a^V1.0238^ea^ vaada.m aaropessanti? a~n~nadatthu sama.na.myeva gotama.m okaasa.m yaacanti agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajjaaya. te sama.no gotamo pabbaajeti {pabbaajeti upasampaadeti (sii0)}. te tattha pabbajitaa samaanaa vuupaka.t.thaa appamattaa aataapino pahitattaa viharantaa ^a^T1.0339^ea^ nacirasseva -- yassatthaaya kulaputtaa sammadeva agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajanti tadanuttara.m -- brahmacariyapariyosaana.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharanti. te evamaaha.msu -- `mana.m vata, bho, anassaama, mana.m vata, bho, panassaama; maya~nhi pubbe assama.naava samaanaa sama.namhaati pa.tijaanimha, abraahma.naava samaanaa braahma.namhaati pa.tijaanimha, anarahantova samaanaa arahantamhaati pa.tijaanimha. idaani khomha sama.naa, idaani khomha braahma.naa, idaani khomha arahanto'ti. yadaaha.m, bho, sama.ne gotame ima.m catuttha.m pada.m addasa.m athaaha.m ni.t.thamagama.m -- `sammaasambuddho bhagavaa, svaakkhaato bhagavataa dhammo, suppa.tipanno bhagavato saavakasa"ngho'''ti.

[01] ``yato ^a^M1.0235^ea^ kho aha.m, bho, sama.ne gotame imaani cattaari padaani addasa.m athaaha.m ni.t.thamagama.m -- `sammaasambuddho bhagavaa, svaakkhaato bhagavataa dhammo, suppa.tipanno bhagavato saavakasa"ngho'''ti.

[03] 290^b^.^eb^ eva.m vutte, jaa.nusso.ni braahma.no sabbasetaa va.lavaabhirathaa orohitvaa eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m karitvaa yena bhagavaa tena~njali.m pa.naametvaa tikkhattu.m udaana.m udaanesi -- ``namo tassa bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa; namo tassa bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa; namo tassa bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa. appeva naama mayampi kadaaci karahaci ^a^P1.0178^ea^ tena bhotaa gotamena saddhi.m samaagaccheyyaama, appeva naama siyaa kocideva kathaasallaapo''ti! atha kho jaa.nusso.ni braahma.no yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami ^a^T1.0340^ea^; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho jaa.nusso.ni braahma.no yaavatako ahosi pilotikena paribbaajakena saddhi.m kathaasallaapo ta.m sabba.m bhagavato aarocesi. eva.m vutte, bhagavaa jaa.nusso.ni.m braahma.na.m etadavoca -- ``na kho, braahma.na, ettaavataa hatthipadopamo vitthaarena paripuuro hoti. api ca, braahma.na, yathaa hatthipadopamo vitthaarena paripuuro hoti ta.m su.naahi, saadhuka.m manasi karohi, bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bho''ti kho jaa.nusso.ni braahma.no bhagavato paccassosi. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] 291^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, braahma.na, naagavaniko naagavana.m paviseyya. so passeyya naagavane mahanta.m ^a^V1.0239^ea^ hatthipada.m, diighato ca aayata.m, tiriya~nca vitthata.m. yo hoti kusalo naagavaniko neva taava ni.t.tha.m gacchati -- `mahaa vata, bho, naago'ti. ta.m kissa hetu? santi hi, braahma.na, naagavane vaamanikaa naama hatthiniyo mahaapadaa, taasa.m peta.m pada.m assaati.

[03] ``so tamanugacchati. tamanugacchanto passati naagavane mahanta.m hatthipada.m, diighato ca aayata.m, tiriya~nca vitthata.m, uccaa ca nisevita.m. yo hoti kusalo naagavaniko neva taava ni.t.tha.m gacchati -- `mahaa vata, bho, naago'ti. ta.m kissa hetu? santi hi, braahma.na, naagavane uccaa kaa.laarikaa naama hatthiniyo mahaapadaa, taasa.m peta.m pada.m assaati.

[03] ``so ^a^M1.0236^ea^ tamanugacchati. tamanugacchanto passati naagavane ^a^T1.0341^ea^ mahanta.m hatthipada.m, diighato ca aayata.m, tiriya~nca vitthata.m, uccaa ca nisevita.m, uccaa ca dantehi aara~njitaani. yo hoti kusalo naagavaniko neva taava ni.t.tha.m gacchati -- `mahaa vata, bho, naago'ti. ta.m kissa hetu? santi hi, braahma.na, naagavane uccaa ka.nerukaa naama hatthiniyo mahaapadaa, taasa.m peta.m pada.m assaati.

[03] ``so tamanugacchati. tamanugacchanto passati naagavane mahanta.m hatthipada.m, diighato ca aayata.m, tiriya~nca vitthata.m, uccaa ca nisevita.m, uccaa ca dantehi aara~njitaani, uccaa ca saakhaabha"nga.m. ta~nca naaga.m passati rukkhamuulagata.m vaa abbhokaasagata.m vaa gacchanta.m vaa ti.t.thanta.m vaa nisinna.m vaa nipanna.m vaa. so ni.t.tha.m gacchati -- `ayameva so mahaanaago'ti.

[03] ``evameva kho ^a^P1.0179^ea^, braahma.na, idha tathaagato loke uppajjati araha.m sammaasambuddho vijjaacara.nasampanno sugato lokaviduu anuttaro purisadammasaarathi satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaa. so ima.m loka.m sadevaka.m samaaraka.m sabrahmaka.m sassama.nabraahma.ni.m paja.m sadevamanussa.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa pavedeti. so dhamma.m deseti aadikalyaa.na.m majjhekalyaa.na.m pariyosaanakalyaa.na.m saattha.m sabya~njana.m; kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m pakaaseti. ta.m dhamma.m su.naati gahapati vaa gahapatiputto vaa a~n~natarasmi.m vaa kule paccaajaato. so ta.m dhamma.m sutvaa tathaagate saddha.m pa.tilabhati. so tena saddhaapa.tilaabhena samannaagato iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `sambaadho gharaavaaso rajopatho ^a^T1.0342^ea^, abbhokaaso pabbajjaa. nayida.m sukara.m agaara.m ^a^V1.0240^ea^ ajjhaavasataa ekantaparipu.n.na.m ekantaparisuddha.m sa"nkhalikhita.m brahmacariya.m caritu.m. ya.mnuunaaha.m kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadetvaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajeyya'nti. so aparena samayena appa.m vaa bhogakkhandha.m pahaaya mahanta.m vaa bhogakkhandha.m pahaaya appa.m vaa ~naatipariva.t.ta.m pahaaya mahanta.m vaa ~naatipariva.t.ta.m pahaaya kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadetvaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajati.

[03] 292^b^.^eb^ ``so eva.m pabbajito samaano bhikkhuuna.m sikkhaasaajiivasamaapanno paa.naatipaata.m pahaaya paa.naatipaataa pa.tivirato hoti, nihitada.n.do ^a^M1.0237^ea^ nihitasattho lajjii dayaapanno sabbapaa.nabhuutahitaanukampii viharati.
[03] ``adinnaadaana.m pahaaya adinnaadaanaa pa.tivirato hoti dinnaadaayii dinnapaa.tika"nkhii. athenena sucibhuutena attanaa viharati.
[03] ``abrahmacariya.m pahaaya brahmacaarii hoti aaraacaarii virato methunaa gaamadhammaa.
[03] ``musaavaada.m pahaaya musaavaadaa pa.tivirato hoti saccavaadii saccasandho theto {.theto (syaa0 ka.m0)} paccayiko avisa.mvaadako lokassa.

[03] ``pisu.na.m vaaca.m pahaaya pisu.naaya vaacaaya pa.tivirato hoti, ito sutvaa na amutra akkhaataa imesa.m bhedaaya, amutra vaa sutvaa na imesa.m akkhaataa amuusa.m bhedaaya. iti bhinnaana.m vaa sandhaataa sahitaana.m vaa anuppadaataa, samaggaaraamo samaggarato samagganandii samaggakara.ni.m vaaca.m bhaasitaa hoti ^a^T1.0343^ea^.

[01] ``pharusa.m vaaca.m pahaaya pharusaaya vaacaaya pa.tivirato hoti. yaa saa vaacaa nelaa ka.n.nasukhaa pemaniiyaa hadaya"ngamaa porii bahujanakantaa bahujanamanaapaa ^a^P1.0180^ea^ tathaaruupi.m vaaca.m bhaasitaa hoti.

[03] ``samphappalaapa.m pahaaya samphappalaapaa pa.tivirato hoti kaalavaadii bhuutavaadii atthavaadii dhammavaadii vinayavaadii, nidhaanavati.m vaaca.m bhaasitaa kaalena saapadesa.m pariyantavati.m atthasa.mhita.m.

[03] 293^b^.^eb^ ``so ^a^V1.0241^ea^ biijagaamabhuutagaamasamaarambhaa pa.tivirato hoti, ekabhattiko hoti rattuuparato, virato vikaalabhojanaa, naccagiitavaaditavisuukadassanaa pa.tivirato hoti, maalaagandhavilepanadhaara.nama.n.danavibhuusana.t.thaanaa pa.tivirato hoti, uccaasayanamahaasayanaa pa.tivirato hoti, jaataruuparajatapa.tiggaha.naa pa.tivirato hoti, aamakadha~n~napa.tiggaha.naa pa.tivirato hoti, aamakama.msapa.tiggaha.naa pa.tivirato hoti, itthikumaarikapa.tiggaha.naa pa.tivirato hoti, daasidaasapa.tiggaha.naa ^a^M1.0238^ea^ pa.tivirato hoti, aje.lakapa.tiggaha.naa pa.tivirato hoti, kukku.tasuukarapa.tiggaha.naa pa.tivirato hoti, hatthigavaassava.lavaapa.tiggaha.naa pa.tivirato hoti, khettavatthupa.tiggaha.naa pa.tivirato hoti, duuteyyapahi.nagamanaanuyogaa pa.tivirato hoti, kayavikkayaa pa.tivirato hoti, tulaakuu.taka.msakuu.tamaanakuu.taa pa.tivirato hoti, ukko.tanava~ncananikatisaaciyogaa pa.tivirato hoti, chedanavadhabandhanaviparaamosaaalopasahasaakaaraa {saahasaakaaraa (ka0)} pa.tivirato hoti {imassa anantara.m ``so iminaa ariyena siilakkhandhena samannaagato ajjhatta.m anavajjasukha.m pa.tisa.mvedetii''ti vacana.m diighanikaaye aagata.m, ta.m idha santosakathaavasaane aagata.m, saa ca santosakathaa tattha satisampaja~n~naanantarameva aagataa}.

[03] 294^b^.^eb^ ``so santu.t.tho hoti kaayaparihaarikena ciivarena kucchiparihaarikena pi.n.dapaatena. so yena yeneva ^a^T1.0344^ea^ pakkamati samaadaayeva pakkamati. seyyathaapi naama pakkhii saku.no yena yeneva .deti sapattabhaarova .deti, evameva bhikkhu santu.t.tho hoti kaayaparihaarikena ciivarena kucchiparihaarikena pi.n.dapaatena. so yena yeneva pakkamati samaadaayeva pakkamati. so iminaa ariyena siilakkhandhena samannaagato ajjhatta.m anavajjasukha.m pa.tisa.mvedeti.

[03] 295^b^.^eb^ ``so cakkhunaa ruupa.m disvaa na nimittaggaahii hoti naanubya~njanaggaahii. yatvaadhikara.namena.m cakkhundriya.m asa.mvuta.m viharanta.m abhijjhaadomanassaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa anvaassaveyyu.m tassa sa.mvaraaya pa.tipajjati, rakkhati cakkhundriya.m, cakkhundriye sa.mvara.m aapajjati. sotena sadda.m sutvaa...pe0... ghaanena gandha.m ghaayitvaa... jivhaaya rasa.m saayitvaa... kaayena pho.t.thabba.m phusitvaa... manasaa dhamma.m vi~n~naaya na nimittaggaahii hoti naanubya~njanaggaahii. yatvaadhikara.namena.m manindriya.m asa.mvuta.m viharanta.m abhijjhaadomanassaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa anvaassaveyyu.m tassa sa.mvaraaya pa.tipajjati, rakkhati ^a^P1.0181^ea^ manindriya.m, manindriye sa.mvara.m aapajjati. so iminaa ariyena indriyasa.mvarena samannaagato ajjhatta.m abyaasekasukha.m pa.tisa.mvedeti.

[03] ``so abhikkante pa.tikkante sampajaanakaarii hoti, aalokite vilokite sampajaanakaarii hoti ^a^V1.0242^ea^, sami~njite pasaarite sampajaanakaarii hoti, sa.mghaa.tipattaciivaradhaara.ne sampajaanakaarii hoti, asite piite ^a^M1.0239^ea^ khaayite saayite sampajaanakaarii hoti, uccaarapassaavakamme sampajaanakaarii hoti, gate .thite nisinne sutte jaagarite bhaasite tu.nhiibhaave ^a^T1.0345^ea^ sampajaanakaarii hoti.

[03] 296^b^.^eb^ ``so iminaa ca ariyena siilakkhandhena samannaagato, (imaaya ca ariyaaya santu.t.thiyaa samannaagato) {( ) etthantare paa.tho idha nadissati, catukka"nguttare pana imasmi.m .thaane dissati, a.t.thakathaa.tiikaasu ca tadattho pakaasito. tasmaa so ettha pa.tiipuurito} iminaa ca ariyena indriyasa.mvarena samannaagato, iminaa ca ariyena satisampaja~n~nena samannaagato vivitta.m senaasana.m bhajati ara~n~na.m rukkhamuula.m pabbata.m kandara.m giriguha.m susaana.m vanapattha.m abbhokaasa.m palaalapu~nja.m. so pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkanto nisiidati palla"nka.m aabhujitvaa, uju.m kaaya.m pa.nidhaaya, parimukha.m sati.m upa.t.thapetvaa. so abhijjha.m loke pahaaya vigataabhijjhena cetasaa viharati, abhijjhaaya citta.m parisodheti. byaapaadappadosa.m pahaaya abyaapannacitto viharati, sabbapaa.nabhuutahitaanukampii byaapaadappadosaa citta.m parisodheti. thinamiddha.m pahaaya vigatathinamiddho viharati aalokasa~n~nii sato sampajaano, thinamiddhaa citta.m parisodheti. uddhaccakukkucca.m pahaaya anuddhato viharati, ajjhatta.m vuupasantacitto uddhaccakukkuccaa citta.m parisodheti. vicikiccha.m pahaaya ti.n.navicikiccho viharati akatha.mkathii kusalesu dhammesu, vicikicchaaya citta.m parisodheti.

[03] 297^b^.^eb^ ``so ime pa~nca niivara.ne pahaaya cetaso upakkilese pa~n~naaya dubbaliikara.ne, vivicceva kaamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. idampi vuccati, braahma.na, tathaagatapada.m itipi, tathaagatanisevita.m itipi, tathaagataara~njita.m itipi. na tveva taava ariyasaavako ni.t.tha.m gacchati -- `sammaasambuddho ^a^T1.0346^ea^ bhagavaa, svaakkhaato bhagavataa dhammo, suppa.tipanno bhagavato saavakasa"ngho'ti.

[03] ``puna capara.m, braahma.na, bhikkhu vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa ajjhatta.m sampasaadana.m cetaso ekodibhaava.m avitakka.m avicaara.m samaadhija.m piitisukha.m dutiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. idampi vuccati, braahma.na...pe0... ^a^P1.0182^ea^ suppa.tipanno bhagavato saavakasa"ngho'ti.

[03] ``puna ^a^M1.0240^ea^ capara.m, braahma.na, bhikkhu piitiyaa ca viraagaa upekkhako ca viharati sato ca sampajaano, sukha~nca kaayena pa.tisa.mvedeti, ya.m ta.m ariyaa aacikkhanti `upekkhako satimaa sukhavihaarii'ti ^a^V1.0243^ea^ tatiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. idampi vuccati, braahma.na...pe0... suppa.tipanno bhagavato saavakasa"ngho'ti.

[03] ``puna capara.m, braahma.na, bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahaanaa dukkhassa ca pahaanaa, pubbeva somanassadomanassaana.m attha"ngamaa, adukkhamasukha.m upekkhaasatipaarisuddhi.m catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. idampi vuccati, braahma.na, tathaagatapada.m itipi, tathaagatanisevita.m itipi, tathaagataara~njita.m itipi. na tveva taava ariyasaavako ni.t.tha.m gacchati -- `sammaasambuddho bhagavaa, svaakkhaato bhagavataa dhammo, suppa.tipanno bhagavato saavakasa"ngho'ti.

[03] 298^b^.^eb^ ``so eva.m samaahite citte parisuddhe pariyodaate ana"nga.ne vigatuupakkilese mudubhuute kammaniye .thite aane~njappatte pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.naaya citta.m abhininnaameti. so anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarati, seyyathida.m -- ekampi jaati.m, dvepi jaatiyo...pe0... iti saakaara.m sauddesa.m anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarati. idampi vuccati, braahma.na, tathaagatapada.m itipi, tathaagatanisevita.m itipi, tathaagataara~njita.m itipi. na tveva taava ariyasaavako ni.t.tha.m gacchati -- `sammaasambuddho bhagavaa, svaakkhaato bhagavataa dhammo, suppa.tipanno bhagavato saavakasa"ngho'ti.

[03] ``so ^a^P1.0183^ea^ eva.m samaahite citte parisuddhe pariyodaate ana"nga.ne vigatuupakkilese mudubhuute kammaniye .thite aane~njappatte sattaana.m cutuupapaata~naa.naaya citta.m abhininnaameti. so dibbena cakkhunaa ^a^T1.0347^ea^ visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena...pe0... yathaakammuupage satte pajaanaati. idampi vuccati, braahma.na, tathaagatapada.m itipi, tathaagatanisevita.m itipi, tathaagataara~njita.m itipi. na tveva taava ariyasaavako ni.t.tha.m gacchati -- `sammaasambuddho bhagavaa, svaakkhaato bhagavataa dhammo, suppa.tipanno bhagavato saavakasa"ngho'ti.

[03] 299^b^.^eb^ ``so eva.m samaahite citte parisuddhe pariyodaate ana"nga.ne vigatuupakkilese mudubhuute kammaniye .thite aane~njappatte aasavaana.m khaya~naa.naaya ^a^M1.0241^ea^ citta.m abhininnaameti. so `ida.m dukkha'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m dukkhasamudayo'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m dukkhanirodho'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. `ime aasavaa'ti ^a^V1.0244^ea^ yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m aasavasamudayo'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m aasavanirodho'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m aasavanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. idampi vuccati, braahma.na, tathaagatapada.m itipi, tathaagatanisevita.m itipi, tathaagataara~njita.m itipi. na tveva taava ariyasaavako ni.t.tha.m gato hoti, api ca kho ni.t.tha.m gacchati -- `sammaasambuddho bhagavaa, svaakkhaato bhagavataa dhammo, suppa.tipanno bhagavato saavakasa"ngho'ti.

[03] ``tassa eva.m jaanato eva.m passato kaamaasavaapi citta.m vimuccati ^a^P1.0184^ea^, bhavaasavaapi citta.m vimuccati, avijjaasavaapi citta.m vimuccati. vimuttasmi.m vimuttamiti ~naa.na.m hoti. `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti ^a^T1.0348^ea^ pajaanaati. idampi vuccati, braahma.na, tathaagatapada.m itipi, tathaagatanisevita.m itipi, tathaagataara~njita.m itipi. ettaavataa kho, braahma.na, ariyasaavako ni.t.tha.m gato hoti -- `sammaasambuddho bhagavaa, svaakkhaato bhagavataa dhammo, suppa.tipanno bhagavato saavakasa"ngho'ti. ettaavataa kho, braahma.na, hatthipadopamo vitthaarena paripuuro hotii''ti.

[03] eva.m vutte, jaa.nusso.ni braahma.no bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``abhikkanta.m, bho gotama, abhikkanta.m, bho gotama! seyyathaapi, bho gotama, nikkujjita.m vaa ukkujjeyya, pa.ticchanna.m vaa vivareyya, muu.lhassa vaa magga.m aacikkheyya, andhakaare vaa telapajjota.m dhaareyya -- cakkhumanto ruupaani dakkhantiiti; evameva.m bhotaa gotamena anekapariyaayena dhammo pakaasito. esaaha.m bhavanta.m gotama.m sara.na.m gacchaami, dhamma~nca, bhikkhusa"ngha~nca. upaasaka.m ma.m bhava.m gotamo dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gata''nti.
[06] cuu.lahatthipadopamasutta.m ni.t.thita.m sattama.m.

[03] 300^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^M1.0242^ea^ ^a^V1.0245^ea^ ^a^T1.0349^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tatra kho aayasmaa saariputto bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``aavuso bhikkhave''ti. ``aavuso''ti kho te bhikkhuu aayasmato saariputtassa paccassosu.m. aayasmaa saariputto etadavoca -- ``seyyathaapi, aavuso, yaani kaanici ja"ngalaana.m paa.naana.m padajaataani sabbaani taani hatthipade samodhaana.m gacchanti, hatthipada.m tesa.m aggamakkhaayati yadida.m mahantattena; evameva kho, aavuso, ye keci kusalaa dhammaa sabbete catuusu ariyasaccesu sa"ngaha.m gacchanti. katamesu catuusu? dukkhe ariyasacce ^a^P1.0185^ea^, dukkhasamudaye ariyasacce, dukkhanirodhe ariyasacce, dukkhanirodhagaaminiyaa pa.tipadaaya ariyasacce''.

[03] 301^b^.^eb^ ``katama~ncaavuso, dukkha.m ariyasacca.m? jaatipi dukkhaa, jaraapi dukkhaa, mara.nampi dukkha.m, sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaapi dukkhaa, yampiccha.m na labhati tampi dukkha.m; sa.mkhittena, pa~ncupaadaanakkhandhaa dukkhaa. katame caavuso, pa~ncupaadaanakkhandhaa? seyyathida.m -- ruupupaadaanakkhandho, vedanupaadaanakkhandho, sa~n~nupaadaanakkhandho, sa"nkhaarupaadaanakkhandho, vi~n~naa.nupaadaanakkhandho.
[03] ``katamo caavuso, ruupupaadaanakkhandho? cattaari ca mahaabhuutaani, catunna~nca mahaabhuutaana.m upaadaaya ruupa.m.
[03] ``katamaa caavuso, cattaaro mahaabhuutaa? pathaviidhaatu, aapodhaatu ^a^T1.0350^ea^, tejodhaatu, vaayodhaatu.

[03] 302^b^.^eb^ ``katamaa caavuso, pathaviidhaatu? pathaviidhaatu siyaa ajjhattikaa, siyaa baahiraa. katamaa caavuso, ajjhattikaa pathaviidhaatu? ya.m ajjhatta.m paccatta.m kakkha.la.m kharigata.m upaadinna.m, seyyathida.m -- kesaa lomaa nakhaa dantaa taco ma.msa.m nhaaru a.t.thi a.t.thimi~nja.m vakka.m hadaya.m yakana.m kilomaka.m pihaka.m papphaasa.m anta.m antagu.na.m udariya.m kariisa.m, ya.m vaa pana~n~nampi ki~nci ajjhatta.m ^a^V1.0246^ea^ paccatta.m kakkha.la.m kharigata.m upaadinna.m. aya.m vuccataavuso, ajjhattikaa pathaviidhaatu. yaa ceva kho pana ajjhattikaa pathaviidhaatu, yaa ca baahiraa pathaviidhaatu, pathaviidhaaturevesaa. `ta.m neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti -- evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya da.t.thabba.m. evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya disvaa pathaviidhaatuyaa nibbindati, pathaviidhaatuyaa citta.m viraajeti.

[03] ``hoti ^a^M1.0243^ea^ kho so, aavuso, samayo ya.m baahiraa aapodhaatu pakuppati {pathaviidhaatu pakuppati (ka0)}. antarahitaa tasmi.m samaye baahiraa pathaviidhaatu hoti. tassaa hi naama, aavuso, baahiraaya pathaviidhaatuyaa taava mahallikaaya aniccataa pa~n~naayissati, khayadhammataa pa~n~naayissati, vayadhammataa pa~n~naayissati, vipari.naamadhammataa pa~n~naayissati. ki.m panimassa matta.t.thakassa kaayassa ta.nhupaadinnassa `ahanti vaa mamanti vaa asmii'ti vaa? atha khvaassa notevettha hoti.

[01] ``ta~nce, aavuso, bhikkhu.m pare akkosanti paribhaasanti rosenti vihesenti, so eva.m pajaanaati -- `uppannaa kho me aya.m sotasamphassajaa dukkhavedanaa ^a^T1.0351^ea^. saa ca kho pa.ticca, no apa.ticca. ki.m pa.ticca? phassa.m ^a^P1.0186^ea^ pa.ticca'. so {sopikho (syaa0), sopi (ka0)} phasso aniccoti passati, vedanaa aniccaati passati, sa~n~naa aniccaati passati, sa"nkhaaraa aniccaati passati, vi~n~naa.na.m aniccanti passati. tassa dhaataaramma.nameva citta.m pakkhandati pasiidati santi.t.thati adhimuccati.

[01] ``ta~nce, aavuso, bhikkhu.m pare ani.t.thehi akantehi amanaapehi samudaacaranti -- paa.nisamphassenapi le.d.dusamphassenapi da.n.dasamphassenapi satthasamphassenapi. so eva.m pajaanaati -- `tathaabhuuto kho aya.m kaayo yathaabhuutasmi.m kaaye paa.nisamphassaapi kamanti, le.d.dusamphassaapi kamanti, da.n.dasamphassaapi kamanti, satthasamphassaapi kamanti. vutta.m kho paneta.m bhagavataa kakacuupamovaade -- ``ubhatoda.n.dakena cepi, bhikkhave, kakacena coraa ocarakaa a"ngama"ngaani okanteyyu.m, tatraapi yo mano paduuseyya na me so tena saasanakaro''ti. aaraddha.m kho pana me viiriya.m bhavissati asalliina.m, upa.t.thitaa sati asammu.t.thaa, passaddho kaayo asaaraddho, samaahita.m citta.m ekagga.m. kaama.m daani imasmi.m kaaye paa.nisamphassaapi kamantu, le.d.dusamphassaapi kamantu, da.n.dasamphassaapi kamantu, satthasamphassaapi kamantu, kariiyati hida.m buddhaana.m saasana'nti.

[03] ``tassa ce, aavuso, bhikkhuno eva.m buddha.m anussarato eva.m dhamma.m anussarato eva.m sa"ngha.m ^a^V1.0247^ea^ anussarato upekkhaa kusalanissitaa na sa.n.thaati. so tena ^a^T1.0352^ea^ sa.mvijjati sa.mvega.m aapajjati -- `alaabhaa vata me, na vata ^a^M1.0244^ea^ me laabhaa, dulladdha.m vata me, na vata me suladdha.m, yassa me eva.m buddha.m anussarato, eva.m dhamma.m anussarato, eva.m sa"ngha.m anussarato, upekkhaa kusalanissitaa na sa.n.thaatii'ti. seyyathaapi, aavuso, su.nisaa sasura.m disvaa sa.mvijjati sa.mvega.m aapajjati; evameva kho, aavuso, tassa ce bhikkhuno eva.m buddha.m anussarato, eva.m dhamma.m anussarato, eva.m sa"ngha.m anussarato, upekkhaa kusalanissitaa na sa.n.thaati, so tena sa.mvijjati sa.mvega.m aapajjati -- `alaabhaa vata me na vata me laabhaa, dulladdha.m vata me, na vata me suladdha.m, yassa me eva.m buddha.m anussarato eva.m dhamma.m anussarato, eva.m sa"ngha.m anussarato, upekkhaa kusalanissitaa na sa.n.thaatii'ti. tassa ce, aavuso, bhikkhuno eva.m buddha.m anussarato, eva.m dhamma.m anussarato, eva.m sa"ngha.m anussarato upekkhaa kusalanissitaa sa.n.thaati, so tena attamano ^a^P1.0187^ea^ hoti. ettaavataapi kho, aavuso, bhikkhuno bahukata.m hoti.

[03] 303^b^.^eb^ ``katamaa caavuso, aapodhaatu? aapodhaatu siyaa ajjhattikaa, siyaa baahiraa. katamaa caavuso ajjhattikaa aapodhaatu? ya.m ajjhatta.m paccatta.m aapo aapogata.m upaadinna.m, seyyathida.m -- pitta.m semha.m pubbo lohita.m sedo medo assu vasaa khe.lo si"nghaa.nikaa lasikaa mutta.m, ya.m vaa pana~n~nampi ki~nci ajjhatta.m paccatta.m aapo aapogata.m upaadinna.m -- aya.m vuccataavuso, ajjhattikaa aapodhaatu. yaa ^a^T1.0353^ea^ ceva kho pana ajjhattikaa aapodhaatu yaa ca baahiraa aapodhaatu, aapodhaaturevesaa. `ta.m neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya da.t.thabba.m. evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya disvaa aapodhaatuyaa nibbindati, aapodhaatuyaa citta.m viraajeti.

[03] ``hoti kho so, aavuso, samayo ya.m baahiraa aapodhaatu pakuppati. saa gaamampi vahati, nigamampi vahati, nagarampi vahati, janapadampi vahati, janapadapadesampi vahati. hoti kho so, aavuso, samayo ya.m mahaasamudde yojanasatikaanipi udakaani ogacchanti, dviyojanasatikaanipi udakaani ogacchanti, tiyojanasatikaanipi udakaani ogacchanti, catuyojanasatikaanipi udakaani ogacchanti, pa~ncayojanasatikaanipi udakaani ogacchanti, chayojanasatikaanipi udakaani ogacchanti, sattayojanasatikaanipi udakaani ogacchanti. hoti kho so, aavuso, samayo ya.m mahaasamudde ^a^M1.0245^ea^ sattataalampi udaka.m sa.n.thaati, chattaalampi udaka.m ^a^V1.0248^ea^ sa.n.thaati, pa~ncataalampi udaka.m sa.n.thaati, catuttaalampi udaka.m sa.n.thaati, titaalampi udaka.m sa.n.thaati, dvitaalampi udaka.m sa.n.thaati, taalamattampi {taala.mpi (sii0)} udaka.m sa.n.thaati. hoti kho so, aavuso, samayo ya.m mahaasamudde sattaporisampi udaka.m sa.n.thaati, chapporisampi udaka.m sa.n.thaati, pa~ncaporisampi udaka.m sa.n.thaati, catupporisampi udaka.m sa.n.thaati, tiporisampi udaka.m sa.n.thaati, dviporisampi udaka.m sa.n.thaati, porisamattampi {porisa.mpi (sii0)} udaka.m sa.n.thaati. hoti kho so, aavuso, samayo ya.m mahaasamudde ^a^T1.0354^ea^ a.d.dhaporisampi udaka.m sa.n.thaati, ka.timattampi udaka.m sa.n.thaati, jaa.nukamattampi udaka.m sa.n.thaati, gopphakamattampi udaka.m sa.n.thaati. hoti kho so, aavuso, samayo, ya.m mahaasamudde a"ngulipabbatemanamattampi udaka.m na hoti. tassaa hi naama, aavuso, baahiraaya aapodhaatuyaa taava mahallikaaya aniccataa ^a^P1.0188^ea^ pa~n~naayissati, khayadhammataa pa~n~naayissati, vayadhammataa pa~n~naayissati, vipari.naamadhammataa pa~n~naayissati. ki.m panimassa matta.t.thakassa kaayassa ta.nhupaadinnassa `ahanti vaa mamanti vaa asmiiti' vaa? atha khvaassa notevettha hoti...pe0... tassa ce, aavuso, bhikkhuno eva.m buddha.m anussarato, eva.m dhamma.m anussarato, eva.m sa"ngha.m anussarato upekkhaa kusalanissitaa sa.n.thaati. so tena attamano hoti. ettaavataapi kho, aavuso, bhikkhuno bahukata.m hoti.

[03] 304^b^.^eb^ ``katamaa caavuso, tejodhaatu? tejodhaatu siyaa ajjhattikaa, siyaa baahiraa. katamaa caavuso, ajjhattikaa tejodhaatu? ya.m ajjhatta.m paccatta.m tejo tejogata.m upaadinna.m, seyyathida.m -- yena ca santappati, yena ca jiiriiyati, yena ca pari.dayhati, yena ca asitapiitakhaayitasaayita.m sammaa pari.naama.m gacchati, ya.m vaa pana~n~nampi ki~nci ajjhatta.m paccatta.m tejo tejogata.m upaadinna.m -- aya.m vuccataavuso, ajjhattikaa tejodhaatu. yaa ceva kho pana ajjhattikaa tejodhaatu yaa ca baahiraa tejodhaatu, tejodhaaturevesaa. `ta.m neta.m mama ^a^T1.0355^ea^, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya da.t.thabba.m. evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya disvaa tejodhaatuyaa nibbindati, tejodhaatuyaa citta.m viraajeti.

[03] ``hoti ^a^M1.0246^ea^ kho so, aavuso, samayo ya.m baahiraa tejodhaatu pakuppati. saa gaamampi dahati, nigamampi dahati, nagarampi dahati, janapadampi dahati, janapadapadesampi dahati. saa haritanta.m vaa panthanta.m vaa selanta.m vaa udakanta.m vaa rama.niiya.m vaa bhuumibhaaga.m aagamma anaahaaraa nibbaayati. hoti kho so, aavuso, samayo ya.m kukku.tapattenapi nhaarudaddulenapi aggi.m gavesanti ^a^V1.0249^ea^. tassaa hi naama, aavuso, baahiraaya tejodhaatuyaa taava mahallikaaya aniccataa pa~n~naayissati, khayadhammataa pa~n~naayissati, vayadhammataa pa~n~naayissati, vipari.naamadhammataa pa~n~naayissati. ki.m panimassa matta.t.thakassa kaayassa ta.nhupaadinnassa `ahanti vaa mamanti vaa asmii'ti vaa? atha khvaassa notevettha hoti...pe0... tassa ce, aavuso, bhikkhuno eva.m buddha.m anussarato eva.m dhamma.m anussarato eva.m sa"ngha.m anussarato upekkhaa kusalanissitaa sa.n.thaati, so tena attamano hoti. ettaavataapi kho, aavuso, bhikkhuno bahukata.m hoti.

[03] 305^b^.^eb^ ``katamaa caavuso, vaayodhaatu? vaayodhaatu siyaa ajjhattikaa, siyaa baahiraa. katamaa caavuso, ajjhattikaa vaayodhaatu? ya.m ajjhatta.m paccatta.m vaayo vaayogata.m upaadinna.m, seyyathida.m -- uddha"ngamaa vaataa, adhogamaa vaataa, kucchisayaa vaataa, ko.t.thaasayaa {ko.t.thasayaa (sii0 pii0)} vaataa, a"ngama"ngaanusaarino ^a^T1.0356^ea^ vaataa, assaaso passaaso iti, ya.m vaa pana~n~nampi ki~nci ajjhatta.m paccatta.m vaayo vaayogata.m upaadinna.m -- aya.m vuccataavuso, ajjhattikaa vaayodhaatu. yaa ceva kho pana ajjhattikaa vaayodhaatu, yaa ca baahiraa vaayodhaatu, vaayodhaaturevesaa. `ta.m neta.m mama nesohamasmi na meso attaa'ti evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya da.t.thabba.m. evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya disvaa vaayodhaatuyaa nibbindati vaayodhaatuyaa citta.m viraajeti.

[01] ``hoti ^a^P1.0189^ea^ kho so, aavuso, samayo ya.m baahiraa vaayodhaatu pakuppati. saa gaamampi vahati, nigamampi vahati, nagarampi vahati, janapadampi vahati, janapadapadesampi vahati. hoti kho so, aavuso, samayo ya.m gimhaana.m pacchime maase taalava.n.tenapi vidhuupanenapi vaata.m pariyesanti, ossavanepi ^a^M1.0247^ea^ ti.naani na icchanti. tassaa hi naama, aavuso, baahiraaya vaayodhaatuyaa taava mahallikaaya aniccataa pa~n~naayissati, khayadhammataa pa~n~naayissati, vayadhammataa pa~n~naayissati, vipari.naamadhammataa pa~n~naayissati. ki.m panimassa matta.t.thakassa kaayassa ta.nhupaadinnassa `ahanti vaa mamanti vaa asmii'ti vaa? atha khvaassa notevettha hoti.

[01] ``ta~nce, aavuso, bhikkhu.m pare akkosanti paribhaasanti rosenti vihesenti. so eva.m pajaanaati, uppannaa kho me aya.m sotasamphassajaa dukkhaa vedanaa. saa ca kho pa.ticca, no apa.ticca. ki.m pa.ticca? phassa.m pa.ticca. sopi phasso aniccoti passati, vedanaa aniccaati ^a^T1.0357^ea^ passati ^a^V1.0250^ea^, sa~n~naa aniccaati passati, sa"nkhaaraa aniccaati passati, vi~n~naa.na.m aniccanti passati. tassa dhaataaramma.nameva citta.m pakkhandati pasiidati santi.t.thati adhimuccati.

[01] ``ta~nce, aavuso, bhikkhu.m pare ani.t.thehi akantehi amanaapehi samudaacaranti, paa.nisamphassenapi le.d.dusamphassenapi da.n.dasamphassenapi satthasamphassenapi. so eva.m pajaanaati `tathaabhuuto kho aya.m kaayo yathaabhuutasmi.m kaaye paa.nisamphassaapi kamanti, le.d.dusamphassaapi kamanti, da.n.dasamphassaapi kamanti, satthasamphassaapi kamanti. vutta.m kho paneta.m bhagavataa kakacuupamovaade ``ubhatoda.n.dakena cepi, bhikkhave, kakacena coraa ocarakaa a"ngama"ngaani okanteyyu.m. tatraapi yo mano paduuseyya, na me so tena saasanakaro''ti. aaraddha.m kho pana me viiriya.m bhavissati asalliina.m, upa.t.thitaa sati asammu.t.thaa, passaddho kaayo asaaraddho, samaahita.m citta.m ekagga.m. kaama.m daani imasmi.m kaaye paa.nisamphassaapi kamantu, le.d.dusamphassaapi kamantu, da.n.dasamphassaapi kamantu, satthasamphassaapi kamantu. kariiyati hida.m buddhaana.m saasana'nti.

[03] 306^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, aavuso, ka.t.tha~nca pa.ticca valli~nca pa.ticca ti.na~nca pa.ticca mattika~nca pa.ticca aakaaso parivaarito agaara.m tveva sa"nkha.m gacchati; evameva kho, aavuso, a.t.thi~nca ^a^V1.0251^ea^ pa.ticca nhaaru~nca pa.ticca ma.msa~nca pa.ticca camma~nca pa.ticca aakaaso parivaarito ruupa.m tveva sa"nkha.m gacchati. ajjhattika~nceva, aavuso, cakkhu.m aparibhinna.m hoti, baahiraa ca ruupaa na aapaatha.m aagacchanti, no ca tajjo samannaahaaro hoti, neva taava tajjassa vi~n~naa.nabhaagassa paatubhaavo hoti. ajjhattika~nceva {ajjhattika~nce (sii0 syaa0 pii0), ajjhattika~ncepi (?)}, aavuso, cakkhu.m aparibhinna.m hoti baahiraa ca ruupaa aapaatha.m aagacchanti, no ca tajjo samannaahaaro hoti, neva ^a^T1.0359^ea^ taava tajjassa vi~n~naa.nabhaagassa paatubhaavo hoti. yato ca kho, aavuso, ajjhattika~nceva cakkhu.m aparibhinna.m hoti, baahiraa ca ruupaa aapaatha.m aagacchanti, tajjo ca samannaahaaro hoti. eva.m tajjassa vi~n~naa.nabhaagassa paatubhaavo hoti. ya.m tathaabhuutassa ruupa.m ta.m ruupupaadaanakkhandhe sa"ngaha.m gacchati, yaa tathaabhuutassa vedanaa saa vedanupaadaanakkhandhe sa"ngaha.m gacchati, yaa tathaabhuutassa sa~n~naa saa sa~n~nupaadaanakkhandhe sa"ngaha.m gacchati, ye tathaabhuutassa sa"nkhaaraa te sa"nkhaarupaadaanakkhandhe sa"ngaha.m gacchanti, ya.m tathaabhuutassa vi~n~naa.na.m ta.m vi~n~naa.nupaadaanakkhandhe sa"ngaha.m gacchati.

[03] ``so eva.m pajaanaati -- `eva~nhi kira imesa.m pa~ncanna.m upaadaanakkhandhaana.m sa"ngaho sannipaato samavaayo hoti. vutta.m kho paneta.m bhagavataa -- `yo pa.ticcasamuppaada.m passati ^a^P1.0191^ea^ so dhamma.m passati; yo dhamma.m passati so pa.ticcasamuppaada.m passatiiti. pa.ticcasamuppannaa kho panime yadida.m pa~ncupaadaanakkhandhaa. yo imesu pa~ncasu ^a^M1.0249^ea^ upaadaanakkhandhesu chando aalayo anunayo ajjhosaana.m so dukkhasamudayo. yo imesu pa~ncasu upaadaanakkhandhesu chandaraagavinayo chandaraagappahaana.m, so dukkhanirodho'ti. ettaavataapi kho, aavuso, bhikkhuno bahukata.m hoti.

[03] ``ajjhattika~nceva, aavuso, sota.m aparibhinna.m hoti...pe0... ghaana.m aparibhinna.m hoti... jivhaa aparibhinnaa hoti... kaayo aparibhinno hoti... mano aparibhinno hoti, baahiraa ca dhammaa na aapaatha.m aagacchanti ^a^T1.0360^ea^ no ca tajjo samannaahaaro hoti, neva taava tajjassa vi~n~naa.nabhaagassa paatubhaavo hoti. ajjhattiko ceva, aavuso, mano aparibhinno hoti, baahiraa ca dhammaa aapaatha.m aagacchanti, no ca tajjo samannaahaaro hoti, neva taava tajjassa vi~n~naa.nabhaagassa paatubhaavo hoti. yato ca kho, aavuso, ajjhattiko ceva mano aparibhinno hoti, baahiraa ca dhammaa aapaatha.m aagacchanti, tajjo ca samannaahaaro hoti, eva.m tajjassa vi~n~naa.nabhaagassa paatubhaavo hoti. ya.m tathaabhuutassa ruupa.m ta.m ruupupaadaanakkhandhe sa"ngaha.m gacchati, yaa tathaabhuutassa vedanaa saa vedanupaadaanakkhandhe sa"ngaha.m gacchati, yaa tathaabhuutassa sa~n~naa ^a^V1.0252^ea^ saa sa~n~nupaadaanakkhandhe sa"ngaha.m gacchati, ye tathaabhuutassa sa"nkhaaraa te sa"nkhaarupaadaanakkhandhe sa"ngaha.m gacchanti, ya.m tathaabhuutassa vi~n~naa.na.m ta.m vi~n~naa.nupaadaanakkhandhe sa"ngaha.m gacchati. so eva.m pajaanaati -- `eva~nhi kira imesa.m pa~ncanna.m upaadaanakkhandhaana.m sa"ngaho sannipaato samavaayo hoti. vutta.m kho paneta.m bhagavataa -- ``yo pa.ticcasamuppaada.m passati so dhamma.m passati; yo dhamma.m passati so pa.ticcasamuppaada.m passatii''ti. pa.ticcasamuppannaa kho panime yadida.m pa~ncupaadaanakkhandhaa. yo imesu pa~ncasu upaadaanakkhandhesu chando aalayo anunayo ajjhosaana.m so dukkhasamudayo. yo imesu pa~ncasu upaadaanakkhandhesu chandaraagavinayo chandaraagappahaana.m so dukkhanirodho'ti. ettaavataapi kho, aavuso, bhikkhuno bahukata.m hotii''ti.

[03] ``idha, bhikkhave, ekacco kulaputto saddhaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito hoti -- `oti.n.nomhi jaatiyaa jaraaya mara.nena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upaayaasehi, dukkhoti.n.no dukkhapareto, appeva naama imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyaa pa~n~naayethaa'ti. so eva.m pabbajito samaano laabhasakkaarasiloka.m abhinibbatteti. so tena laabhasakkaarasilokena attamano hoti paripu.n.nasa"nkappo. so tena laabhasakkaarasilokena attaanukka.mseti para.m vambheti -- `ahamasmi laabhasakkaarasilokavaa {laabhii silokavaa (sii0 pii0), laabhii sakkaara silokavaa (syaa0)}, ime pana~n~ne bhikkhuu appa~n~naataa appesakkhaa'ti. so tena laabhasakkaarasilokena majjati pamajjati pamaada.m aapajjati, pamatto samaano dukkha.m viharati.
