[03] 312^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T1.0374^ea^ ^a^V1.0261^ea^ ^a^P1.0198^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. atha kho pi"ngalakoccho braahma.no yena ^a^M1.0258^ea^ bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho pi"ngalakoccho braahma.no bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``yeme, bho gotama, sama.nabraahma.naa sa"nghino ga.nino ga.naacariyaa ~naataa yasassino titthakaraa saadhusammataa, bahujanassa, seyyathida.m -- puura.no kassapo, makkhali gosaalo, ajito kesakambalo, pakudho kaccaayano, sa~ncayo {sa~njayo (sii0 syaa0 pii0 ka0)} bela.t.thaputto, niga.n.tho naa.taputto, sabbete sakaaya pa.ti~n~naaya abbha~n~na.msu sabbeva naabbha~n~na.msu, udaahu ekacce abbha~n~na.msu ekacce naabbha~n~na.msuu''ti? ``ala.m, braahma.na, ti.t.thateta.m -- sabbete sakaaya pa.ti~n~naaya abbha~n~na.msu sabbeva naabbha~n~na.msu, udaahu ekacce abbha~n~na.msu ekacce naabbha~n~na.msuuti. dhamma.m te, braahma.na, desessaami, ta.m su.naahi, saadhuka.m manasi karohi, bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bho''ti kho pi"ngalakoccho braahma.no bhagavato paccassosi. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] 313^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, braahma.na, puriso saaratthiko saaragavesii saarapariyesana.m caramaano mahato rukkhassa ti.t.thato saaravato atikkammeva saara.m atikkamma pheggu.m atikkamma taca.m ^a^T1.0375^ea^ atikkamma papa.tika.m, saakhaapalaasa.m chetvaa aadaaya pakkameyya `saara'nti ma~n~namaano. tamena.m cakkhumaa puriso disvaa eva.m vadeyya -- `na vataaya.m bhava.m puriso a~n~naasi saara.m, na a~n~naasi pheggu.m, na a~n~naasi taca.m, na a~n~naasi papa.tika.m, na a~n~naasi saakhaapalaasa.m. tathaa haya.m bhava.m puriso saaratthiko saaragavesii saarapariyesana.m caramaano mahato rukkhassa ti.t.thato saaravato atikkammeva saara.m atikkamma pheggu.m atikkamma taca.m atikkamma papa.tika.m, saakhaapalaasa.m chetvaa aadaaya pakkanto `saara'nti ma~n~namaano. ya~ncassa saarena saarakara.niiya.m ta~ncassa attha.m naanubhavissatii'ti.

[03] 314^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi vaa pana, braahma.na, puriso saaratthiko saaragavesii saarapariyesana.m caramaano ^a^V1.0262^ea^ mahato rukkhassa ti.t.thato saaravato atikkammeva saara.m atikkamma pheggu.m atikkamma taca.m ^a^P1.0199^ea^, papa.tika.m chetvaa aadaaya ^a^M1.0259^ea^ pakkameyya `saara'nti ma~n~namaano. tamena.m cakkhumaa puriso disvaa eva.m vadeyya -- `na vataaya.m bhava.m puriso a~n~naasi saara.m, na a~n~naasi pheggu.m, na a~n~naasi taca.m, na a~n~naasi papa.tika.m, na a~n~naasi saakhaapalaasa.m. tathaa haya.m bhava.m puriso saaratthiko saaragavesii saarapariyesana.m caramaano mahato rukkhassa ti.t.thato saaravato atikkammeva saara.m atikkamma pheggu.m atikkamma taca.m papa.tika.m chetvaa aadaaya pakkanto `saara'nti ma~n~namaano. ya~ncassa saarena saarakara.niiya.m ta~ncassa attha.m naanubhavissatii'ti.

[03] 315^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi vaa pana, braahma.na, puriso saaratthiko saaragavesii saarapariyesana.m caramaano mahato rukkhassa ti.t.thato ^a^T1.0376^ea^ saaravato atikkammeva saara.m atikkamma pheggu.m, taca.m chetvaa aadaaya pakkameyya `saara'nti ma~n~namaano. tamena.m cakkhumaa puriso disvaa eva.m vadeyya -- `na vataaya.m bhava.m puriso a~n~naasi saara.m, na a~n~naasi pheggu.m, na a~n~naasi taca.m, na a~n~naasi papa.tika.m, na a~n~naasi saakhaapalaasa.m. tathaa haya.m bhava.m puriso saaratthiko saaragavesii saarapariyesana.m caramaano mahato rukkhassa ti.t.thato saaravato atikkammeva saara.m atikkamma pheggu.m, taca.m chetvaa aadaaya pakkanto `saara'nti ma~n~namaano. ya~ncassa saarena saarakara.niiya.m ta~ncassa attha.m naanubhavissatii'ti.

[03] 316^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi vaa pana, braahma.na, puriso saaratthiko saaragavesii saarapariyesana.m caramaano mahato rukkhassa ti.t.thato saaravato atikkammeva saara.m, pheggu.m chetvaa aadaaya pakkameyya `saara'nti ma~n~namaano. tamena.m cakkhumaa puriso disvaa eva.m vadeyya -- `na vataaya.m bhava.m puriso a~n~naasi saara.m, na a~n~naasi pheggu.m, na a~n~naasi taca.m, na a~n~naasi papa.tika.m, na a~n~naasi saakhaapalaasa.m. tathaa haya.m bhava.m puriso saaratthiko saaragavesii saarapariyesana.m caramaano mahato rukkhassa ti.t.thato saaravato atikkammeva saara.m, pheggu.m chetvaa aadaaya pakkanto `saara'nti ma~n~namaano. ya~ncassa saarena saarakara.niiya.m ta~ncassa attha.m naanubhavissatii'ti.

[03] 317^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi vaa pana, braahma.na, puriso saaratthiko saaragavesii saarapariyesana.m caramaano ^a^V1.0263^ea^ mahato rukkhassa ti.t.thato saaravato saara~n~neva ^a^M1.0260^ea^ chetvaa aadaaya pakkameyya `saara'nti jaanamaano. tamena.m cakkhumaa^a^T1.0377^ea^ puriso disvaa eva.m vadeyya -- `a~n~naasi vataaya.m bhava.m puriso saara.m, a~n~naasi pheggu.m, a~n~naasi taca.m, a~n~naasi papa.tika.m, a~n~naasi saakhaapalaasa.m. tathaa haya.m bhava.m puriso saaratthiko saaragavesii saarapariyesana.m caramaano mahato rukkhassa ti.t.thato saaravato saara~n~neva chetvaa aadaaya ^a^P1.0200^ea^ pakkanto `saara'nti jaanamaano. ya~ncassa saarena saarakara.niiya.m ta~ncassa attha.m anubhavissatii'ti.

[03] 318^b^.^eb^ ``evameva kho, braahma.na, idhekacco puggalo saddhaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito hoti -- `oti.n.nomhi jaatiyaa jaraaya mara.nena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upaayaasehi, dukkhoti.n.no dukkhapareto, appeva naama imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyaa pa~n~naayethaa'ti. so eva.m pabbajito samaano laabhasakkaarasiloka.m abhinibbatteti. so tena laabhasakkaarasilokena attamano hoti paripu.n.nasa"nkappo. so tena laabhasakkaarasilokena attaanukka.mseti, para.m vambheti -- `ahamasmi laabhasakkaarasilokavaa, ime pana~n~ne bhikkhuu appa~n~naataa appesakkhaa'ti. laabhasakkaarasilokena ca ye a~n~ne dhammaa uttaritaraa ca pa.niitataraa ca tesa.m dhammaana.m sacchikiriyaaya na chanda.m janeti, na vaayamati, oliinavuttiko ca hoti saathaliko. seyyathaapi so, braahma.na, puriso saaratthiko saaragavesii saarapariyesana.m caramaano mahato rukkhassa ti.t.thato saaravato atikkammeva saara.m atikkamma pheggu.m atikkamma taca.m atikkamma papa.tika.m, saakhaapalaasa.m chetvaa ^a^T1.0378^ea^ aadaaya pakkanto `saara'nti ma~n~namaano. ya~ncassa saarena saarakara.niiya.m ta~ncassa attha.m naanubhavissati. tathuupamaaha.m, braahma.na, ima.m puggala.m vadaami.

[03] 319^b^.^eb^ ``idha pana, braahma.na, ekacco puggalo saddhaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito hoti -- `oti.n.nomhi jaatiyaa jaraaya mara.nena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upaayaasehi, dukkhoti.n.no dukkhapareto, appeva naama imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyaa pa~n~naayethaa'ti. so eva.m pabbajito samaano laabhasakkaarasiloka.m abhinibbatteti. so tena laabhasakkaarasilokena na ^a^M1.0261^ea^ attamano hoti na paripu.n.nasa"nkappo. so tena laabhasakkaarasilokena na attaanukka.mseti, na para.m vambheti. laabhasakkaarasilokena ca ye a~n~ne dhammaa uttaritaraa ca pa.niitataraa ca tesa.m dhammaana.m sacchikiriyaaya chanda.m janeti, vaayamati ^a^V1.0264^ea^, anoliinavuttiko ca hoti asaathaliko. so siilasampada.m aaraadheti. so taaya siilasampadaaya attamano hoti, paripu.n.nasa"nkappo. so taaya siilasampadaaya attaanukka.mseti, para.m vambheti -- `ahamasmi siilavaa kalyaa.nadhammo, ime pana~n~ne bhikkhuu dussiilaa paapadhammaa'ti. siilasampadaaya ca ye a~n~ne dhammaa uttaritaraa ca pa.niitataraa ca tesa.m dhammaana.m ^a^P1.0201^ea^ sacchikiriyaaya na chanda.m janeti, na vaayamati, oliinavuttiko ca hoti saathaliko. seyyathaapi so, braahma.na, puriso saaratthiko saaragavesii ^a^T1.0379^ea^ saarapariyesana.m caramaano mahato rukkhassa ti.t.thato saaravato atikkammeva saara.m atikkamma pheggu.m atikkamma taca.m, papa.tika.m chetvaa aadaaya pakkanto `saara'nti ma~n~namaano. ya~ncassa saarena saarakara.niiya.m, ta~ncassa attha.m naanubhavissati. tathuupamaaha.m, braahma.na, ima.m puggala.m vadaami.

[03] 320^b^.^eb^ ``idha pana, braahma.na, ekacco puggalo saddhaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito hoti -- `oti.n.nomhi jaatiyaa jaraaya mara.nena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upaayaasehi, dukkhoti.n.no dukkhapareto, appeva naama imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyaa pa~n~naayethaa'ti. so eva.m pabbajito samaano laabhasakkaarasiloka.m abhinibbatteti. so tena laabhasakkaarasilokena na attamano hoti, na paripu.n.nasa"nkappo. so tena laabhasakkaarasilokena na attaanukka.mseti, na para.m vambheti. laabhasakkaarasilokena ca ye a~n~ne dhammaa uttaritaraa ca pa.niitataraa ca tesa.m dhammaana.m sacchikiriyaaya chanda.m janeti, vaayamati, anoliinavuttiko ca hoti asaathaliko. so siilasampada.m aaraadheti. so taaya siilasampadaaya attamano hoti no ca kho paripu.n.nasa"nkappo. so taaya siilasampadaaya na attaanukka.mseti, na para.m vambheti. siilasampadaaya ca ye a~n~ne dhammaa uttaritaraa ca pa.niitataraa ca tesa.m dhammaana.m sacchikiriyaaya chanda.m janeti, vaayamati, anoliinavuttiko ca hoti asaathaliko ^a^M1.0262^ea^. so samaadhisampada.m aaraadheti. so taaya samaadhisampadaaya attamano hoti, paripu.n.nasa"nkappo. so taaya samaadhisampadaaya attaanukka.mseti, para.m vambheti -- `ahamasmi samaahito ekaggacitto, ime pana~n~ne bhikkhuu ^a^T1.0380^ea^ asamaahitaa vibbhantacittaa'ti. samaadhisampadaaya ca ye a~n~ne dhammaa uttaritaraa ca pa.niitataraa ca, tesa.m dhammaana.m sacchikiriyaaya na chanda.m janeti, na vaayamati, oliinavuttiko ca hoti saathaliko. seyyathaapi so, braahma.na, puriso saaratthiko saaragavesii saarapariyesana.m caramaano mahato rukkhassa ti.t.thato saaravato atikkammeva saara.m atikkamma pheggu.m, taca.m chetvaa aadaaya pakkanto `saara'nti ma~n~namaano. ya~ncassa ^a^V1.0265^ea^ saarena saarakara.niiya.m ta~ncassa attha.m naanubhavissati. tathuupamaaha.m, braahma.na, ima.m puggala.m vadaami.

[03] 322^b^.^eb^ ``idha pana, braahma.na, ekacco puggalo saddhaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito hoti -- `oti.n.nomhi jaatiyaa jaraaya mara.nena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upaayaasehi ^a^V1.0266^ea^, dukkhoti.n.no dukkhapareto ^a^T1.0382^ea^, appeva naama imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyaa pa~n~naayethaa'ti. so eva.m pabbajito samaano ^a^P1.0203^ea^ laabhasakkaarasiloka.m abhinibbatteti. so tena laabhasakkaarasilokena na attamano hoti, na paripu.n.nasa"nkappo. so tena laabhasakkaarasilokena na attaanukka.mseti, na para.m vambheti. laabhasakkaarasilokena ca ye a~n~ne dhammaa uttaritaraa ca pa.niitataraa ca tesa.m dhammaana.m sacchikiriyaaya chanda.m janeti, vaayamati, anoliinavuttiko ca hoti asaathaliko. so siilasampada.m aaraadheti. so taaya siilasampadaaya attamano hoti, no ca kho paripu.n.nasa"nkappo. so taaya siilasampadaaya na attaanukka.mseti, na para.m vambheti. siilasampadaaya ca ye a~n~ne dhammaa uttaritaraa ca pa.niitataraa ca tesa.m dhammaana.m sacchikiriyaaya chanda.m janeti, vaayamati, anoliinavuttiko ca hoti asaathaliko. so samaadhisampada.m aaraadheti. so taaya samaadhisampadaaya attamano hoti, no ca kho paripu.n.nasa"nkappo. so taaya samaadhisampadaaya na attaanukka.mseti, na para.m vambheti. samaadhisampadaaya ca ye a~n~ne dhammaa uttaritaraa ca pa.niitataraa ca tesa.m dhammaana.m sacchikiriyaaya chanda.m janeti, vaayamati, anoliinavuttiko ca hoti asaathaliko. so ~naa.nadassana.m aaraadheti. so tena ~naa.nadassanena attamano hoti, no ca kho paripu.n.nasa"nkappo. so tena ~naa.nadassanena na attaanukka.mseti, na ^a^M1.0264^ea^ para.m vambheti. ~naa.nadassanena ca ye a~n~ne dhammaa uttaritaraa ca pa.niitataraa ^a^T1.0383^ea^ ca tesa.m dhammaana.m sacchikiriyaaya chanda.m janeti, vaayamati, anoliinavuttiko ca hoti asaathaliko.

[03] 323^b^.^eb^ ``katame ca, braahma.na, dhammaa ~naa.nadassanena uttaritaraa ca pa.niitataraa ca? idha, braahma.na, bhikkhu vivicceva kaamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. ayampi kho, braahma.na, dhammo ~naa.nadassanena uttaritaro ca pa.niitataro ca.

[03] ``puna capara.m, braahma.na, bhikkhu vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa ajjhatta.m sampasaadana.m cetaso ekodibhaava.m avitakka.m avicaara.m samaadhija.m piitisukha.m dutiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. ayampi kho, braahma.na, dhammo ~naa.nadassanena uttaritaro ca pa.niitataro ca.

[03] ``puna capara.m, braahma.na, bhikkhu piitiyaa ca viraagaa upekkhako ca viharati, sato ca sampajaano ^a^V1.0267^ea^ sukha~nca kaayena pa.tisa.mvedeti, ya.m ta.m ariyaa aacikkhanti -- `upekkhako satimaa sukhavihaarii'ti tatiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. ayampi kho ^a^P1.0204^ea^, braahma.na, dhammo ~naa.nadassanena uttaritaro ca pa.niitataro ca.

[03] ``puna capara.m, braahma.na, bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahaanaa dukkhassa ca pahaanaa pubbeva somanassadomanassaana.m attha"ngamaa adukkhamasukha.m upekkhaasatipaarisuddhi.m catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. ayampi kho, braahma.na, dhammo ~naa.nadassanena uttaritaro ca pa.niitataro ca.

[01] ``puna capara.m, braahma.na, bhikkhu sabbaso ruupasa~n~naana.m samatikkamaa pa.tighasa~n~naana.m attha"ngamaa naanattasa~n~naana.m amanasikaaraa `ananto aakaaso'ti aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m upasampajja viharati. ayampi kho, braahma.na, dhammo ~naa.nadassanena uttaritaro ca pa.niitataro ca.

[03] ``puna capara.m, braahma.na, bhikkhu sabbaso aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m samatikkamma `ananta.m vi~n~naa.na'nti vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m upasampajja viharati. ayampi kho, braahma.na, dhammo ~naa.nadassanena uttaritaro ca pa.niitataro ca.

[03] ``puna capara.m, braahma.na, bhikkhu sabbaso vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m samatikkamma `natthi ki~ncii'ti aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m upasampajja viharati. ayampi kho, braahma.na, dhammo ~naa.nadassanena uttaritaro ca pa.niitataro ca.

[03] ``puna ^a^M1.0265^ea^ capara.m, braahma.na, bhikkhu sabbaso aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m samatikkamma nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m upasampajja viharati. ayampi kho, braahma.na, dhammo ~naa.nadassanena uttaritaro ca ^a^T1.0384^ea^ pa.niitataro ca.

[03] ``puna capara.m, braahma.na, bhikkhu sabbaso nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m samatikkamma sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m upasampajja viharati, pa~n~naaya cassa disvaa aasavaa parikkhii.naa honti. ayampi kho, braahma.na, dhammo ~naa.nadassanena uttaritaro ca pa.niitataro ca. ime kho, braahma.na, dhammaa ~naa.nadassanena uttaritaraa ca pa.niitataraa ca.

[03] 324^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi ^a^V1.0268^ea^ so, braahma.na, puriso saaratthiko saaragavesii saarapariyesana.m caramaano mahato rukkhassa ti.t.thato saaravato saara.myeva chetvaa aadaaya pakkanto `saara'nti jaanamaano. ya~ncassa saarena saarakara.niiya.m ta~ncassa attha.m anubhavissati. tathuupamaaha.m, braahma.na, ima.m puggala.m vadaami.

[03] ``iti kho, braahma.na, nayida.m brahmacariya.m laabhasakkaarasilokaanisa.msa.m, na siilasampadaanisa.msa.m, na samaadhisampadaanisa.msa.m, na ~naa.nadassanaanisa.msa.m. yaa ca kho aya.m ^a^P1.0205^ea^, braahma.na, akuppaa cetovimutti -- etadatthamida.m, braahma.na, brahmacariya.m, eta.m saara.m eta.m pariyosaana''nti.

[21] mo.liyaphaggunari.t.tha~nca ^a^T1.0385^ea^ naamo, andhavane kathipu.n.na.m nivaapo.
[22] raasika.nerumahaagajanaamo, saaruupamo {saaravaro (syaa0), saaravano (ka0)} puna pi"ngalakoccho..

[03] 325^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^M1.0266^ea^ ^a^V1.0269^ea^ ^a^T1.0386^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa naatike {naadike (sii0 syaa0 pii0), ~naatike (ka0)} viharati gi~njakaavasathe. tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa ca anuruddho aayasmaa ca nandiyo aayasmaa ca kimilo {kimbilo (sii0 pii0 ka0)} gosi"ngasaalavanadaaye viharanti. atha kho bhagavaa saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito yena gosi"ngasaalavanadaayo tenupasa"nkami. addasaa kho daayapaalo bhagavanta.m duuratova aagacchanta.m. disvaana bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``maa, sama.na, eta.m daaya.m paavisi. santettha tayo kulaputtaa attakaamaruupaa viharanti. maa tesa.m aphaasumakaasii''ti.

[03] assosi kho aayasmaa anuruddho daayapaalassa bhagavataa saddhi.m mantayamaanassa. sutvaana daayapaala.m etadavoca -- ``maa, aavuso daayapaala, bhagavanta.m vaaresi. satthaa no bhagavaa anuppatto''ti. atha kho aayasmaa anuruddho yenaayasmaa ca nandiyo aayasmaa ca kimilo tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta~nca nandiya.m aayasmanta~nca kimila.m etadavoca -- ``abhikkamathaayasmanto, abhikkamathaayasmanto, satthaa no bhagavaa ^a^P1.0206^ea^ anuppatto''ti. atha ^a^T1.0387^ea^ kho aayasmaa ca anuruddho aayasmaa ca nandiyo aayasmaa ca kimilo bhagavanta.m paccuggantvaa -- eko bhagavato pattaciivara.m pa.tiggahesi, eko aasana.m pa~n~napesi, eko paadodaka.m upa.t.thaapesi. nisiidi bhagavaa pa~n~natte aasane. nisajja kho bhagavaa paade pakkhaalesi. tepi kho aayasmanto bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho aayasmanta.m anuruddha.m bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] 326^b^.^eb^ ``kacci vo, anuruddhaa, khamaniiya.m, kacci yaapaniiya.m, kacci pi.n.dakena na kilamathaa''ti ^a^V1.0270^ea^? ``khamaniiya.m, bhagavaa, yaapaniiya.m, bhagavaa; na ca maya.m, bhante, pi.n.dakena kilamaamaa''ti. ``kacci pana vo, anuruddhaa, samaggaa sammodamaanaa avivadamaanaa khiirodakiibhuutaa a~n~nama~n~na.m piyacakkhuuhi sampassantaa viharathaa''ti? ``taggha maya.m ^a^M1.0267^ea^, bhante, samaggaa sammodamaanaa avivadamaanaa khiirodakiibhuutaa a~n~nama~n~na.m piyacakkhuuhi sampassantaa viharaamaa''ti. ``yathaa katha.m pana tumhe, anuruddhaa, samaggaa sammodamaanaa avivadamaanaa khiirodakiibhuutaa a~n~nama~n~na.m piyacakkhuuhi sampassantaa viharathaa''ti? ``idha mayha.m, bhante, eva.m hoti -- `laabhaa vata me, suladdha.m vata me, yoha.m evaruupehi sabrahmacaariihi saddhi.m viharaamii'ti. tassa mayha.m, bhante, imesu aayasmantesu metta.m kaayakamma.m paccupa.t.thita.m aavi ceva raho ca; metta.m vaciikamma.m paccupa.t.thita.m aavi ceva raho ca; metta.m manokamma.m paccupa.t.thita.m aavi ceva raho ca. tassa mayha.m, bhante, eva.m hoti -- `ya.mnuunaaha.m saka.m citta.m nikkhipitvaa ^a^T1.0388^ea^ imesa.myeva aayasmantaana.m cittassa vasena vatteyya'nti. so kho aha.m, bhante, saka.m citta.m nikkhipitvaa imesa.myeva aayasmantaana.m cittassa vasena vattaami. naanaa hi kho no, bhante, kaayaa eka~nca pana ma~n~ne citta''nti.

[03] aayasmaapi kho nandiyo...pe0... aayasmaapi kho kimilo bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``mayhampi, bhante, eva.m hoti -- `laabhaa vata me, suladdha.m vata me, yoha.m evaruupehi sabrahmacaariihi saddhi.m viharaamii'ti. tassa mayha.m, bhante, imesu aayasmantesu metta.m kaayakamma.m paccupa.t.thita.m aavi ceva raho ca, metta.m vaciikamma.m paccupa.t.thita.m aavi ceva raho ca, metta.m manokamma.m paccupa.t.thita.m aavi ceva raho ca. tassa mayha.m, bhante, eva.m hoti -- `ya.mnuunaaha.m saka.m ^a^P1.0207^ea^ citta.m nikkhipitvaa imesa.myeva aayasmantaana.m cittassa vasena vatteyya'nti. so kho aha.m, bhante, saka.m citta.m nikkhipitvaa imesa.myeva aayasmantaana.m cittassa vasena vattaami. naanaa hi kho no, bhante, kaayaa eka~nca pana ma~n~ne cittanti.
[03] ``eva.m kho maya.m, bhante, samaggaa sammodamaanaa avivadamaanaa khiirodakiibhuutaa a~n~nama~n~na.m piyacakkhuuhi sampassantaa viharaamaa''ti.

[03] 327^b^.^eb^ ``saadhu saadhu, anuruddhaa! kacci pana vo, anuruddhaa, appamattaa aataapino pahitattaa viharathaa''ti? ``taggha maya.m, bhante, appamattaa aataapino pahitattaa viharaamaa''ti. ``yathaa ^a^V1.0271^ea^ katha.m pana tumhe, anuruddhaa, appamattaa aataapino pahitattaa viharathaa''ti? ``idha, bhante, amhaaka.m yo pa.thama.m gaamato pi.n.daaya pa.tikkamati so aasanaani ^a^T1.0389^ea^ pa~n~napeti, paaniiya.m paribhojaniiya.m upa.t.thaapeti, avakkaarapaati.m upa.t.thaapeti. yo pacchaa gaamato ^a^M1.0268^ea^ pi.n.daaya pa.tikkamati, sace hoti bhuttaavaseso sace aaka"nkhati bhu~njati, no ce aaka"nkhati appaharite vaa cha.d.deti, appaa.nake vaa udake opilaapeti. so aasanaani pa.tisaameti, paaniiya.m paribhojaniiya.m pa.tisaameti, avakkaarapaati.m pa.tisaameti, bhattagga.m sammajjati. yo passati paaniiyagha.ta.m vaa paribhojaniiyagha.ta.m vaa vaccagha.ta.m vaa ritta.m tuccha.m so upa.t.thaapeti. sacassa hoti avisayha.m, hatthavikaarena dutiya.m aamantetvaa hatthavila"nghakena upa.t.thaapema, na tveva maya.m, bhante, tappaccayaa vaaca.m bhindaama. pa~ncaahika.m kho pana maya.m, bhante, sabbarattika.m dhammiyaa kathaaya sannisiidaama. eva.m kho maya.m, bhante, appamattaa aataapino pahitattaa viharaamaa''ti.

[03] 328^b^.^eb^ ``saadhu saadhu, anuruddhaa! atthi pana vo, anuruddhaa, eva.m appamattaana.m aataapiina.m pahitattaana.m viharantaana.m uttarimanussadhammaa alamariya~naa.nadassanaviseso adhigato phaasuvihaaro''ti? ``ki~nhi no siyaa, bhante! idha maya.m, bhante, yaavadeva aaka"nkhaama vivicceva kaamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharaama. aya.m kho no, bhante, amhaaka.m appamattaana.m aataapiina.m pahitattaana.m viharantaana.m uttarimanussadhammaa alamariya~naa.nadassanaviseso adhigato phaasuvihaaro''ti.

[03] ``saadhu saadhu, anuruddhaa! etassa ^a^T1.0390^ea^ pana vo, anuruddhaa, vihaarassa samatikkamaaya etassa vihaarassa ^a^P1.0208^ea^ pa.tippassaddhiyaa attha~n~no uttarimanussadhammaa alamariya~naa.nadassanaviseso adhigato phaasuvihaaro''ti? ``ki~nhi no siyaa, bhante! idha maya.m, bhante, yaavadeva aaka"nkhaama vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa ajjhatta.m sampasaadana.m cetaso ekodibhaava.m avitakka.m avicaara.m samaadhija.m piitisukha.m dutiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharaama. etassa, bhante, vihaarassa samatikkamaaya etassa vihaarassa pa.tippassaddhiyaa ayama~n~no uttarimanussadhammaa alamariya~naa.nadassanaviseso adhigato phaasuvihaaro''ti.

[03] ``saadhu ^a^V1.0272^ea^ saadhu, anuruddhaa! etassa pana vo, anuruddhaa, vihaarassa samatikkamaaya etassa vihaarassa pa.tippassaddhiyaa attha~n~no uttarimanussadhammaa alamariya~naa.nadassanaviseso adhigato phaasuvihaaro''ti? ``ki~nhi ^a^M1.0269^ea^ no siyaa, bhante! idha maya.m, bhante, yaavadeva aaka"nkhaama piitiyaa ca viraagaa upekkhakaa ca viharaama, sataa ca sampajaanaa, sukha~nca kaayena pa.tisa.mvedema, ya.m ta.m ariyaa aacikkhanti -- `upekkhako satimaa sukhavihaarii'ti tatiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharaama. etassa, bhante, vihaarassa samatikkamaaya etassa vihaarassa pa.tippassaddhiyaa ayama~n~no uttarimanussadhammaa alamariya~naa.nadassanaviseso adhigato phaasuvihaaro''ti.

[03] ``saadhu saadhu, anuruddhaa! etassa pana vo, anuruddhaa, vihaarassa samatikkamaaya etassa vihaarassa pa.tippassaddhiyaa attha~n~no uttarimanussadhammaa alamariya~naa.nadassanaviseso adhigato phaasuvihaaro''ti ^a^T1.0391^ea^? ``ki~nhi no siyaa, bhante! idha maya.m, bhante, yaavadeva aaka"nkhaama sukhassa ca pahaanaa dukkhassa ca pahaanaa, pubbeva somanassadomanassaana.m attha"ngamaa, adukkhamasukha.m upekkhaasatipaarisuddhi.m catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharaama. etassa, bhante, vihaarassa samatikkamaaya etassa vihaarassa pa.tippassaddhiyaa ayama~n~no uttari manussadhammaa alamariya~naa.nadassanaviseso adhigato phaasuvihaaro''ti.

[03] ``saadhu saadhu, anuruddhaa! etassa pana vo, anuruddhaa, vihaarassa samatikkamaaya etassa vihaarassa pa.tippassaddhiyaa attha~n~no uttarimanussadhammaa alamariya~naa.nadassanaviseso adhigato phaasuvihaaro''ti? ``ki~nhi no siyaa, bhante! idha maya.m, bhante, yaavadeva aaka"nkhaama sabbaso ruupasa~n~naana.m samatikkamaa pa.tighasa~n~naana.m attha"ngamaa naanattasa~n~naana.m amanasikaaraa `ananto aakaaso'ti aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m ^a^P1.0209^ea^ upasampajja viharaama. etassa, bhante, vihaarassa samatikkamaaya etassa vihaarassa pa.tippassaddhiyaa ayama~n~no uttarimanussadhammaa alamariya~naa.nadassanaviseso adhigato phaasuvihaaro''ti.

[03] ``saadhu saadhu, anuruddhaa! etassa pana vo, anuruddhaa, vihaarassa samatikkamaaya etassa vihaarassa pa.tippassaddhiyaa attha~n~no uttarimanussadhammaa alamariya~naa.nadassanaviseso adhigato phaasuvihaaro''ti? ``ki~nhi no siyaa, bhante! idha maya.m, bhante, yaavadeva aaka"nkhaama ^a^V1.0273^ea^ sabbaso aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m samatikkamma `ananta.m vi~n~naa.na'nti vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m upasampajja viharaama...pe0... sabbaso vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m ^a^T1.0392^ea^ samatikkamma `natthi ki~ncii'ti aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m upasampajja viharaama...pe0... sabbaso aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m samatikkamma ^a^M1.0270^ea^ nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m upasampajja viharaama. etassa, bhante, vihaarassa samatikkamaaya etassa vihaarassa pa.tippassaddhiyaa ayama~n~no uttarimanussadhammaa alamariya~naa.nadassanaviseso adhigato phaasuvihaaro''ti.

[03] 329^b^.^eb^ ``saadhu saadhu, anuruddhaa! etassa pana vo, anuruddhaa, vihaarassa samatikkamaaya etassa vihaarassa pa.tippassaddhiyaa attha~n~no uttarimanussadhammaa alamariya~naa.nadassanaviseso adhigato phaasuvihaaro''ti? ``ki~nhi no siyaa, bhante! idha maya.m, bhante, yaavadeva aaka"nkhaama sabbaso nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m samatikkamma sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m upasampajja viharaama, pa~n~naaya ca no disvaa aasavaa parikkhii.naa. etassa, bhante, vihaarassa samatikkamaaya etassa vihaarassa pa.tippassaddhiyaa ayama~n~no uttarimanussadhammaa alamariya~naa.nadassanaviseso adhigato phaasuvihaaro. imamhaa ca maya.m, bhante, phaasuvihaaraa a~n~na.m phaasuvihaara.m uttaritara.m vaa pa.niitatara.m vaa na samanupassaamaa''ti. ``saadhu saadhu, anuruddhaa! imamhaa phaasuvihaaraa uttaritaro vaa pa.niitataro vaa phaasuvihaaro natthii''ti.

[03] 330^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa aayasmanta~nca anuruddha.m aayasmanta~nca nandiya.m aayasmanta~nca kimila.m dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassetvaa samaadapetvaa ^a^T1.0393^ea^ samuttejetvaa sampaha.msetvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkaami. atha kho aayasmaa ca anuruddho aayasmaa ca nandiyo aayasmaa ca kimilo bhagavanta.m anusa.myaayitvaa {anusa.msaavetvaa (sii0), anusaavetvaa (.tiikaa)} tato pa.tinivattitvaa aayasmaa ca nandiyo ^a^P1.0210^ea^ aayasmaa ca kimilo aayasmanta.m anuruddha.m etadavocu.m -- ``ki.m nu kho maya.m aayasmato anuruddhassa evamaarocimha -- `imaasa~nca imaasa~nca vihaarasamaapattiina.m maya.m laabhino'ti, ya.m no aayasmaa anuruddho bhagavato sammukhaa yaava aasavaana.m khayaa pakaasetii''ti? ``na kho me aayasmanto evamaarocesu.m -- `imaasa~nca imaasa~nca vihaarasamaapattiina.m maya.m laabhino'ti, api ca me aayasmantaana.m cetasaa ceto paricca vidito -- `imaasa~nca imaasa~nca vihaarasamaapattiina.m ime aayasmanto laabhino'ti. devataapi me ^a^M1.0271^ea^ etamattha.m aarocesu.m -- `imaasa~nca imaasa~nca vihaarasamaapattiina.m ime aayasmanto laabhino'ti. tamena.m bhagavataa pa~nhaabhipu.t.thena byaakata''nti.

[03] 331^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^V1.0274^ea^ kho diigho parajano yakkho yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. ekamanta.m .thito kho diigho parajano yakkho bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``laabhaa vata, bhante, vajjiina.m, suladdhalaabhaa vajjipajaaya, yattha tathaagato viharati araha.m sammaasambuddho, ime ca tayo kulaputtaa -- aayasmaa ca anuruddho, aayasmaa ca nandiyo, aayasmaa ca kimilo''ti. diighassa parajanassa yakkhassa sadda.m sutvaa bhummaa devaa saddamanussaavesu.m -- `laabhaa ^a^T1.0394^ea^ vata, bho, vajjiina.m, suladdhalaabhaa vajjipajaaya, yattha tathaagato viharati araha.m sammaasambuddho, ime ca tayo kulaputtaa -- aayasmaa ca anuruddho, aayasmaa ca nandiyo, aayasmaa ca kimilo'ti. bhummaana.m devaana.m sadda.m sutvaa caatumahaaraajikaa devaa...pe0... taavati.msaa devaa...pe0... yaamaa devaa...pe0... tusitaa devaa...pe0... nimmaanaratii devaa...pe0... paranimmitavasavattii devaa...pe0... brahmakaayikaa devaa saddamanussaavesu.m -- ``laabhaa vata, bho, vajjiina.m, suladdhalaabhaa vajjipajaaya, yattha tathaagato viharati araha.m sammaasambuddho, ime ca tayo kulaputtaa -- aayasmaa ca anuruddho, aayasmaa ca nandiyo, aayasmaa ca kimilo''ti. itiha te aayasmanto tena kha.nena (tena layena) {( ) sii0 syaa0 pii0 potthakesu natthi} tena muhuttena yaavabrahmalokaa viditaa {sa.mviditaa (ka0)} ahesu.m.

[01] ``evameta.m, diigha, evameta.m, diigha! yasmaapi, diigha, kulaa ete tayo kulaputtaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitaa, ta~ncepi kula.m ete tayo kulaputte pasannacitta.m anussareyya, tassapaassa kulassa diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaaya. yasmaapi, diigha, kulapariva.t.taa ete tayo kulaputtaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m ^a^P1.0211^ea^ pabbajitaa, so cepi kulapariva.t.to ete tayo kulaputte pasannacitto anussareyya, tassapaassa kulapariva.t.tassa diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaaya. yasmaapi, diigha, gaamaa ete tayo kulaputtaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitaa, so cepi gaamo ete tayo kulaputte ^a^M1.0272^ea^ pasannacitto anussareyya, tassapaassa gaamassa ^a^T1.0395^ea^ diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaaya. yasmaapi, diigha, nigamaa ete tayo kulaputtaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitaa, so cepi nigamo ete tayo kulaputte pasannacitto anussareyya, tassapaassa nigamassa diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaaya. yasmaapi, diigha, nagaraa ete tayo kulaputtaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitaa, ta~ncepi nagara.m ete tayo kulaputte pasannacitta.m anussareyya, tassapaassa nagarassa diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaaya. yasmaapi, diigha, janapadaa ete tayo kulaputtaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitaa, so cepi janapado ete tayo kulaputte pasannacitto anussareyya, tassapaassa janapadassa diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaaya. sabbe cepi, diigha, khattiyaa ete tayo kulaputte pasannacittaa ^a^V1.0275^ea^ anussareyyu.m, sabbesaana.mpaassa khattiyaana.m diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaaya. sabbe cepi, diigha, braahma.naa...pe0... sabbe cepi, diigha, vessaa...pe0... sabbe cepi, diigha, suddaa ete tayo kulaputte pasannacittaa anussareyyu.m, sabbesaana.mpaassa suddaana.m diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaaya. sadevako cepi, diigha, loko samaarako sabrahmako sassama.nabraahma.nii pajaa sadevamanussaa ete tayo kulaputte pasannacittaa anussareyya, sadevakassapaassa lokassa samaarakassa sabrahmakassa sassama.nabraahma.niyaa pajaaya sadevamanussaaya diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaaya. passa, diigha, yaava ete tayo kulaputtaa bahujanahitaaya pa.tipannaa bahujanasukhaaya lokaanukampaaya, atthaaya hitaaya sukhaaya devamanussaana''nti.
[03] idamavoca ^a^T1.0396^ea^ bhagavaa. attamano diigho parajano yakkho bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandiiti.
[06] cuu.lagosi"ngasutta.m ni.t.thita.m pa.thama.m.

[03] 332^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T1.0397^ea^ ^a^V1.0276^ea^ ^a^P1.0212^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa gosi"ngasaalavanadaaye viharati sambahulehi abhi~n~naatehi abhi~n~naatehi therehi saavakehi saddhi.m -- aayasmataa ca saariputtena aayasmataa ca mahaamoggallaanena aayasmataa ^a^M1.0273^ea^ ca mahaakassapena aayasmataa ca anuruddhena aayasmataa ca revatena aayasmataa ca aanandena, a~n~nehi ca abhi~n~naatehi abhi~n~naatehi therehi saavakehi saddhi.m. atha kho aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito yenaayasmaa mahaakassapo tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m mahaakassapa.m etadavoca -- ``aayaamaavuso, kassapa, yenaayasmaa saariputto tenupasa"nkamissaama dhammassavanaayaa''ti. ``evamaavuso''ti kho aayasmaa mahaakassapo aayasmato mahaamoggallaanassa paccassosi. atha kho aayasmaa ca mahaamoggallaano aayasmaa ca mahaakassapo aayasmaa ca anuruddho yenaayasmaa saariputto tenupasa"nkami.msu dhammassavanaaya. addasaa kho aayasmaa aanando aayasmanta~nca mahaamoggallaana.m aayasmanta~nca mahaakassapa.m aayasmanta~nca anuruddha.m yenaayasmaa saariputto tenupasa"nkamante dhammassavanaaya. disvaana yenaayasmaa revato tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m revata.m etadavoca -- ``upasa"nkamantaa kho amuu, aavuso {aayasmantaavuso (ka0)} revata, sappurisaa yenaayasmaa saariputto ^a^T1.0398^ea^ tena dhammassavanaaya. aayaamaavuso revata, yenaayasmaa saariputto tenupasa"nkamissaama dhammassavanaayaa''ti. ``evamaavuso''ti kho aayasmaa revato aayasmato aanandassa paccassosi. atha kho aayasmaa ca revato aayasmaa ca aanando yenaayasmaa saariputto tenupasa"nkami.msu dhammassavanaaya.

[03] 333^b^.^eb^ addasaa kho aayasmaa saariputto aayasmanta~nca revata.m aayasmanta~nca aananda.m duuratova aagacchante. disvaana aayasmanta.m aananda.m etadavoca -- ``etu kho aayasmaa aanando! svaagata.m aayasmato aanandassa bhagavato upa.t.thaakassa bhagavato santikaavacarassa! rama.niiya.m, aavuso aananda, gosi"ngasaalavana.m, dosinaa ratti, sabbaphaaliphullaa {sabbapaaliphullaa (sii0)} saalaa, dibbaa, ma~n~ne, gandhaa sampavanti; katha.mruupena, aavuso aananda, bhikkhunaa gosi"ngasaalavana.m sobheyyaa''ti? ``idhaavuso saariputta ^a^P1.0213^ea^, bhikkhu bahussuto hoti sutadharo sutasannicayo. ye te dhammaa aadikalyaa.naa majjhekalyaa.naa pariyosaanakalyaa.naa ^a^M1.0274^ea^ saatthaa sabya~njanaa; kevalaparipu.n.na.m ^a^V1.0277^ea^ parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m abhivadanti, tathaaruupaassa dhammaa bahussutaa honti, dhaataa {dhataa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}, vacasaa paricitaa, manasaanupekkhitaa, di.t.thiyaa suppa.tividdhaa. so catassanna.m parisaana.m dhamma.m deseti parima.n.dalehi padabya~njanehi anuppabandhehi {appabaddhehi (sii0 pii0)} anusayasamugghaataaya. evaruupena kho, aavuso saariputta, bhikkhunaa gosi"ngasaalavana.m sobheyyaa''ti.

[03] 334^b^.^eb^ eva.m vutte, aayasmaa saariputto aayasmanta.m revata.m etadavoca ^a^T1.0399^ea^ -- ``byaakata.m kho, aavuso revata, aayasmataa aanandena yathaasaka.m pa.tibhaana.m. tattha daani maya.m aayasmanta.m revata.m pucchaama -- `rama.niiya.m, aavuso revata, gosi"ngasaalavana.m, dosinaa ratti, sabbaphaaliphullaa saalaa, dibbaa, ma~n~ne, gandhaa sampavanti; katha.mruupena, aavuso revata, bhikkhunaa gosi"ngasaalavana.m sobheyyaa'''ti? ``idhaavuso saariputta, bhikkhu pa.tisallaanaaraamo hoti pa.tisallaanarato, ajjhatta.m cetosamathamanuyutto aniraakatajjhaano, vipassanaaya samannaagato, bruuhetaa su~n~naagaaraana.m. evaruupena kho, aavuso saariputta, bhikkhunaa gosi"ngasaalavana.m sobheyyaa''ti.

[03] 335^b^.^eb^ eva.m vutte, aayasmaa saariputto aayasmanta.m anuruddha.m etadavoca -- ``byaakata.m kho, aavuso anuruddha, aayasmataa revatena yathaasaka.m pa.tibhaana.m. tattha daani maya.m aayasmanta.m anuruddha.m pucchaama -- `rama.niiya.m, aavuso anuruddha, gosi"ngasaalavana.m, dosinaa ratti, sabbaphaaliphullaa saalaa, dibbaa, ma~n~ne, gandhaa sampavanti; katha.mruupena, aavuso anuruddha, bhikkhunaa gosi"ngasaalavana.m sobheyyaa'''ti? ``idhaavuso saariputta, bhikkhu dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena sahassa.m lokaana.m voloketi. seyyathaapi, aavuso saariputta, cakkhumaa puriso uparipaasaadavaragato sahassa.m nemima.n.dalaana.m volokeyya; evameva kho, aavuso saariputta, bhikkhu dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena sahassa.m lokaana.m voloketi. evaruupena kho, aavuso saariputta, bhikkhunaa gosi"ngasaalavana.m sobheyyaa''ti.

[03] 336^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T1.0400^ea^ ^a^M1.0275^ea^ vutte, aayasmaa saariputto aayasmanta.m mahaakassapa.m etadavoca -- ``byaakata.m kho, aavuso kassapa, aayasmataa anuruddhena yathaasaka.m pa.tibhaana.m. tattha daani maya.m aayasmanta.m mahaakassapa.m pucchaama -- `rama.niiya.m, aavuso kassapa, gosi"ngasaalavana.m, dosinaa ratti, sabbaphaaliphullaa saalaa, dibbaa, ma~n~ne, gandhaa sampavanti; katha.mruupena, aavuso kassapa, bhikkhunaa ^a^P1.0214^ea^ gosi"ngasaalavana.m sobheyyaa'''ti? ``idhaavuso saariputta, bhikkhu attanaa ca aara~n~niko ^a^V1.0278^ea^ hoti aara~n~nikattassa ca va.n.navaadii, attanaa ca pi.n.dapaatiko hoti pi.n.dapaatikattassa ca va.n.navaadii, attanaa ca pa.msukuuliko hoti pa.msukuulikattassa ca va.n.navaadii, attanaa ca teciivariko hoti teciivarikattassa ca va.n.navaadii, attanaa ca appiccho hoti appicchataaya ca va.n.navaadii, attanaa ca santu.t.tho hoti santu.t.thiyaa ca va.n.navaadii, attanaa ca pavivitto hoti pavivekassa ca va.n.navaadii, attanaa ca asa.msa.t.tho hoti asa.msaggassa ca va.n.navaadii, attanaa ca aaraddhaviiriyo hoti viiriyaarambhassa ca va.n.navaadii, attanaa ca siilasampanno hoti siilasampadaaya ca va.n.navaadii, attanaa ca samaadhisampanno hoti samaadhisampadaaya ca va.n.navaadii, attanaa ca pa~n~naasampanno hoti pa~n~naasampadaaya ca va.n.navaadii, attanaa ca vimuttisampanno hoti vimuttisampadaaya ca va.n.navaadii, attanaa ca vimutti~naa.nadassanasampanno hoti vimutti~naa.nadassanasampadaaya ca va.n.navaadii. evaruupena kho, aavuso saariputta ^a^T1.0401^ea^, bhikkhunaa gosi"ngasaalavana.m sobheyyaa''ti.

[03] 337^b^.^eb^ eva.m vutte, aayasmaa saariputto aayasmanta.m mahaamoggallaana.m etadavoca -- ``byaakata.m kho, aavuso moggallaana, aayasmataa mahaakassapena yathaasaka.m pa.tibhaana.m. tattha daani maya.m aayasmanta.m mahaamoggallaana.m pucchaama -- `rama.niiya.m, aavuso moggallaana, gosi"ngasaalavana.m, dosinaa ratti, sabbaphaaliphullaa saalaa, dibbaa, ma~n~ne, gandhaa sampavanti; katha.mruupena, aavuso moggallaana, bhikkhunaa gosi"ngasaalavana.m sobheyyaa'''ti? ``idhaavuso saariputta, dve bhikkhuu abhidhammakatha.m kathenti, te a~n~nama~n~na.m pa~nha.m pucchanti, a~n~nama~n~nassa pa~nha.m pu.t.thaa vissajjenti, no ca sa.msaadenti {sa.msaarenti (ka0)}, dhammii ca nesa.m kathaa pavattinii hoti. evaruupena kho, aavuso saariputta, bhikkhunaa gosi"ngasaalavana.m sobheyyaa''ti.

[03] 338^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^M1.0276^ea^ kho aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano aayasmanta.m saariputta.m etadavoca -- ``byaakata.m kho, aavuso saariputta, amhehi sabbeheva yathaasaka.m pa.tibhaana.m. tattha daani maya.m aayasmanta.m saariputta.m pucchaama -- `rama.niiya.m, aavuso saariputta, gosi"ngasaalavana.m, dosinaa ratti, sabbaphaaliphullaa saalaa, dibbaa, ma~n~ne, gandhaa sampavanti; katha.mruupena, aavuso saariputta, bhikkhunaa gosi"ngasaalavana.m sobheyyaa'''ti? ``idhaavuso moggallaana, bhikkhu citta.m vasa.m vatteti, no ca bhikkhu cittassa vasena vattati. so yaaya vihaarasamaapattiyaa aaka"nkhati ^a^P1.0215^ea^ pubba.nhasamaya.m viharitu.m, taaya vihaarasamaapattiyaa pubba.nhasamaya.m viharati; yaaya vihaarasamaapattiyaa ^a^T1.0402^ea^ aaka"nkhati majjhanhikasamaya.m {majjhantikasamaya.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0 ka0)} viharitu.m, taaya vihaarasamaapattiyaa majjhanhikasamaya.m ^a^V1.0279^ea^ viharati; yaaya vihaarasamaapattiyaa aaka"nkhati saayanhasamaya.m viharitu.m, taaya vihaarasamaapattiyaa saayanhasamaya.m viharati. seyyathaapi, aavuso moggallaana, ra~n~no vaa raajamahaamattassa vaa naanaarattaana.m dussaana.m dussakara.n.dako puuro assa. so ya~n~nadeva dussayuga.m aaka"nkheyya pubba.nhasamaya.m paarupitu.m, ta.m tadeva dussayuga.m pubba.nhasamaya.m paarupeyya; ya~n~nadeva dussayuga.m aaka"nkheyya majjhanhikasamaya.m paarupitu.m, ta.m tadeva dussayuga.m majjhanhikasamaya.m paarupeyya; ya~n~nadeva dussayuga.m aaka"nkheyya saayanhasamaya.m paarupitu.m, ta.m tadeva dussayuga.m saayanhasamaya.m paarupeyya. evameva kho, aavuso moggallaana, bhikkhu citta.m vasa.m vatteti, no ca bhikkhu cittassa vasena vattati. so yaaya vihaarasamaapattiyaa aaka"nkhati pubba.nhasamaya.m viharitu.m, taaya vihaarasamaapattiyaa pubba.nhasamaya.m viharati; yaaya vihaarasamaapattiyaa aaka"nkhati majjhanhikasamaya.m viharitu.m, taaya vihaarasamaapattiyaa majjhanhikasamaya.m viharati; yaaya vihaarasamaapattiyaa aaka"nkhati saayanhasamaya.m viharitu.m, taaya vihaarasamaapattiyaa saayanhasamaya.m viharati. evaruupena kho, aavuso moggallaana, bhikkhunaa gosi"ngasaalavana.m sobheyyaa''ti.

[03] 339^b^.^eb^ atha kho aayasmaa saariputto te aayasmante etadavoca -- ``byaakata.m kho, aavuso, amhehi sabbeheva yathaasaka.m pa.tibhaana.m. aayaamaavuso, yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkamissaama; upasa"nkamitvaa etamattha.m ^a^M1.0277^ea^ bhagavato ^a^T1.0403^ea^ aarocessaama. yathaa no bhagavaa byaakarissati tathaa na.m dhaaressaamaa''ti. ``evamaavuso''ti kho te aayasmanto aayasmato saariputtassa paccassosu.m. atha kho te aayasmanto yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa saariputto bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``addasa.m kho aha.m, bhante, aayasmanta~nca revata.m aayasmanta~nca aananda.m duuratova aagacchante. disvaana aayasmanta.m ^a^P1.0216^ea^ aananda.m etadavoca.m -- `etu kho aayasmaa aanando! svaagata.m aayasmato aanandassa bhagavato upa.t.thaakassa bhagavato santikaavacarassa! rama.niiya.m, aavuso aananda, gosi"ngasaalavana.m, dosinaa ratti, sabbaphaaliphullaa saalaa, dibbaa, ma~n~ne, gandhaa sampavanti; katha.mruupena, aavuso aananda, bhikkhunaa gosi"ngasaalavana.m sobheyyaa'ti? eva.m vutte, bhante, aayasmaa aanando ma.m etadavoca -- `idhaavuso, saariputta, bhikkhu bahussuto hoti sutadharo...pe0... anusayasamugghaataaya. evaruupena kho, aavuso saariputta, bhikkhunaa gosi"ngasaalavana.m ^a^V1.0280^ea^ sobheyyaa'''ti. ``saadhu saadhu, saariputta! yathaa ta.m aanandova sammaa byaakaramaano byaakareyya. aanando hi, saariputta, bahussuto sutadharo sutasannicayo. ye te dhammaa aadikalyaa.naa majjhekalyaa.naa pariyosaanakalyaa.naa saatthaa sabya~njanaa; kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m ^a^T1.0404^ea^ brahmacariya.m abhivadanti, tathaaruupaassa dhammaa bahussutaa honti, dhaataa, vacasaa paricitaa, manasaanupekkhitaa, di.t.thiyaa suppa.tividdhaa. so catassanna.m parisaana.m dhamma.m deseti parima.n.dalehi padabya~njanehi anuppabandhehi anusayasamugghaataayaa''ti.

[03] 340^b^.^eb^ ``eva.m vutte, aha.m, bhante, aayasmanta.m revata.m etadavoca.m -- `byaakata.m kho, aavuso revata aayasmataa aanandena yathaasaka.m pa.tibhaana.m. tattha daani maya.m aayasmanta.m revata.m pucchaama -- rama.niiya.m, aavuso revata, gosi"ngasaalavana.m, dosinaa ratti, sabbaphaaliphullaa saalaa, dibbaa ma~n~ne gandhaa sampavanti. katha.mruupena, aavuso revata, bhikkhunaa gosi"ngasaalavana.m sobheyyaa'ti? eva.m vutte, bhante, aayasmaa revato ma.m etadavoca -- `idhaavuso saariputta bhikkhu pa.tisallaanaaraamo hoti pa.tisallaanarato ^a^M1.0278^ea^, ajjhatta.m cetosamathamanuyutto, aniraakatajjhaano, vipassanaaya samannaagato, bruuhetaa su~n~naagaaraana.m. evaruupena kho, aavuso saariputta, bhikkhunaa gosi"ngasaalavana.m sobheyyaa'''ti. ``saadhu saadhu, saariputta! yathaa ta.m revatova sammaa byaakaramaano byaakareyya. revato hi, saariputta, pa.tisallaanaaraamo pa.tisallaanarato, ajjhatta.m cetosamathamanuyutto aniraakatajjhaano, vipassanaaya samannaagato bruuhetaa su~n~naagaaraana''nti.

[03] 341^b^.^eb^ ``eva.m ^a^P1.0217^ea^ vutte, aha.m, bhante, aayasmanta.m anuruddha.m etadavoca.m -- `byaakata.m kho aavuso anuruddha aayasmataa revatena...pe0... katha.mruupena, aavuso ^a^T1.0405^ea^ anuruddha, bhikkhunaa gosi"ngasaalavana.m sobheyyaa'ti. eva.m vutte, bhante, aayasmaa anuruddho ma.m etadavoca -- `idhaavuso saariputta, bhikkhu dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena sahassa.m lokaana.m voloketi. seyyathaapi, aavuso saariputta, cakkhumaa puriso...pe0... evaruupena kho aavuso saariputta bhikkhunaa gosi"ngasaalavana.m sobheyyaa'''ti. ``saadhu saadhu, saariputta, yathaa ta.m anuruddhova sammaa byaakaramaano byaakareyya. anuruddho hi, saariputta, dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena sahassa.m lokaana.m voloketii''ti.

[03] 342^b^.^eb^ ``eva.m vutte, aha.m, bhante, aayasmanta.m mahaakassapa.m etadavoca.m -- `byaakata.m kho, aavuso ^a^V1.0281^ea^ kassapa aayasmataa anuruddhena yathaasaka.m pa.tibhaana.m. tattha daani maya.m aayasmanta.m mahaakassapa.m pucchaama...pe0... katha.m ruupena kho, aavuso kassapa, bhikkhunaa gosi"ngasaalavana.m sobheyyaa'ti? eva.m vutte bhante, aayasmaa mahaakassapo ma.m etadavoca -- `idhaavuso saariputta, bhikkhu attanaa ca aara~n~niko hoti aara~n~nikattassa ca va.n.navaadii, attanaa ca pi.n.dapaatiko hoti...pe0... attanaa ca pa.msukuuliko hoti...pe0... attanaa ca teciivariko hoti...pe0... attanaa ca appiccho hoti...pe0... attanaa ca santu.t.tho hoti...pe0... attanaa ca pavivitto hoti...pe0... attanaa ca asa.msa.t.tho hoti...pe0... attanaa ca aaraddhaviiriyo hoti...pe0... attanaa ca siilasampanno hoti...pe0... attanaa ca samaadhisampanno hoti...pe0... attanaa ca pa~n~naasampanno hoti... attanaa ca vimuttisampanno ^a^T1.0406^ea^ hoti... ^a^M1.0279^ea^ attanaa ca vimutti~naa.nadassanasampanno hoti vimutti~naa.nadassanasampadaaya ca va.n.navaadii. evaruupena kho, aavuso saariputta, bhikkhunaa gosi"ngasaalavana.m sobheyyaa'''ti ^a^P1.0218^ea^. ``saadhu saadhu, saariputta! yathaa ta.m kassapova sammaa byaakaramaano byaakareyya. kassapo hi, saariputta, attanaa ca aara~n~niko aara~n~nikattassa ca va.n.navaadii, attanaa ca pi.n.dapaatiko pi.n.dapaatikattassa ca va.n.navaadii, attanaa ca pa.msukuuliko pa.msukuulikattassa ca va.n.navaadii, attanaa ca teciivariko teciivarikattassa ca va.n.navaadii, attanaa ca appiccho appicchataaya ca va.n.navaadii, attanaa ca santu.t.tho santu.t.thiyaa ca va.n.navaadii, attanaa ca pavivitto pavivekassa ca va.n.navaadii, attanaa ca asa.msa.t.tho asa.msaggassa ca va.n.navaadii, attanaa ca aaraddhaviiriyo viiriyaarambhassa ca va.n.navaadii, attanaa ca siilasampanno siilasampadaaya ca va.n.navaadii, attanaa ca samaadhisampanno samaadhisampadaaya ca va.n.navaadii, attanaa ca pa~n~naasampanno pa~n~naasampadaaya ca va.n.navaadii, attanaa ca vimuttisampanno vimuttisampadaaya ca va.n.navaadii, attanaa ca vimutti~naa.nadassanasampanno vimutti~naa.nadassanasampadaaya ca va.n.navaadii''ti.

[03] 343^b^.^eb^ ``eva.m vutte, aha.m bhante aayasmanta.m mahaamoggallaana.m etadavoca.m -- `byaakata.m kho, aavuso moggallaana, aayasmataa mahaakassapena ^a^T1.0407^ea^ yathaasaka.m pa.tibhaana.m. tattha daani maya.m aayasmanta.m mahaamoggallaana.m pucchaama...pe0... katha.mruupena, aavuso moggallaana, bhikkhunaa gosi"ngasaalavana.m sobheyyaa'ti? eva.m vutte, bhante, aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano ma.m etadavoca -- `idhaavuso saariputta, dve bhikkhuu abhidhammakatha.m kathenti. te a~n~nama~n~na.m pa~nha.m pucchanti, a~n~nama~n~nassa ^a^V1.0282^ea^ pa~nha.m pu.t.thaa vissajjenti, no ca sa.msaadenti, dhammii ca nesa.m kathaa pavattinii hoti. evaruupena kho, aavuso saariputta, bhikkhunaa gosi"ngasaalavana.m sobheyyaa'''ti. ``saadhu saadhu, saariputta, yathaa ta.m moggallaanova sammaa byaakaramaano byaakareyya. moggallaano hi, saariputta, dhammakathiko''ti.

[03] 344^b^.^eb^ eva.m vutte, aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``atha khvaaha.m, bhante, aayasmanta.m saariputta.m etadavoca.m -- `byaakata.m kho, aavuso saariputta, amhehi sabbeheva yathaasaka.m pa.tibhaana.m. tattha daani ^a^M1.0280^ea^ maya.m aayasmanta.m saariputta.m pucchaama -- rama.niiya.m, aavuso saariputta, gosi"ngasaalavana.m, dosinaa ratti, sabbaphaaliphullaa saalaa, dibbaa, ma~n~ne, gandhaa sampavanti. katha.mruupena, aavuso saariputta, bhikkhunaa gosi"ngasaalavana.m sobheyyaa'ti? eva.m vutte, bhante, aayasmaa saariputto ma.m etadavoca -- `idhaavuso, moggallaana, bhikkhu citta.m vasa.m vatteti no ca bhikkhu cittassa vasena vattati. so yaaya vihaarasamaapattiyaa aaka"nkhati pubba.nhasamaya.m viharitu.m, taaya vihaarasamaapattiyaa pubba.nhasamaya.m ^a^T1.0408^ea^ viharati; yaaya vihaarasamaapattiyaa aaka"nkhati majjhanhikasamaya.m viharitu.m, taaya vihaarasamaapattiyaa majjhanhikasamaya.m viharati; yaaya vihaarasamaapattiyaa aaka"nkhati saayanhasamaya.m viharitu.m, taaya vihaarasamaapattiyaa saayanhasamaya.m viharati. seyyathaapi, aavuso moggallaana, ra~n~no vaa raajamahaamattassa vaa naanaarattaana.m dussaana.m dussakara.n.dako puuro assa. so ya~n~nadeva dussayuga.m aaka"nkheyya pubba.nhasamaya.m paarupitu.m ^a^P1.0219^ea^, ta.m tadeva dussayuga.m pubba.nhasamaya.m paarupeyya; ya~n~nadeva dussayuga.m aaka"nkheyya majjhanhikasamaya.m paarupitu.m, ta.m tadeva dussayuga.m majjhanhikasamaya.m paarupeyya; ya~n~nadeva dussayuga.m aaka"nkheyya saayanhasamaya.m paarupitu.m, ta.m tadeva dussayuga.m saayanhasamaya.m paarupeyya. evameva kho, aavuso moggallaana, bhikkhu citta.m vasa.m vatteti, no ca bhikkhu cittassa vasena vattati. so yaaya vihaarasamaapattiyaa aaka"nkhati pubba.nhasamaya.m viharitu.m, taaya vihaarasamaapattiyaa pubba.nhasamaya.m viharati; yaaya vihaarasamaapattiyaa aaka"nkhati majjhanhikasamaya.m viharitu.m, taaya vihaarasamaapattiyaa majjhanhikasamaya.m viharati; yaaya vihaarasamaapattiyaa aaka"nkhati saayanhasamaya.m viharitu.m, taaya vihaarasamaapattiyaa saayanhasamaya.m viharati. evaruupena kho, aavuso moggallaana, bhikkhunaa gosi"ngasaalavana.m sobheyyaa'''ti. ``saadhu saadhu, moggallaana! yathaa ta.m saariputtova sammaa byaakaramaano byaakareyya. saariputto hi, moggallaana, citta.m vasa.m vatteti no ca saariputto cittassa vasena vattati. so yaaya vihaarasamaapattiyaa ^a^T1.0409^ea^ ^a^V1.0283^ea^ aaka"nkhati pubba.nhasamaya.m viharitu.m, taaya vihaarasamaapattiyaa pubba.nhasamaya.m viharati; [03] 346^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T1.0410^ea^ ^a^V1.0284^ea^ ^a^P1.0220^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``ekaadasahi, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagato gopaalako abhabbo goga.na.m pariharitu.m phaati.m kaatu.m {phaatikattu.m (sii0 pii0), phaatikaatu.m (syaa0 ka.m0)}. katamehi ekaadasahi? idha, bhikkhave, gopaalako na ruupa~n~nuu hoti, na lakkha.nakusalo hoti, na aasaa.tika.m haaretaa {saa.tetaa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} hoti, na va.na.m pa.ticchaadetaa hoti, na dhuuma.m kattaa hoti, na tittha.m jaanaati, na piita.m jaanaati, na viithi.m jaanaati, na gocarakusalo hoti anavasesadohii ca hoti. ye te usabhaa gopitaro gopari.naayakaa te na atirekapuujaaya puujetaa hoti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, ekaadasahi a"ngehi samannaagato gopaalako abhabbo goga.na.m pariharitu.m phaati.m kaatu.m. evameva kho, bhikkhave, ekaadasahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu abhabbo imasmi.m dhammavinaye ^a^M1.0282^ea^ vuddhi.m viruu.lhi.m vepulla.m aapajjitu.m. katamehi ekaadasahi? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na ruupa~n~nuu hoti, na lakkha.nakusalo hoti, na aasaa.tika.m haaretaa hoti, na va.na.m pa.ticchaadetaa hoti, na dhuuma.m kattaa hoti, na tittha.m jaanaati, na piita.m jaanaati, na viithi.m jaanaati, na gocarakusalo hoti, anavasesadohii ca hoti. ye te ^a^T1.0411^ea^ bhikkhuu theraa ratta~n~nuu cirapabbajitaa sa"nghapitaro sa"nghapari.naayakaa te na atirekapuujaaya puujetaa hoti.

[03] 347^b^.^eb^ ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na ruupa~n~nuu hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ya.m ki~nci ruupa.m sabba.m ruupa.m `cattaari mahaabhuutaani, catunna~nca mahaabhuutaana.m upaadaayaruupa'nti yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na ruupa~n~nuu hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na lakkha.nakusalo hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu `kammalakkha.no ^a^V1.0285^ea^ baalo, kammalakkha.no pa.n.dito'ti yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na lakkha.nakusalo hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na aasaa.tika.m haaretaa hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu uppanna.m kaamavitakka.m adhivaaseti, nappajahati na vinodeti na byantii karoti na anabhaava.m gameti. uppanna.m byaapaadavitakka.m...pe0... uppanna.m vihi.msaavitakka.m...pe0... uppannuppanne paapake akusale dhamme adhivaaseti, nappajahati ^a^P1.0221^ea^ na vinodeti na byantii karoti na anabhaava.m gameti. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na aasaa.tika.m haaretaa hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na va.na.m pa.ticchaadetaa hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cakkhunaa ruupa.m disvaa nimittaggaahii hoti anubya~njanaggaahii. yatvaadhikara.namena.m cakkhundriya.m asa.mvuta.m viharanta.m abhijjhaadomanassaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa anvaassaveyyu.m, tassa sa.mvaraaya na pa.tipajjati, na rakkhati ^a^T1.0412^ea^ cakkhundriya.m, cakkhundriye na sa.mvara.m aapajjati. sotena sadda.m sutvaa...pe0... ghaanena gandha.m ghaayitvaa...pe0... jivhaaya rasa.m saayitvaa...pe0... kaayena pho.t.thabba.m phusitvaa...pe0... manasaa dhamma.m vi~n~naaya nimittaggaahii hoti anubya~njanaggaahii. yatvaadhikara.namena.m manindriya.m asa.mvuta.m viharanta.m abhijjhaadomanassaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa anvaassaveyyu.m, tassa sa.mvaraaya na pa.tipajjati, na ^a^M1.0283^ea^ rakkhati manindriya.m, manindriye na sa.mvara.m aapajjati. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na va.na.m pa.ticchaadetaa hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na dhuuma.m kattaa hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yathaasuta.m yathaapariyatta.m dhamma.m na vitthaarena paresa.m desetaa hoti. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na dhuuma.m kattaa hoti.

[03] 350^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T1.0418^ea^ ^a^V1.0290^ea^ ^a^P1.0225^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa vajjiisu viharati ukkacelaaya.m ga"ngaaya nadiyaa tiire. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``bhuutapubba.m ^a^M1.0287^ea^, bhikkhave, maagadhako gopaalako duppa~n~najaatiko, vassaana.m pacchime maase saradasamaye, asamavekkhitvaa ga"ngaaya nadiyaa orima.m tiira.m, asamavekkhitvaa paarima.m tiira.m, atittheneva gaavo pataaresi uttara.m tiira.m suvidehaana.m. atha kho, bhikkhave, gaavo majjhega"ngaaya nadiyaa sote aama.n.daliya.m karitvaa tattheva anayabyasana.m aapajji.msu. ta.m kissa hetu? tathaa hi so, bhikkhave, maagadhako gopaalako duppa~n~najaatiko, vassaana.m pacchime maase saradasamaye, asamavekkhitvaa ga"ngaaya nadiyaa orima.m tiira.m, asamavekkhitvaa paarima.m tiira.m, atittheneva gaavo pataaresi uttara.m tiira.m suvidehaana.m. evameva kho, bhikkhave, ye hi keci {ye keci (syaa0 ka.m0)} sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa akusalaa imassa lokassa akusalaa parassa lokassa, akusalaa maaradheyyassa akusalaa amaaradheyyassa, akusalaa maccudheyyassa akusalaa amaccudheyyassa, tesa.m ye sotabba.m saddahaatabba.m ma~n~nissanti, tesa.m ta.m bhavissati diigharatta.m ahitaaya dukkhaaya.

[03] 351^b^.^eb^ ``bhuutapubba.m, bhikkhave, maagadhako gopaalako sappa~n~najaatiko, vassaana.m ^a^T1.0419^ea^ pacchime maase saradasamaye, samavekkhitvaa ga"ngaaya nadiyaa orima.m tiira.m, samavekkhitvaa paarima.m tiira.m, tittheneva gaavo pataaresi uttara.m tiira.m suvidehaana.m. so pa.thama.m pataaresi ye te usabhaa gopitaro gopari.naayakaa. te tiriya.m ga"ngaaya sota.m chetvaa sotthinaa paara.m agama.msu. athaapare pataaresi balavagaavo dammagaavo. tepi tiriya.m ga"ngaaya sota.m chetvaa sotthinaa paara.m agama.msu. athaapare pataaresi vacchatare vacchatariyo. tepi tiriya.m ga"ngaaya sota.m chetvaa sotthinaa paara.m agama.msu. athaapare pataaresi vacchake kisaabalake {kisabalake (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}. tepi tiriya.m ga"ngaaya sota.m chetvaa sotthinaa paara.m agama.msu. bhuutapubba.m, bhikkhave, vacchako taru.nako taavadeva jaatako maatugoravakena vuyhamaano, sopi tiriya.m ga"ngaaya sota.m chetvaa sotthinaa paara.m agamaasi. ta.m kissa hetu? tathaa ^a^V1.0291^ea^ hi so, bhikkhave, maagadhako gopaalako sappa~n~najaatiko ^a^P1.0226^ea^, vassaana.m pacchime maase saradasamaye, samavekkhitvaa ga"ngaaya nadiyaa orima.m ^a^M1.0288^ea^ tiira.m, samavekkhitvaa paarima.m tiira.m, tittheneva gaavo pataaresi uttara.m tiira.m suvidehaana.m. evameva kho, bhikkhave, ye hi keci sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa kusalaa imassa lokassa kusalaa parassa lokassa, kusalaa maaradheyyassa kusalaa amaaradheyyassa, kusalaa maccudheyyassa kusalaa amaccudheyyassa, tesa.m ye sotabba.m saddahaatabba.m ma~n~nissanti, tesa.m ta.m bhavissati diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaaya.

[03] 352^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi ^a^T1.0420^ea^, bhikkhave, ye te usabhaa gopitaro gopari.naayakaa te tiriya.m ga"ngaaya sota.m chetvaa sotthinaa paara.m agama.msu, evameva kho, bhikkhave, ye te bhikkhuu arahanto khii.naasavaa vusitavanto katakara.niiyaa ohitabhaaraa anuppattasadatthaa parikkhii.nabhavasa.myojanaa sammada~n~naa vimuttaa, te tiriya.m maarassa sota.m chetvaa sotthinaa paara.m gataa.

[03] ``seyyathaapi te, bhikkhave, balavagaavo dammagaavo tiriya.m ga"ngaaya sota.m chetvaa sotthinaa paara.m agama.msu, evameva kho, bhikkhave, ye te bhikkhuu pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa opapaatikaa tattha parinibbaayino anaavattidhammaa tasmaa lokaa, tepi tiriya.m maarassa sota.m chetvaa sotthinaa paara.m gamissanti.

[03] ``seyyathaapi te, bhikkhave, vacchataraa vacchatariyo tiriya.m ga"ngaaya sota.m chetvaa sotthinaa paara.m agama.msu, evameva kho, bhikkhave, ye te bhikkhuu ti.n.na.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa raagadosamohaana.m tanuttaa sakadaagaamino saki.mdeva ima.m loka.m aagantvaa dukkhassanta.m karissanti, tepi tiriya.m maarassa sota.m chetvaa sotthinaa paara.m gamissanti.

[03] ``seyyathaapi te, bhikkhave, vacchakaa kisaabalakaa tiriya.m ga"ngaaya sota.m chetvaa sotthinaa paara.m agama.msu, evameva kho, bhikkhave, ye te bhikkhuu ti.n.na.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa sotaapannaa avinipaatadhammaa niyataa sambodhiparaayanaa, tepi tiriya.m maarassa sota.m chetvaa sotthinaa paara.m gamissanti.

[01] ``seyyathaapi so, bhikkhave, vacchako taru.nako taavadeva jaatako maatugoravakena ^a^T1.0421^ea^ vuyhamaano tiriya.m ^a^V1.0292^ea^ ga"ngaaya sota.m chetvaa sotthinaa ^a^M1.0289^ea^ paara.m agamaasi, evameva kho, bhikkhave, ye te bhikkhuu dhammaanusaarino saddhaanusaarino, tepi tiriya.m maarassa sota.m chetvaa sotthinaa paara.m gamissanti.

[03] ``aha.m kho pana, bhikkhave, kusalo ^a^P1.0227^ea^ imassa lokassa kusalo parassa lokassa, kusalo maaradheyyassa kusalo amaaradheyyassa, kusalo maccudheyyassa kusalo amaccudheyyassa. tassa mayha.m, bhikkhave, ye sotabba.m saddahaatabba.m ma~n~nissanti, tesa.m ta.m bhavissati diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaayaa''ti.
[03] idamavoca bhagavaa. ida.m vatvaa sugato athaapara.m etadavoca satthaa --
[21] ``aya.m loko paro loko, jaanataa suppakaasito.
[22] ya~nca maarena sampatta.m, appatta.m ya~nca maccunaa..
[21] ``sabba.m loka.m abhi~n~naaya, sambuddhena pajaanataa.
[22] viva.ta.m amatadvaara.m, khema.m nibbaanapattiyaa..
[21] ``chinna.m paapimato sota.m, viddhasta.m vina.liikata.m.
[22] paamojjabahulaa hotha, khema.m pattattha {patthetha (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0 a.t.thakathaaya.m sa.mva.n.netabbapaa.tho)} bhikkhavo''ti..
[06] cuu.lagopaalakasutta.m ni.t.thita.m catuttha.m.

[03] 353^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T1.0422^ea^ ^a^V1.0293^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa vesaaliya.m viharati mahaavane kuu.taagaarasaalaaya.m. tena kho pana samayena saccako niga.n.thaputto vesaaliya.m pa.tivasati bhassappavaadako pa.n.ditavaado saadhusammato bahujanassa. so vesaaliya.m parisati eva.m vaaca.m bhaasati -- ``naaha.m ta.m passaami sama.na.m vaa braahma.na.m vaa, sa"nghi.m ga.ni.m ga.naacariya.m, api arahanta.m sammaasambuddha.m pa.tijaanamaana.m, yo mayaa vaadena vaada.m samaaraddho na sa"nkampeyya na sampakampeyya na sampavedheyya, yassa na kacchehi sedaa mucceyyu.m. thuu.na.m cepaaha.m acetana.m vaadena vaada.m samaarabheyya.m, saapi mayaa vaadena vaada.m samaaraddhaa ^a^M1.0290^ea^ sa"nkampeyya sampakampeyya sampavedheyya. ko pana vaado manussabhuutassaa''ti?

[03] atha kho aayasmaa assaji pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya vesaali.m pi.n.daaya paavisi. addasaa kho saccako niga.n.thaputto vesaaliya.m ja"nghaavihaara.m anuca"nkamamaano anuvicaramaano ^a^P1.0228^ea^ aayasmanta.m assaji.m duuratova aagacchanta.m. disvaana yenaayasmaa assaji tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmataa assajinaa saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. ekamanta.m .thito kho saccako niga.n.thaputto aayasmanta.m assaji.m etadavoca -- ``katha.m pana, bho assaji, sama.no gotamo saavake vineti, katha.mbhaagaa ^a^T1.0423^ea^ ca pana sama.nassa gotamassa saavakesu anusaasanii bahulaa pavattatii''ti? ``eva.m kho, aggivessana, bhagavaa saavake vineti, eva.mbhaagaa ca pana bhagavato saavakesu anusaasanii bahulaa pavattati -- `ruupa.m, bhikkhave, anicca.m, vedanaa aniccaa, sa~n~naa aniccaa, sa"nkhaaraa aniccaa, vi~n~naa.na.m anicca.m. ruupa.m, bhikkhave, anattaa, vedanaa anattaa, sa~n~naa anattaa, sa"nkhaaraa anattaa, vi~n~naa.na.m anattaa. sabbe sa"nkhaaraa aniccaa, sabbe dhammaa anattaa'ti. eva.m kho, aggivessana, bhagavaa saavake vineti, eva.mbhaagaa ca pana bhagavato saavakesu anusaasanii bahulaa pavattatii''ti. ``dussuta.m vata, bho assaji, assumha ye maya.m eva.mvaadi.m sama.na.m gotama.m assumha. appeva naama maya.m kadaaci karahaci tena bhotaa gotamena saddhi.m samaagaccheyyaama ^a^V1.0294^ea^, appeva naama siyaa kocideva kathaasallaapo, appeva naama tasmaa paapakaa di.t.thigataa viveceyyaamaa''ti.

[03] 354^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena pa~ncamattaani licchavisataani santhaagaare {sandhaagaare (ka0)} sannipatitaani honti kenacideva kara.niiyena. atha kho saccako niga.n.thaputto yena te licchavii tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa te licchavii etadavoca -- ``abhikkamantu bhonto licchavii, abhikkamantu bhonto licchavii, ajja me sama.nena gotamena saddhi.m kathaasallaapo bhavissati. sace me sama.no gotamo tathaa pati.t.thissati yathaa ca me {yathaassa me (sii0 pii0)} ~naata~n~natarena saavakena assajinaa naama bhikkhunaa pati.t.thita.m, seyyathaapi ^a^T1.0424^ea^ naama balavaa puriso diighalomika.m e.laka.m lomesu gahetvaa aaka.d.dheyya parika.d.dheyya samparika.d.dheyya ^a^M1.0291^ea^, evamevaaha.m sama.na.m gotama.m vaadena vaada.m aaka.d.dhissaami parika.d.dhissaami samparika.d.dhissaami. seyyathaapi naama balavaa so.n.dikaakammakaaro mahanta.m so.n.dikaaki.la~nja.m gambhiire udakarahade pakkhipitvaa ka.n.ne gahetvaa aaka.d.dheyya parika.d.dheyya samparika.d.dheyya, evamevaaha.m sama.na.m gotama.m vaadena vaada.m aaka.d.dhissaami parika.d.dhissaami samparika.d.dhissaami. seyyathaapi naama balavaa so.n.dikaadhutto vaala.m ^a^P1.0229^ea^ {thaala.m (ka0)} ka.n.ne gahetvaa odhuneyya niddhuneyya nippho.teyya {nicchaadeyya (sii0 pii0 ka0), niccho.teyya (ka0), nippo.theyya (syaa0 ka.m0)} evamevaaha.m sama.na.m gotama.m vaadena vaada.m odhunissaami niddhunissaami nippho.tessaami. seyyathaapi naama ku~njaro sa.t.thihaayano gambhiira.m pokkhara.ni.m ogaahetvaa saa.nadhovika.m naama kii.litajaata.m kii.lati, evamevaaha.m sama.na.m gotama.m saa.nadhovika.m ma~n~ne kii.litajaata.m kii.lissaami. abhikkamantu bhonto licchavii, abhikkamantu bhonto licchavii, ajja me sama.nena gotamena saddhi.m kathaasallaapo bhavissatii''ti. tatrekacce licchavii evamaaha.msu -- ``ki.m sama.no gotamo saccakassa niga.n.thaputtassa vaada.m aaropessati, atha kho saccako niga.n.thaputto sama.nassa gotamassa vaada.m aaropessatii''ti? ekacce licchavii evamaaha.msu -- ``ki.m so bhavamaano saccako niga.n.thaputto yo bhagavato vaada.m aaropessati, atha kho bhagavaa saccakassa niga.n.thaputtassa vaada.m aaropessatii''ti? atha kho saccako ^a^T1.0425^ea^ niga.n.thaputto pa~ncamattehi licchavisatehi parivuto yena mahaavana.m kuu.taagaarasaalaa tenupasa"nkami.

[03] 355^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena sambahulaa bhikkhuu abbhokaase ca"nkamanti. atha kho saccako niga.n.thaputto yena te bhikkhuu tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa te bhikkhuu etadavoca -- ``kaha.m nu kho, bho, etarahi so bhava.m gotamo viharati? dassanakaamaa hi maya.m ta.m bhavanta.m gotama''nti ^a^V1.0295^ea^. ``esa, aggivessana, bhagavaa mahaavana.m ajjhogaahetvaa a~n~natarasmi.m rukkhamuule divaavihaara.m nisinno''ti. atha kho saccako niga.n.thaputto mahatiyaa licchaviparisaaya saddhi.m mahaavana.m ajjhogaahetvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. tepi kho licchavii appekacce bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu, appekacce bhagavataa ^a^M1.0292^ea^ saddhi.m sammodi.msu, sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. appekacce yena bhagavaa tena~njali.m pa.naametvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu, appekacce bhagavato santike naamagotta.m saavetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu, appekacce tu.nhiibhuutaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu.

[03] 356^b^.^eb^ ekamanta.m nisinno kho saccako niga.n.thaputto bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``puccheyyaaha.m bhavanta.m gotama.m ki~ncideva desa.m, sace me bhava.m gotamo okaasa.m karoti pa~nhassa veyyaakara.naayaa''ti. ``puccha, aggivessana ^a^T1.0426^ea^, yadaaka"nkhasii''ti ^a^P1.0230^ea^. ``katha.m pana bhava.m gotamo saavake vineti, katha.mbhaagaa ca pana bhoto gotamassa saavakesu anusaasanii bahulaa pavattatii''ti? ``eva.m kho aha.m, aggivessana, saavake vinemi, eva.mbhaagaa ca pana me saavakesu anusaasanii bahulaa pavattati -- `ruupa.m, bhikkhave, anicca.m, vedanaa aniccaa, sa~n~naa aniccaa, sa"nkhaaraa aniccaa, vi~n~naa.na.m anicca.m. ruupa.m, bhikkhave, anattaa, vedanaa anattaa, sa~n~naa anattaa, sa"nkhaaraa anattaa, vi~n~naa.na.m anattaa. sabbe sa"nkhaaraa aniccaa, sabbe dhammaa anattaa'ti. eva.m kho aha.m, aggivessana, saavake vinemi, eva.mbhaagaa ca pana me saavakesu anusaasanii bahulaa pavattatii''ti.
[03] ``upamaa ma.m, bho gotama, pa.tibhaatii''ti. ``pa.tibhaatu ta.m, aggivessanaa''ti bhagavaa avoca.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bho gotama, ye kecime biijagaamabhuutagaamaa vuddhi.m viruu.lhi.m vepulla.m aapajjanti, sabbe te pathavi.m nissaaya pathaviya.m pati.t.thaaya. evamete biijagaamabhuutagaamaa vuddhi.m viruu.lhi.m vepulla.m aapajjanti. seyyathaapi vaa pana, bho gotama, ye kecime balakara.niiyaa kammantaa kariiyanti, sabbe te pathavi.m nissaaya pathaviya.m pati.t.thaaya. evamete balakara.niiyaa kammantaa kariiyanti. evameva kho, bho gotama, ruupattaaya.m purisapuggalo ruupe pati.t.thaaya pu~n~na.m vaa apu~n~na.m vaa pasavati, vedanattaaya.m purisapuggalo vedanaaya.m pati.t.thaaya pu~n~na.m vaa ^a^V1.0296^ea^ apu~n~na.m vaa pasavati, sa~n~nattaaya.m purisapuggalo sa~n~naaya.m pati.t.thaaya pu~n~na.m vaa apu~n~na.m vaa pasavati, sa"nkhaarattaaya.m purisapuggalo sa"nkhaaresu ^a^T1.0427^ea^ pati.t.thaaya pu~n~na.m vaa apu~n~na.m vaa pasavati, vi~n~naa.nattaaya.m purisapuggalo vi~n~naa.ne pati.t.thaaya pu~n~na.m vaa apu~n~na.m vaa pasavatii''ti.

[03] ``nanu tva.m, aggivessana, eva.m vadesi -- `ruupa.m me attaa, vedanaa me attaa, sa~n~naa me attaa, sa"nkhaaraa me attaa, vi~n~naa.na.m me attaa'''ti? ``aha~nhi, bho gotama ^a^M1.0293^ea^, eva.m vadaami -- `ruupa.m me attaa, vedanaa me attaa, sa~n~naa me attaa, sa"nkhaaraa me attaa, vi~n~naa.na.m me attaa'ti, aya~nca mahatii janataa''ti.

[03] ``ki~nhi te, aggivessana, mahatii janataa karissati? i"ngha tva.m, aggivessana, saka~n~neva vaada.m nibbe.thehii''ti. ``aha~nhi, bho gotama, eva.m vadaami -- `ruupa.m me attaa, vedanaa me attaa, sa~n~naa me attaa, sa"nkhaaraa me attaa, vi~n~naa.na.m me attaa'''ti.

[03] 357^b^.^eb^ ``tena hi, aggivessana, ta~n~nevettha pa.tipucchissaami, yathaa te khameyya tathaa na.m {tathaa ta.m (ka0)} byaakareyyaasi. ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi ^a^P1.0231^ea^, aggivessana, vatteyya ra~n~no khattiyassa muddhaavasittassa sakasmi.m vijite vaso -- ghaatetaaya.m vaa ghaatetu.m, jaapetaaya.m vaa jaapetu.m, pabbaajetaaya.m vaa pabbaajetu.m, seyyathaapi ra~n~no pasenadissa kosalassa, seyyathaapi vaa pana ra~n~no maagadhassa ajaatasattussa vedehiputtassaa''ti? ``vatteyya, bho gotama, ra~n~no khattiyassa muddhaavasittassa sakasmi.m vijite vaso -- ghaatetaaya.m vaa ghaatetu.m, jaapetaaya.m vaa jaapetu.m, pabbaajetaaya.m vaa pabbaajetu.m, seyyathaapi ra~n~no pasenadissa kosalassa, seyyathaapi vaa pana ra~n~no maagadhassa ajaatasattussa vedehiputtassa. imesampi hi, bho gotama, sa"nghaana.m ga.naana.m -- seyyathida.m, vajjiina.m mallaana.m -- vattati sakasmi.m vijite vaso -- ghaatetaaya.m vaa ghaatetu.m, jaapetaaya.m vaa jaapetu.m, pabbaajetaaya.m vaa pabbaajetu.m. ki.m pana ra~n~no khattiyassa muddhaavasittassa, seyyathaapi ra~n~no pasenadissa kosalassa ^a^T1.0428^ea^, seyyathaapi vaa pana ra~n~no maagadhassa ajaatasattussa vedehiputtassa? vatteyya, bho gotama, vattitu~nca marahatii''ti.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, aggivessana, ya.m tva.m eva.m vadesi -- `ruupa.m me attaa'ti, vattati te ^a^V1.0297^ea^ tasmi.m ruupe vaso -- eva.m me ruupa.m hotu, eva.m me ruupa.m maa ahosii''ti? eva.m vutte, saccako niga.n.thaputto tu.nhii ahosi. dutiyampi kho bhagavaa saccaka.m niga.n.thaputta.m etadavoca -- ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, aggivessana, ya.m tva.m eva.m vadesi -- `ruupa.m me attaa'ti, vattati te tasmi.m ruupe vaso -- eva.m me ruupa.m hotu, eva.m me ruupa.m maa ahosii''ti? dutiyampi ^a^M1.0294^ea^ kho saccako niga.n.thaputto tu.nhii ahosi. atha kho bhagavaa saccaka.m niga.n.thaputta.m etadavoca -- ``byaakarohi daani, aggivessana, na daani te tu.nhiibhaavassa kaalo. yo koci, aggivessana tathaagatena yaavatatiya.m sahadhammika.m pa~nha.m pu.t.tho na byaakaroti, etthevassa sattadhaa muddhaa phalatii''ti.

[03] tena kho pana samayena vajirapaa.ni yakkho aayasa.m vajira.m aadaaya aaditta.m sampajjalita.m sajotibhuuta.m saccakassa niga.n.thaputtassa uparivehaasa.m .thito hoti -- `sacaaya.m ^a^T1.0429^ea^ saccako niga.n.thaputto bhagavataa yaavatatiya.m sahadhammika.m pa~nha.m pu.t.tho na byaakarissati etthevassa sattadhaa muddha.m phaalessaamii'ti. ta.m kho pana vajirapaa.ni.m yakkha.m bhagavaa ceva passati saccako ca niga.n.thaputto. atha kho saccako niga.n.thaputto bhiito sa.mviggo lomaha.t.thajaato bhagavanta.myeva ^a^P1.0232^ea^ taa.na.m gavesii bhagavanta.myeva le.na.m gavesii bhagavanta.myeva sara.na.m gavesii bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``pucchatu ma.m bhava.m gotamo, byaakarissaamii''ti.

[03] 358^b^.^eb^ ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, aggivessana, ya.m tva.m eva.m vadesi -- `ruupa.m me attaa'ti, vattati te tasmi.m ruupe vaso -- eva.m me ruupa.m hotu, eva.m me ruupa.m maa ahosii''ti? ``no hida.m, bho gotama''.

[03] ``manasi karohi, aggivessana; manasi karitvaa kho, aggivessana, byaakarohi. na kho te sandhiyati purimena vaa pacchima.m pacchimena vaa purima.m. ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, aggivessana, ya.m tva.m eva.m vadesi -- `vedanaa me attaa'ti, vattati te tissa.m vedanaaya.m {taaya.m vedanaaya.m (sii0 syaa0)} vaso -- eva.m me vedanaa hotu, eva.m me vedanaa maa ahosii''ti? ``no hida.m, bho gotama''.

[03] ``manasi karohi, aggivessana; manasi karitvaa kho, aggivessana, byaakarohi. na kho te sandhiyati purimena vaa pacchima.m, pacchimena vaa purima.m. ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, aggivessana ^a^V1.0298^ea^, ya.m tva.m eva.m vadesi -- `sa~n~naa me attaa'ti, vattati te tissa.m sa~n~naaya.m vaso -- eva.m me sa~n~naa hotu, eva.m me sa~n~naa maa ahosii''ti? ``no hida.m, bho gotama''.

[03] ``manasi ^a^M1.0295^ea^ karohi, aggivessana ^a^T1.0430^ea^; manasi karitvaa kho, aggivessana, byaakarohi. na kho te sandhiyati purimena vaa pacchima.m, pacchimena vaa purima.m. ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, aggivessana, ya.m tva.m eva.m vadesi -- `sa"nkhaaraa me attaa'ti, vattati te tesu sa"nkhaaresu vaso -- eva.m me sa"nkhaaraa hontu, eva.m me sa"nkhaaraa maa ahesu''nti? ``no hida.m, bho gotama''.

[03] ``manasi karohi, aggivessana; manasi karitvaa kho, aggivessana, byaakarohi. na kho te sandhiyati purimena vaa pacchima.m, pacchimena vaa purima.m. ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, aggivessana, ya.m tva.m eva.m vadesi -- `vi~n~naa.na.m me attaa'ti, vattati te tasmi.m vi~n~naa.ne vaso -- eva.m me vi~n~naa.na.m hotu, eva.m me vi~n~naa.na.m maa ahosii''ti? ``no hida.m, bho gotama''.

[03] ``manasi karohi, aggivessana; manasi karitvaa kho, aggivessana, byaakarohi. na kho te sandhiyati purimena vaa pacchima.m, pacchimena vaa purima.m. ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, aggivessana, ruupa.m nicca.m vaa anicca.m vaa''ti? ``anicca.m, bho gotama''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vaa ta.m sukha.m vaa''ti? ``dukkha.m, bho gotama''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vipari.naamadhamma.m, kalla.m nu ta.m samanupassitu.m -- `eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso ^a^P1.0233^ea^ me attaa'''ti? ``no hida.m, bho gotama''.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, aggivessana, vedanaa...pe0... sa~n~naa...pe0... sa"nkhaaraa...pe0... ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, aggivessana, vi~n~naa.na.m nicca.m vaa anicca.m vaa''ti? ``anicca.m, bho gotama''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vaa ta.m sukha.m vaa''ti? ``dukkha.m, bho gotama''. ``ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vipari.naamadhamma.m, kalla.m nu ta.m samanupassitu.m ^a^T1.0431^ea^ -- `eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso me attaa'''ti? ``no hida.m, bho gotama''.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, aggivessana, yo nu kho dukkha.m alliino dukkha.m upagato dukkha.m ajjhosito ^a^V1.0299^ea^, dukkha.m `eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso me attaa'ti samanupassati, api nu kho so saama.m vaa dukkha.m parijaaneyya, dukkha.m vaa parikkhepetvaa vihareyyaa''ti? ``ki~nhi siyaa, bho gotama? no hida.m, bho gotamaa''ti.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, aggivessana, nanu tva.m eva.m sante dukkha.m alliino dukkha.m upagato dukkha.m ajjhosito, dukkha.m -- `eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso me attaa'ti samanupassasii''ti? ``ki~nhi no siyaa, bho gotama? evameta.m bho gotamaa''ti.

[03] 359^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi ^a^M1.0296^ea^, aggivessana, puriso saaratthiko saaragavesii saarapariyesana.m caramaano ti.nha.m ku.thaari.m {kudhaari.m (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} aadaaya vana.m paviseyya. so tattha passeyya mahanta.m kadalikkhandha.m uju.m nava.m akukkukajaata.m {akukku.tajaata.m (syaa0 ka.m0)}. tamena.m muule chindeyya, muule chetvaa agge chindeyya, agge chetvaa pattava.t.ti.m vinibbhujeyya {vinibbhujjeyya (ka0)}. so tattha pattava.t.ti.m vinibbhujanto pheggumpi naadhigaccheyya, kuto saara.m? evameva kho tva.m, aggivessana, mayaa sakasmi.m vaade samanuyu~njiyamaano samanugaahiyamaano samanubhaasiyamaano ritto tuccho aparaddho. bhaasitaa kho pana te esaa, aggivessana, vesaaliya.m parisati vaacaa -- `naaha.m ta.m passaami sama.na.m vaa braahma.na.m vaa, sa"nghi.m ga.ni.m ga.naacariya.m, api arahanta.m sammaasambuddha.m pa.tijaanamaana.m, yo mayaa vaadena vaada.m samaaraddho na sa"nkampeyya na sampakampeyya na ^a^T1.0432^ea^ sampavedheyya, yassa na kacchehi sedaa mucceyyu.m. thuu.na.m cepaaha.m acetana.m vaadena vaada.m samaarabheyya.m saapi mayaa vaadena vaada.m samaaraddhaa sa"nkampeyya sampakampeyya sampavedheyya. ko pana vaado manussabhuutassaa'ti? tuyha.m kho pana, aggivessana, appekaccaani sedaphusitaani nalaa.taa muttaani, uttaraasa"nga.m vinibhinditvaa bhuumiya.m pati.t.thitaani. mayha.m kho pana, aggivessana, natthi etarahi kaayasmi.m sedo''ti. iti bhagavaa tasmi.m {tassa.m (?)} parisati suva.n.nava.n.na.m kaaya.m vivari. eva.m ^a^P1.0234^ea^ vutte, saccako niga.n.thaputto tu.nhiibhuuto ma"nkubhuuto pattakkhandho adhomukho pajjhaayanto appa.tibhaano nisiidi.

[03] 360^b^.^eb^ atha kho dummukho licchaviputto saccaka.m niga.n.thaputta.m tu.nhiibhuuta.m ma"nkubhuuta.m pattakkhandha.m adhomukha.m pajjhaayanta.m appa.tibhaana.m viditvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``upamaa ma.m, bhagavaa, pa.tibhaatii''ti. ``pa.tibhaatu ta.m, dummukhaa''ti bhagavaa avoca. ``seyyathaapi, bhante, gaamassa vaa nigamassa vaa aviduure pokkhara.nii. tatraassa kakka.tako. atha kho, bhante, sambahulaa ^a^V1.0300^ea^ kumaarakaa vaa kumaarikaa vaa tamhaa gaamaa vaa nigamaa vaa nikkhamitvaa yena saa pokkhara.nii tenupasa"nkameyyu.m; upasa"nkamitvaa ta.m pokkhara.ni.m ogaahetvaa ta.m kakka.taka.m udakaa uddharitvaa thale pati.t.thaapeyyu.m. ya~n~nadeva hi so, bhante, kakka.tako a.la.m abhininnaameyya ta.m tadeva te kumaarakaa vaa kumaarikaa vaa ka.t.thena vaa kathalena vaa sa~nchindeyyu.m sambha~njeyyu.m ^a^M1.0297^ea^ sampalibha~njeyyu.m. eva~nhi ^a^T1.0433^ea^ so, bhante, kakka.tako sabbehi a.lehi sa~nchinnehi sambhaggehi sampalibhaggehi abhabbo ta.m pokkhara.ni.m puna otaritu.m, seyyathaapi pubbe. evameva kho, bhante, yaani saccakassa niga.n.thaputtassa visuukaayitaani visevitaani vipphanditaani taanipi sabbaani {vipphanditaani kaanici kaanici taani (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} bhagavataa sa~nchinnaani sambhaggaani sampalibhaggaani; abhabbo ca daani, bhante, saccako niga.n.thaputto puna bhagavanta.m upasa"nkamitu.m yadida.m vaadaadhippaayo''ti. eva.m vutte, saccako niga.n.thaputto dummukha.m licchaviputta.m etadavoca -- ``aagamehi tva.m, dummukha, aagamehi tva.m, dummukha ( ) {(mukharosi tva.m dummukha) (syaa0 ka.m0)} na maya.m tayaa saddhi.m mantema, idha maya.m bhotaa gotamena saddhi.m mantema.

[03] 361^b^.^eb^ ``ti.t.thatesaa, bho gotama, amhaaka~nceva a~n~nesa~nca puthusama.nabraahma.naana.m vaacaa. vilaapa.m vilapita.m ma~n~ne. kittaavataa ca nu kho bhoto gotamassa saavako saasanakaro hoti ovaadapatikaro ti.n.navicikiccho vigatakatha.mkatho vesaarajjappatto aparappaccayo satthusaasane viharatii''ti? ``idha, aggivessana, mama saavako ya.m ki~nci ruupa.m atiitaanaagatapaccuppanna.m ajjhatta.m vaa bahiddhaa vaa o.laarika.m vaa sukhuma.m vaa hiina.m vaa pa.niita.m vaa ya.m duure santike vaa, sabba.m ruupa.m `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti evameta.m ^a^P1.0235^ea^ yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya passati; yaa kaaci vedanaa...pe0... yaa kaaci sa~n~naa...pe0... ye keci sa"nkhaaraa...pe0... ya.m ki~nci vi~n~naa.na.m atiitaanaagatapaccuppanna.m ajjhatta.m vaa bahiddhaa vaa o.laarika.m vaa sukhuma.m vaa hiina.m vaa pa.niita.m vaa, ya.m duure santike vaa, sabba.m vi~n~naa.na.m `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya passati. ettaavataa kho, aggivessana, mama saavako saasanakaro hoti ovaadapatikaro ti.n.navicikiccho vigatakatha.mkatho vesaarajjappatto aparappaccayo satthusaasane viharatii''ti.

[03] ``kittaavataa ^a^V1.0301^ea^ pana, bho gotama, bhikkhu araha.m hoti khii.naasavo vusitavaa katakara.niiyo ohitabhaaro anuppattasadattho parikkhii.nabhavasa.myojano sammada~n~naa vimutto''ti? ``idha, aggivessana, bhikkhu ya.m ki~nci ruupa.m atiitaanaagatapaccuppanna.m ajjhatta.m vaa bahiddhaa vaa o.laarika.m vaa sukhuma.m vaa hiina.m vaa pa.niita.m vaa ya.m duure santike vaa sabba.m ruupa.m `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na ^a^M1.0298^ea^ meso attaa'ti evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya disvaa anupaadaa vimutto hoti; yaa kaaci vedanaa...pe0... yaa kaaci sa~n~naa...pe0... ye keci sa"nkhaaraa...pe0... ya.m ki~nci vi~n~naa.na.m atiitaanaagatapaccuppanna.m ajjhatta.m vaa bahiddhaa vaa o.laarika.m vaa sukhuma.m vaa hiina.m vaa ^a^T1.0434^ea^ pa.niita.m vaa ya.m duure santike vaa sabba.m vi~n~naa.na.m `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya disvaa anupaadaa vimutto hoti. ettaavataa kho, aggivessana, bhikkhu araha.m hoti khii.naasavo vusitavaa katakara.niiyo ohitabhaaro anuppattasadattho parikkhii.nabhavasa.myojano sammada~n~naa vimutto. eva.m vimuttacitto kho, aggivessana, bhikkhu tiihi anuttariyehi samannaagato ^a^T1.0435^ea^ hoti -- dassanaanuttariyena, pa.tipadaanuttariyena, vimuttaanuttariyena. eva.m vimuttacitto kho, aggivessana, bhikkhu tathaagata~n~neva sakkaroti garu.m karoti maaneti puujeti -- buddho so bhagavaa bodhaaya dhamma.m deseti, danto so bhagavaa damathaaya dhamma.m deseti, santo so bhagavaa samathaaya dhamma.m deseti, ti.n.no so bhagavaa tara.naaya dhamma.m deseti, parinibbuto so bhagavaa parinibbaanaaya dhamma.m desetii''ti.

[03] 362^b^.^eb^ eva.m vutte, saccako niga.n.thaputto bhagavanta.m etadavoca ^a^P1.0236^ea^ -- ``mayameva, bho gotama, dha.msii, maya.m pagabbaa, ye maya.m bhavanta.m gotama.m vaadena vaada.m aasaadetabba.m ama~n~nimha. siyaa hi, bho gotama, hatthi.m pabhinna.m aasajja purisassa sotthibhaavo, na tveva bhavanta.m gotama.m aasajja siyaa purisassa sotthibhaavo. siyaa hi, bho gotama, pajjalita.m {jalanta.m (sii0 pii0)} aggikkhandha.m aasajja purisassa sotthibhaavo ^a^V1.0302^ea^, na tveva bhavanta.m gotama.m aasajja siyaa purisassa sotthibhaavo. siyaa hi, bho gotama, aasiivisa.m ghoravisa.m aasajja purisassa sotthibhaavo, na tveva bhavanta.m gotama.m aasajja siyaa purisassa sotthibhaavo. mayameva, bho gotama, dha.msii, maya.m pagabbaa, ye maya.m bhavanta.m gotama.m vaadena vaada.m aasaadetabba.m ama~n~nimha. adhivaasetu {adhivaasetu ca (pii0 ka0)} me bhava.m gotamo svaatanaaya bhatta.m saddhi.m bhikkhusa"nghenaa''ti. adhivaasesi bhagavaa tu.nhiibhaavena.

[03] 363^b^.^eb^ atha kho saccako niga.n.thaputto bhagavato adhivaasana.m viditvaa te licchavii aamantesi -- ``su.nantu me bhonto licchavii, sama.no ^a^M1.0299^ea^ me gotamo nimantito svaatanaaya saddhi.m ^a^T1.0436^ea^ bhikkhusa"nghena. tena me abhihareyyaatha yamassa patiruupa.m ma~n~neyyaathaa''ti. atha kho te licchavii tassaa rattiyaa accayena saccakassa niga.n.thaputtassa pa~ncamattaani thaalipaakasataani bhattaabhihaara.m abhihari.msu. atha kho niga.n.thaputto sake aaraame pa.niita.m khaadaniiya.m bhojaniiya.m pa.tiyaadaapetvaa bhagavato kaala.m aarocaapesi -- ``kaalo, bho gotama, ni.t.thita.m bhatta''nti. atha kho bhagavaa pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya yena saccakassa niga.n.thaputtassa aaraamo tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi saddhi.m bhikkhusa"nghena. atha kho saccako niga.n.thaputto buddhappamukha.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m pa.niitena khaadaniiyena bhojaniiyena sahatthaa santappesi sampavaaresi. atha kho saccako niga.n.thaputto bhagavanta.m bhuttaavi.m oniitapattapaa.ni.m a~n~natara.m niica.m aasana.m gahetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho saccako niga.n.thaputto bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``yamida.m, bho gotama, daane pu~n~na~nca pu~n~namahii ca ta.m daayakaana.m sukhaaya hotuu''ti. ``ya.m kho, aggivessana, taadisa.m dakkhi.neyya.m aagamma aviitaraaga.m aviitadosa.m aviitamoha.m, ta.m ^a^P1.0237^ea^ daayakaana.m bhavissati. ya.m kho, aggivessana, maadisa.m dakkhi.neyya.m aagamma viitaraaga.m viitadosa.m viitamoha.m, ta.m tuyha.m bhavissatii''ti.
[06] cuu.lasaccakasutta.m ni.t.thita.m pa~ncama.m.
