[03] 364^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T1.0437^ea^ ^a^V1.0303^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa vesaaliya.m viharati mahaavane kuu.taagaarasaalaaya.m. tena kho pana samayena bhagavaa pubba.nhasamaya.m sunivattho hoti pattaciivaramaadaaya vesaali.m pi.n.daaya pavisitukaamo {pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya... pavisitukaamo hoti (sii0)}. atha kho saccako niga.n.thaputto ja"nghaavihaara.m anuca"nkamamaano anuvicaramaano yena mahaavana.m kuu.taagaarasaalaa tenupasa"nkami. addasaa kho aayasmaa aanando saccaka.m niga.n.thaputta.m duuratova aagacchanta.m. disvaana bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``aya.m, bhante, saccako ^a^M1.0300^ea^ niga.n.thaputto aagacchati bhassappavaadako pa.n.ditavaado saadhusammato bahujanassa. eso kho, bhante, ava.n.nakaamo buddhassa, ava.n.nakaamo dhammassa, ava.n.nakaamo sa"nghassa. saadhu, bhante, bhagavaa muhutta.m nisiidatu anukampa.m upaadaayaa''ti. nisiidi bhagavaa pa~n~natte aasane. atha kho saccako niga.n.thaputto yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi, sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho saccako niga.n.thaputto bhagavanta.m etadavoca --

[03] 365^b^.^eb^ ``santi, bho gotama, eke sama.nabraahma.naa kaayabhaavanaanuyogamanuyuttaa viharanti, no cittabhaavana.m. phusanti hi te, bho gotama, saariirika.m dukkha.m vedana.m. bhuutapubba.m, bho gotama, saariirikaaya dukkhaaya vedanaaya phu.t.thassa sato uurukkhambhopi naama bhavissati, hadayampi naama ^a^T1.0438^ea^ phalissati, u.nhampi lohita.m mukhato uggamissati, ummaadampi paapu.nissati {paapu.nissanti (syaa0 ka.m0)} cittakkhepa.m. tassa kho eta.m, bho gotama, kaayanvaya.m citta.m hoti, kaayassa vasena vattati. ta.m kissa hetu? abhaavitattaa ^a^P1.0238^ea^ cittassa. santi pana, bho gotama, eke sama.nabraahma.naa cittabhaavanaanuyogamanuyuttaa viharanti, no kaayabhaavana.m. phusanti hi te, bho gotama, cetasika.m dukkha.m vedana.m. bhuutapubba.m, bho gotama, cetasikaaya dukkhaaya vedanaaya phu.t.thassa sato uurukkhambhopi naama bhavissati, hadayampi naama phalissati, u.nhampi lohita.m mukhato uggamissati, ummaadampi paapu.nissati cittakkhepa.m. tassa kho eso, bho gotama, cittanvayo kaayo hoti, cittassa vasena vattati. ta.m kissa hetu? abhaavitattaa kaayassa ^a^V1.0304^ea^. tassa mayha.m, bho gotama, eva.m hoti -- `addhaa bhoto gotamassa saavakaa cittabhaavanaanuyogamanuyuttaa viharanti, no kaayabhaavana'''nti.

[03] 366^b^.^eb^ ``kinti pana te, aggivessana, kaayabhaavanaa sutaa''ti? ``seyyathida.m -- nando vaccho, kiso sa.mkicco, makkhali gosaalo -- etehi, bho gotama, acelakaa muttaacaaraa hatthaapalekhanaa naehibhaddantikaa nati.t.thabhaddantikaa {naehibhadantikaa, nati.t.thabhadantikaa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0 ka0)} na abhiha.ta.m na uddissakata.m na nimantana.m saadiyanti, te na kumbhimukhaa ^a^M1.0301^ea^ pa.tigga.nhanti na ka.lopimukhaa pa.tigga.nhanti na e.lakamantara.m na da.n.damantara.m na musalamantara.m na dvinna.m bhu~njamaanaana.m na gabbhiniyaa na paayamaanaaya na purisantaragataaya na sa"nkittiisu na yattha saa upa.t.thito hoti na yattha makkhikaa sa.n.dasa.n.dacaarinii ^a^T1.0439^ea^, na maccha.m na ma.msa.m na sura.m na meraya.m na thusodaka.m pivanti. te ekaagaarikaa vaa honti ekaalopikaa, dvaagaarikaa vaa honti dvaalopikaa...pe0... sattaagaarikaa vaa honti sattaalopikaa. ekissaapi dattiyaa yaapenti, dviihipi dattiihi yaapenti...pe0... sattahipi dattiihi yaapenti. ekaahikampi aahaara.m aahaarenti, dviihikampi aahaara.m aahaarenti...pe0... sattaahikampi aahaara.m aahaarenti. iti evaruupa.m addhamaasikampi pariyaayabhattabhojanaanuyogamanuyuttaa viharantii''ti.

[03] ``ki.m pana te, aggivessana, taavatakeneva yaapentii''ti? ``no hida.m, bho gotama. appekadaa, bho gotama, u.laaraani u.laaraani khaadaniiyaani khaadanti, u.laaraani u.laaraani bhojanaani bhu~njanti, u.laaraani u.laaraani saayaniiyaani saayanti, u.laaraani u.laaraani paanaani pivanti. te ima.m kaaya.m bala.m gaahenti naama, bruuhenti naama, medenti naamaa''ti.

[03] ``ya.m kho te, aggivessana, purima.m pahaaya pacchaa upacinanti, eva.m imassa kaayassa aacayaapacayo hoti. kinti pana te, aggivessana, cittabhaavanaa sutaa''ti? cittabhaavanaaya kho ^a^P1.0239^ea^ saccako niga.n.thaputto bhagavataa pu.t.tho samaano na sampaayaasi.

[03] 367^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa saccaka.m niga.n.thaputta.m etadavoca -- ``yaapi kho te esaa, aggivessana, purimaa kaayabhaavanaa bhaasitaa saapi ariyassa vinaye no dhammikaa kaayabhaavanaa. kaayabhaavanampi {kaayabhaavana.m hi (sii0 pii0 ka0)} kho tva.m, aggivessana, na a~n~naasi, kuto pana tva.m cittabhaavana.m ^a^V1.0305^ea^ jaanissasi ^a^T1.0440^ea^? api ca, aggivessana, yathaa abhaavitakaayo ca hoti abhaavitacitto ca, bhaavitakaayo ca hoti bhaavitacitto ca. ta.m su.naahi, saadhuka.m manasi karohi, bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bho''ti kho saccako niga.n.thaputto bhagavato paccassosi. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] 368^b^.^eb^ ``katha~nca ^a^M1.0302^ea^, aggivessana, abhaavitakaayo ca hoti abhaavitacitto ca? idha, aggivessana, assutavato puthujjanassa uppajjati sukhaa vedanaa. so sukhaaya vedanaaya phu.t.tho samaano sukhasaaraagii ca hoti sukhasaaraagita~nca aapajjati. tassa saa sukhaa vedanaa nirujjhati. sukhaaya vedanaaya nirodhaa uppajjati dukkhaa vedanaa. so dukkhaaya vedanaaya phu.t.tho samaano socati kilamati paridevati urattaa.li.m kandati sammoha.m aapajjati. tassa kho esaa, aggivessana, uppannaapi sukhaa vedanaa citta.m pariyaadaaya ti.t.thati abhaavitattaa kaayassa, uppannaapi dukkhaa vedanaa citta.m pariyaadaaya ti.t.thati abhaavitattaa cittassa. yassa kassaci, aggivessana, eva.m ubhatopakkha.m uppannaapi sukhaa vedanaa citta.m pariyaadaaya ti.t.thati abhaavitattaa kaayassa, uppannaapi dukkhaa vedanaa citta.m pariyaadaaya ti.t.thati abhaavitattaa cittassa, eva.m kho, aggivessana, abhaavitakaayo ca hoti abhaavitacitto ca.

[03] 369^b^.^eb^ ``katha~nca, aggivessana, bhaavitakaayo ca hoti bhaavitacitto ca? idha, aggivessana, sutavato ariyasaavakassa uppajjati sukhaa vedanaa. so sukhaaya vedanaaya phu.t.tho samaano na sukhasaaraagii ^a^T1.0441^ea^ ca hoti, na sukhasaaraagita~nca aapajjati. tassa saa sukhaa vedanaa nirujjhati. sukhaaya vedanaaya nirodhaa uppajjati dukkhaa vedanaa. so dukkhaaya vedanaaya phu.t.tho samaano na socati na kilamati na paridevati na urattaa.li.m kandati na sammoha.m aapajjati. tassa kho esaa, aggivessana, uppannaapi sukhaa vedanaa citta.m na pariyaadaaya ti.t.thati bhaavitattaa kaayassa, uppannaapi dukkhaa vedanaa citta.m na pariyaadaaya ti.t.thati bhaavitattaa cittassa. yassa kassaci, aggivessana, eva.m ubhatopakkha.m uppannaapi sukhaa vedanaa citta.m ^a^P1.0240^ea^ na pariyaadaaya ti.t.thati bhaavitattaa kaayassa, uppannaapi dukkhaa vedanaa citta.m na pariyaadaaya ti.t.thati bhaavitattaa cittassa. eva.m kho, aggivessana, bhaavitakaayo ca hoti bhaavitacitto caa''ti.

[03] 370^b^.^eb^ ``eva.m pasanno aha.m bhoto gotamassa! bhava~nhi gotamo bhaavitakaayo ca hoti bhaavitacitto caa''ti ^a^V1.0306^ea^. ``addhaa kho te aya.m, aggivessana, aasajja upaniiya vaacaa bhaasitaa, api ca te aha.m byaakarissaami ^a^M1.0303^ea^. yato kho aha.m, aggivessana, kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadetvaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito, ta.m vata me uppannaa vaa sukhaa vedanaa citta.m pariyaadaaya .thassati, uppannaa vaa dukkhaa vedanaa citta.m pariyaadaaya .thassatiiti neta.m .thaana.m {neta.m kho.thaana.m (sii0 pii0)} vijjatii''ti.

[03] ``na hi nuuna {na hanuuna (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} bhoto gotamassa uppajjati tathaaruupaa sukhaa vedanaa yathaaruupaa uppannaa sukhaa vedanaa citta.m pariyaadaaya ti.t.theyya; na hi nuuna bhoto gotamassa uppajjati ^a^T1.0442^ea^ tathaaruupaa dukkhaa vedanaa yathaaruupaa uppannaa dukkhaa vedanaa citta.m pariyaadaaya ti.t.theyyaa''ti.

[03] 371^b^.^eb^ ``ki~nhi no siyaa, aggivessana? idha me, aggivessana, pubbeva sambodhaa anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato etadahosi -- `sambaadho gharaavaaso rajaapatho, abbhokaaso pabbajjaa. nayida.m sukara.m agaara.m ajjhaavasataa ekantaparipu.n.na.m ekantaparisuddha.m sa"nkhalikhita.m brahmacariya.m caritu.m. ya.mnuunaaha.m kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadetvaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajeyya'nti. so kho aha.m, aggivessana, aparena samayena daharova samaano, susukaa.lakeso bhadrena yobbanena samannaagato pa.thamena vayasaa, akaamakaana.m maataapituuna.m assumukhaana.m rudantaana.m, kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadetvaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbaji.m. so eva.m pabbajito samaano ki.mkusalagavesii anuttara.m santivarapada.m pariyesamaano yena aa.laaro kaalaamo tenupasa"nkami.m; upasa"nkamitvaa aa.laara.m kaalaama.m etadavoca.m -- `icchaamaha.m, aavuso kaalaama, imasmi.m dhammavinaye brahmacariya.m caritu'nti. eva.m vutte, aggivessana, aa.laaro kaalaamo ma.m etadavoca -- `viharataayasmaa, taadiso aya.m dhammo yattha vi~n~nuu puriso nacirasseva saka.m aacariyaka.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja vihareyyaa'ti. so kho aha.m, aggivessana, nacirasseva khippameva ta.m dhamma.m pariyaapu.ni.m. so kho aha.m, aggivessana, taavatakeneva o.t.thapahatamattena lapitalaapanamattena ~naa.navaada~nca ^a^T1.0443^ea^ vadaami theravaada~nca, `jaanaami passaamii'ti ca pa.tijaanaami, aha~nceva a~n~ne ca. tassa mayha.m, aggivessana, etadahosi -- `na kho aa.laaro kaalaamo ima.m dhamma.m kevala.m saddhaamattakena saya.m abhi~n~naa ^a^M1.0304^ea^ sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharaamiiti pavedeti, addhaa aa.laaro kaalaamo ima.m dhamma.m jaana.m passa.m viharatii'''ti.

[03] ``atha khvaaha.m, aggivessana, yena aa.laaro kaalaamo tenupasa"nkami.m; upasa"nkamitvaa aa.laara.m ^a^V1.0307^ea^ kaalaama.m etadavoca.m -- `kittaavataa no, aavuso kaalaama, ima.m dhamma.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharaamiiti pavedesii'ti? eva.m vutte, aggivessana, aa.laaro kaalaamo aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m pavedesi. tassa mayha.m, aggivessana, etadahosi -- `na kho aa.laarasseva kaalaamassa atthi saddhaa, mayha.mpatthi saddhaa; na kho aa.laarasseva kaalaamassa atthi viiriya.m, mayha.mpatthi viiriya.m; na kho aa.laarasseva kaalaamassa atthi sati, mayha.mpatthi sati; na kho aa.laarasseva kaalaamassa atthi samaadhi, mayha.mpatthi samaadhi; na kho aa.laarasseva kaalaamassa atthi pa~n~naa, mayha.mpatthi pa~n~naa; ya.mnuunaaha.m ya.m dhamma.m aa.laaro kaalaamo saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharaamiiti pavedeti tassa dhammassa sacchikiriyaaya padaheyya'nti. so kho aha.m, aggivessana, nacirasseva khippameva ta.m dhamma.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja vihaasi.m.

[01] ``atha khvaaha.m, aggivessana, yena aa.laaro kaalaamo tenupasa"nkami.m; upasa"nkamitvaa aa.laara.m kaalaama.m etadavoca.m -- `ettaavataa no, aavuso kaalaama ^a^T1.0444^ea^, ima.m dhamma.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja pavedesii'ti? `ettaavataa kho aha.m, aavuso, ima.m dhamma.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja pavedemii'ti. `ahampi kho, aavuso, ettaavataa ima.m dhamma.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharaamii'ti. `laabhaa no, aavuso, suladdha.m no, aavuso, ye maya.m aayasmanta.m taadisa.m sabrahmacaari.m passaama. iti yaaha.m dhamma.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja pavedemi ta.m tva.m dhamma.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharasi; ya.m tva.m dhamma.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharasi tamaha.m dhamma.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja pavedemi. iti yaaha.m dhamma.m jaanaami ta.m tva.m dhamma.m jaanaasi; ya.m tva.m dhamma.m jaanaasi tamaha.m dhamma.m jaanaami. iti yaadiso aha.m taadiso tuva.m, yaadiso tuva.m taadiso aha.m. ehi daani, aavuso, ubhova santaa ima.m ga.na.m pariharaamaa'ti. iti ^a^M1.0305^ea^ kho, aggivessana, aa.laaro kaalaamo aacariyo me samaano (attano) {( ) natthi (sii0 pii0)} antevaasi.m ma.m samaana.m attanaa samasama.m .thapesi, u.laaraaya ca ma.m puujaaya puujesi. tassa mayha.m, aggivessana, etadahosi -- `naaya.m dhammo nibbidaaya na viraagaaya na nirodhaaya na upasamaaya na abhi~n~naaya na sambodhaaya na nibbaanaaya sa.mvattati, yaavadeva aaki~nca~n~naayatanuupapattiyaa'ti. so kho aha.m, aggivessana, ta.m dhamma.m anala"nkaritvaa tasmaa dhammaa nibbijja apakkami.m.

[03] 372^b^.^eb^ ``so kho aha.m, aggivessana, ki.mkusalagavesii anuttara.m santivarapada.m ^a^T1.0445^ea^ pariyesamaano ^a^V1.0308^ea^ yena udako raamaputto tenupasa"nkami.m; upasa"nkamitvaa udaka.m raamaputta.m etadavoca.m -- `icchaamaha.m, aavuso {passa ma0 ni0 1.278 paasaraasisutte} imasmi.m dhammavinaye brahmacariya.m caritu'nti. eva.m vutte, aggivessana, udako raamaputto ma.m etadavoca -- `viharataayasmaa, taadiso aya.m dhammo yattha vi~n~nuu puriso nacirasseva saka.m aacariyaka.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja vihareyyaa'ti. so kho aha.m, aggivessana, nacirasseva khippameva ta.m dhamma.m pariyaapu.ni.m. so kho aha.m, aggivessana, taavatakeneva o.t.thapahatamattena lapitalaapanamattena ~naa.navaada~nca vadaami theravaada~nca, `jaanaami passaamii'ti ca pa.tijaanaami, aha~nceva a~n~ne ca. tassa mayha.m, aggivessana, etadahosi -- `na kho raamo ima.m dhamma.m kevala.m saddhaamattakena saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharaamiiti pavedesi. addhaa raamo ima.m dhamma.m jaana.m passa.m vihaasii'ti. atha khvaaha.m, aggivessana, yena udako raamaputto tenupasa"nkami.m; upasa"nkamitvaa udaka.m raamaputta.m etadavoca.m -- `kittaavataa no, aavuso raamo, ima.m dhamma.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharaamiiti pavedesii'ti? eva.m vutte, aggivessana, udako raamaputto nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m pavedesi. tassa mayha.m, aggivessana, etadahosi -- `na kho raamasseva ahosi saddhaa, mayha.mpatthi saddhaa; na kho raamasseva ahosi viiriya.m, mayha.mpatthi viiriya.m; na kho raamasseva ahosi sati, mayha.mpatthi sati; na kho raamasseva ahosi samaadhi, mayha.mpatthi ^a^T1.0446^ea^ samaadhi; na kho raamasseva ahosi pa~n~naa, mayha.mpatthi pa~n~naa; ya.mnuunaaha.m ya.m dhamma.m raamo saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharaamiiti pavedesi tassa dhammassa sacchikiriyaaya ^a^M1.0306^ea^ padaheyya'nti. so kho aha.m, aggivessana, nacirasseva khippameva ta.m dhamma.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja vihaasi.m.

[03] ``atha khvaaha.m, aggivessana, yena udako raamaputto tenupasa"nkami.m; upasa"nkamitvaa udaka.m raamaputta.m etadavoca.m -- `ettaavataa no, aavuso, raamo ima.m dhamma.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja pavedesii'ti? `ettaavataa kho, aavuso, raamo ima.m dhamma.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja pavedesii'ti. `ahampi kho, aavuso, ettaavataa ima.m dhamma.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharaamii'ti. `laabhaa no, aavuso, suladdha.m no, aavuso, ye maya.m aayasmanta.m taadisa.m sabrahmacaari.m passaama. iti ya.m dhamma.m raamo saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja pavedesi, ta.m tva.m dhamma.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharasi; ya.m tva.m dhamma.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharasi, ta.m dhamma.m raamo saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja pavedesi. iti ya.m dhamma.m raamo abhi~n~naasi ta.m tva.m dhamma.m jaanaasi; ya.m tva.m dhamma.m jaanaasi ta.m dhamma.m raamo abhi~n~naasi. iti ^a^V1.0309^ea^ yaadiso raamo ahosi taadiso tuva.m; yaadiso tuva.m taadiso raamo ahosi. ehi daani, aavuso, tuva.m ima.m ga.na.m pariharaa'ti. iti kho, aggivessana, udako ^a^T1.0447^ea^ raamaputto sabrahmacaarii me samaano aacariya.t.thaane ca ma.m .thapesi, u.laaraaya ca ma.m puujaaya puujesi. tassa mayha.m, aggivessana, etadahosi -- `naaya.m dhammo nibbidaaya na viraagaaya na nirodhaaya na upasamaaya na abhi~n~naaya na sambodhaaya na nibbaanaaya sa.mvattati, yaavadeva nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanuupapattiyaa'ti. so kho aha.m, aggivessana, ta.m dhamma.m anala"nkaritvaa tasmaa dhammaa nibbijja apakkami.m.

[03] 373^b^.^eb^ ``so kho aha.m, aggivessana, ki.mkusalagavesii anuttara.m santivarapada.m pariyesamaano magadhesu anupubbena caarika.m caramaano yena uruvelaa senaanigamo tadavasari.m. tatthaddasa.m rama.niiya.m bhuumibhaaga.m, paasaadika~nca vanasa.n.da.m, nadi~nca sandanti.m setaka.m supatittha.m rama.niiya.m, samantaa ca gocaragaama.m. tassa mayha.m, aggivessana, etadahosi -- `rama.niiyo vata, bho, bhuumibhaago, paasaadiko ca vanasa.n.do, nadii ca sandati setakaa supatitthaa rama.niiyaa, samantaa ca gocaragaamo. ala.m vatida.m kulaputtassa padhaanatthikassa ^a^M1.0307^ea^ padhaanaayaa'ti. so kho aha.m, aggivessana, tattheva nisiidi.m `alamida.m padhaanaayaa'ti.

[03] 374^b^.^eb^ ``apissuma.m, aggivessana, tisso upamaa pa.tibha.msu anacchariyaa pubbe assutapubbaa. seyyathaapi, aggivessana, alla.m ka.t.tha.m sasneha.m udake nikkhitta.m. atha puriso aagaccheyya uttaraara.ni.m aadaaya -- `aggi.m abhinibbattessaami, tejo paatukarissaamii'ti. ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, aggivessana, api nu so puriso amu.m alla.m ka.t.tha.m sasneha.m, udake nikkhitta.m ^a^T1.0448^ea^, uttaraara.ni.m aadaaya abhimanthento aggi.m abhinibbatteyya, tejo paatukareyyaa''ti? ``no hida.m, bho gotama''. ``ta.m kissa hetu''? ``adu~nhi, bho gotama, alla.m ka.t.tha.m sasneha.m, ta~nca pana udake ^a^P1.0241^ea^ nikkhitta.m. yaavadeva ca pana so puriso kilamathassa vighaatassa bhaagii assaa''ti. ``evameva kho, aggivessana, ye hi keci sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa kaayena ceva cittena ca kaamehi avuupaka.t.thaa viharanti, yo ca nesa.m kaamesu kaamacchando kaamasneho kaamamucchaa kaamapipaasaa kaamapari.laaho, so ca ajjhatta.m na suppahiino hoti, na suppa.tippassaddho, opakkamikaa cepi te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa dukkhaa tibbaa kharaa ka.tukaa vedanaa vedayanti, abhabbaava te ~naa.naaya dassanaaya anuttaraaya sambodhaaya. no cepi te bhonto ^a^V1.0310^ea^ sama.nabraahma.naa opakkamikaa dukkhaa tibbaa kharaa ka.tukaa vedanaa vedayanti, abhabbaava te ~naa.naaya dassanaaya anuttaraaya sambodhaaya. aya.m kho ma.m, aggivessana, pa.thamaa upamaa pa.tibhaasi anacchariyaa pubbe assutapubbaa.

[03] 375^b^.^eb^ ``aparaapi kho ma.m, aggivessana, dutiyaa upamaa pa.tibhaasi anacchariyaa pubbe assutapubbaa. seyyathaapi, aggivessana, alla.m ka.t.tha.m sasneha.m, aarakaa udakaa thale nikkhitta.m. atha puriso aagaccheyya uttaraara.ni.m aadaaya -- `aggi.m abhinibbattessaami, tejo paatukarissaamii'ti. ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, aggivessana, api nu so puriso amu.m alla.m ka.t.tha.m sasneha.m, aarakaa udakaa thale nikkhitta.m, uttaraara.ni.m aadaaya ^a^T1.0449^ea^ abhimanthento aggi.m abhinibbatteyya tejo paatukareyyaa''ti? ``no hida.m, bho gotama''. ``ta.m kissa hetu''? ``adu~nhi, bho gotama, alla.m ka.t.tha.m sasneha.m, ki~ncaapi aarakaa udakaa thale nikkhitta.m. yaavadeva ca pana so puriso kilamathassa vighaatassa ^a^M1.0308^ea^ bhaagii assaati. evameva kho, aggivessana, ye hi keci sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa kaayena ceva cittena ca kaamehi vuupaka.t.thaa viharanti, yo ca nesa.m kaamesu kaamacchando kaamasneho kaamamucchaa kaamapipaasaa kaamapari.laaho so ca ajjhatta.m na suppahiino hoti, na suppa.tippassaddho, opakkamikaa cepi te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa dukkhaa tibbaa kharaa ka.tukaa vedanaa vedayanti, abhabbaava te ~naa.naaya dassanaaya anuttaraaya sambodhaaya. no cepi te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa opakkamikaa dukkhaa tibbaa kharaa ka.tukaa vedanaa vedayanti, abhabbaava te ~naa.naaya dassanaaya anuttaraaya sambodhaaya. aya.m kho ma.m, aggivessana, dutiyaa upamaa pa.tibhaasi anacchariyaa pubbe assutapubbaa''.

[03] 376^b^.^eb^ ``aparaapi kho ma.m, aggivessana, tatiyaa upamaa pa.tibhaasi anacchariyaa ^a^P1.0242^ea^ pubbe assutapubbaa. seyyathaapi, aggivessana, sukkha.m ka.t.tha.m ko.laapa.m, aarakaa udakaa thale nikkhitta.m. atha puriso aagaccheyya uttaraara.ni.m aadaaya -- `aggi.m abhinibbattessaami, tejo paatukarissaamii'ti. ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, aggivessana, api nu so puriso amu.m sukkha.m ka.t.tha.m ko.laapa.m, aarakaa udakaa thale nikkhitta.m, uttaraara.ni.m aadaaya ^a^T1.0450^ea^ abhimanthento aggi.m abhinibbatteyya, tejo paatukareyyaa''ti? ``eva.m, bho gotama''. ``ta.m kissa hetu''? ``adu~nhi, bho gotama, sukkha.m ka.t.tha.m ko.laapa.m, ta~nca pana aarakaa udakaa thale nikkhitta''nti ^a^V1.0311^ea^. ``evameva kho, aggivessana, ye hi keci sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa kaayena ceva cittena ca kaamehi vuupaka.t.thaa viharanti, yo ca nesa.m kaamesu kaamacchando kaamasneho kaamamucchaa kaamapipaasaa kaamapari.laaho, so ca ajjhatta.m suppahiino hoti suppa.tippassaddho, opakkamikaa cepi te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa dukkhaa tibbaa kharaa ka.tukaa vedanaa vedayanti, bhabbaava te ~naa.naaya dassanaaya anuttaraaya sambodhaaya. no cepi te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa opakkamikaa dukkhaa tibbaa kharaa ka.tukaa vedanaa vedayanti, bhabbaava te ~naa.naaya dassanaaya anuttaraaya sambodhaaya. aya.m kho ma.m, aggivessana, tatiyaa upamaa pa.tibhaasi anacchariyaa pubbe assutapubbaa. imaa kho ma.m, aggivessana, tisso upamaa pa.tibha.msu anacchariyaa pubbe assutapubbaa.''

[03] 377^b^.^eb^ ``tassa ^a^M1.0309^ea^ mayha.m, aggivessana, etadahosi -- `ya.mnuunaaha.m dantebhi dantamaadhaaya {passa ma0 ni0 1.221 vitakkasa.n.thaanasutte}, jivhaaya taalu.m aahacca, cetasaa citta.m abhinigga.nheyya.m abhinippii.leyya.m abhisantaapeyya'nti. so kho aha.m, aggivessana, dantebhi dantamaadhaaya, jivhaaya taalu.m aahacca, cetasaa citta.m abhinigga.nhaami abhinippii.lemi abhisantaapemi. tassa mayha.m, aggivessana, dantebhi dantamaadhaaya jivhaaya taalu.m aahacca cetasaa citta.m abhinigga.nhato abhinippii.layato ^a^T1.0451^ea^ abhisantaapayato kacchehi sedaa muccanti. seyyathaapi, aggivessana, balavaa puriso dubbalatara.m purisa.m siise vaa gahetvaa khandhe vaa gahetvaa abhinigga.nheyya abhinippii.leyya abhisantaapeyya, evameva kho me, aggivessana, dantebhi dantamaadhaaya, jivhaaya taalu.m aahacca, cetasaa citta.m abhinigga.nhato abhinippii.layato abhisantaapayato kacchehi sedaa muccanti. aaraddha.m kho pana me, aggivessana, viiriya.m hoti asalliina.m, upa.t.thitaa sati asammu.t.thaa, saaraddho ca pana me kaayo ^a^P1.0243^ea^ hoti appa.tippassaddho teneva dukkhappadhaanena padhaanaabhitunnassa sato. evaruupaapi kho me, aggivessana, uppannaa dukkhaa vedanaa citta.m na pariyaadaaya ti.t.thati.

[03] 378^b^.^eb^ ``tassa mayha.m, aggivessana, etadahosi -- `ya.mnuunaaha.m appaa.naka.myeva jhaana.m jhaayeyya'nti. so kho aha.m, aggivessana, mukhato ca naasato ca assaasapassaase uparundhi.m. tassa mayha.m, aggivessana, mukhato ca naasato ca assaasapassaasesu uparuddhesu ka.n.nasotehi vaataana.m nikkhamantaana.m adhimatto saddo hoti. seyyathaapi naama kammaaragaggariyaa dhamamaanaaya adhimatto saddo hoti, evameva kho me, aggivessana, mukhato ca naasato ca assaasapassaasesu ^a^V1.0312^ea^ uparuddhesu ka.n.nasotehi vaataana.m nikkhamantaana.m adhimatto saddo hoti. aaraddha.m kho pana me, aggivessana, viiriya.m hoti asalliina.m upa.t.thitaa sati asammu.t.thaa. saaraddho ca pana me ^a^T1.0452^ea^ kaayo hoti appa.tippassaddho teneva dukkhappadhaanena padhaanaabhitunnassa sato. evaruupaapi kho me, aggivessana, uppannaa dukkhaa vedanaa citta.m na pariyaadaaya ti.t.thati.

[03] ``tassa mayha.m, aggivessana, etadahosi -- `ya.mnuunaaha.m appaa.naka.myeva jhaana.m jhaayeyya'nti. so kho aha.m, aggivessana, mukhato ca naasato ca ka.n.nato ^a^M1.0310^ea^ ca assaasapassaase uparundhi.m. tassa mayha.m, aggivessana, mukhato ca naasato ca ka.n.nato ca assaasapassaasesu uparuddhesu adhimattaa vaataa muddhani uuhananti {uuhanti (sii0), ohananti (syaa0 ka.m0), uhananti (ka0)}. seyyathaapi, aggivessana, balavaa puriso ti.nhena sikharena muddhani abhimattheyya {muddhaana.m abhimantheyya (sii0 pii0), muddhaana.m abhimattheyya (syaa0 ka.m0)}, evameva kho me, aggivessana, mukhato ca naasato ca ka.n.nato ca assaasapassaasesu uparuddhesu adhimattaa vaataa muddhani uuhananti. aaraddha.m kho pana me, aggivessana, viiriya.m hoti asalliina.m upa.t.thitaa sati asammu.t.thaa. saaraddho ca pana me kaayo hoti appa.tippassaddho teneva dukkhappadhaanena padhaanaabhitunnassa sato. evaruupaapi kho me, aggivessana, uppannaa dukkhaa vedanaa citta.m na pariyaadaaya ti.t.thati.

[03] ``tassa mayha.m, aggivessana, etadahosi -- `ya.mnuunaaha.m appaa.naka.myeva jhaana.m jhaayeyya'nti. so kho aha.m, aggivessana, mukhato ca naasato ca ka.n.nato ca assaasapassaase uparundhi.m. tassa mayha.m, aggivessana, mukhato ca naasato ca ka.n.nato ca assaasapassaasesu ^a^T1.0453^ea^ uparuddhesu adhimattaa siise siisavedanaa honti. seyyathaapi, aggivessana, balavaa puriso da.lhena ^a^P1.0244^ea^ varattakkha.n.dena {varattakabandhanena (sii0)} siise siisave.tha.m dadeyya, evameva kho me, aggivessana, mukhato ca naasato ca ka.n.nato ca assaasapassaasesu uparuddhesu adhimattaa siise siisavedanaa honti. aaraddha.m kho pana me, aggivessana, viiriya.m hoti asalliina.m upa.t.thitaa sati asammu.t.thaa. saaraddho ca pana me kaayo hoti appa.tippassaddho teneva dukkhappadhaanena padhaanaabhitunnassa sato. evaruupaapi kho me, aggivessana, uppannaa dukkhaa vedanaa citta.m na pariyaadaaya ti.t.thati.

[03] ``tassa mayha.m, aggivessana, etadahosi -- `ya.mnuunaaha.m appaa.naka.myeva jhaana.m jhaayeyya'nti. so kho aha.m, aggivessana, mukhato ca naasato ca ka.n.nato ca assaasapassaase uparundhi.m. tassa mayha.m, aggivessana, mukhato ca naasato ca ka.n.nato ca assaasapassaasesu uparuddhesu adhimattaa ^a^V1.0313^ea^ vaataa kucchi.m parikantanti. seyyathaapi, aggivessana, dakkho goghaatako vaa goghaatakantevaasii vaa ti.nhena ^a^M1.0311^ea^ govikantanena kucchi.m parikanteyya, evameva kho me, aggivessana, mukhato ca naasato ca ka.n.nato ca assaasapassaasesu uparuddhesu adhimattaa vaataa kucchi.m parikantanti. aaraddha.m kho pana me, aggivessana, viiriya.m hoti asalliina.m upa.t.thitaa sati asammu.t.thaa. saaraddho ca pana me kaayo hoti appa.tippassaddho teneva dukkhappadhaanena ^a^T1.0454^ea^ padhaanaabhitunnassa sato. evaruupaapi kho me, aggivessana, uppannaa dukkhaa vedanaa citta.m na pariyaadaaya ti.t.thati.

[03] ``tassa mayha.m, aggivessana, etadahosi -- `ya.mnuunaaha.m appaa.naka.myeva jhaana.m jhaayeyya'nti. so kho aha.m, aggivessana, mukhato ca naasato ca ka.n.nato ca assaasapassaase uparundhi.m. tassa mayha.m, aggivessana, mukhato ca naasato ca ka.n.nato ca assaasapassaasesu uparuddhesu adhimatto kaayasmi.m .daaho hoti. seyyathaapi, aggivessana, dve balavanto purisaa dubbalatara.m purisa.m naanaabaahaasu gahetvaa a"ngaarakaasuyaa santaapeyyu.m samparitaapeyyu.m, evameva kho me, aggivessana, mukhato ca naasato ca ka.n.nato ca assaasapassaasesu uparuddhesu adhimatto kaayasmi.m .daaho hoti. aaraddha.m kho pana me, aggivessana, viiriya.m hoti asalliina.m upa.t.thitaa sati asammu.t.thaa. saaraddho ca pana me kaayo hoti appa.tippassaddho teneva dukkhappadhaanena padhaanaabhitunnassa sato. evaruupaapi kho me, aggivessana, uppannaa dukkhaa vedanaa citta.m na pariyaadaaya ti.t.thati. apissu ma.m, aggivessana, devataa ^a^P1.0245^ea^ disvaa evamaaha.msu -- `kaala"nkato sama.no gotamo'ti. ekaccaa devataa evamaaha.msu -- `na kaala"nkato sama.no gotamo, api ca kaala"nkarotii'ti. ekaccaa devataa evamaaha.msu -- `na kaala"nkato sama.no gotamo, napi kaala"nkaroti, araha.m sama.no gotamo, vihaarotveva so {vihaarotveveso (sii0)} arahato evaruupo hotii'ti {vihaarotveveso arahato''ti (?)}.

[03] 379^b^.^eb^ ``tassa ^a^T1.0455^ea^ mayha.m, aggivessana, etadahosi -- `ya.mnuunaaha.m sabbaso aahaarupacchedaaya pa.tipajjeyya'nti. atha kho ma.m, aggivessana, devataa upasa"nkamitvaa ^a^M1.0312^ea^ etadavocu.m -- `maa kho tva.m, maarisa, sabbaso aahaarupacchedaaya pa.tipajji. sace kho tva.m, maarisa, sabbaso aahaarupacchedaaya pa.tipajjissasi, tassa te maya.m dibba.m oja.m lomakuupehi ajjhohaaressaama {ajjhoharissaama (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0 ka0)}, taaya tva.m yaapessasii'ti. tassa mayha.m, aggivessana, etadahosi -- `aha~nceva kho pana sabbaso ajajjita.m {ajaddhuka.m (sii0 pii0), jaddhuka.m (syaa0 ka.m0)} pa.tijaaneyya.m, imaa ca me devataa dibba.m oja.m lomakuupehi ajjhohaareyyu.m {ajjhohareyyu.m (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0 ka0)}, taaya ^a^V1.0314^ea^ caaha.m yaapeyya.m, ta.m mamassa musaa'ti. so kho aha.m, aggivessana, taa devataa paccaacikkhaami, `hala'nti vadaami.

[03] 380^b^.^eb^ ``tassa mayha.m, aggivessana, etadahosi -- `ya.mnuunaaha.m thoka.m thoka.m aahaara.m aahaareyya.m, pasata.m pasata.m, yadi vaa muggayuusa.m, yadi vaa kulatthayuusa.m, yadi vaa ka.laayayuusa.m, yadi vaa hare.nukayuusa'nti. so kho aha.m, aggivessana, thoka.m thoka.m aahaara.m aahaaresi.m, pasata.m pasata.m, yadi vaa muggayuusa.m, yadi vaa kulatthayuusa.m, yadi vaa ka.laayayuusa.m, yadi vaa hare.nukayuusa.m. tassa mayha.m, aggivessana, thoka.m thoka.m aahaara.m aahaarayato, pasata.m pasata.m, yadi vaa muggayuusa.m, yadi vaa kulatthayuusa.m, yadi vaa ka.laayayuusa.m, yadi vaa hare.nukayuusa.m, adhimattakasimaana.m patto kaayo hoti. seyyathaapi naama aasiitikapabbaani vaa kaa.lapabbaani vaa, evamevassu ^a^T1.0456^ea^ me a"ngapacca"ngaani bhavanti taayevappaahaarataaya. seyyathaapi naama o.t.thapada.m, evamevassu me aanisada.m hoti taayevappaahaarataaya. seyyathaapi naama va.t.tanaava.lii, evamevassu me pi.t.thika.n.tako u.n.nataavanato hoti taayevappaahaarataaya. seyyathaapi naama jarasaalaaya gopaa.nasiyo oluggaviluggaa bhavanti, evamevassu me phaasu.liyo oluggaviluggaa bhavanti taayevappaahaarataaya. seyyathaapi naama gambhiire udapaane udakataarakaa gambhiiragataa okkhaayikaa dissanti, evamevassu me akkhikuupesu akkhitaarakaa gambhiiragataa okkhaayikaa dissanti taayevappaahaarataaya. seyyathaapi naama tittakaalaabu ^a^P1.0246^ea^ aamakacchinno vaataatapena sa.mphu.tito hoti sammilaato, evamevassu me siisacchavi sa.mphu.titaa hoti sammilaataa ^a^M1.0313^ea^ taayevappaahaarataaya.

[03] ``so kho aha.m, aggivessana, udaracchavi.m parimasissaamiiti pi.t.thika.n.taka.myeva parigga.nhaami, pi.t.thika.n.taka.m parimasissaamiiti udaracchavi.myeva parigga.nhaami, yaavassu me, aggivessana, udaracchavi pi.t.thika.n.taka.m alliinaa hoti taayevappaahaarataaya. so kho aha.m, aggivessana, vacca.m vaa mutta.m vaa karissaamiiti tattheva avakujjo papataami taayevappaahaarataaya. so kho aha.m, aggivessana, imameva kaaya.m assaasento paa.ninaa gattaani anumajjaami. tassa mayha.m, aggivessana, paa.ninaa gattaani anumajjato puutimuulaani lomaani kaayasmaa papatanti taayevappaahaarataaya. apissu ma.m, aggivessana, manussaa ^a^T1.0457^ea^ disvaa evamaaha.msu -- `kaa.lo sama.no gotamo'ti. ekacce manussaa evamaaha.msu -- `na kaa.lo sama.no gotamo, saamo sama.no gotamo'ti. ekacce manussaa evamaaha.msu -- `na kaa.lo sama.no gotamo ^a^V1.0315^ea^, napi saamo, ma"nguracchavi sama.no gotamo'ti. yaavassu me, aggivessana, taava parisuddho chaviva.n.no pariyodaato upahato hoti taayevappaahaarataaya.

[03] 381^b^.^eb^ ``tassa mayha.m, aggivessana, etadahosi -- `ye kho keci atiitamaddhaana.m sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa opakkamikaa dukkhaa tibbaa kharaa ka.tukaa vedanaa vedayi.msu, etaavaparama.m, nayito bhiyyo. yepi hi keci anaagatamaddhaana.m sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa opakkamikaa dukkhaa tibbaa kharaa ka.tukaa vedanaa vedayissanti, etaavaparama.m, nayito bhiyyo. yepi hi keci etarahi sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa opakkamikaa dukkhaa tibbaa kharaa ka.tukaa vedanaa vedayanti, etaavaparama.m, nayito bhiyyo. na kho panaaha.m imaaya ka.tukaaya dukkarakaarikaaya adhigacchaami uttari manussadhammaa alamariya~naa.nadassanavisesa.m. siyaa nu kho a~n~no maggo bodhaayaa'ti? tassa mayha.m, aggivessana, etadahosi -- `abhijaanaami kho panaaha.m pitu sakkassa kammante siitaaya jambucchaayaaya nisinno vivicceva kaamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharitaa. siyaa nu kho eso maggo bodhaayaa'ti? tassa mayha.m, aggivessana, sataanusaari ^a^T1.0458^ea^ vi~n~naa.na.m ahosi -- `eseva maggo bodhaayaa'ti. tassa mayha.m, aggivessana, etadahosi -- `ki.m nu kho aha.m ^a^P1.0247^ea^ tassa sukhassa bhaayaami, ya.m ta.m sukha.m a~n~natreva kaamehi a~n~natra ^a^M1.0314^ea^ akusalehi dhammehii'ti? tassa mayha.m, aggivessana, etadahosi -- `na kho aha.m tassa sukhassa bhaayaami, ya.m ta.m sukha.m a~n~natreva kaamehi a~n~natra akusalehi dhammehii'ti.

[03] 382^b^.^eb^ ``tassa mayha.m, aggivessana, etadahosi -- `na kho ta.m sukara.m sukha.m adhigantu.m eva.m adhimattakasimaana.m pattakaayena, ya.mnuunaaha.m o.laarika.m aahaara.m aahaareyya.m odanakummaasa'nti. so kho aha.m, aggivessana, o.laarika.m aahaara.m aahaaresi.m odanakummaasa.m. tena kho pana ma.m, aggivessana, samayena pa~nca {pa~ncavaggiyaa (a~n~nasuttesu)} bhikkhuu paccupa.t.thitaa honti -- `ya.m kho sama.no gotamo dhamma.m adhigamissati, ta.m no aarocessatii'ti. yato kho aha.m, aggivessana, o.laarika.m aahaara.m aahaaresi.m odanakummaasa.m, atha me te pa~nca bhikkhuu nibbijja pakkami.msu -- `baahulliko {baahuliko (sii0 pii0) sa.mghabhedasikkhaapada.tiikaaya sameti} sama.no gotamo, padhaanavibbhanto, aavatto baahullaayaa'ti.

[03] 383^b^.^eb^ ``so ^a^V1.0316^ea^ kho aha.m, aggivessana, o.laarika.m aahaara.m aahaaretvaa, bala.m gahetvaa, vivicceva kaamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja vihaasi.m. evaruupaapi kho me, aggivessana, uppannaa sukhaa vedanaa citta.m na pariyaadaaya ti.t.thati. vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa ajjhatta.m sampasaadana.m cetaso ekodibhaava.m avitakka.m avicaara.m samaadhija.m piitisukha.m dutiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja vihaasi.m. evaruupaapi kho me, aggivessana, uppannaa sukhaa vedanaa citta.m na pariyaadaaya ti.t.thati. piitiyaa ca viraagaa upekkhako ca vihaasi.m, sato ca sampajaano. sukha~nca kaayena pa.tisa.mvedesi.m ya.m ta.m ariyaa aacikkhanti -- `upekkhako satimaa sukhavihaarii'ti tatiya.m jhaana.m ^a^T1.0459^ea^ upasampajja vihaasi.m. evaruupaapi kho me, aggivessana, uppannaa sukhaa vedanaa citta.m na pariyaadaaya ti.t.thati. sukhassa ca pahaanaa dukkhassa ca pahaanaa, pubbeva somanassadomanassaana.m attha"ngamaa, adukkhamasukha.m upekkhaasatipaarisuddhi.m catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja vihaasi.m. evaruupaapi kho me, aggivessana, uppannaa sukhaa vedanaa citta.m na pariyaadaaya ti.t.thati.

[03] 384^b^.^eb^ ``so eva.m samaahite citte parisuddhe pariyodaate ana"nga.ne vigatuupakkilese mudubhuute kammaniye .thite aane~njappatte pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.naaya ^a^P1.0248^ea^ citta.m abhininnaamesi.m. so anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussaraami ^a^M1.0315^ea^, seyyathida.m -- ekampi jaati.m...pe0... iti saakaara.m sauddesa.m anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussaraami. aya.m kho me, aggivessana, rattiyaa pa.thame yaame pa.thamaa vijjaa adhigataa; avijjaa vihataa, vijjaa uppannaa; tamo vihato, aaloko uppanno; yathaa ta.m appamattassa aataapino pahitattassa viharato. evaruupaapi kho me, aggivessana, uppannaa sukhaa vedanaa citta.m na pariyaadaaya ti.t.thati.

[03] 385^b^.^eb^ ``so eva.m samaahite citte parisuddhe pariyodaate ana"nga.ne vigatuupakkilese mudubhuute kammaniye .thite aane~njappatte sattaana.m cutuupapaata~naa.naaya citta.m abhininnaamesi.m. so dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena satte passaami cavamaane upapajjamaane hiine pa.niite suva.n.ne dubba.n.ne sugate duggate yathaakammuupage satte pajaanaami...pe0... aya.m kho me, aggivessana, rattiyaa majjhime yaame dutiyaa vijjaa adhigataa; avijjaa vihataa, vijjaa uppannaa; tamo ^a^P1.0249^ea^ vihato, aaloko uppanno; yathaa ta.m appamattassa aataapino pahitattassa viharato ^a^V1.0317^ea^. evaruupaapi kho me, aggivessana ^a^T1.0460^ea^, uppannaa sukhaa vedanaa citta.m na pariyaadaaya ti.t.thati.

[03] 386^b^.^eb^ ``so eva.m samaahite citte parisuddhe pariyodaate ana"nga.ne vigatuupakkilese mudubhuute kammaniye .thite aane~njappatte aasavaana.m khaya~naa.naaya citta.m abhininnaamesi.m. so `ida.m dukkha'nti yathaabhuuta.m abbha~n~naasi.m, `aya.m dukkhasamudayo'ti yathaabhuuta.m abbha~n~naasi.m, `aya.m dukkhanirodho'ti yathaabhuuta.m abbha~n~naasi.m, `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m abbha~n~naasi.m. `ime aasavaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m abbha~n~naasi.m, `aya.m aasavasamudayo'ti yathaabhuuta.m abbha~n~naasi.m, `aya.m aasavanirodho'ti yathaabhuuta.m abbha~n~naasi.m, `aya.m aasavanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m abbha~n~naasi.m. tassa me eva.m jaanato eva.m passato kaamaasavaapi citta.m vimuccittha, bhavaasavaapi citta.m vimuccittha, avijjaasavaapi citta.m vimuccittha. vimuttasmi.m vimuttamiti ~naa.na.m ahosi. `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti abbha~n~naasi.m. aya.m kho me, aggivessana, rattiyaa pacchime yaame tatiyaa vijjaa adhigataa; avijjaa vihataa, vijjaa uppannaa; tamo vihato, aaloko uppanno; yathaa ^a^M1.0316^ea^ ta.m appamattassa aataapino pahitattassa viharato. evaruupaapi kho me, aggivessana, uppannaa sukhaa vedanaa citta.m na pariyaadaaya ti.t.thati.

[03] 387^b^.^eb^ ``abhijaanaami kho panaaha.m, aggivessana, anekasataaya parisaaya dhamma.m desetaa. apissu ma.m ekameko eva.m ma~n~nati -- `mamevaarabbha sama.no gotamo dhamma.m desetii'ti. `na kho paneta.m, aggivessana, eva.m da.t.thabba.m; yaavadeva vi~n~naapanatthaaya tathaagato paresa.m dhamma.m ^a^T1.0461^ea^ deseti. so kho aha.m, aggivessana, tassaayeva kathaaya pariyosaane, tasmi.myeva purimasmi.m samaadhinimitte ajjhattameva citta.m sa.n.thapemi sannisaademi ekodi.m karomi samaadahaami, yena suda.m niccakappa.m viharaamii'''ti.

[03] ``okappaniyameta.m bhoto gotamassa yathaa ta.m arahato sammaasambuddhassa. abhijaanaati kho pana bhava.m gotamo divaa supitaa''ti? ``abhijaanaamaha.m, aggivessana, gimhaana.m pacchime maase pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkanto catuggu.na.m sa"nghaa.ti.m pa~n~napetvaa dakkhi.nena passena sato sampajaano nidda.m okkamitaa''ti. ``eta.m kho, bho gotama, eke sama.nabraahma.naa sammohavihaarasmi.m ^a^V1.0318^ea^ vadantii''ti ^a^P1.0250^ea^? ``na kho, aggivessana, ettaavataa sammuu.lho vaa hoti asammuu.lho vaa. api ca, aggivessana, yathaa sammuu.lho ca hoti asammuu.lho ca, ta.m su.naahi, saadhuka.m manasi karohi, bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bho''ti kho saccako niga.n.thaputto bhagavato paccassosi. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] 388^b^.^eb^ ``yassa kassaci, aggivessana, ye aasavaa sa.mkilesikaa ponobbhavikaa sadaraa dukkhavipaakaa aayati.m jaatijaraamara.niyaa appahiinaa, tamaha.m `sammuu.lho'ti vadaami. aasavaana~nhi, aggivessana, appahaanaa sammuu.lho hoti. yassa kassaci, aggivessana, ye aasavaa sa.mkilesikaa ponobbhavikaa sadaraa dukkhavipaakaa aayati.m jaatijaraamara.niyaa pahiinaa, tamaha.m `asammuu.lho'ti vadaami. aasavaana~nhi, aggivessana, pahaanaa asammuu.lho hoti.

[03] ``tathaagatassa ^a^T1.0462^ea^ kho, aggivessana, ye aasavaa sa.mkilesikaa ponobbhavikaa sadaraa dukkhavipaakaa aayati.m jaatijaraamara.niyaa pahiinaa ucchinnamuulaa taalaavatthukataa anabhaava.mkataa aayati.m anuppaadadhammaa ^a^M1.0317^ea^. seyyathaapi, aggivessana, taalo matthakacchinno abhabbo puna viruu.lhiyaa, evameva kho, aggivessana, tathaagatassa ye aasavaa sa.mkilesikaa ponobbhavikaa sadaraa dukkhavipaakaa aayati.m jaatijaraamara.niyaa pahiinaa ucchinnamuulaa taalaavatthukataa anabhaava.mkataa aayati.m anuppaadadhammaa''ti.

[03] 389^b^.^eb^ eva.m vutte, saccako niga.n.thaputto bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``acchariya.m, bho gotama, abbhuta.m, bho gotama! yaava~ncida.m bhoto gotamassa eva.m aasajja aasajja vuccamaanassa, upaniitehi vacanappathehi samudaacariyamaanassa, chaviva.n.no ceva pariyodaayati, mukhava.n.no ca vippasiidati, yathaa ta.m arahato sammaasambuddhassa. abhijaanaamaha.m, bho gotama, puura.na.m kassapa.m vaadena vaada.m samaarabhitaa. sopi mayaa vaadena vaada.m samaaraddho a~n~nena~n~na.m pa.ticari, bahiddhaa katha.m apanaamesi, kopa~nca dosa~nca appaccaya~nca paatvaakaasi. bhoto pana {bhoto kho pana (sii0)} gotamassa eva.m aasajja aasajja vuccamaanassa, upaniitehi vacanappathehi samudaacariyamaanassa, chaviva.n.no ceva pariyodaayati, mukhava.n.no ca vippasiidati, yathaa ta.m arahato sammaasambuddhassa. abhijaanaamaha.m, bho gotama, makkhali.m gosaala.m...pe0... ajita.m kesakambala.m... pakudha.m kaccaayana.m... sa~njaya.m bela.t.thaputta.m... niga.n.tha.m naa.taputta.m vaadena vaada.m samaarabhitaa ^a^V1.0319^ea^. sopi mayaa ^a^T1.0463^ea^ vaadena vaada.m samaaraddho a~n~nena~n~na.m ^a^P1.0251^ea^ pa.ticari, bahiddhaa katha.m apanaamesi, kopa~nca dosa~nca appaccaya~nca paatvaakaasi. bhoto pana gotamassa eva.m aasajja aasajja vuccamaanassa, upaniitehi vacanappathehi samudaacariyamaanassa, chaviva.n.no ceva pariyodaayati, mukhava.n.no ca vippasiidati, yathaa ta.m arahato sammaasambuddhassa. handa ca daani maya.m, bho gotama, gacchaama. bahukiccaa maya.m, bahukara.niiyaa''ti. ``yassadaani tva.m, aggivessana, kaala.m ma~n~nasii''ti.
[03] atha kho saccako niga.n.thaputto bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinanditvaa anumoditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkaamiiti.
[06] mahaasaccakasutta.m ni.t.thita.m cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 390^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^M1.0318^ea^ ^a^V1.0320^ea^ ^a^T1.0464^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati pubbaaraame migaaramaatupaasaade. atha kho sakko devaanamindo yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. ekamanta.m .thito kho sakko devaanamindo bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``kittaavataa nu kho, bhante, bhikkhu sa.mkhittena ta.nhaasa"nkhayavimutto hoti accantani.t.tho accantayogakkhemii accantabrahmacaarii accantapariyosaano se.t.tho devamanussaana''nti?

[03] ``idha, devaanaminda, bhikkhuno suta.m hoti -- `sabbe dhammaa naala.m abhinivesaayaa'ti. eva~nceta.m, devaanaminda, bhikkhuno suta.m hoti -- `sabbe dhammaa naala.m abhinivesaayaa'ti. so sabba.m dhamma.m abhijaanaati; sabba.m dhamma.m abhi~n~naaya sabba.m dhamma.m parijaanaati; sabba.m dhamma.m pari~n~naaya ya.m ki~nci vedana.m vedeti -- sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa, so taasu vedanaasu aniccaanupassii viharati, viraagaanupassii viharati, nirodhaanupassii viharati, pa.tinissaggaanupassii viharati. so taasu vedanaasu aniccaanupassii viharanto, viraagaanupassii viharanto, nirodhaanupassii viharanto, pa.tinissaggaanupassii viharanto na ki~nci loke upaadiyati. anupaadiya.m na paritassati, aparitassa.m paccatta~n~neva parinibbaayati ^a^P1.0252^ea^ -- `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti ^a^T1.0465^ea^ pajaanaati. ettaavataa kho, devaanaminda, bhikkhu sa.mkhittena ta.nhaasa"nkhayavimutto hoti accantani.t.tho accantayogakkhemii accantabrahmacaarii accantapariyosaano se.t.tho devamanussaana''nti.
[03] atha kho sakko devaanamindo bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinanditvaa anumoditvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa tatthevantaradhaayi.

[03] 391^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano bhagavato aviduure nisinno hoti. atha kho aayasmato mahaamoggallaanassa etadahosi -- ``ki.m nu kho so yakkho bhagavato ^a^V1.0321^ea^ bhaasita.m abhisamecca anumodi udaahu no; ya.mnuunaaha.m ta.m yakkha.m jaaneyya.m -- yadi vaa so yakkho bhagavato bhaasita.m abhisamecca ^a^M1.0319^ea^ anumodi yadi vaa no''ti? atha kho aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano -- seyyathaapi naama balavaa puriso sami~njita.m vaa baaha.m pasaareyya, pasaarita.m vaa baaha.m sami~njeyya, evameva -- pubbaaraame migaaramaatupaasaade antarahito devesu taavati.msesu paaturahosi. tena kho pana samayena sakko devaanamindo ekapu.n.dariike uyyaane dibbehi pa~ncahi tuuriyasatehi {turiyasatehi (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} samappito sama"ngiibhuuto paricaareti. addasaa kho sakko devaanamindo aayasmanta.m mahaamoggallaana.m duuratova aagacchanta.m. disvaana taani dibbaani pa~nca tuuriyasataani pa.tippa.naametvaa yenaayasmaa mahaamoggallaano tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m mahaamoggallaana.m ^a^T1.0466^ea^ etadavoca -- ``ehi kho, maarisa moggallaana, svaagata.m, maarisa moggallaana! cirassa.m kho, maarisa moggallaana, ima.m pariyaaya.m akaasi yadida.m idhaagamanaaya. nisiida, maarisa moggallaana, idamaasana.m pa~n~natta''nti. nisiidi kho aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano pa~n~natte aasane. sakkopi kho devaanamindo a~n~natara.m niica.m aasana.m gahetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho sakka.m devaanaminda.m aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano etadavoca -- ``yathaa katha.m pana kho, kosiya, bhagavaa sa.mkhittena ta.nhaasa"nkhayavimutti.m abhaasi? saadhu mayampi etissaa kathaaya bhaagino assaama savanaayaa''ti.

[03] 392^b^.^eb^ ``maya.m kho, maarisa moggallaana, bahukiccaa bahukara.niiyaa -- appeva sakena kara.niiyena, api ca devaana.myeva taavati.msaana.m kara.niiyena. api ca, maarisa moggallaana, sussuta.myeva hoti suggahita.m sumanasikata.m ^a^P1.0253^ea^ suupadhaarita.m, ya.m no khippameva antaradhaayati. bhuutapubba.m, maarisa moggallaana, devaasurasa"ngaamo samupabyuu.lho {samuupabyu.lho (syaa0 ka.m0), samuupabbuu.lho (sii0)} ahosi. tasmi.m kho pana, maarisa moggallaana, sa"ngaame devaa jini.msu, asuraa paraajini.msu. so kho aha.m, maarisa moggallaana, ta.m sa"ngaama.m abhivijinitvaa vijitasa"ngaamo tato pa.tinivattitvaa vejayanta.m naama paasaada.m maapesi.m. vejayantassa kho, maarisa moggallaana, paasaadassa ekasata.m niyyuuha.m. ekekasmi.m niyyuuhe satta satta kuu.taagaarasataani. ekamekasmi.m kuu.taagaare satta satta accharaayo ^a^T1.0467^ea^. ekamekissaa accharaaya satta satta paricaarikaayo. iccheyyaasi no tva.m ^a^M1.0320^ea^, maarisa moggallaana, vejayantassa paasaadassa raama.neyyaka.m da.t.thu''nti? adhivaasesi kho aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano tu.nhiibhaavena.

[03] 393^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^V1.0322^ea^ kho sakko ca devaanamindo vessava.no ca mahaaraajaa aayasmanta.m mahaamoggallaana.m purakkhatvaa yena vejayanto paasaado tenupasa"nkami.msu. addasa.msu kho sakkassa devaanamindassa paricaarikaayo aayasmanta.m mahaamoggallaana.m duuratova aagacchanta.m; disvaa ottappamaanaa hiriiyamaanaa saka.m saka.m ovaraka.m pavisi.msu. seyyathaapi naama su.nisaa sasura.m disvaa ottappati hiriiyati, evameva sakkassa devaanamindassa paricaarikaayo aayasmanta.m mahaamoggallaana.m disvaa ottappamaanaa hiriiyamaanaa saka.m saka.m ovaraka.m pavisi.msu. atha kho sakko ca devaanamindo vessava.no ca mahaaraajaa aayasmanta.m mahaamoggallaana.m vejayante paasaade anuca"nkamaapenti anuvicaraapenti -- ``idampi, maarisa moggallaana, passa vejayantassa paasaadassa raama.neyyaka.m; idampi, maarisa moggallaana, passa vejayantassa paasaadassa raama.neyyaka''nti. ``sobhati ida.m aayasmato kosiyassa, yathaa ta.m pubbe katapu~n~nassa. manussaapi ki~ncideva raama.neyyaka.m disvaa {di.t.thaa (sii0 pii0 ka0)} evamaaha.msu -- `sobhati vata bho yathaa devaana.m taavati.msaana'nti. tayida.m aayasmato kosiyassa sobhati, yathaa ta.m pubbe katapu~n~nassaa''ti. atha kho aayasmato mahaamoggallaanassa ^a^T1.0468^ea^ etadahosi -- ``atibaa.lha.m kho aya.m yakkho pamatto viharati. ya.mnuunaaha.m ima.m yakkha.m sa.mvejeyya''nti. atha kho aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano tathaaruupa.m iddhaabhisa"nkhaara.m abhisa"nkhaasi {abhisa"nkhaaresi (ka0), abhisa"nkhaareti (syaa0 ka.m0)} yathaa vejayanta.m paasaada.m paada"ngu.t.thakena sa"nkampesi sampakampesi sampavedhesi ^a^P1.0254^ea^. atha kho sakko ca devaanamindo, vessava.no ca mahaaraajaa, devaa ca taavati.msaa acchariyabbhutacittajaataa ahesu.m -- ``acchariya.m vata, bho, abbhuta.m vata, bho, sama.nassa mahiddhikataa mahaanubhaavataa, yatra hi naama dibbabhavana.m paada"ngu.t.thakena sa"nkampessati sampakampessati sampavedhessatii''ti! atha kho aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano sakka.m devaanaminda.m sa.mvigga.m lomaha.t.thajaata.m viditvaa sakka.m devaanaminda.m etadavoca -- ``yathaa katha.m pana kho, kosiya, bhagavaa sa.mkhittena ta.nhaasa"nkhayavimutti.m abhaasi? saadhu mayampi etissaa kathaaya bhaagino assaama savanaayaa''ti.

[03] 394^b^.^eb^ ``idhaaha.m ^a^M1.0321^ea^, maarisa moggallaana, yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.m; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi.m. ekamanta.m .thito kho aha.m, maarisa moggallaana, bhagavanta.m etadavoca.m -- `kittaavataa nu kho, bhante, bhikkhu sa.mkhittena ta.nhaasa"nkhayavimutto hoti accantani.t.tho accantayogakkhemii accantabrahmacaarii accantapariyosaano se.t.tho devamanussaana'''nti?

[03] ``eva.m ^a^V1.0323^ea^ vutte, maarisa moggallaana, bhagavaa ma.m etadavoca -- `idha, devaanaminda, bhikkhuno suta.m hoti -- sabbe dhammaa naala.m ^a^T1.0469^ea^ abhinivesaayaa'ti. eva.m ceta.m devaanaminda bhikkhuno suta.m hoti `sabbe dhammaa naala.m abhinivesaayaa'ti. so sabba.m dhamma.m abhijaanaati, sabba.m dhamma.m abhi~n~naaya sabba.m dhamma.m parijaanaati, sabba.m dhamma.m pari~n~naaya ya.m ki~nci vedana.m vedeti sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa. so taasu vedanaasu aniccaanupassii viharati, viraagaanupassii viharati, nirodhaanupassii viharati, pa.tinissaggaanupassii viharati. so taasu vedanaasu aniccaanupassii viharanto, viraagaanupassii viharanto, nirodhaanupassii viharanto, pa.tinissaggaanupassii viharanto na ki~nci loke upaadiyati, anupaadiya.m na paritassati, aparitassa.m paccatta~n~neva parinibbaayati -- `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti pajaanaati. ettaavataa kho, devaanaminda, bhikkhu sa.mkhittena ta.nhaasa"nkhayavimutto hoti accantani.t.tho accantayogakkhemii accantabrahmacaarii accantapariyosaano se.t.tho devamanussaananti. eva.m kho me, maarisa moggallaana, bhagavaa sa.mkhittena ta.nhaasa"nkhayavimutti.m abhaasii''ti.

[03] atha kho aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano sakkassa devaanamindassa bhaasita.m ^a^P1.0255^ea^ abhinanditvaa anumoditvaa -- seyyathaapi naama balavaa puriso sami~njita.m vaa baaha.m pasaareyya, pasaarita.m vaa baaha.m sami~njeyya evameva -- devesu taavati.msesu antarahito pubbaaraame migaaramaatupaasaade paaturahosi. atha kho sakkassa devaanamindassa paricaarikaayo acirapakkante aayasmante mahaamoggallaane sakka.m devaanaminda.m ^a^T1.0470^ea^ etadavocu.m -- ``eso nu te, maarisa, so bhagavaa satthaa''ti? ``na kho me, maarisa, so bhagavaa satthaa. sabrahmacaarii me eso aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano''ti. ``laabhaa te, maarisa, (suladdha.m te, maarisa) {( ) natthi (sii0 pii0)} yassa te sabrahmacaarii eva.mmahiddhiko eva.mmahaanubhaavo! aho nuuna te so bhagavaa satthaa''ti.

[03] 395^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^M1.0322^ea^ kho aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``abhijaanaati no, bhante, bhagavaa ahu {ahuna~n~neva (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)} ~naata~n~natarassa mahesakkhassa yakkhassa sa.mkhittena ta.nhaasa"nkhayavimutti.m bhaasitaa''ti {abhaasitthaati (ka0)}? ``abhijaanaamaha.m, moggallaana, idha sakko devaanamindo yenaaha.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ma.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. ekamanta.m .thito kho, moggallaana, sakko devaanamindo ma.m etadavoca -- `kittaavataa nu kho, bhante ^a^V1.0324^ea^, bhikkhu sa.mkhittena ta.nhaasa"nkhayavimutto hoti accantani.t.tho accantayogakkhemii accantabrahmacaarii accantapariyosaano se.t.tho devamanussaana''nti.

[03] eva.m vutte aha.m, moggallaana, sakka.m devaanaminda.m etadavoca.m ``idha devaanaminda bhikkhuno suta.m hoti `sabbe dhammaa naala.m abhinivesaayaa'ti. eva.m ceta.m devaanaminda bhikkhuno suta.m hoti `sabbe dhammaa naala.m abhinivesaayaa'ti. so sabba.m dhamma.m abhijaanaati, sabba.m dhamma.m abhi~n~naaya sabba.m dhamma.m parijaanaati ^a^T1.0471^ea^, sabba.m dhamma.m pari~n~naaya ya.m ki~nci vedana.m vedeti sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa. so taasu vedanaasu aniccaanupassii viharati, viraagaanupassii viharati, nirodhaanupassii viharati, pa.tinissaggaanupassii viharati. so taasu vedanaasu aniccaanupassii viharanto, viraagaanupassii viharanto, nirodhaanupassii viharanto, pa.tinissaggaanupassii viharanto na ki~nci loke upaadiyati, anupaadiya.m na paritassati, aparitassa.m paccatta~n~neva parinibbaayati -- `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m ^a^P1.0256^ea^, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti pajaanaati. ettaavataa kho, devaanaminda, bhikkhu sa.mkhittena ta.nhaasa"nkhayavimutto hoti accantani.t.tho accantayogakkhemii accantabrahmacaarii accantapariyosaano se.t.tho devamanussaananti. eva.m kho aha.m, moggallaana, abhijaanaami sakkassa devaanamindassa sa.mkhittena ta.nhaasa"nkhayavimutti.m bhaasitaa''ti.
[03] idamavoca bhagavaa. attamano aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandiiti.
[06] cuu.lata.nhaasa"nkhayasutta.m ni.t.thita.m sattama.m.

[03] 396^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T1.0472^ea^ ^a^M1.0323^ea^ ^a^V1.0325^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena saatissa naama bhikkhuno keva.t.taputtassa evaruupa.m paapaka.m di.t.thigata.m uppanna.m hoti -- ``tathaaha.m bhagavataa dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaami yathaa tadevida.m vi~n~naa.na.m sandhaavati sa.msarati ana~n~na''nti. assosu.m kho sambahulaa bhikkhuu -- ``saatissa kira naama bhikkhuno keva.t.taputtassa evaruupa.m paapaka.m di.t.thigata.m uppanna.m -- `tathaaha.m bhagavataa dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaami yathaa tadevida.m vi~n~naa.na.m sandhaavati sa.msarati, ana~n~na'''nti. atha kho te bhikkhuu yena saati bhikkhu keva.t.taputto tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa saati.m bhikkhu.m keva.t.taputta.m etadavocu.m -- ``sacca.m kira te, aavuso saati, evaruupa.m paapaka.m di.t.thigata.m uppanna.m -- `tathaaha.m bhagavataa dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaami yathaa tadevida.m vi~n~naa.na.m sandhaavati sa.msarati, ana~n~na'''nti? ``eva.m byaa kho aha.m, aavuso, bhagavataa dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaami yathaa tadevida.m vi~n~naa.na.m sandhaavati sa.msarati, ana~n~na''nti. atha kho te bhikkhuu saati.m bhikkhu.m keva.t.taputta.m etasmaa paapakaa di.t.thigataa vivecetukaamaa samanuyu~njanti samanugaahanti samanubhaasanti -- ``maa eva.m, aavuso saati, avaca, maa bhagavanta.m abbhaacikkhi, na hi saadhu bhagavato abbhakkhaana.m, na hi bhagavaa eva.m vadeyya. anekapariyaayenaavuso ^a^T1.0473^ea^ saati, pa.ticcasamuppanna.m vi~n~naa.na.m vutta.m ^a^P1.0257^ea^ bhagavataa, a~n~natra paccayaa natthi vi~n~naa.nassa sambhavo''ti. evampi kho saati bhikkhu keva.t.taputto tehi bhikkhuuhi samanuyu~njiyamaano samanugaahiyamaano samanubhaasiyamaano tadeva paapaka.m di.t.thigata.m thaamasaa paraamaasaa abhinivissa voharati -- ``eva.m byaa kho aha.m, aavuso, bhagavataa dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaami yathaa tadevida.m vi~n~naa.na.m sandhaavati sa.msarati ana~n~na''nti.

[03] 397^b^.^eb^ yato kho te bhikkhuu naasakkhi.msu saati.m bhikkhu.m keva.t.taputta.m etasmaa paapakaa di.t.thigataa vivecetu.m, atha kho te bhikkhuu yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinnaa kho te bhikkhuu bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``saatissa naama, bhante, bhikkhuno keva.t.taputtassa evaruupa.m paapaka.m di.t.thigata.m uppanna.m ^a^M1.0324^ea^ -- `tathaaha.m bhagavataa ^a^V1.0326^ea^ dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaami yathaa tadevida.m vi~n~naa.na.m sandhaavati sa.msarati, ana~n~na'nti. assumha kho maya.m, bhante, saatissa kira naama bhikkhuno keva.t.taputtassa evaruupa.m paapaka.m di.t.thigata.m uppanna.m -- `tathaaha.m bhagavataa dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaami yathaa tadevida.m vi~n~naa.na.m sandhaavati sa.msarati, ana~n~na'nti. atha kho maya.m, bhante, yena saati bhikkhu keva.t.taputto tenupasa"nkamimha; upasa"nkamitvaa saati.m bhikkhu.m keva.t.taputta.m etadavocumha -- `sacca.m kira te, aavuso saati, evaruupa.m paapaka.m di.t.thigata.m uppanna.m -- ``tathaaha.m bhagavataa dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaami yathaa tadevida.m vi~n~naa.na.m sandhaavati sa.msarati, ana~n~na''nti? eva.m vutte, bhante, saati bhikkhu keva.t.taputto amhe etadavoca -- `eva.m byaa kho aha.m, aavuso, bhagavataa dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaami ^a^T1.0474^ea^ yathaa tadevida.m vi~n~naa.na.m sandhaavati sa.msarati, ana~n~na'nti. atha kho maya.m, bhante, saati.m bhikkhu.m keva.t.taputta.m etasmaa paapakaa di.t.thigataa vivecetukaamaa samanuyu~njimha samanugaahimha samanubhaasimha -- `maa eva.m, aavuso saati, avaca, maa bhagavanta.m abbhaacikkhi, na hi saadhu bhagavato abbhakkhaana.m, na hi bhagavaa eva.m vadeyya. anekapariyaayenaavuso saati, pa.ticcasamuppanna.m vi~n~naa.na.m vutta.m bhagavataa, a~n~natra paccayaa natthi vi~n~naa.nassa sambhavo'ti. evampi kho, bhante, saati bhikkhu keva.t.taputto amhehi samanuyu~njiyamaano samanugaahiyamaano samanubhaasiyamaano tadeva paapaka.m di.t.thigata.m thaamasaa paraamasaa abhinivissa voharati -- `eva.m byaa kho aha.m, aavuso, bhagavataa dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaami yathaa tadevida.m vi~n~naa.na.m sandhaavati sa.msarati, ana~n~na'nti. yato kho maya.m, bhante, naasakkhimha saati.m bhikkhu.m keva.t.taputta.m etasmaa paapakaa di.t.thigataa vivecetu.m, atha maya.m etamattha.m bhagavato aarocemaa''ti.

[03] 398^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa a~n~natara.m bhikkhu.m aamantesi -- ``ehi tva.m ^a^P1.0258^ea^ bhikkhu, mama vacanena saati.m bhikkhu.m keva.t.taputta.m aamantehi -- `satthaa ta.m, aavuso saati, aamantetii'''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato pa.tissutvaa yena saati bhikkhu keva.t.taputto tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa saati.m bhikkhu.m keva.t.taputta.m etadavoca -- ``satthaa ta.m, aavuso saati, aamantetii''ti. ``evamaavuso''ti kho saati bhikkhu keva.t.taputto ^a^T1.0475^ea^ tassa bhikkhuno pa.tissutvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m ^a^M1.0325^ea^ abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho saati.m bhikkhu.m keva.t.taputta.m bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``sacca.m kira, te, saati, evaruupa.m paapaka.m di.t.thigata.m uppanna.m -- `tathaaha.m bhagavataa dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaami yathaa tadevida.m vi~n~naa.na.m sandhaavati sa.msarati, ana~n~na'''nti? ``eva.m byaa kho aha.m, bhante, bhagavataa dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaami yathaa tadevida.m vi~n~naa.na.m ^a^V1.0327^ea^ sandhaavati sa.msarati, ana~n~na''nti. ``katama.m ta.m, saati, vi~n~naa.na''nti? ``yvaaya.m, bhante, vado vedeyyo tatra tatra kalyaa.napaapakaana.m kammaana.m vipaaka.m pa.tisa.mvedetii''ti. ``kassa nu kho naama tva.m, moghapurisa, mayaa eva.m dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaasi? nanu mayaa, moghapurisa, anekapariyaayena pa.ticcasamuppanna.m vi~n~naa.na.m vutta.m, a~n~natra paccayaa natthi vi~n~naa.nassa sambhavoti? atha ca pana tva.m, moghapurisa, attanaa duggahitena amhe ceva abbhaacikkhasi, attaana~nca kha.nasi, bahu~nca apu~n~na.m pasavasi. ta~nhi te, moghapurisa, bhavissati diigharatta.m ahitaaya dukkhaayaa''ti.

[03] 399^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, api naaya.m saati bhikkhu keva.t.taputto usmiikatopi imasmi.m dhammavinaye''ti? ``ki~nhi siyaa bhante? no heta.m, bhante''ti. eva.m vutte, saati bhikkhu keva.t.taputto tu.nhiibhuuto ma"nkubhuuto pattakkhandho adhomukho pajjhaayanto appa.tibhaano nisiidi. atha kho bhagavaa saati.m ^a^T1.0476^ea^ bhikkhu.m keva.t.taputta.m tu.nhiibhuuta.m ma"nkubhuuta.m pattakkhandha.m adhomukha.m pajjhaayanta.m appa.tibhaana.m viditvaa saati.m bhikkhu.m keva.t.taputta.m etadavoca -- ``pa~n~naayissasi kho tva.m, moghapurisa, etena sakena paapakena di.t.thigatena. idhaaha.m bhikkhuu pa.tipucchissaamii''ti. atha kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``tumhepi me, bhikkhave, eva.m dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaatha yathaaya.m saati bhikkhu keva.t.taputto ^a^P1.0259^ea^ attanaa duggahitena amhe ceva abbhaacikkhati, attaana~nca kha.nati, bahu~nca apu~n~na.m pasavatii''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante! anekapariyaayena hi no, bhante, pa.ticcasamuppanna.m vi~n~naa.na.m vutta.m bhagavataa, a~n~natra paccayaa natthi vi~n~naa.nassa sambhavo''ti. ``saadhu saadhu, bhikkhave! saadhu kho me tumhe, bhikkhave, eva.m dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaatha. anekapariyaayena hi vo, bhikkhave, pa.ticcasamuppanna.m vi~n~naa.na.m vutta.m mayaa, a~n~natra paccayaa natthi vi~n~naa.nassa sambhavoti. atha ca panaaya.m saati bhikkhu keva.t.taputto attanaa duggahitena amhe ceva abbhaacikkhati, attaana~nca kha.nati, bahu~nca apu~n~na.m pasavati ^a^M1.0326^ea^ pasavati. ta~nhi tassa moghapurisassa bhavissati diigharatta.m ahitaaya dukkhaaya.

[03] 400^b^.^eb^ ``ya.m yadeva, bhikkhave, paccaya.m pa.ticca uppajjati vi~n~naa.na.m, tena teneva vi~n~naa.na.mtveva sa"nkhya.m gacchati {sa"nkha.m gacchati (sii0 pii0)}. cakkhu~nca pa.ticca ruupe ca uppajjati vi~n~naa.na.m, cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.mtveva ^a^V1.0328^ea^ sa"nkhya.m gacchati; sota~nca pa.ticca sadde ca uppajjati vi~n~naa.na.m, sotavi~n~naa.na.mtveva sa"nkhya.m gacchati; ghaana~nca pa.ticca gandhe ca uppajjati vi~n~naa.na.m, ghaanavi~n~naa.na.mtveva sa"nkhya.m ^a^T1.0477^ea^ gacchati; jivha~nca pa.ticca rase ca uppajjati vi~n~naa.na.m, jivhaavi~n~naa.na.mtveva sa"nkhya.m gacchati; kaaya~nca pa.ticca pho.t.thabbe ca uppajjati vi~n~naa.na.m, kaayavi~n~naa.na.mtveva sa"nkhya.m gacchati; mana~nca pa.ticca dhamme ca uppajjati vi~n~naa.na.m, manovi~n~naa.na.mtveva sa"nkhya.m gacchati.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, ya.m yadeva paccaya.m pa.ticca aggi jalati tena teneva sa"nkhya.m gacchati. ka.t.tha~nca pa.ticca aggi jalati, ka.t.thaggitveva sa"nkhya.m gacchati; sakalika~nca pa.ticca aggi jalati, sakalikaggitveva sa"nkhya.m gacchati; ti.na~nca pa.ticca aggi jalati, ti.naggitveva sa"nkhya.m gacchati; gomaya~nca pa.ticca aggi jalati, gomayaggitveva sa"nkhya.m gacchati; thusa~nca pa.ticca aggi jalati, thusaggitveva sa"nkhya.m gacchati; sa"nkaara~nca pa.ticca aggi jalati, sa"nkaaraggitveva sa"nkhya.m gacchati. evameva kho, bhikkhave, ya.m yadeva paccaya.m pa.ticca uppajjati vi~n~naa.na.m, tena teneva sa"nkhya.m gacchati. cakkhu~nca pa.ticca ruupe ca uppajjati vi~n~naa.na.m, cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.mtveva sa"nkhya.m gacchati; sota~nca pa.ticca sadde ca uppajjati vi~n~naa.na.m, sotavi~n~naa.na.mtveva sa"nkhya.m gacchati, ghaana~nca pa.ticca gandhe ca uppajjati vi~n~naa.na.m ^a^P1.0260^ea^, ghaa.navi~n~naa.na.mtveva sa"nkhya.m gacchati, jivha~nca pa.ticca rase ca uppajjati vi~n~naa.na.m, jivhaavi~n~naa.na.mtveva sa"nkhya.m gacchati. kaaya~nca pa.ticca pho.t.thabbe ca uppajjati vi~n~naa.na.m, kaayavi~n~naa.na.mtveva sa"nkhya.m gacchati. mana~nca pa.ticca dhamme ca uppajjati vi~n~naa.na.m, manovi~n~naa.na.mtveva sa"nkhya.m gacchati.
[03] 401^b^.^eb^ ``bhuutamidanti ^a^T1.0478^ea^, bhikkhave, passathaa''ti?

[03] ``ima.m ^a^T1.0479^ea^ ce tumhe, bhikkhave, di.t.thi.m eva.m parisuddha.m eva.m pariyodaata.m alliiyetha kelaayetha dhanaayetha ^a^V1.0331^ea^ mamaayetha, api nu me tumhe, bhikkhave, kulluupama.m dhamma.m desita.m aajaaneyyaatha nitthara.natthaaya no gaha.natthaayaa''ti?
