[03] ``aaka"nkheyya ce, gahapatayo, dhammacaarii samacaarii -- `aho vataaha.m kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa aabhaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajjeyya'nti; .thaana.m kho paneta.m vijjati, ya.m so kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa aabhaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajjeyya. ta.m kissa hetu? tathaa hi so dhammacaarii samacaarii.

[01] ``aaka"nkheyya ^a^V1.0369^ea^ ce, gahapatayo, dhammacaarii samacaarii `aho vataaha.m kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa parittaabhaana.m devaana.m...pe0... appamaa.naabhaana.m devaana.m... aabhassaraana.m devaana.m... parittasubhaana.m devaana.m... appamaa.nasubhaana.m devaana.m... subhaki.nhaana.m devaana.m ^a^T1.0534^ea^... vehapphalaana.m devaana.m... avihaana.m devaana.m... atappaana.m devaana.m... sudassaana.m devaana.m... sudassiina.m devaana.m... akani.t.thaana.m devaana.m... aakaasaana~ncaayatanuupagaana.m devaana.m... vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanuupagaana.m ^a^M1.0365^ea^ devaana.m... aaki~nca~n~naayatanuupagaana.m devaana.m... nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanuupagaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajjeyya'nti; .thaana.m kho paneta.m vijjati, ya.m so kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanuupagaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajjeyya. ta.m kissa hetu? tathaa hi so dhammacaarii samacaarii.

[03] ``aaka"nkheyya ce gahapatayo dhammacaarii samacaarii -- `aho vataaha.m aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja vihareyya'nti; .thaana.m kho paneta.m vijjati, `ya.m so aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja vihareyya. ta.m kissa hetu? tathaa hi so dhammacaarii samacaarii'''ti.

[03] 448^b^.^eb^ eva.m vutte, vera~njakaa braahma.nagahapatikaa bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``abhikkanta.m, bho gotama, abhikkanta.m bho gotama! seyyathaapi, bho gotama, nikkujjita.m vaa ukkujjeyya, pa.ticchanna.m vaa vivareyya, muu.lhassa vaa magga.m aacikkheyya, andhakaare vaa telapajjota.m dhaareyya, cakkhumanto ruupaani dakkhantiiti; evameva.m bhotaa gotamena anekapariyaayena dhammo pakaasito. ete maya.m bhavanta.m gotama.m sara.na.m gacchaama ^a^T1.0535^ea^ dhamma~nca bhikkhusa"ngha~nca. upaasake no bhava.m gotamo dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupete sara.na.m gate''ti.
[06] vera~njakasutta.m ni.t.thita.m dutiya.m.

[03] 449^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T1.0536^ea^ ^a^V1.0370^ea^ ^a^P1.0292^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. atha kho aayasmaa mahaako.t.thiko saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito yenaayasmaa saariputto tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmataa saariputtena saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa mahaako.t.thiko aayasmanta.m saariputta.m etadavoca ^a^M1.0366^ea^ --
[03] ```duppa~n~no duppa~n~no'ti, aavuso, vuccati. kittaavataa nu kho, aavuso, duppa~n~noti vuccatii''ti?
[03] ```nappajaanaati nappajaanaatii'ti kho, aavuso, tasmaa duppa~n~noti vuccati.

[03] ``ki~nca nappajaanaati? `ida.m dukkha'nti nappajaanaati, `aya.m dukkhasamudayo'ti nappajaanaati, `aya.m dukkhanirodho'ti nappajaanaati, `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti nappajaanaati. `nappajaanaati nappajaanaatii'ti kho, aavuso, tasmaa duppa~n~noti vuccatii''ti.
[03] ```saadhaavuso'ti kho aayasmaa mahaako.t.thiko aayasmato saariputtassa bhaasita.m abhinanditvaa anumoditvaa aayasmanta.m saariputta.m uttari.m pa~nha.m apucchi --
[03] ```pa~n~navaa pa~n~navaa'ti, aavuso, vuccati. kittaavataa nu kho, aavuso, pa~n~navaati vuccatii''ti?
[03] ```pajaanaati pajaanaatii'ti kho, aavuso, tasmaa pa~n~navaati vuccati.

[03] ``ki~nca pajaanaati? `ida.m dukkha'nti pajaanaati, `aya.m dukkhasamudayo'ti pajaanaati, `aya.m dukkhanirodho'ti ^a^T1.0537^ea^ ^a^V1.0371^ea^ pajaanaati, `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti pajaanaati. `pajaanaati pajaanaatii'ti kho, aavuso, tasmaa pa~n~navaati vuccatii''ti.
[03] ```vi~n~naa.na.m vi~n~naa.na'nti, aavuso, vuccati. kittaavataa nu kho, aavuso, vi~n~naa.nanti vuccatii''ti?
[03] ```vijaanaati vijaanaatii'ti kho, aavuso, tasmaa vi~n~naa.nanti vuccati.
[03] ``ki~nca vijaanaati? sukhantipi vijaanaati, dukkhantipi vijaanaati, adukkhamasukhantipi vijaanaati. `vijaanaati vijaanaatii'ti kho, aavuso, tasmaa vi~n~naa.nanti vuccatii''ti.

[03] ``yaa caavuso, pa~n~naa ya~nca vi~n~naa.na.m -- ime dhammaa sa.msa.t.thaa udaahu visa.msa.t.thaa? labbhaa ca panimesa.m dhammaana.m vinibbhujitvaa {vinibbhujjitvaa vinibbhujjitvaa (ka0)} vinibbhujitvaa naanaakara.na.m pa~n~naapetu''nti? ``yaa caavuso, pa~n~naa ya~nca vi~n~naa.na.m -- ime dhammaa sa.msa.t.thaa, no visa.msa.t.thaa. na ca labbhaa imesa.m dhammaana.m vinibbhujitvaa vinibbhujitvaa naanaakara.na.m pa~n~naapetu.m. ya.m haavuso {ya~ncaavuso (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)}, pajaanaati ta.m vijaanaati, ya.m vijaanaati ta.m pajaanaati. tasmaa ^a^P1.0293^ea^ ime dhammaa sa.msa.t.thaa, no visa.msa.t.thaa. na ca labbhaa imesa.m dhammaana.m vinibbhujitvaa vinibbhujitvaa naanaakara.na.m pa~n~naapetu''nti.

[03] ``yaa caavuso, pa~n~naa ya~nca vi~n~naa.na.m -- imesa.m dhammaana.m sa.msa.t.thaana.m no visa.msa.t.thaana.m ki.m naanaakara.na''nti? ``yaa caavuso, pa~n~naa ya~nca vi~n~naa.na.m -- imesa.m ^a^M1.0367^ea^ dhammaana.m sa.msa.t.thaana.m no visa.msa.t.thaana.m pa~n~naa bhaavetabbaa, vi~n~naa.na.m pari~n~neyya.m. ida.m nesa.m naanaakara.na''nti.
[03] 450^b^.^eb^ ```vedanaa vedanaa'ti, aavuso, vuccati. kittaavataa nu kho, aavuso ^a^T1.0538^ea^, vedanaati vuccatii''ti?
[03] ```vedeti vedetii'ti kho, aavuso, tasmaa vedanaati vuccati.
[03] ``ki~nca ^a^V1.0372^ea^ vedeti? sukhampi vedeti, dukkhampi vedeti, adukkhamasukhampi vedeti. `vedeti vedetii'ti kho, aavuso, tasmaa vedanaati vuccatii''ti.
[03] ```sa~n~naa sa~n~naa'ti, aavuso, vuccati. kittaavataa nu kho, aavuso, sa~n~naati vuccatii''ti?
[03] ```sa~njaanaati sa~njaanaatii'ti kho, aavuso, tasmaa sa~n~naati vuccati.

[03] ``ki~nca sa~njaanaati? niilakampi sa~njaanaati, piitakampi sa~njaanaati, lohitakampi sa~njaanaati, odaatampi sa~njaanaati. `sa~njaanaati sa~njaanaatii'ti kho, aavuso, tasmaa sa~n~naati vuccatii''ti.

[03] ``yaa caavuso, vedanaa yaa ca sa~n~naa ya~nca vi~n~naa.na.m -- ime dhammaa sa.msa.t.thaa udaahu visa.msa.t.thaa? labbhaa ca panimesa.m dhammaana.m vinibbhujitvaa vinibbhujitvaa naanaakara.na.m pa~n~naapetu''nti? ``yaa caavuso, vedanaa yaa ca sa~n~naa ya~nca vi~n~naa.na.m -- ime dhammaa sa.msa.t.thaa, no visa.msa.t.thaa. na ca labbhaa imesa.m dhammaana.m vinibbhujitvaa vinibbhujitvaa naanaakara.na.m pa~n~naapetu.m. ya.m haavuso {ya~ncaavuso (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)}, vedeti ta.m sa~njaanaati, ya.m sa~njaanaati ta.m vijaanaati. tasmaa ime dhammaa sa.msa.t.thaa no visa.msa.t.thaa. na ca labbhaa imesa.m dhammaana.m vinibbhujitvaa vinibbhujitvaa naanaakara.na.m pa~n~naapetu''nti.
[03] 451^b^.^eb^ ``nissa.t.thena haavuso {nissa.t.thena panaavuso (?)}, pa~ncahi indriyehi parisuddhena manovi~n~naa.nena ki.m neyya''nti?

[03] ``nissa.t.thena aavuso, pa~ncahi indriyehi parisuddhena manovi~n~naa.nena `ananto aakaaso'ti aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m ^a^T1.0539^ea^ neyya.m, `ananta.m vi~n~naa.na'nti vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m neyya.m, `natthi ki~ncii'ti aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m neyya''nti.
[03] ``neyya.m panaavuso, dhamma.m kena pajaanaatii''ti?
[03] ``neyya.m ^a^V1.0373^ea^ kho, aavuso, dhamma.m pa~n~naacakkhunaa pajaanaatii''ti.
[03] ``pa~n~naa panaavuso, kimatthiyaa''ti?
[03] ``pa~n~naa kho, aavuso, abhi~n~natthaa pari~n~natthaa pahaanatthaa''ti.
[03] 452^b^.^eb^ ``kati ^a^M1.0368^ea^ ^a^P1.0294^ea^ panaavuso, paccayaa sammaadi.t.thiyaa uppaadaayaa''ti?
[03] ``dve kho, aavuso, paccayaa sammaadi.t.thiyaa uppaadaaya -- parato ca ghoso, yoniso ca manasikaaro. ime kho, aavuso, dve paccayaa sammaadi.t.thiyaa uppaadaayaa''ti.
[03] ``katihi panaavuso, a"ngehi anuggahitaa sammaadi.t.thi cetovimuttiphalaa ca hoti cetovimuttiphalaanisa.msaa ca, pa~n~naavimuttiphalaa ca hoti pa~n~naavimuttiphalaanisa.msaa caa''ti?

[03] ``pa~ncahi kho, aavuso, a"ngehi anuggahitaa sammaadi.t.thi cetovimuttiphalaa ca hoti cetovimuttiphalaanisa.msaa ca, pa~n~naavimuttiphalaa ca hoti pa~n~naavimuttiphalaanisa.msaa ca. idhaavuso, sammaadi.t.thi siilaanuggahitaa ca hoti, sutaanuggahitaa ca hoti, saakacchaanuggahitaa ca hoti, samathaanuggahitaa ca hoti, vipassanaanuggahitaa ca hoti. imehi kho, aavuso, pa~ncaha"ngehi anuggahitaa sammaadi.t.thi cetovimuttiphalaa ca hoti cetovimuttiphalaanisa.msaa ca, pa~n~naavimuttiphalaa ca hoti pa~n~naavimuttiphalaanisa.msaa caa''ti.
[03] 453^b^.^eb^ ``kati panaavuso, bhavaa''ti?
[03] ``tayome, aavuso, bhavaa -- kaamabhavo ^a^T1.0540^ea^, ruupabhavo, aruupabhavo''ti.
[03] ``katha.m panaavuso, aayati.m punabbhavaabhinibbatti hotii''ti?
[03] ``avijjaaniivara.naana.m ^a^V1.0374^ea^ kho, aavuso, sattaana.m ta.nhaasa.myojanaana.m tatratatraabhinandanaa -- eva.m aayati.m punabbhavaabhinibbatti hotii''ti.
[03] ``katha.m panaavuso, aayati.m punabbhavaabhinibbatti na hotii''ti?
[03] ``avijjaaviraagaa kho, aavuso, vijjuppaadaa ta.nhaanirodhaa -- eva.m aayati.m punabbhavaabhinibbatti na hotii''ti.
[03] 454^b^.^eb^ ``katama.m panaavuso, pa.thama.m jhaana''nti?

[03] ``idhaavuso, bhikkhu vivicceva kaamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati -- ida.m vuccati, aavuso, pa.thama.m jhaana''nti.
[03] ``pa.thama.m panaavuso, jhaana.m katia"ngika''nti?

[03] ``pa.thama.m kho, aavuso, jhaana.m pa~nca"ngika.m. idhaavuso, pa.thama.m jhaana.m samaapannassa bhikkhuno vitakko ca vattati, vicaaro ca piiti ca sukha~nca cittekaggataa ca. pa.thama.m kho, aavuso, jhaana.m eva.m pa~nca"ngika''nti.
[03] ``pa.thama.m panaavuso, jhaana.m kata"ngavippahiina.m kata"ngasamannaagata''nti?

[03] ``pa.thama.m kho, aavuso, jhaana.m pa~nca"ngavippahiina.m, pa~nca"ngasamannaagata.m. idhaavuso, pa.thama.m jhaana.m samaapannassa bhikkhuno kaamacchando pahiino ^a^M1.0369^ea^ hoti, byaapaado pahiino hoti, thiinamiddha.m pahiina.m hoti, uddhaccakukkucca.m pahiina.m ^a^P1.0295^ea^ hoti, vicikicchaa pahiinaa hoti; vitakko ca vattati, vicaaro ca piiti ca sukha~nca cittekaggataa ca. pa.thama.m kho, aavuso, jhaana.m eva.m pa~nca"ngavippahiina.m pa~nca"ngasamannaagata''nti.

[03] 455^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncimaani ^a^T1.0541^ea^, aavuso, indriyaani naanaavisayaani naanaagocaraani, na a~n~nama~n~nassa ^a^V1.0375^ea^ gocaravisaya.m paccanubhonti, seyyathida.m -- cakkhundriya.m, sotindriya.m, ghaanindriya.m, jivhindriya.m, kaayindriya.m. imesa.m kho, aavuso, pa~ncanna.m indriyaana.m naanaavisayaana.m naanaagocaraana.m, na a~n~nama~n~nassa gocaravisaya.m paccanubhontaana.m, ki.m pa.tisara.na.m, ko ca nesa.m gocaravisaya.m paccanubhotii''ti?

[03] ``pa~ncimaani, aavuso, indriyaani naanaavisayaani naanaagocaraani, na a~n~nama~n~nassa gocaravisaya.m paccanubhonti, seyyathida.m -- cakkhundriya.m, sotindriya.m, ghaanindriya.m, jivhindriya.m, kaayindriya.m. imesa.m kho, aavuso, pa~ncanna.m indriyaana.m naanaavisayaana.m naanaagocaraana.m, na a~n~nama~n~nassa gocaravisaya.m paccanubhontaana.m, mano pa.tisara.na.m, mano ca nesa.m gocaravisaya.m paccanubhotii''ti.

[03] 456^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncimaani, aavuso, indriyaani, seyyathida.m -- cakkhundriya.m, sotindriya.m, ghaanindriya.m, jivhindriya.m, kaayindriya.m. imaani kho, aavuso, pa~ncindriyaani ki.m pa.ticca ti.t.thantii''ti?

[03] ``pa~ncimaani, aavuso, indriyaani, seyyathida.m -- cakkhundriya.m, sotindriya.m, ghaanindriya.m, jivhindriya.m, kaayindriya.m. imaani kho, aavuso, pa~ncindriyaani aayu.m pa.ticca ti.t.thantii''ti.
[03] ``aayu panaavuso, ki.m pa.ticca ti.t.thatii''ti?
[03] ``aayu usma.m pa.ticca ti.t.thatii''ti.
[03] ``usmaa panaavuso, ki.m pa.ticca ti.t.thatii''ti?
[03] ``usmaa aayu.m pa.ticca ti.t.thatii''ti.

[03] ``idaaneva kho maya.m, aavuso, aayasmato saariputtassa bhaasita.m eva.m aajaanaama -- `aayu ^a^V1.0376^ea^ usma.m pa.ticca ti.t.thatii'ti. idaaneva pana maya.m, aavuso, aayasmato ^a^T1.0542^ea^ saariputtassa bhaasita.m eva.m aajaanaama -- `usmaa aayu.m pa.ticca ti.t.thatii'ti.
[03] ``yathaa katha.m panaavuso, imassa bhaasitassa attho da.t.thabbo''ti?

[03] ``tena haavuso, upama.m te karissaami; upamaayapidhekacce vi~n~nuu purisaa bhaasitassa attha.m aajaananti. seyyathaapi, aavuso, telappadiipassa jhaayato acci.m pa.ticca aabhaa pa~n~naayati, aabha.m pa.ticca acci pa~n~naayati; evameva kho, aavuso, aayu usma.m pa.ticca ti.t.thati, usmaa aayu.m pa.ticca ti.t.thatii''ti.

[03] 457^b^.^eb^ ``teva ^a^M1.0370^ea^ nu kho, aavuso, aayusa"nkhaaraa, te vedaniyaa dhammaa udaahu a~n~ne aayusa"nkhaaraa a~n~ne vedaniyaa dhammaa''ti? ``na kho ^a^P1.0296^ea^, aavuso, teva aayusa"nkhaaraa te vedaniyaa dhammaa. te ca haavuso, aayusa"nkhaaraa abhavi.msu te vedaniyaa dhammaa, na yida.m sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m samaapannassa bhikkhuno vu.t.thaana.m pa~n~naayetha. yasmaa ca kho, aavuso, a~n~ne aayusa"nkhaaraa a~n~ne vedaniyaa dhammaa, tasmaa sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m samaapannassa bhikkhuno vu.t.thaana.m pa~n~naayatii''ti.
[03] ``yadaa nu kho, aavuso, ima.m kaaya.m kati dhammaa jahanti; athaaya.m kaayo ujjhito avakkhitto seti, yathaa ka.t.tha.m acetana''nti?
[03] ``yadaa kho, aavuso, ima.m kaaya.m tayo dhammaa jahanti -- aayu usmaa ca vi~n~naa.na.m; athaaya.m kaayo ujjhito avakkhitto seti, yathaa ka.t.tha.m acetana''nti.
[03] ``yvaaya.m, aavuso, mato kaala"nkato, yo caaya.m bhikkhu sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m samaapanno -- imesa.m ki.m naanaakara.na''nti?

[03] ``yvaaya.m, aavuso, mato kaala"nkato tassa kaayasa"nkhaaraa niruddhaa pa.tippassaddhaa ^a^T1.0543^ea^, vaciisa"nkhaaraa niruddhaa pa.tippassaddhaa, cittasa"nkhaaraa niruddhaa pa.tippassaddhaa, aayu parikkhii.no, usmaa vuupasantaa, indriyaani paribhinnaani. yo caaya.m bhikkhu sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m samaapanno tassapi kaayasa"nkhaaraa niruddhaa pa.tippassaddhaa, vaciisa"nkhaaraa niruddhaa pa.tippassaddhaa, cittasa"nkhaaraa niruddhaa pa.tippassaddhaa, aayu na parikkhii.no, usmaa avuupasantaa, indriyaani vippasannaani. yvaaya.m, aavuso, mato kaala"nkato, yo caaya.m bhikkhu sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m samaapanno -- ida.m nesa.m naanaakara.na''nti.
[03] 458^b^.^eb^ ``kati ^a^V1.0377^ea^ panaavuso, paccayaa adukkhamasukhaaya cetovimuttiyaa samaapattiyaa''ti?

[03] ``cattaaro kho, aavuso, paccayaa adukkhamasukhaaya cetovimuttiyaa samaapattiyaa. idhaavuso, bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahaanaa dukkhassa ca pahaanaa pubbeva somanassadomanassaana.m attha"ngamaa adukkhamasukha.m upekkhaasatipaarisuddhi.m catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. ime kho, aavuso, cattaaro paccayaa adukkhamasukhaaya cetovimuttiyaa samaapattiyaa''ti.
[03] ``kati panaavuso, paccayaa animittaaya cetovimuttiyaa samaapattiyaa''ti?

[03] ``dve kho, aavuso, paccayaa animittaaya cetovimuttiyaa samaapattiyaa ^a^M1.0371^ea^ -- sabbanimittaana~nca amanasikaaro, animittaaya ca dhaatuyaa manasikaaro. ime kho, aavuso, dve paccayaa animittaaya cetovimuttiyaa samaapattiyaa''ti.
[03] ``kati panaavuso, paccayaa animittaaya cetovimuttiyaa .thitiyaa''ti?

[03] ``tayo kho, aavuso, paccayaa animittaaya cetovimuttiyaa ^a^T1.0544^ea^ .thitiyaa ^a^P1.0297^ea^ -- sabbanimittaana~nca amanasikaaro, animittaaya ca dhaatuyaa manasikaaro, pubbe ca abhisa"nkhaaro. ime kho, aavuso, tayo paccayaa animittaaya cetovimuttiyaa .thitiyaa''ti.
[03] ``kati panaavuso, paccayaa animittaaya cetovimuttiyaa vu.t.thaanaayaa''ti?

[03] ``dve kho, aavuso, paccayaa animittaaya cetovimuttiyaa vu.t.thaanaaya -- sabbanimittaana~nca manasikaaro, animittaaya ca dhaatuyaa amanasikaaro. ime kho, aavuso, dve paccayaa animittaaya cetovimuttiyaa vu.t.thaanaayaa''ti.

[03] 459^b^.^eb^ ``yaa caaya.m, aavuso, appamaa.naa cetovimutti, yaa ca aaki~nca~n~naa cetovimutti, yaa ca su~n~nataa cetovimutti, yaa ca animittaa cetovimutti -- ime dhammaa naanaatthaa ceva naanaabya~njanaa ca udaahu ekatthaa bya~njanameva naana''nti?

[03] ``yaa caaya.m, aavuso, appamaa.naa cetovimutti, yaa ca aaki~nca~n~naa cetovimutti, yaa ca su~n~nataa cetovimutti, yaa ca animittaa cetovimutti -- atthi kho, aavuso, pariyaayo ya.m pariyaaya.m aagamma ime dhammaa naanaatthaa ceva naanaabya~njanaa ca; atthi ca kho, aavuso, pariyaayo ya.m pariyaaya.m aagamma ime dhammaa ekatthaa, bya~njanameva naana.m''.
[03] ``katamo ^a^V1.0378^ea^ caavuso, pariyaayo ya.m pariyaaya.m aagamma ime dhammaa naanaatthaa ceva naanaabya~njanaa ca''?

[03] ``idhaavuso, bhikkhu mettaasahagatena cetasaa eka.m disa.m pharitvaa viharati, tathaa dutiya.m, tathaa tatiya.m, tathaa catuttha.m. iti uddhamadho tiriya.m sabbadhi sabbattataaya sabbaavanta.m loka.m mettaasahagatena ^a^T1.0545^ea^ cetasaa vipulena mahaggatena appamaa.nena averena abyaabajjhena pharitvaa viharati. karu.naasahagatena cetasaa...pe0... muditaasahagatena cetasaa... upekkhaasahagatena cetasaa eka.m disa.m pharitvaa viharati, tathaa dutiya.m, tathaa tatiya.m, tathaa catuttha.m. iti uddhamadho ^a^M1.0372^ea^ tiriya.m sabbadhi sabbattataaya sabbaavanta.m loka.m upekkhaasahagatena cetasaa vipulena mahaggatena appamaa.nena averena abyaabajjhena pharitvaa viharati. aya.m vuccataavuso, appamaa.naa cetovimutti''.
[03] ``katamaa caavuso, aaki~nca~n~naa cetovimutti''?
[03] ``idhaavuso, bhikkhu sabbaso vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m samatikkamma natthi ki~nciiti aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m upasampajja viharati. aya.m vuccataavuso, aaki~nca~n~naa cetovimutti''.
[03] ``katamaa caavuso, su~n~nataa cetovimutti''?

[03] ``idhaavuso, bhikkhu ara~n~nagato vaa rukkhamuulagato vaa su~n~naagaaragato vaa iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `su~n~namida.m attena vaa attaniyena vaa'ti. aya.m ^a^P1.0298^ea^ vuccataavuso, su~n~nataa cetovimutti''.
[03] ``katamaa caavuso, animittaa cetovimutti''?

[03] ``idhaavuso, bhikkhu sabbanimittaana.m amanasikaaraa animitta.m cetosamaadhi.m upasampajja viharati. aya.m vuccataavuso, animittaa cetovimutti. aya.m kho, aavuso, pariyaayo ya.m pariyaaya.m aagamma ime dhammaa naanaatthaa ceva naanaabya~njanaa ca''.
[03] ``katamo caavuso, pariyaayo ya.m pariyaaya.m aagamma ime dhammaa ekatthaa bya~njanameva naana.m''?

[03] ``raago kho, aavuso, pamaa.nakara.no, doso pamaa.nakara.no, moho pamaa.nakara.no. te khii.naasavassa bhikkhuno pahiinaa ^a^T1.0546^ea^ ucchinnamuulaa taalaavatthukataa anabhaava.mkataa aayati.m anuppaadadhammaa. yaavataa kho, aavuso, appamaa.naa cetovimuttiyo, akuppaa taasa.m cetovimutti aggamakkhaayati. saa kho panaakuppaa cetovimutti su~n~naa raagena, su~n~naa dosena, su~n~naa mohena. raago kho, aavuso, ki~ncano, doso ki~ncano, moho ki~ncano. te khii.naasavassa bhikkhuno pahiinaa ucchinnamuulaa taalaavatthukataa anabhaava.mkataa aayati.m anuppaadadhammaa. yaavataa kho, aavuso, aaki~nca~n~naa cetovimuttiyo, akuppaa taasa.m cetovimutti aggamakkhaayati. saa kho panaakuppaa cetovimutti su~n~naa raagena, su~n~naa dosena ^a^V1.0379^ea^, su~n~naa mohena. raago kho, aavuso, nimittakara.no, doso nimittakara.no, moho nimittakara.no. te ^a^M1.0373^ea^ khii.naasavassa bhikkhuno pahiinaa ucchinnamuulaa taalaavatthukataa anabhaava.mkataa aayati.m anuppaadadhammaa. yaavataa kho, aavuso, animittaa cetovimuttiyo, akuppaa taasa.m cetovimutti aggamakkhaayati. saa kho panaakuppaa cetovimutti su~n~naa raagena, su~n~naa dosena, su~n~naa mohena. aya.m kho, aavuso, pariyaayo ya.m pariyaaya.m aagamma ime dhammaa ekatthaa bya~njanameva naana''nti.
[03] idamavocaayasmaa saariputto. attamano aayasmaa mahaako.t.thiko aayasmato saariputtassa bhaasita.m abhinandiiti.
[06] mahaavedallasutta.m ni.t.thita.m tatiya.m.

[03] 460^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T1.0547^ea^ ^a^V1.0380^ea^ ^a^P1.0299^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape. atha kho visaakho upaasako yena dhammadinnaa bhikkhunii tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa dhammadinna.m bhikkhuni.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho visaakho upaasako dhammadinna.m bhikkhuni.m etadavoca -- ```sakkaayo sakkaayo'ti, ayye, vuccati. katamo nu kho, ayye, sakkaayo vutto bhagavataa''ti? ``pa~nca kho ime, aavuso visaakha, upaadaanakkhandhaa sakkaayo vutto bhagavataa, seyyathida.m -- ruupupaadaanakkhandho, vedanupaadaanakkhandho, sa~n~nupaadaanakkhandho, sa"nkhaarupaadaanakkhandho, vi~n~naa.nupaadaanakkhandho. ime kho, aavuso visaakha, pa~ncupaadaanakkhandhaa sakkaayo vutto bhagavataa''ti.

[03] ``saadhayye''ti kho visaakho upaasako dhammadinnaaya bhikkhuniyaa bhaasita.m abhinanditvaa anumoditvaa dhammadinna.m bhikkhuni.m uttari.m pa~nha.m apucchi -- ```sakkaayasamudayo sakkaayasamudayo'ti, ayye, vuccati. katamo nu kho, ayye, sakkaayasamudayo vutto bhagavataa''ti? ``yaaya.m, aavuso visaakha, ta.nhaa ponobbhavikaa nandiiraagasahagataa tatratatraabhinandinii, seyyathida.m -- kaamata.nhaa bhavata.nhaa vibhavata.nhaa; aya.m kho, aavuso visaakha, sakkaayasamudayo vutto bhagavataa''ti.
[03] ```sakkaayanirodho ^a^M1.0374^ea^ sakkaayanirodho'ti, ayye, vuccati. katamo nu kho, ayye, sakkaayanirodho vutto bhagavataa''ti?
[03] ``yo ^a^T1.0548^ea^ kho, aavuso visaakha, tassaayeva ta.nhaaya asesaviraaganirodho caago pa.tinissaggo mutti anaalayo; aya.m kho, aavuso visaakha, sakkaayanirodho vutto bhagavataa''ti.
[03] ```sakkaayanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa sakkaayanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti, ayye, vuccati. katamaa nu kho, ayye, sakkaayanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa vuttaa bhagavataa''ti?

[03] ``ayameva kho, aavuso visaakha, ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo sakkaayanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa vuttaa bhagavataa, seyyathida.m ^a^V1.0381^ea^ -- sammaadi.t.thi sammaasa"nkappo sammaavaacaa sammaakammanto sammaaaajiivo sammaavaayaamo sammaasati sammaasamaadhii''ti.

[03] ``ta~n~neva nu kho, ayye, upaadaana.m te {teva (sii0)} pa~ncupaadaanakkhandhaa udaahu a~n~natra pa~ncahupaadaanakkhandhehi upaadaana''nti? ``na kho, aavuso visaakha, ta~n~neva upaadaana.m te pa~ncupaadaanakkhandhaa, naapi ^a^P1.0300^ea^ a~n~natra pa~ncahupaadaanakkhandhehi upaadaana.m. yo kho, aavuso visaakha, pa~ncasu upaadaanakkhandhesu chandaraago ta.m tattha upaadaana''nti.

[03] 461^b^.^eb^ ``katha.m panaayye, sakkaayadi.t.thi hotii''ti? ``idhaavuso visaakha, assutavaa puthujjano, ariyaana.m adassaavii ariyadhammassa akovido ariyadhamme aviniito, sappurisaana.m adassaavii sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme aviniito, ruupa.m attato samanupassati, ruupavanta.m vaa attaana.m, attani vaa ruupa.m, ruupasmi.m vaa attaana.m. vedana.m...pe0... sa~n~na.m... sa"nkhaare... vi~n~naa.na.m attato samanupassati, vi~n~naa.navanta.m vaa attaana.m, attani vaa vi~n~naa.na.m, vi~n~naa.nasmi.m vaa attaana.m. eva.m kho ^a^T1.0549^ea^, aavuso visaakha, sakkaayadi.t.thi hotii''ti.
[03] ``katha.m panaayye, sakkaayadi.t.thi na hotii''ti?

[03] ``idhaavuso visaakha, sutavaa ariyasaavako, ariyaana.m dassaavii ariyadhammassa kovido ariyadhamme suviniito, sappurisaana.m dassaavii sappurisadhammassa kovido sappurisadhamme suviniito, na ruupa.m attato samanupassati, na ruupavanta.m vaa attaana.m, na attani vaa ruupa.m, na ruupasmi.m vaa attaana.m. na vedana.m...pe0... na sa~n~na.m... na sa"nkhaare...pe0... na vi~n~naa.na.m attato samanupassati, na vi~n~naa.navanta.m vaa attaana.m ^a^M1.0375^ea^, na attani vaa vi~n~naa.na.m, na vi~n~naa.nasmi.m vaa attaana.m. eva.m kho, aavuso visaakha, sakkaayadi.t.thi na hotii''ti.
[03] 462^b^.^eb^ ``katamo panaayye, ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo''ti?

[03] ``ayameva kho, aavuso visaakha, ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo, seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi sammaasa"nkappo sammaavaacaa sammaakammanto ^a^V1.0382^ea^ sammaaaajiivo sammaavaayaamo sammaasati sammaasamaadhii''ti. ``ariyo panaayye, a.t.tha"ngiko maggo sa"nkhato udaahu asa"nkhato''ti?
[03] ``ariyo kho, aavuso visaakha, a.t.tha"ngiko maggo sa"nkhato''ti ^a^P1.0301^ea^.
[03] ``ariyena nu kho, ayye, a.t.tha"ngikena maggena tayo khandhaa sa"ngahitaa udaahu tiihi khandhehi ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo sa"ngahito''ti?

[03] ``na kho, aavuso visaakha, ariyena a.t.tha"ngikena maggena tayo khandhaa sa"ngahitaa; tiihi ca kho, aavuso visaakha, khandhehi ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo sa"ngahito. yaa caavuso visaakha, sammaavaacaa yo ca sammaakammanto yo ca sammaaaajiivo ime dhammaa ^a^T1.0550^ea^ siilakkhandhe sa"ngahitaa. yo ca sammaavaayaamo yaa ca sammaasati yo ca sammaasamaadhi ime dhammaa samaadhikkhandhe sa"ngahitaa. yaa ca sammaadi.t.thi yo ca sammaasa"nkappo, ime dhammaa pa~n~naakkhandhe sa"ngahitaa''ti.
[03] ``katamo panaayye, samaadhi, katame dhammaa samaadhinimittaa, katame dhammaa samaadhiparikkhaaraa, katamaa samaadhibhaavanaa''ti?

[03] ``yaa kho, aavuso visaakha, cittassa ekaggataa aya.m samaadhi; cattaaro satipa.t.thaanaa samaadhinimittaa; cattaaro sammappadhaanaa samaadhiparikkhaaraa. yaa tesa.myeva dhammaana.m aasevanaa bhaavanaa bahuliikamma.m, aya.m ettha samaadhibhaavanaa''ti.
[03] 463^b^.^eb^ ``kati panaayye, sa"nkhaaraa''ti?
[03] ``tayome, aavuso visaakha, sa"nkhaaraa -- kaayasa"nkhaaro, vaciisa"nkhaaro, cittasa"nkhaaro''ti.
[03] ``katamo panaayye, kaayasa"nkhaaro, katamo vaciisa"nkhaaro, katamo cittasa"nkhaaro''ti?
[03] ``assaasapassaasaa kho, aavuso visaakha, kaayasa"nkhaaro, vitakkavicaaraa vaciisa"nkhaaro, sa~n~naa ca vedanaa ca cittasa"nkhaaro''ti.
[03] ``kasmaa panaayye, assaasapassaasaa kaayasa"nkhaaro, kasmaa vitakkavicaaraa vaciisa"nkhaaro, kasmaa sa~n~naa ca vedanaa ca cittasa"nkhaaro''ti?

[03] ``assaasapassaasaa kho, aavuso ^a^M1.0376^ea^ visaakha, kaayikaa ete dhammaa kaayappa.tibaddhaa, tasmaa assaasapassaasaa kaayasa"nkhaaro. pubbe kho, aavuso visaakha, vitakketvaa vicaaretvaa pacchaa vaaca.m bhindati, tasmaa vitakkavicaaraa vaciisa"nkhaaro. sa~n~naa ca vedanaa ca cetasikaa ete dhammaa ^a^T1.0551^ea^ cittappa.tibaddhaa, tasmaa sa~n~naa ca vedanaa ca cittasa"nkhaaro''ti.
[03] 464^b^.^eb^ ``katha.m ^a^V1.0383^ea^ panaayye, sa~n~naavedayitanirodhasamaapatti hotii''ti?

[03] ``na kho, aavuso visaakha, sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m samaapajjantassa bhikkhuno eva.m hoti -- `aha.m sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m samaapajjissa'nti vaa, `aha.m sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m samaapajjaamii'ti vaa, `aha.m sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m samaapanno'ti vaa. atha khvaassa pubbeva tathaa citta.m bhaavita.m hoti ya.m ta.m tathattaaya upanetii''ti.

[03] ``sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m samaapajjantass ^a^P1.0302^ea^ panaayye, bhikkhuno katame dhammaa pa.thama.m nirujjhanti -- yadi vaa kaayasa"nkhaaro, yadi vaa vaciisa"nkhaaro, yadi vaa cittasa"nkhaaro''ti? ``sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m samaapajjantassa kho, aavuso visaakha, bhikkhuno pa.thama.m nirujjhati vaciisa"nkhaaro, tato kaayasa"nkhaaro, tato cittasa"nkhaaro''ti.
[03] ``katha.m panaayye, sa~n~naavedayitanirodhasamaapattiyaa vu.t.thaana.m hotii''ti?

[03] ``na kho, aavuso visaakha, sa~n~naavedayitanirodhasamaapattiyaa vu.t.thahantassa bhikkhuno eva.m hoti -- `aha.m sa~n~naavedayitanirodhasamaapattiyaa vu.t.thahissa'nti vaa, `aha.m sa~n~naavedayitanirodhasamaapattiyaa vu.t.thahaamii'ti vaa, `aha.m sa~n~naavedayitanirodhasamaapattiyaa vu.t.thito'ti vaa. atha khvaassa pubbeva tathaa citta.m bhaavita.m hoti ya.m ta.m tathattaaya upanetii''ti.

[03] ``sa~n~naavedayitanirodhasamaapattiyaa vu.t.thahantassa panaayye, bhikkhuno katame dhammaa pa.thama.m uppajjanti -- yadi vaa kaayasa"nkhaaro, yadi vaa vaciisa"nkhaaro, yadi ^a^T1.0552^ea^ vaa cittasa"nkhaaro''ti? ``sa~n~naavedayitanirodhasamaapattiyaa vu.t.thahantassa kho, aavuso visaakha, bhikkhuno pa.thama.m uppajjati cittasa"nkhaaro, tato kaayasa"nkhaaro, tato vaciisa"nkhaaro''ti.

[03] ``sa~n~naavedayitanirodhasamaapattiyaa vu.t.thita.m panaayye, bhikkhu.m kati phassaa phusantii''ti? ``sa~n~naavedayitanirodhasamaapattiyaa vu.t.thita.m kho, aavuso ^a^M1.0377^ea^ visaakha, bhikkhu.m tayo phassaa phusanti -- su~n~nato phasso, animitto phasso, appa.nihito phasso''ti.

[03] ``sa~n~naavedayitanirodhasamaapattiyaa vu.t.thitassa panaayye, bhikkhuno ki.mninna.m citta.m hoti ki.mpo.na.m ki.mpabbhaara''nti? ``sa~n~naavedayitanirodhasamaapattiyaa vu.t.thitassa kho, aavuso visaakha, bhikkhuno vivekaninna.m citta.m hoti, vivekapo.na.m vivekapabbhaara''nti.
[03] 465^b^.^eb^ ``kati ^a^V1.0384^ea^ panaayye, vedanaa''ti?
[03] ``tisso kho imaa, aavuso visaakha, vedanaa -- sukhaa vedanaa, dukkhaa vedanaa, adukkhamasukhaa vedanaa''ti.
[03] ``katamaa panaayye, sukhaa vedanaa, katamaa dukkhaa vedanaa, katamaa adukkhamasukhaa vedanaa''ti?

[03] ``ya.m kho, aavuso visaakha, kaayika.m vaa cetasika.m vaa sukha.m saata.m vedayita.m -- aya.m sukhaa vedanaa. ya.m kho, aavuso visaakha, kaayika.m vaa cetasika.m vaa dukkha.m asaata.m vedayita.m -- aya.m dukkhaa vedanaa. ya.m kho, aavuso visaakha, kaayika.m vaa cetasika.m vaa neva saata.m naasaata.m vedayita.m -- aya.m adukkhamasukhaa ^a^P1.0303^ea^ vedanaa''ti.
[03] ``sukhaa panaayye, vedanaa ki.msukhaa ki.mdukkhaa, dukkhaa vedanaa ki.msukhaa ki.mdukkhaa, adukkhamasukhaa vedanaa ki.msukhaa ki.mdukkhaa''ti?

[03] ``sukhaa kho, aavuso visaakha, vedanaa .thitisukhaa vipari.naamadukkhaa; dukkhaa vedanaa .thitidukkhaa vipari.naamasukhaa ^a^T1.0553^ea^; adukkhamasukhaa vedanaa ~naa.nasukhaa a~n~naa.nadukkhaa''ti.
[03] ``sukhaaya panaayye, vedanaaya ki.m anusayo anuseti, dukkhaaya vedanaaya ki.m anusayo anuseti, adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya ki.m anusayo anusetii''ti?
[03] ``sukhaaya kho, aavuso visaakha, vedanaaya raagaanusayo anuseti, dukkhaaya vedanaaya pa.tighaanusayo anuseti, adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya avijjaanusayo anusetii''ti.
[03] ``sabbaaya nu kho, ayye, sukhaaya vedanaaya raagaanusayo anuseti, sabbaaya dukkhaaya vedanaaya pa.tighaanusayo anuseti, sabbaaya adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya avijjaanusayo anusetii''ti?

[03] ``na kho, aavuso visaakha, sabbaaya sukhaaya vedanaaya raagaanusayo anuseti, na sabbaaya dukkhaaya vedanaaya pa.tighaanusayo anuseti, na sabbaaya adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya avijjaanusayo anusetii''ti.
[03] ``sukhaaya ^a^M1.0378^ea^ panaayye, vedanaaya ki.m pahaatabba.m, dukkhaaya vedanaaya ki.m pahaatabba.m, adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya ki.m pahaatabba''nti?
[03] ``sukhaaya kho, aavuso visaakha, vedanaaya raagaanusayo pahaatabbo, dukkhaaya vedanaaya pa.tighaanusayo pahaatabbo, adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya avijjaanusayo pahaatabbo''ti.

[03] ``sabbaaya ^a^V1.0385^ea^ nu kho, ayye, sukhaaya vedanaaya raagaanusayo pahaatabbo, sabbaaya dukkhaaya vedanaaya pa.tighaanusayo pahaatabbo, sabbaaya adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya avijjaanusayo pahaatabbo''ti?

[03] ``na kho, aavuso visaakha, sabbaaya sukhaaya vedanaaya raagaanusayo pahaatabbo, na sabbaaya dukkhaaya vedanaaya pa.tighaanusayo pahaatabbo ^a^T1.0554^ea^, na sabbaaya adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya avijjaanusayo pahaatabbo. idhaavuso visaakha, bhikkhu vivicceva kaamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. raaga.m tena pajahati, na tattha raagaanusayo anuseti. idhaavuso visaakha, bhikkhu iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `kudaassu naamaaha.m tadaayatana.m upasampajja viharissaami yadariyaa etarahi aayatana.m upasampajja viharantii'ti? iti anuttaresu vimokkhesu piha.m upa.t.thaapayato ^a^P1.0304^ea^ uppajjati pihaappaccayaa domanassa.m. pa.tigha.m tena pajahati, na tattha pa.tighaanusayo anuseti. idhaavuso visaakha, bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahaanaa, dukkhassa ca pahaanaa, pubbeva somanassadomanassaana.m attha"ngamaa, adukkhamasukha.m upekkhaasatipaarisuddhi.m catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. avijja.m tena pajahati, na tattha avijjaanusayo anusetii''ti.
[03] 466^b^.^eb^ ``sukhaaya panaayye, vedanaaya ki.m pa.tibhaago''ti?
[03] ``sukhaaya kho, aavuso visaakha, vedanaaya dukkhaa vedanaa pa.tibhaago''ti.
[03] ``dukkhaaya pannaayye, vedanaaya ki.m pa.tibhaago''ti?
[03] ``dukkhaaya kho, aavuso visaakha, vedanaaya sukhaa vedanaa pa.tibhaago''ti.
[03] ``adukkhamasukhaaya panaayye, vedanaaya ki.m pa.tibhaago''ti?
[03] ``adukkhamasukhaaya kho, aavuso visaakha, vedanaaya avijjaa pa.tibhaago''ti.
[03] ``avijjaaya panaayye, ki.m pa.tibhaago''ti?
[03] ``avijjaaya kho, aavuso visaakha, vijjaa pa.tibhaago''ti.
[03] ``vijjaaya panaayye, ki.m pa.tibhaago''ti?
[03] ``vijjaaya kho, aavuso visaakha, vimutti pa.tibhaago''ti.
[03] ``vimuttiyaa panaayye ^a^T1.0555^ea^, ki.m pa.tibhaago''ti?
[03] ``vimuttiyaa kho, aavuso visaakha, nibbaana.m pa.tibhaago''ti.

[03] ``nibbaanassa panaayye, ki.m pa.tibhaago''ti? ``accayaasi, aavuso {accasaraavuso (sii0 pii0), accassaraavuso (syaa0 ka.m0)} visaakha, pa~nha.m, naasakkhi pa~nhaana.m pariyanta.m gahetu.m. nibbaanogadha~nhi, aavuso visaakha, brahmacariya.m, nibbaanaparaayana.m nibbaanapariyosaana.m. aaka"nkhamaano ca tva.m, aavuso visaakha, bhagavanta.m upasa"nkamitvaa etamattha.m puccheyyaasi, yathaa ca te bhagavaa byaakaroti tathaa na.m dhaareyyaasii''ti.

[03] 467^b^.^eb^ atha kho visaakho upaasako dhammadinnaaya bhikkhuniyaa bhaasita.m abhinanditvaa anumoditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa dhammadinna.m bhikkhuni.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho visaakho upaasako yaavatako ahosi dhammadinnaaya bhikkhuniyaa saddhi.m kathaasallaapo ta.m sabba.m bhagavato aarocesi. eva.m vutte, bhagavaa visaakha.m upaasaka.m etadavoca -- ``pa.n.ditaa, visaakha, dhammadinnaa bhikkhunii, mahaapa~n~naa, visaakha, dhammadinnaa bhikkhunii. ma.m cepi tva.m, visaakha, etamattha.m puccheyyaasi, ahampi ta.m evameva.m byaakareyya.m, yathaa ^a^P1.0305^ea^ ta.m dhammadinnaaya bhikkhuniyaa byaakata.m. eso cevetassa {esovetassa (syaa0 ka.m0)} attho. eva~nca na.m {evameta.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)} dhaarehii''ti.
[03] idamavoca bhagavaa. attamano visaakho upaasako bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandiiti.
[06] cuu.lavedallasutta.m ni.t.thita.m catuttha.m.

[03] 468^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T1.0556^ea^ ^a^V1.0387^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``cattaarimaani, bhikkhave, dhammasamaadaanaani. katamaani cattaari? atthi, bhikkhave, dhammasamaadaana.m paccuppannasukha.m aayati.m dukkhavipaaka.m; atthi, bhikkhave ^a^M1.0380^ea^, dhammasamaadaana.m paccuppannadukkha~nceva aayati~nca dukkhavipaaka.m; atthi, bhikkhave, dhammasamaadaana.m paccuppannadukkha.m aayati.m sukhavipaaka.m; atthi, bhikkhave, dhammasamaadaana.m paccuppannasukha~nceva aayati~nca sukhavipaaka.m''.

[03] 469^b^.^eb^ ``katama~nca, bhikkhave, dhammasamaadaana.m paccuppannasukha.m aayati.m dukkhavipaaka.m? santi, bhikkhave, eke sama.nabraahma.naa eva.mvaadino eva.mdi.t.thino -- `natthi kaamesu doso'ti. te kaamesu paatabyata.m aapajjanti. te kho mo.libaddhaahi {mo.libandhaahi (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} paribbaajikaahi paricaarenti. te evamaaha.msu -- `ki.msu naama te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa kaamesu anaagatabhaya.m sampassamaanaa kaamaana.m pahaanamaaha.msu, kaamaana.m pari~n~na.m pa~n~napenti? sukho imissaa paribbaajikaaya taru.naaya mudukaaya lomasaaya baahaaya samphasso'ti te kaamesu paatabyata.m aapajjanti. te kaamesu paatabyata.m aapajjitvaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m ^a^T1.0557^ea^ duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjanti. te tattha dukkhaa tibbaa kharaa ka.tukaa vedanaa vedayanti. te evamaaha.msu -- `ida.m kho te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa kaamesu anaagatabhaya.m sampassamaanaa kaamaana.m pahaanamaaha.msu, kaamaana.m pari~n~na.m pa~n~napenti, ime hi maya.m kaamahetu kaamanidaana.m ^a^P1.0306^ea^ dukkhaa tibbaa kharaa ka.tukaa vedanaa vedayaamaa'ti. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, gimhaana.m pacchime maase maaluvaasipaa.tikaa phaleyya. atha kho ta.m, bhikkhave, maaluvaabiija.m a~n~natarasmi.m saalamuule nipateyya. atha kho, bhikkhave, yaa tasmi.m saale adhivatthaa devataa saa bhiitaa sa.mviggaa santaasa.m aapajjeyya. atha kho, bhikkhave, tasmi.m saale adhivatthaaya devataaya mittaamaccaa ~naatisaalohitaa aaraamadevataa vanadevataa rukkhadevataa osadhiti.navanappatiisu adhivatthaa devataa sa"ngamma samaagamma eva.m samassaaseyyu.m -- `maa bhava.m bhaayi, maa bhava.m bhaayi; appeva naameta.m maaluvaabiija.m ^a^V1.0388^ea^ moro vaa gileyya {moro vaa gileyya, godhaa vaa khaadeyya (ka0)}, mago vaa khaadeyya, dava.daaho {vanadaaho (ka0)} khaadeyya, na dava.daaho .daheyya, na vanakammikaa uddhareyyu.m, na upacikaa u.t.thaheyyu.m, biija~nca panassa ta.m paavussakena meghena abhippavu.t.tha.m ^a^M1.0381^ea^ sammadeva viruheyya. saassa maaluvaalataa taru.naa mudukaa lomasaa vilambinii, saa ta.m saala.m upaniseveyya. atha kho, bhikkhave, tasmi.m saale adhivatthaaya devataaya evamassa -- `ki.msu naama te ^a^T1.0558^ea^ bhonto mittaamaccaa ~naatisaalohitaa aaraamadevataa vanadevataa rukkhadevataa osadhiti.navanappatiisu adhivatthaa devataa maaluvaabiije anaagatabhaya.m sampassamaanaa sa"ngamma samaagamma eva.m [03] 470^b^.^eb^ ``katama~nca, bhikkhave, dhammasamaadaana.m paccuppannadukkha~nceva aayati~nca dukkhavipaaka.m? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco acelako hoti muttaacaaro hatthaapalekhano, naehibhaddantiko, nati.t.thabhaddantiko, naabhiha.ta.m, na uddissakata.m, na nimantana.m saadiyati, so na kumbhimukhaa pa.tigga.nhaati, na ka.lopimukhaa pa.tigga.nhaati, na e.lakamantara.m, na da.n.damantara.m, na musalamantara.m, na dvinna.m bhu~njamaanaana.m, na gabbhiniyaa, na paayamaanaaya, na purisantaragataaya, na sa"nkittiisu, na yattha saa upa.t.thito ^a^T1.0560^ea^ hoti, na yattha makkhikaa sa.n.dasa.n.dacaarinii, na maccha.m, na ma.msa.m, na sura.m, na meraya.m, na thusodaka.m pivati. so ekaagaariko vaa hoti ekaalopiko, dvaagaariko vaa hoti dvaalopiko...pe0... sattaagaariko vaa hoti sattaalopiko. ekissaapi dattiyaa yaapeti, dviihipi dattiihi yaapeti... sattahipi dattiihi yaapeti. ekaahikampi aahaara.m aahaareti, dviihikampi aahaara.m aahaareti... sattaahikampi aahaara.m aahaareti. iti evaruupa.m addhamaasikampi pariyaayabhattabhojanaanuyogamanuyutto viharati. so saakabhakkho vaa hoti ^a^P1.0308^ea^, saamaakabhakkho vaa hoti, niivaarabhakkho vaa hoti, daddulabhakkho pavattaphalabhojii. so saa.naanipi dhaareti, masaa.naanipi dhaareti, chavadussaanipi dhaareti, pa.msukuulaanipi dhaareti, tirii.taanipi dhaareti, ajinampi dhaareti, ajinakkhipampi dhaareti, kusaciirampi dhaareti, vaakaciirampi dhaareti, phalakaciirampi dhaareti, kesakambalampi dhaareti, vaa.lakambalampi dhaareti, uluukapakkhampi dhaareti, kesamassulocakopi hoti, kesamassulocanaanuyogamanuyutto, ubbha.t.thakopi hoti, aasanapa.tikkhitto, ukku.tikopi hoti ukku.tikappadhaanamanuyutto, ka.n.takaapassayikopi hoti, ka.n.takaapassaye seyya.m ^a^M1.0383^ea^ kappeti {passa ma0 ni0 1.155 mahaasiihanaadasutte}, saayatatiyakampi udakorohanaanuyogamanuyutto viharati. iti evaruupa.m anekavihita.m kaayassa aataapanaparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto viharati ^a^T1.0561^ea^. so kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjati. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, dhammasamaadaana.m paccuppannadukkha~nceva aayati~nca dukkhavipaaka.m.

[03] 471^b^.^eb^ ``katama~nca, bhikkhave, dhammasamaadaana.m paccuppannadukkha.m aayati.m sukhavipaaka.m? idha ^a^V1.0390^ea^, bhikkhave, ekacco pakatiyaa tibbaraagajaatiko hoti, so abhikkha.na.m raagaja.m dukkha.m domanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedeti; pakatiyaa tibbadosajaatiko hoti, so abhikkha.na.m dosaja.m dukkha.m domanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedeti; pakatiyaa tibbamohajaatiko hoti, so abhikkha.na.m mohaja.m dukkha.m domanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedeti. so sahaapi dukkhena, sahaapi domanassena, assumukhopi rudamaano paripu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m carati. so kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjati. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, dhammasamaadaana.m paccuppannadukkha.m aayati.m sukhavipaaka.m.

[03] 472^b^.^eb^ ``katama~nca, bhikkhave, dhammasamaadaana.m paccuppannasukha~nceva aayati~nca sukhavipaaka.m? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco pakatiyaa na tibbaraagajaatiko hoti, so na abhikkha.na.m raagaja.m dukkha.m domanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedeti; pakatiyaa na tibbadosajaatiko hoti, so na abhikkha.na.m dosaja.m dukkha.m domanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedeti; pakatiyaa na tibbamohajaatiko hoti ^a^P1.0309^ea^, so na abhikkha.na.m mohaja.m dukkha.m domanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedeti. so vivicceva kaamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m ^a^T1.0562^ea^ piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa ajjhatta.m sampasaadana.m cetaso ekodibhaava.m avitakka.m avicaara.m samaadhija.m piitisukha.m dutiya.m jhaana.m...pe0... tatiya.m jhaana.m... catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. so kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjati. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, dhammasamaadaana.m paccuppannasukha~nceva aayati~nca sukhavipaaka.m. imaani kho, bhikkhave, cattaari dhammasamaadaanaanii''ti.
[03] idamavoca ^a^M1.0384^ea^ bhagavaa. attamanaa te bhikkhuu bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandunti.

[03] 473^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^V1.0391^ea^ ^a^T1.0563^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``yebhuyyena, bhikkhave, sattaa eva.mkaamaa eva.mchandaa eva.madhippaayaa -- `aho vata ani.t.thaa akantaa amanaapaa dhammaa parihaayeyyu.m, i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dheyyu'nti. tesa.m, bhikkhave, sattaana.m eva.mkaamaana.m eva.mchandaana.m eva.madhippaayaana.m ani.t.thaa akantaa amanaapaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti, i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa dhammaa parihaayanti. tatra tumhe, bhikkhave, ka.m hetu.m paccethaa''ti? ``bhagava.mmuulakaa ^a^P1.0310^ea^ no, bhante, dhammaa, bhagava.mnettikaa, bhagava.mpa.tisara.naa. saadhu vata, bhante, bhagavanta~n~neva pa.tibhaatu etassa bhaasitassa attho; bhagavato sutvaa bhikkhuu dhaaressantii''ti. ``tena hi, bhikkhave, su.naatha, saadhuka.m manasi karotha, bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] 474^b^.^eb^ ``idha, bhikkhave, assutavaa puthujjano, ariyaana.m adassaavii ariyadhammassa akovido ariyadhamme aviniito, sappurisaana.m adassaavii sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme aviniito, sevitabbe dhamme na jaanaati asevitabbe dhamme na jaanaati, bhajitabbe ^a^T1.0564^ea^ dhamme na jaanaati abhajitabbe dhamme na jaanaati. so sevitabbe dhamme ajaananto asevitabbe dhamme ajaananto, bhajitabbe dhamme ajaananto abhajitabbe dhamme ajaananto, asevitabbe dhamme sevati sevitabbe dhamme na sevati, abhajitabbe dhamme bhajati bhajitabbe dhamme na bhajati. tassa asevitabbe dhamme sevato sevitabbe dhamme asevato, abhajitabbe dhamme bhajato bhajitabbe dhamme abhajato ani.t.thaa akantaa amanaapaa dhammaa ^a^M1.0385^ea^ abhiva.d.dhanti, i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa dhammaa parihaayanti. ta.m kissa hetu? eva~nheta.m, bhikkhave, hoti yathaa ta.m aviddasuno.

[03] ``sutavaa ca kho, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako, ariyaana.m dassaavii ariyadhammassa kovido ariyadhamme ^a^V1.0392^ea^ suviniito, sappurisaana.m dassaavii sappurisadhammassa kovido sappurisadhamme suviniito, sevitabbe dhamme jaanaati asevitabbe dhamme jaanaati, bhajitabbe dhamme jaanaati abhajitabbe dhamme jaanaati. so sevitabbe dhamme jaananto asevitabbe dhamme jaananto, bhajitabbe dhamme jaananto abhajitabbe dhamme jaananto, asevitabbe dhamme na sevati sevitabbe dhamme sevati, abhajitabbe dhamme na bhajati bhajitabbe dhamme bhajati. tassa asevitabbe dhamme asevato sevitabbe dhamme sevato, abhajitabbe dhamme abhajato bhajitabbe dhamme bhajato, ani.t.thaa akantaa amanaapaa dhammaa parihaayanti, i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti. ta.m ^a^T1.0565^ea^ kissa hetu? eva~nheta.m, bhikkhave, hoti yathaa ta.m viddasuno.

[03] 476^b^.^eb^ ``tatra, bhikkhave, yamida.m {yadida.m (sii0)} dhammasamaadaana.m paccuppannadukkha~nceva aayati~nca dukkhavipaaka.m, ta.m avidvaa avijjaagato yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati -- `ida.m kho dhammasamaadaana.m paccuppannadukkha~nceva aayati~nca dukkhavipaaka'nti. ta.m avidvaa avijjaagato yathaabhuuta.m appajaananto ta.m sevati, ta.m na parivajjeti. tassa ta.m sevato, ta.m aparivajjayato, ani.t.thaa akantaa amanaapaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti, i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa dhammaa parihaayanti. ta.m kissa hetu? eva~nheta.m, bhikkhave, hoti yathaa ta.m aviddasuno.
