[03] ``tatra ^a^V1.0393^ea^, bhikkhave, yamida.m dhammasamaadaana.m paccuppannadukkha.m aayati.m sukhavipaaka.m, ta.m avidvaa avijjaagato yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati -- `ida.m kho dhammasamaadaana.m paccuppannadukkha.m aayati.m sukhavipaaka'nti. ta.m avidvaa avijjaagato yathaabhuuta.m appajaananto ta.m na sevati, ta.m parivajjeti. tassa ta.m asevato, ta.m parivajjayato, ani.t.thaa ^a^P1.0312^ea^ akantaa amanaapaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti, i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa dhammaa parihaayanti. ta.m kissa hetu? eva~nheta.m, bhikkhave, hoti yathaa ta.m aviddasuno.

[03] ``tatra, bhikkhave, yamida.m dhammasamaadaana.m paccuppannasukha~nceva aayati~nca sukhavipaaka.m, ta.m avidvaa avijjaagato yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati -- `ida.m kho dhammasamaadaana.m paccuppannasukha~nceva aayati~nca sukhavipaaka'nti. ta.m avidvaa avijjaagato yathaabhuuta.m appajaananto ta.m na sevati, ta.m parivajjeti. tassa ta.m asevato, ta.m parivajjayato, ani.t.thaa akantaa amanaapaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti, i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa dhammaa parihaayanti. ta.m kissa hetu? eva~nheta.m, bhikkhave, hoti yathaa ta.m aviddasuno.

[03] 477^b^.^eb^ ``tatra, bhikkhave, yamida.m dhammasamaadaana.m paccuppannadukkha~nceva aayati~nca dukkhavipaaka.m ta.m vidvaa vijjaagato yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati -- `ida.m ^a^T1.0567^ea^ kho dhammasamaadaana.m paccuppannadukkha~nceva aayati~nca dukkhavipaaka'nti. ta.m vidvaa vijjaagato yathaabhuuta.m pajaananto ta.m na sevati, ta.m parivajjeti. tassa ta.m asevato, ta.m parivajjayato, ani.t.thaa akantaa amanaapaa dhammaa parihaayanti, i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti. ta.m kissa hetu? eva~nheta.m, bhikkhave, hoti yathaa ta.m viddasuno.

[03] ``tatra, bhikkhave, yamida.m dhammasamaadaana.m paccuppannasukha.m aayati.m dukkhavipaaka.m ta.m vidvaa vijjaagato yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati -- `ida.m kho dhammasamaadaana.m paccuppannasukha.m aayati.m dukkhavipaaka'nti. ta.m vidvaa vijjaagato yathaabhuuta.m pajaananto ta.m na sevati, ta.m parivajjeti. tassa ta.m asevato, ta.m parivajjayato ^a^M1.0387^ea^, ani.t.thaa akantaa amanaapaa dhammaa parihaayanti, i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti. ta.m kissa hetu? eva~nheta.m, bhikkhave, hoti yathaa ta.m viddasuno.

[03] ``tatra ^a^V1.0394^ea^, bhikkhave, yamida.m dhammasamaadaana.m paccuppannadukkha.m aayati.m sukhavipaaka.m ta.m vidvaa vijjaagato yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati -- `ida.m kho dhammasamaadaana.m paccuppannadukkha.m aayati.m sukhavipaaka'nti. ta.m vidvaa vijjaagato yathaabhuuta.m pajaananto ta.m sevati, ta.m na parivajjeti. tassa ta.m sevato, ta.m aparivajjayato, ani.t.thaa akantaa amanaapaa dhammaa parihaayanti, i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti. ta.m kissa hetu? eva~nheta.m, bhikkhave, hoti yathaa ta.m viddasuno.

[03] ``tatra, bhikkhave, yamida.m dhammasamaadaana.m paccuppannasukha~nceva aayati~nca sukhavipaaka.m ^a^T1.0568^ea^ ta.m vidvaa vijjaagato yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati -- `ida.m kho dhammasamaadaana.m paccuppannasukha~nceva aayati~nca sukhavipaaka'nti. ta.m vidvaa vijjaagato yathaabhuuta.m pajaananto ta.m sevati, ta.m na parivajjeti. tassa ta.m sevato, ta.m aparivajjayato, ani.t.thaa akantaa amanaapaa dhammaa parihaayanti, i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti. ta.m kissa hetu? eva~nheta.m, bhikkhave, hoti yathaa ta.m viddasuno.

[03] 478^b^.^eb^ ``katama~nca ^a^P1.0313^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammasamaadaana.m paccuppannadukkha~nceva aayati~nca dukkhavipaaka.m? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco sahaapi dukkhena sahaapi domanassena paa.naatipaatii hoti, paa.naatipaatapaccayaa ca dukkha.m domanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedeti; sahaapi dukkhena sahaapi domanassena adinnaadaayii hoti, adinnaadaanapaccayaa ca dukkha.m domanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedeti; sahaapi dukkhena sahaapi domanassena kaamesu micchaacaarii hoti, kaamesu micchaacaarapaccayaa ca dukkha.m domanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedeti; sahaapi dukkhena sahaapi domanassena musaavaadii hoti, musaavaadapaccayaa ca dukkha.m domanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedeti; sahaapi dukkhena sahaapi domanassena pisu.navaaco hoti, pisu.navaacaapaccayaa ca dukkha.m domanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedeti; sahaapi dukkhena sahaapi domanassena pharusavaaco hoti, pharusavaacaapaccayaa ca dukkha.m domanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedeti; sahaapi dukkhena sahaapi domanassena samphappalaapii hoti, samphappalaapapaccayaa ca dukkha.m domanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedeti; sahaapi ^a^M1.0388^ea^ dukkhena sahaapi domanassena abhijjhaalu ^a^T1.0569^ea^ hoti, abhijjhaapaccayaa ca dukkha.m domanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedeti; sahaapi dukkhena sahaapi domanassena byaapannacitto hoti, byaapaadapaccayaa ca dukkha.m domanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedeti; sahaapi dukkhena sahaapi domanassena micchaadi.t.thi hoti, micchaadi.t.thipaccayaa ca dukkha.m domanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedeti. so ^a^V1.0395^ea^ kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjati. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, dhammasamaadaana.m paccuppannadukkha~nceva aayati~nca dukkhavipaaka.m.

[03] 479^b^.^eb^ ``katama~nca, bhikkhave, dhammasamaadaana.m paccuppannasukha.m aayati.m dukkhavipaaka.m? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco sahaapi sukhena sahaapi somanassena paa.naatipaatii hoti, paa.naatipaatapaccayaa ca sukha.m somanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedeti; sahaapi sukhena sahaapi somanassena adinnaadaayii hoti, adinnaadaanapaccayaa ca sukha.m somanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedeti; sahaapi sukhena sahaapi somanassena kaamesumicchaacaarii hoti, kaamesumicchaacaarapaccayaa ca sukha.m somanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedeti; sahaapi sukhena sahaapi somanassena musaavaadii hoti, musaavaadapaccayaa ca sukha.m somanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedeti; sahaapi sukhena sahaapi somanassena pisu.navaaco hoti, pisu.navaacaapaccayaa ca sukha.m ^a^P1.0314^ea^ somanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedeti; sahaapi sukhena sahaapi somanassena pharusavaaco hoti, pharusavaacaapaccayaa ca sukha.m somanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedeti; sahaapi sukhena sahaapi somanassena samphappalaapii hoti, samphappalaapapaccayaa ca sukha.m somanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedeti; sahaapi ^a^T1.0570^ea^ sukhena sahaapi somanassena abhijjhaalu hoti, abhijjhaapaccayaa ca sukha.m somanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedeti; sahaapi sukhena sahaapi somanassena byaapannacitto hoti, byaapaadapaccayaa ca sukha.m somanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedeti; sahaapi sukhena sahaapi somanassena micchaadi.t.thi hoti, micchaadi.t.thipaccayaa ca sukha.m somanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedeti. so kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjati. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, dhammasamaadaana.m paccuppannasukha.m aayati.m dukkhavipaaka.m.

[03] 480^b^.^eb^ ``katama~nca, bhikkhave, dhammasamaadaana.m paccuppannadukkha.m aayati.m sukhavipaaka.m? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco sahaapi dukkhena sahaapi domanassena paa.naatipaataa pa.tivirato hoti, paa.naatipaataa verama.niipaccayaa ca dukkha.m domanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedeti ^a^M1.0389^ea^; sahaapi dukkhena sahaapi domanassena adinnaadaanaa pa.tivirato hoti, adinnaadaanaa verama.niipaccayaa ca dukkha.m domanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedeti; sahaapi dukkhena sahaapi domanassena kaamesumicchaacaaraa pa.tivirato hoti, kaamesumicchaacaaraa verama.niipaccayaa ca dukkha.m domanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedeti; sahaapi dukkhena sahaapi domanassena musaavaadaa pa.tivirato hoti, musaavaadaa verama.niipaccayaa ca dukkha.m domanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedeti; sahaapi dukkhena sahaapi domanassena pisu.naaya vaacaaya pa.tivirato hoti ^a^V1.0396^ea^, pisu.naaya vaacaaya verama.niipaccayaa ca dukkha.m domanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedeti ^a^T1.0571^ea^; sahaapi dukkhena sahaapi domanassena pharusaaya vaacaaya pa.tivirato hoti, pharusaaya vaacaaya verama.niipaccayaa ca dukkha.m domanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedeti; sahaapi dukkhena sahaapi domanassena samphappalaapaa pa.tivirato hoti, samphappalaapaa verama.niipaccayaa ca dukkha.m domanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedeti; sahaapi dukkhena sahaapi domanassena anabhijjhaalu hoti, anabhijjhaapaccayaa ca dukkha.m domanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedeti; sahaapi dukkhena sahaapi domanassena abyaapannacitto hoti, abyaapaadapaccayaa ca dukkha.m domanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedeti; sahaapi dukkhena ^a^P1.0315^ea^ sahaapi domanassena sammaadi.t.thi hoti, sammaadi.t.thipaccayaa ca dukkha.m domanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedeti. so kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjati. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, dhammasamaadaana.m paccuppannadukkha.m aayati.m sukhavipaaka.m.

[03] 481^b^.^eb^ ``katama~nca, bhikkhave, dhammasamaadaana.m paccuppannasukha~nceva aayati~nca sukhavipaaka.m? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco sahaapi sukhena sahaapi somanassena paa.naatipaataa pa.tivirato hoti, paa.naatipaataa verama.niipaccayaa ca sukha.m somanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedeti; sahaapi sukhena sahaapi somanassena adinnaadaanaa pa.tivirato hoti, adinnaadaanaa verama.niipaccayaa ca sukha.m somanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedeti; sahaapi sukhena sahaapi somanassena kaamesumicchaacaaraa pa.tivirato hoti, kaamesumicchaacaaraa verama.niipaccayaa ca sukha.m somanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedeti; sahaapi sukhena ^a^T1.0572^ea^ sahaapi somanassena musaavaadaa pa.tivirato hoti, musaavaadaa verama.niipaccayaa ca sukha.m somanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedeti; sahaapi sukhena sahaapi somanassena pisu.naaya vaacaaya pa.tivirato hoti, pisu.naaya vaacaaya ^a^M1.0390^ea^ verama.niipaccayaa ca sukha.m somanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedeti; sahaapi sukhena sahaapi somanassena pharusaaya vaacaaya pa.tivirato hoti, pharusaaya vaacaaya verama.niipaccayaa ca sukha.m somanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedeti; sahaapi sukhena sahaapi somanassena samphappalaapaa pa.tivirato hoti, samphappalaapaa verama.niipaccayaa ca sukha.m somanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedeti; sahaapi sukhena sahaapi somanassena anabhijjhaalu hoti, anabhijjhaapaccayaa ca sukha.m somanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedeti; sahaapi sukhena sahaapi somanassena abyaapannacitto hoti, abyaapaadapaccayaa ca sukha.m somanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedeti; sahaapi sukhena sahaapi somanassena sammaadi.t.thi hoti, sammaadi.t.thipaccayaa ca sukha.m somanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedeti. so kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjati. ida.m, vuccati, bhikkhave, dhammasamaadaana.m paccuppannasukha~nceva ^a^V1.0397^ea^ aayati~nca sukhavipaaka.m. imaani kho, bhikkhave, cattaari dhammasamaadaanaani.

[03] 482^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, tittakaalaabu visena sa.msa.t.tho. atha puriso aagaccheyya jiivitukaamo amaritukaamo sukhakaamo dukkhappa.tikuulo. tamena.m eva.m vadeyyu.m -- `ambho purisa, aya.m tittakaalaabu visena sa.msa.t.tho, sace aaka"nkhasi piva {pipa (sii0 pii0)}. tassa ^a^P1.0316^ea^ te pivato {pipato (sii0 pii0)} ceva nacchaadessati ^a^T1.0573^ea^ va.n.nenapi gandhenapi rasenapi, pivitvaa {piitvaa (sii0)} ca pana mara.na.m vaa nigacchasi mara.namatta.m vaa dukkha'nti. so ta.m appa.tisa"nkhaaya piveyya, nappa.tinissajjeyya. tassa ta.m pivato ceva nacchaadeyya va.n.nenapi gandhenapi rasenapi, pivitvaa ca pana mara.na.m vaa nigaccheyya mara.namatta.m vaa dukkha.m. tathuupamaaha.m, bhikkhave, ima.m dhammasamaadaana.m vadaami, yamida.m dhammasamaadaana.m paccuppannadukkha~nceva aayati~nca dukkhavipaaka.m.

[03] 483^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, aapaaniiyaka.mso va.n.nasampanno gandhasampanno rasasampanno. so ca kho visena sa.msa.t.tho. atha puriso aagaccheyya jiivitukaamo amaritukaamo sukhakaamo dukkhappa.tikuulo. tamena.m eva.m vadeyyu.m -- `ambho purisa, aya.m aapaaniiyaka.mso va.n.nasampanno gandhasampanno rasasampanno. so ca kho visena sa.msa.t.tho, sace aaka"nkhasi piva. tassa te pivatohi {pivatopi (ka0)} kho chaadessati va.n.nenapi gandhenapi rasenapi, pivitvaa ca pana mara.na.m vaa nigacchasi mara.namatta.m vaa dukkha'nti. so ta.m appa.tisa"nkhaaya ^a^M1.0391^ea^ piveyya, nappa.tinissajjeyya. tassa ta.m pivatohi kho chaadeyya va.n.nenapi gandhenapi rasenapi, pivitvaa ca pana mara.na.m vaa nigaccheyya mara.namatta.m vaa dukkha.m. tathuupamaaha.m, bhikkhave, ima.m dhammasamaadaana.m vadaami, yamida.m dhammasamaadaana.m paccuppannasukha.m aayati.m dukkhavipaaka.m.

[03] 484^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, puutimutta.m naanaabhesajjehi sa.msa.t.tha.m. atha ^a^T1.0574^ea^ puriso aagaccheyya pa.n.dukarogii. tamena.m eva.m vadeyyu.m -- `ambho purisa, ida.m puutimutta.m naanaabhesajjehi sa.msa.t.tha.m, sace aaka"nkhasi piva. tassa te pivatohi kho nacchaadessati va.n.nenapi gandhenapi rasenapi, pivitvaa ca pana sukhii bhavissasii'ti. so ta.m pa.tisa"nkhaaya piveyya, nappa.tinissajjeyya. tassa ta.m pivatohi kho nacchaadeyya va.n.nenapi gandhenapi rasenapi, pivitvaa ^a^V1.0398^ea^ ca pana sukhii assa. tathuupamaaha.m, bhikkhave, ima.m dhammasamaadaana.m vadaami, yamida.m dhammasamaadaana.m paccuppannadukkha.m aayati.m sukhavipaaka.m.

[03] 485^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, dadhi ca madhu ca sappi ca phaa.nita~nca ekajjha.m sa.msa.t.tha.m. atha puriso aagaccheyya lohitapakkhandiko. tamena.m eva.m vadeyyu.m -- `ambho purisa, ida.m ^a^P1.0317^ea^ dadhi.m ca madhu.m ca sappi.m ca phaa.nita~nca ekajjha.m sa.msa.t.tha.m, sace aaka"nkhasi piva. tassa te pivato ceva chaadessati va.n.nenapi gandhenapi rasenapi, pivitvaa ca pana sukhii bhavissasii'ti. so ta.m pa.tisa"nkhaaya piveyya, nappa.tinissajjeyya. tassa ta.m pivato ceva chaadeyya va.n.nenapi gandhenapi rasenapi, pivitvaa ca pana sukhii assa. tathuupamaaha.m, bhikkhave, ima.m dhammasamaadaana.m vadaami, yamida.m dhammasamaadaana.m paccuppannasukha~nceva aayati~nca sukhavipaaka.m.

[03] 486^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, vassaana.m pacchime maase saradasamaye viddhe vigatavalaahake deve aadicco nabha.m abbhussakkamaano sabba.m aakaasagata.m tamagata.m abhivihacca bhaasate ca tapate ca virocate ca; evameva ^a^T1.0575^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, yamida.m dhammasamaadaana.m paccuppannasukha~nceva aayati~nca sukhavipaaka.m tada~n~ne puthusama.nabraahma.naparappavaade abhivihacca bhaasate ca tapate ca virocate caa''ti.
[03] idamavoca bhagavaa. attamanaa te bhikkhuu bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandunti.
[06] mahaadhammasamaadaanasutta.m ni.t.thita.m cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 487^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T1.0576^ea^ ^a^M1.0392^ea^ ^a^V1.0399^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``viima.msakena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa parassa cetopariyaaya.m ajaanantena {aajaanantena (pii0 ka0), ajaanantena kinti (?)} tathaagate samannesanaa kaatabbaa `sammaasambuddho vaa no vaa' iti vi~n~naa.naayaa''ti. ``bhagava.mmuulakaa no, bhante, dhammaa, bhagava.mnettikaa bhagava.mpa.tisara.naa; saadhu vata, bhante, bhagavanta.myeva pa.tibhaatu etassa bhaasitassa attho; bhagavato sutvaa bhikkhuu dhaaressantii''ti. ``tena hi, bhikkhave, su.naatha, saadhuka.m manasi karotha, bhaasissaamii''ti ^a^P1.0318^ea^. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] 488^b^.^eb^ ``viima.msakena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa parassa cetopariyaaya.m ajaanantena dviisu dhammesu tathaagato samannesitabbo cakkhusotavi~n~neyyesu dhammesu -- `ye sa.mkili.t.thaa cakkhusotavi~n~neyyaa dhammaa, sa.mvijjanti vaa te tathaagatassa no vaa'ti? tamena.m samannesamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `ye sa.mkili.t.thaa cakkhusotavi~n~neyyaa dhammaa, na te tathaagatassa sa.mvijjantii'ti.

[03] ``yato na.m samannesamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `ye sa.mkili.t.thaa cakkhusotavi~n~neyyaa dhammaa, na te tathaagatassa sa.mvijjantii'ti, tato na.m uttari.m samannesati -- `ye viitimissaa cakkhusotavi~n~neyyaa dhammaa, sa.mvijjanti vaa te tathaagatassa no ^a^T1.0577^ea^ vaa'ti? tamena.m samannesamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `ye viitimissaa cakkhusotavi~n~neyyaa dhammaa, na te tathaagatassa sa.mvijjantii'ti.

[03] ``yato na.m samannesamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `ye viitimissaa cakkhusotavi~n~neyyaa dhammaa, na te tathaagatassa sa.mvijjantii'ti, tato na.m uttari.m samannesati -- `ye vodaataa cakkhusotavi~n~neyyaa ^a^V1.0400^ea^ dhammaa, sa.mvijjanti vaa te tathaagatassa no vaa'ti? tamena.m samannesamaano eva.m ^a^M1.0393^ea^ jaanaati -- `ye vodaataa cakkhusotavi~n~neyyaa dhammaa, sa.mvijjanti te tathaagatassaa'ti.

[03] ``yato na.m samannesamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `ye vodaataa cakkhusotavi~n~neyyaa dhammaa, sa.mvijjanti te tathaagatassaa'ti, tato na.m uttari.m samannesati -- `diigharatta.m samaapanno ayamaayasmaa ima.m kusala.m dhamma.m, udaahu ittarasamaapanno'ti? tamena.m samannesamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `diigharatta.m samaapanno ayamaayasmaa ima.m kusala.m dhamma.m, naayamaayasmaa ittarasamaapanno'ti.

[03] ``yato na.m samannesamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `diigharatta.m samaapanno ayamaayasmaa ima.m kusala.m dhamma.m, naayamaayasmaa ittarasamaapanno'ti, tato na.m uttari.m samannesati -- `~nattajjhaapanno ayamaayasmaa bhikkhu yasappatto, sa.mvijjantassa idhekacce aadiinavaa'ti? na taava, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno idhekacce aadiinavaa sa.mvijjanti yaava na ~nattajjhaapanno hoti yasappatto. yato ca kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ~nattajjhaapanno hoti yasappatto ^a^T1.0578^ea^, athassa idhekacce aadiinavaa sa.mvijjanti. tamena.m samannesamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `~nattajjhaapanno ayamaayasmaa bhikkhu yasappatto, naassa idhekacce aadiinavaa sa.mvijjantii'ti.

[03] ``yato na.m samannesamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `~nattajjhaapanno ayamaayasmaa ^a^P1.0319^ea^ bhikkhu yasappatto, naassa idhekacce aadiinavaa sa.mvijjantii'ti, tato na.m uttari.m samannesati -- `abhayuuparato ayamaayasmaa, naayamaayasmaa bhayuuparato; viitaraagattaa kaame na sevati khayaa raagassaa'ti? tamena.m samannesamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `abhayuuparato ayamaayasmaa, naayamaayasmaa bhayuuparato; viitaraagattaa kaame na sevati khayaa raagassaa'ti. ta~nce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu.m pare eva.m puccheyyu.m -- `ke panaayasmato aakaaraa, ke anvayaa, yenaayasmaa eva.m vadesi -- abhayuuparato ayamaayasmaa, naayamaayasmaa bhayuuparato; viitaraagattaa kaame na sevati khayaa raagassaa'ti. sammaa byaakaramaano, bhikkhave, bhikkhu eva.m byaakareyya -- `tathaa hi pana ayamaayasmaa sa"nghe vaa viharanto eko vaa viharanto, ye ca tattha sugataa ye ca tattha duggataa, ye ca tattha ga.namanusaasanti, ye ca idhekacce aamisesu sa.mdissanti, ye ca idhekacce aamisena anupalittaa, naayamaayasmaa ta.m tena avajaanaati ^a^M1.0394^ea^. sammukhaa kho pana meta.m bhagavato ^a^V1.0401^ea^ suta.m sammukhaa pa.tiggahita.m -- abhayuuparatohamasmi, naahamasmi bhayuuparato, viitaraagattaa kaame na sevaami khayaa raagassaa'ti.

[03] 489^b^.^eb^ ``tatra ^a^T1.0579^ea^, bhikkhave, tathaagatova uttari.m pa.tipucchitabbo -- `ye sa.mkili.t.thaa cakkhusotavi~n~neyyaa dhammaa, sa.mvijjanti vaa te tathaagatassa no vaa'ti? byaakaramaano, bhikkhave, tathaagato eva.m byaakareyya -- `ye sa.mkili.t.thaa cakkhusotavi~n~neyyaa dhammaa, na te tathaagatassa sa.mvijjantii'''ti.

[03] ``ye viitimissaa cakkhusotavi~n~neyyaa dhammaa, sa.mvijjanti vaa te tathaagatassa no vaati? byaakaramaano, bhikkhave, tathaagato eva.m byaakareyya -- `ye viitimissaa cakkhusotavi~n~neyyaa dhammaa, na te tathaagatassa sa.mvijjantii'ti.

[03] ``ye vodaataa cakkhusotavi~n~neyyaa dhammaa, sa.mvijjanti vaa te tathaagatassa no vaati? byaakaramaano, bhikkhave, tathaagato eva.m byaakareyya -- `ye vodaataa cakkhusotavi~n~neyyaa dhammaa, sa.mvijjanti te tathaagatassa; eta.mpathohamasmi, eta.mgocaro {etapathohamasmi etagocaro (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}, no ca tena tammayo'ti.

[03] ``eva.mvaadi.m kho, bhikkhave, satthaara.m arahati saavako upasa"nkamitu.m dhammassavanaaya. tassa satthaa dhamma.m deseti uttaruttari.m pa.niitapa.niita.m ka.nhasukkasappa.tibhaaga.m. yathaa yathaa kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno satthaa dhamma.m deseti uttaruttari.m pa.niitapa.niita.m ka.nhasukkasappa.tibhaaga.m tathaa tathaa so tasmi.m dhamme abhi~n~naaya idhekacca.m dhamma.m dhammesu ^a^P1.0320^ea^ ni.t.tha.m gacchati, satthari pasiidati -- `sammaasambuddho bhagavaa, svaakkhaato bhagavataa dhammo, suppa.tipanno sa"ngho'ti. ta~nce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu.m pare eva.m puccheyyu.m -- `ke panaayasmato aakaaraa, ke anvayaa, yenaayasmaa eva.m vadesi -- sammaasambuddho bhagavaa ^a^T1.0580^ea^, svaakkhaato bhagavataa dhammo, suppa.tipanno sa"ngho'ti? sammaa byaakaramaano, bhikkhave, bhikkhu eva.m byaakareyya -- `idhaaha.m, aavuso, yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.m dhammassavanaaya. tassa me bhagavaa dhamma.m deseti uttaruttari.m pa.niitapa.niita.m ka.nhasukkasappa.tibhaaga.m. yathaa yathaa me, aavuso ^a^M1.0395^ea^, bhagavaa dhamma.m deseti uttaruttari.m pa.niitapa.niita.m ka.nhasukkasappa.tibhaaga.m tathaa tathaaha.m tasmi.m dhamme abhi~n~naaya idhekacca.m dhamma.m dhammesu ni.t.thamagama.m, satthari pasiidi.m -- sammaasambuddho bhagavaa, svaakkhaato bhagavataa, dhammo, suppa.tipanno sa"ngho'ti.

[03] 490^b^.^eb^ ``yassa ^a^V1.0402^ea^ kassaci, bhikkhave, imehi aakaarehi imehi padehi imehi bya~njanehi tathaagate saddhaa nivi.t.thaa hoti muulajaataa pati.t.thitaa, aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, aakaaravatii saddhaa dassanamuulikaa, da.lhaa; asa.mhaariyaa sama.nena vaa braahma.nena vaa devena vaa maarena vaa brahmunaa vaa kenaci vaa lokasmi.m. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, tathaagate dhammasamannesanaa hoti. eva~nca pana tathaagato dhammataasusamanni.t.tho hotii''ti.
[03] idamavoca bhagavaa. attamanaa te bhikkhuu bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandunti.
[06] viima.msakasutta.m ni.t.thita.m sattama.m.

[03] 491^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T1.0581^ea^ ^a^V1.0403^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa kosambiya.m viharati ghositaaraame. tena kho pana samayena kosambiya.m bhikkhuu bha.n.danajaataa kalahajaataa vivaadaapannaa a~n~nama~n~na.m mukhasattiihi vitudantaa viharanti. te na ceva a~n~nama~n~na.m sa~n~naapenti na ca sa~n~natti.m upenti, na ca a~n~nama~n~na.m nijjhaapenti, na ca nijjhatti.m upenti. atha kho a~n~nataro ^a^P1.0321^ea^ bhikkhu yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``idha, bhante, kosambiya.m bhikkhuu bha.n.danajaataa kalahajaataa vivaadaapannaa a~n~nama~n~na.m mukhasattiihi vitudantaa viharanti, te na ceva a~n~nama~n~na.m sa~n~naapenti, na ca sa~n~natti.m upenti, na ca a~n~nama~n~na.m nijjhaapenti, na ca nijjhatti.m upentii''ti.

[03] atha kho bhagavaa a~n~natara.m bhikkhu.m aamantesi -- ``ehi tva.m, bhikkhu, mama vacanena te bhikkhuu aamantehi -- `satthaa vo aayasmante aamantetii'''ti. ``eva.m ^a^M1.0396^ea^, bhante''ti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato pa.tissutvaa yena te bhikkhuu tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa te bhikkhuu etadavoca -- ``satthaa aayasmante aamantetii''ti. ``evamaavuso''ti kho te bhikkhuu tassa bhikkhuno pa.tissutvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m ^a^T1.0582^ea^ nisinne kho te bhikkhuu bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``sacca.m kira tumhe, bhikkhave, bha.n.danajaataa kalahajaataa vivaadaapannaa a~n~nama~n~na.m mukhasattiihi vitudantaa viharatha, te na ceva a~n~nama~n~na.m sa~n~naapetha, na ca sa~n~natti.m upetha, na ca a~n~nama~n~na.m nijjhaapetha, na ca nijjhatti.m upethaa''ti? ``eva.m, bhante''. ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, yasmi.m tumhe samaye bha.n.danajaataa kalahajaataa vivaadaapannaa a~n~nama~n~na.m ^a^P1.0322^ea^ mukhasattiihi vitudantaa viharatha, api nu tumhaaka.m tasmi.m samaye metta.m kaayakamma.m paccupa.t.thita.m hoti sabrahmacaariisu aavi ceva raho ca, metta.m vaciikamma.m...pe0... metta.m manokamma.m paccupa.t.thita.m hoti sabrahmacaariisu aavi ceva raho caa''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``iti kira, bhikkhave, yasmi.m tumhe samaye bha.n.danajaataa kalahajaataa vivaadaapannaa a~n~nama~n~na.m mukhasattiihi vitudantaa viharatha, neva tumhaaka.m ^a^V1.0404^ea^ tasmi.m samaye metta.m kaayakamma.m paccupa.t.thita.m hoti sabrahmacaariisu aavi ceva raho ca, na metta.m vaciikamma.m...pe0... na metta.m manokamma.m paccupa.t.thita.m hoti sabrahmacaariisu aavi ceva raho ca. atha ki~ncarahi tumhe, moghapurisaa, ki.m jaanantaa ki.m passantaa bha.n.danajaataa kalahajaataa vivaadaapannaa a~n~nama~n~na.m mukhasattiihi vitudantaa viharatha, te na ceva a~n~nama~n~na.m sa~n~naapetha, na ca sa~n~natti.m upetha, na ca a~n~nama~n~na.m nijjhaapetha, na ca nijjhatti.m upetha ^a^T1.0583^ea^? ta~nhi tumhaaka.m, moghapurisaa, bhavissati diigharatta.m ahitaaya dukkhaayaa''ti.

[03] 492^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``chayime, bhikkhave, dhammaa saara.niiyaa piyakara.naa garukara.naa sa"ngahaaya avivaadaaya saamaggiyaa ekiibhaavaaya sa.mvattanti. katame cha? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno metta.m kaayakamma.m paccupa.t.thita.m hoti sabrahmacaariisu aavi ceva raho ca. ayampi dhammo saara.niiyo piyakara.no garukara.no sa"ngahaaya avivaadaaya saamaggiyaa ekiibhaavaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno metta.m vaciikamma.m paccupa.t.thita.m hoti sabrahmacaariisu aavi ceva raho ca. ayampi dhammo saara.niiyo piyakara.no ^a^M1.0397^ea^ garukara.no sa"ngahaaya avivaadaaya saamaggiyaa ekibhaavaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno metta.m manokamma.m paccupa.t.thita.m hoti sabrahmacaariisu aavi ceva raho ca. ayampi dhammo saara.niiyo piyakara.no garukara.no sa"ngahaaya avivaadaaya saamaggiyaa ekiibhaavaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ye te laabhaa dhammikaa dhammaladdhaa antamaso pattapariyaapannamattampi, tathaaruupehi laabhehi appa.tivibhattabhogii hoti siilavantehi sabrahmacaariihi saadhaara.nabhogii. ayampi dhammo saara.niiyo piyakara.no garukara.no sa"ngahaaya avivaadaaya saamaggiyaa ekiibhaavaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yaani taani siilaani akha.n.daani acchiddaani asabalaani akammaasaani bhujissaani vi~n~nuppasatthaani ^a^T1.0584^ea^ aparaama.t.thaani samaadhisa.mvattanikaani tathaaruupesu siilesu siilasaama~n~nagato viharati sabrahmacaariihi aavi ceva raho ca. ayampi dhammo ^a^V1.0405^ea^ saara.niiyo piyakara.no garukara.no sa"ngahaaya avivaadaaya saamaggiyaa ekiibhaavaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yaaya.m di.t.thi ariyaa niyyaanikaa niyyaati takkarassa sammaa dukkhakkhayaaya tathaaruupaaya di.t.thiyaa di.t.thisaama~n~nagato viharati sabrahmacaariihi aavi ceva raho ca. ayampi dhammo saara.niiyo piyakara.no garukara.no sa"ngahaaya avivaadaaya saamaggiyaa ekiibhaavaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``ime kho, bhikkhave, cha saara.niiyaa dhammaa piyakara.naa garukara.naa sa"ngahaaya avivaadaaya saamaggiyaa ekiibhaavaaya sa.mvattanti. imesa.m kho, bhikkhave, channa.m saara.niiyaana.m dhammaana.m eta.m agga.m eta.m sa"ngaahika.m {sa"ngaahaka.m (?)} eta.m sa"nghaa.tanika.m -- yadida.m yaaya.m di.t.thi ariyaa niyyaanikaa niyyaati takkarassa sammaa dukkhakkhayaaya. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, kuu.taagaarassa eta.m agga.m eta.m sa"ngaahika.m eta.m sa"nghaa.tanika.m yadida.m kuu.ta.m; evameva kho, bhikkhave ^a^P1.0323^ea^, imesa.m channa.m saara.niiyaana.m dhammaana.m eta.m agga.m eta.m sa"ngaahika.m eta.m sa"nghaa.tanika.m ^a^M1.0398^ea^ yadida.m yaaya.m di.t.thi ariyaa niyyaanikaa niyyaati takkarassa sammaa dukkhakkhayaaya.

[03] 493^b^.^eb^ ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, yaaya.m di.t.thi ariyaa niyyaanikaa niyyaati takkarassa sammaa dukkhakkhayaaya? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ara~n~nagato vaa rukkhamuulagato vaa su~n~naagaaragato vaa iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `atthi nu ^a^T1.0585^ea^ kho me ta.m pariyu.t.thaana.m ajjhatta.m appahiina.m, yenaaha.m pariyu.t.thaanena pariyu.t.thitacitto yathaabhuuta.m nappajaaneyya.m na passeyya'nti? sace, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaamaraagapariyu.t.thito hoti, pariyu.t.thitacittova hoti. sace, bhikkhave, bhikkhu byaapaadapariyu.t.thito hoti, pariyu.t.thitacittova hoti. sace, bhikkhave, bhikkhu thiinamiddhapariyu.t.thito hoti, pariyu.t.thitacittova hoti. sace, bhikkhave, bhikkhu uddhaccakukkuccapariyu.t.thito hoti, pariyu.t.thitacittova hoti. sace, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vicikicchaapariyu.t.thito hoti, pariyu.t.thitacittova hoti. sace, bhikkhave, bhikkhu idhalokacintaaya pasuto hoti, pariyu.t.thitacittova hoti. sace, bhikkhave, bhikkhu paralokacintaaya pasuto hoti, pariyu.t.thitacittova hoti. sace, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bha.n.danajaato kalahajaato vivaadaapanno a~n~nama~n~na.m mukhasattiihi vitudanto viharati, pariyu.t.thitacittova hoti ^a^V1.0406^ea^. so eva.m pajaanaati -- `natthi kho me ta.m pariyu.t.thaana.m ajjhatta.m appahiina.m, yenaaha.m pariyu.t.thaanena pariyu.t.thitacitto yathaabhuuta.m nappajaaneyya.m na passeyya.m. suppa.nihita.m me maanasa.m saccaana.m bodhaayaa'ti. idamassa pa.thama.m ~naa.na.m adhigata.m hoti ariya.m lokuttara.m asaadhaara.na.m puthujjanehi.

[03] 494^b^.^eb^ ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `ima.m nu kho aha.m di.t.thi.m aasevanto bhaavento bahuliikaronto labhaami paccatta.m samatha.m, labhaami paccatta.m nibbuti'nti? so eva.m pajaanaati -- `ima.m kho aha.m di.t.thi.m aasevanto bhaavento bahuliikaronto labhaami paccatta.m ^a^T1.0586^ea^ samatha.m, labhaami paccatta.m nibbuti'nti. idamassa dutiya.m ~naa.na.m adhigata.m hoti ariya.m lokuttara.m asaadhaara.na.m puthujjanehi.

[03] 495^b^.^eb^ ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `yathaa ruupaayaaha.m di.t.thiyaa samannaagato, atthi nu kho ito bahiddhaa a~n~no sama.no ^a^M1.0399^ea^ vaa braahma.no vaa ^a^P1.0324^ea^ tathaaruupaaya di.t.thiyaa samannaagato'ti? so eva.m pajaanaati -- `yathaaruupaayaaha.m di.t.thiyaa samannaagato, natthi ito bahiddhaa a~n~no sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa tathaaruupaaya di.t.thiyaa samannaagato'ti. idamassa tatiya.m ~naa.na.m adhigata.m hoti ariya.m lokuttara.m asaadhaara.na.m puthujjanehi.

[03] 496^b^.^eb^ ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `yathaaruupaaya dhammataaya di.t.thisampanno puggalo samannaagato, ahampi tathaaruupaaya dhammataaya samannaagato'ti. katha.mruupaaya ca, bhikkhave, dhammataaya di.t.thisampanno puggalo samannaagato? dhammataa esaa, bhikkhave, di.t.thisampannassa puggalassa -- `ki~ncaapi tathaaruupi.m aapatti.m aapajjati, yathaaruupaaya aapattiyaa vu.t.thaana.m pa~n~naayati, atha kho na.m khippameva satthari vaa vi~n~nuusu vaa sabrahmacaariisu deseti vivarati uttaaniikaroti; desetvaa vivaritvaa uttaaniikatvaa aayati.m sa.mvara.m aapajjati'. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, daharo kumaaro mando uttaanaseyyako hatthena vaa paadena vaa a"ngaara.m akkamitvaa khippameva pa.tisa.mharati; evameva kho, bhikkhave, dhammataa esaa di.t.thisampannassa puggalassa -- `ki~ncaapi tathaaruupi.m ^a^T1.0587^ea^ aapatti.m aapajjati yathaaruupaaya aapattiyaa vu.t.thaana.m pa~n~naayati, atha kho na.m khippameva satthari vaa vi~n~nuusu vaa sabrahmacaariisu deseti vivarati ^a^V1.0407^ea^ uttaaniikaroti; desetvaa vivaritvaa uttaaniikatvaa aayati.m sa.mvara.m aapajjati'. so eva.m pajaanaati -- `yathaaruupaaya dhammataaya di.t.thisampanno puggalo samannaagato, ahampi tathaaruupaaya dhammataaya samannaagato'ti. idamassa catuttha.m ~naa.na.m adhigata.m hoti ariya.m lokuttara.m asaadhaara.na.m puthujjanehi.

[03] 497^b^.^eb^ ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `yathaaruupaaya dhammataaya di.t.thisampanno puggalo samannaagato, ahampi tathaaruupaaya dhammataaya samannaagato'ti. katha.mruupaaya ca, bhikkhave, dhammataaya di.t.thisampanno puggalo samannaagato? dhammataa esaa, bhikkhave, di.t.thisampannassa puggalassa -- `ki~ncaapi yaani taani sabrahmacaariina.m uccaavacaani ki.mkara.niiyaani tattha ussukka.m aapanno hoti, atha khvaassa tibbaapekkhaa hoti adhisiilasikkhaaya adhicittasikkhaaya adhipa~n~naasikkhaaya'. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, gaavii taru.navacchaa thamba~nca aalumpati vacchaka~nca apacinati; evameva kho, bhikkhave ^a^M1.0400^ea^, dhammataa esaa di.t.thisampannassa puggalassa -- `ki~ncaapi yaani taani sabrahmacaariina.m uccaavacaani ki.mkara.niiyaani tattha ussukka.m aapanno hoti, atha khvaassa tibbaapekkhaa hoti adhisiilasikkhaaya adhicittasikkhaaya adhipa~n~naasikkhaaya'. so eva.m pajaanaati -- `yathaaruupaaya dhammataaya di.t.thisampanno puggalo ^a^T1.0588^ea^ samannaagato, ahampi tathaaruupaaya dhammataaya samannaagato'ti. idamassa pa~ncama.m ~naa.na.m adhigata.m hoti ariya.m lokuttara.m asaadhaara.na.m puthujjanehi.

[03] 498^b^.^eb^ ``puna ^a^P1.0325^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `yathaaruupaaya balataaya di.t.thisampanno puggalo samannaagato, ahampi tathaaruupaaya balataaya samannaagato'ti. katha.mruupaaya ca, bhikkhave, balataaya di.t.thisampanno puggalo samannaagato? balataa esaa, bhikkhave, di.t.thisampannassa puggalassa ya.m tathaagatappavedite dhammavinaye desiyamaane a.t.thi.mkatvaa manasikatvaa sabbacetasaa {sabbacetaso (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0), sabba.m cetasaa (ka0)} samannaaharitvaa ohitasoto dhamma.m su.naati. so eva.m pajaanaati -- `yathaaruupaaya balataaya di.t.thisampanno puggalo samannaagato, ahampi tathaaruupaaya balataaya samannaagato'ti. idamassa cha.t.tha.m ~naa.na.m adhigata.m hoti ariya.m lokuttara.m asaadhaara.na.m puthujjanehi.

[03] 499^b^.^eb^ ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `yathaaruupaaya balataaya ^a^V1.0408^ea^ di.t.thisampanno puggalo samannaagato, ahampi tathaaruupaaya balataaya samannaagato'ti. katha.mruupaaya ca, bhikkhave, balataaya di.t.thisampanno puggalo samannaagato? balataa esaa, bhikkhave, di.t.thisampannassa puggalassa ya.m tathaagatappavedite dhammavinaye desiyamaane labhati atthaveda.m, labhati dhammaveda.m, labhati dhammuupasa.mhita.m paamojja.m. so eva.m pajaanaati -- `yathaaruupaaya balataaya di.t.thisampanno puggalo ^a^T1.0589^ea^ samannaagato, ahampi tathaaruupaaya balataaya samannaagato'ti. idamassa sattama.m ~naa.na.m adhigata.m hoti ariya.m lokuttara.m asaadhaara.na.m puthujjanehi.

[03] 500^b^.^eb^ ``eva.m satta"ngasamannaagatassa kho, bhikkhave, ariyasaavakassa dhammataa susamanni.t.thaa hoti sotaapattiphalasacchikiriyaaya. eva.m satta"ngasamannaagato ^a^M1.0401^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako sotaapattiphalasamannaagato hotii''ti.
[03] idamavoca bhagavaa. attamanaa te bhikkhuu bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandunti.
[06] kosambiyasutta.m ni.t.thita.m a.t.thama.m.

[03] 501^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T1.0590^ea^ ^a^V1.0409^ea^ ^a^P1.0326^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[01] ``ekamidaaha.m, bhikkhave, samaya.m ukka.t.thaaya.m viharaami subhagavane saalaraajamuule. tena kho pana, bhikkhave, samayena bakassa brahmuno evaruupa.m paapaka.m di.t.thigata.m uppanna.m hoti -- `ida.m nicca.m, ida.m dhuva.m, ida.m sassata.m, ida.m kevala.m, ida.m acavanadhamma.m, ida~nhi na jaayati na jiiyati na miiyati na cavati na upapajjati, ito ca pana~n~na.m uttari nissara.na.m natthii'ti. atha khvaaha.m, bhikkhave, bakassa brahmuno cetasaa cetoparivitakkama~n~naaya -- seyyathaapi naama balavaa puriso sami~njita.m vaa baaha.m pasaareyya, pasaarita.m vaa baaha.m sami~njeyya, evameva -- ukka.t.thaaya.m subhagavane saalaraajamuule antarahito tasmi.m brahmaloke paaturahosi.m. addasaa kho ma.m, bhikkhave, bako brahmaa duuratova aagacchanta.m; disvaana ma.m etadavoca -- `ehi kho, maarisa, svaagata.m, maarisa! cirassa.m kho, maarisa, ima.m pariyaayamakaasi yadida.m idhaagamanaaya. ida~nhi, maarisa, nicca.m, ida.m dhuva.m, ida.m sassata.m, ida.m kevala.m, ida.m acavanadhamma.m, ida~nhi na jaayati na jiiyati na miiyati na cavati na upapajjati. ito ca pana~n~na.m uttari nissara.na.m natthii'''ti.

[01] eva.m vutte, aha.m, bhikkhave, baka.m brahmaana.m etadavoca.m ^a^T1.0591^ea^ -- ``avijjaagato vata, bho, bako brahmaa; avijjaagato vata, bho, bako brahmaa; yatra hi naama anicca.myeva samaana.m niccanti vakkhati, addhuva.myeva samaana.m dhuvanti vakkhati, asassata.myeva samaana.m sassatanti vakkhati, akevala.myeva samaana.m ^a^M1.0402^ea^ kevalanti vakkhati, cavanadhamma.myeva samaana.m acavanadhammanti vakkhati; yattha ca pana jaayati jiiyati miiyati cavati upapajjati ta~nca vakkhati -- `ida~nhi na jaayati na jiiyati na miiyati na cavati na upapajjatii'ti; santa~nca pana~n~na.m uttari nissara.na.m `nattha~n~na.m uttari nissara.na'nti vakkhatii''ti.

[03] 502^b^.^eb^ ``atha ^a^V1.0410^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, maaro paapimaa a~n~natara.m brahmapaarisajja.m anvaavisitvaa ma.m etadavoca -- `bhikkhu, bhikkhu, metamaasado metamaasado, eso hi, bhikkhu, brahmaa mahaabrahmaa ^a^P1.0327^ea^ abhibhuu anabhibhuuto a~n~nadatthudaso vasavattii issaro kattaa nimmaataa se.t.tho sajitaa {sajjitaa (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0), sa~njitaa (sii0 pii0)} vasii pitaa bhuutabhabyaana.m. ahesu.m kho ye, bhikkhu, tayaa pubbe sama.nabraahma.naa lokasmi.m pathaviigarahakaa pathaviijigucchakaa, aapagarahakaa aapajigucchakaa, tejagarahakaa tejajigucchakaa, vaayagarahakaa vaayajigucchakaa, bhuutagarahakaa bhuutajigucchakaa, devagarahakaa devajigucchakaa, pajaapatigarahakaa pajaapatijigucchakaa, brahmagarahakaa brahmajigucchakaa -- te kaayassa bhedaa paa.nupacchedaa hiine kaaye pati.t.thitaa ahesu.m. ye pana, bhikkhu, tayaa pubbe sama.nabraahma.naa lokasmi.m pathaviipasa.msakaa pathavaabhinandino, aapapasa.msakaa aapaabhinandino, tejapasa.msakaa tejaabhinandino, vaayapasa.msakaa ^a^T1.0592^ea^ vaayaabhinandino, bhuutapasa.msakaa bhuutaabhinandino, devapasa.msakaa devaabhinandino, pajaapatipasa.msakaa pajaapataabhinandino, brahmapasa.msakaa brahmaabhinandino -- te kaayassa bhedaa paa.nupacchedaa pa.niite kaaye pati.t.thitaa. ta.m taaha.m, bhikkhu, eva.m vadaami -- `i"ngha tva.m, maarisa, yadeva te brahmaa aaha tadeva tva.m karohi, maa tva.m brahmuno vacana.m upaativattittho'. sace kho tva.m, bhikkhu, brahmuno vacana.m upaativattissasi, seyyathaapi naama puriso siri.m aagacchanti.m da.n.dena pa.tippa.naameyya, seyyathaapi vaa pana, bhikkhu, puriso narakappapaate papatanto hatthehi ca paadehi ca pathavi.m viraadheyya, eva.m sampadamida.m, bhikkhu, tuyha.m bhavissati. `i"ngha.m tva.m, maarisa, yadeva te brahmaa aaha tadeva tva.m karohi, maa tva.m brahmuno vacana.m upaativattittho. nanu tva.m, bhikkhu, passasi brahmaparisa.m sannipatita'nti? iti kho ma.m, bhikkhave, maaro paapimaa brahmaparisa.m upanesi.

[03] ``eva.m ^a^M1.0403^ea^ vutte, aha.m, bhikkhave, maara.m paapimanta.m etadavoca.m -- `jaanaami kho taaha.m, paapima; maa tva.m ma~n~nittho -- na ma.m jaanaatii'ti. maaro tvamasi, paapima. yo ceva, paapima, brahmaa, yaa ca brahmaparisaa, ye ca brahmapaarisajjaa, sabbeva tava hatthagataa sabbeva tava vasa.mgataa. tuyha~nhi, paapima, eva.m hoti -- `esopi me assa hatthagato, esopi me assa vasa.mgato'ti. aha.m kho pana, paapima, neva tava hatthagato neva tava vasa.mgato''ti.

[03] 503^b^.^eb^ ``eva.m ^a^T1.0593^ea^ vutte, bhikkhave, bako brahmaa ma.m etadavoca -- `aha~nhi, maarisa, nicca.myeva ^a^V1.0411^ea^ samaana.m niccanti vadaami, dhuva.myeva ^a^P1.0328^ea^ samaana.m dhuvanti vadaami, sassata.myeva samaana.m sassatanti vadaami, kevala.myeva samaana.m kevalanti vadaami, acavanadhamma.myeva samaana.m acavanadhamma'nti vadaami, yattha ca pana na jaayati na jiiyati na miiyati na cavati na upapajjati tadevaaha.m vadaami -- `ida~nhi na jaayati na jiiyati na miiyati na cavati na upapajjatii'ti. asanta~nca pana~n~na.m uttari nissara.na.m `nattha~n~na.m uttari nissara.na'nti vadaami. ahesu.m kho, bhikkhu, tayaa pubbe sama.nabraahma.naa lokasmi.m yaavataka.m tuyha.m kasi.na.m aayu taavataka.m tesa.m tapokammameva ahosi. te kho eva.m jaaneyyu.m -- `santa~nca pana~n~na.m uttari nissara.na.m attha~n~na.m uttari nissara.nanti, asanta.m vaa a~n~na.m uttari nissara.na.m nattha~n~na.m uttari nissara.na'nti. ta.m taaha.m, bhikkhu, eva.m vadaami -- `na ceva~n~na.m uttari nissara.na.m dakkhissasi, yaavadeva ca pana kilamathassa vighaatassa bhaagii bhavissasi. sace kho tva.m, bhikkhu, pathavi.m ajjhosissasi, opasaayiko me bhavissasi vatthusaayiko, yathaakaamakara.niiyo baahiteyyo. sace aapa.m... teja.m... vaaya.m... bhuute... deve... pajaapati.m... brahma.m ajjhosissasi, opasaayiko me bhavissasi vatthusaayiko, yathaakaamakara.niiyo baahiteyyo'ti.

[03] ``ahampi kho eva.m, brahme, jaanaami -- sace pathavi.m ajjhosissaami, opasaayiko te bhavissaami vatthusaayiko, yathaakaamakara.niiyo ^a^T1.0594^ea^ baahiteyyo. `sace aapa.m... teja.m... vaaya.m... bhuute... deve... pajaapati.m... brahma.m ajjhosissaami, opasaayiko te bhavissaami vatthusaayiko, yathaakaamakara.niiyo baahiteyyo'ti api ca te aha.m, brahme, gati~nca pajaanaami, juti~nca pajaanaami -- eva.m mahiddhiko bako brahmaa, eva.m mahaanubhaavo bako brahmaa, eva.m mahesakkho bako brahmaa''ti.

[03] ``yathaakatha.m ^a^M1.0404^ea^ pana me tva.m, maarisa, gati~nca pajaanaasi, juti~nca pajaanaasi -- `eva.m mahiddhiko bako brahmaa, eva.m mahaanubhaavo bako brahmaa, eva.m mahesakkho bako brahmaa'ti?
[21] ``yaavataa candimasuuriyaa, pariharanti disaa bhanti virocanaa.
[22] taava sahassadhaa loko, ettha te vattate {vattatii (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} vaso..
[21] ``paropara~nca ^a^V1.0412^ea^ {parovara~nca (sii0 pii0)} jaanaasi, atho raagaviraagina.m.
[22] itthabhaava~n~nathaabhaava.m, sattaana.m aagati.m gati''nti..
[03] ``eva.m kho te aha.m, brahme, gati~nca pajaanaami juti~nca pajaanaami -- `eva.m mahiddhiko bako brahmaa, eva.m mahaanubhaavo bako ^a^P1.0329^ea^ brahmaa, eva.m mahesakkho bako brahmaa'ti.

[03] 504^b^.^eb^ ``atthi kho, brahme, a~n~no kaayo, ta.m tva.m na jaanaasi na passasi; tamaha.m jaanaami passaami. atthi kho, brahme, aabhassaraa naama kaayo yato tva.m cuto idhuupapanno. tassa te aticiranivaasena saa sati pamu.t.thaa, tena ta.m tva.m na jaanaasi na passasi; tamaha.m jaanaami passaami. evampi kho aha.m, brahme, neva te samasamo abhi~n~naaya, kuto niiceyya.m? atha ^a^T1.0595^ea^ kho ahameva tayaa bhiyyo. atthi kho, brahme, subhaki.nho naama kaayo, vehapphalo naama kaayo, abhibhuu naama kaayo, ta.m tva.m na jaanaasi na passasi; tamaha.m jaanaami passaami. evampi kho aha.m, brahme, neva te samasamo abhi~n~naaya, kuto niiceyya.m? atha kho ahameva tayaa bhiyyo. pathavi.m kho aha.m, brahme, pathavito abhi~n~naaya yaavataa pathaviyaa pathavattena ananubhuuta.m tadabhi~n~naaya pathavi.m naapahosi.m, pathaviyaa naapahosi.m, pathavito naapahosi.m, pathavi.m meti naapahosi.m, pathavi.m naabhivadi.m. evampi kho aha.m, brahme, neva te samasamo abhi~n~naaya, kuto niiceyya.m? atha kho ahameva tayaa bhiyyo. aapa.m kho aha.m, brahme...pe0... teja.m kho aha.m, brahme...pe0... vaaya.m kho aha.m, brahme...pe0... bhuute kho aha.m, brahme...pe0... deve kho aha.m, brahme...pe0... pajaapati.m kho aha.m, brahme...pe0... brahma.m kho aha.m, brahme...pe0... aabhassare kho aha.m, brahme...pe0... subhaki.nhe kho aha.m, brahme... ^a^M1.0405^ea^ ...pe0... vehapphale kho aha.m, brahme...pe0... abhibhu.m kho aha.m, brahme...pe0... sabba.m kho aha.m, brahme, sabbato abhi~n~naaya yaavataa sabbassa sabbattena ananubhuuta.m tadabhi~n~naaya sabba.m naapahosi.m sabbasmi.m naapahosi.m sabbato naapahosi.m sabba.m meti naapahosi.m, sabba.m naabhivadi.m. evampi kho aha.m, brahme, neva te samasamo abhi~n~naaya, kuto niiceyya.m? atha kho ahameva tayaa bhiyyo''ti.
[03] ``sace ^a^V1.0413^ea^ kho, maarisa, sabbassa sabbattena ananubhuuta.m, tadabhi~n~naaya maa heva te rittakameva ahosi, tucchakameva ahosii''ti ^a^T1.0596^ea^.

[03] ```vi~n~naa.na.m anidassana.m ananta.m sabbato pabha.m', ta.m pathaviyaa pathavattena ananubhuuta.m, aapassa aapattena ananubhuuta.m, tejassa tejattena ananubhuuta.m, vaayassa vaayattena ananubhuuta.m, bhuutaana.m bhuutattena ananubhuuta.m, devaana.m devattena ananubhuuta.m, pajaapatissa pajaapatittena ananubhuuta.m, brahmaana.m brahmattena ananubhuuta.m, aabhassaraana.m aabhassarattena ananubhuuta.m, subhaki.nhaana.m subhaki.nhattena ananubhuuta.m, vehapphalaana.m vehapphalatte ^a^P1.0330^ea^ ananubhuuta.m, abhibhussa abhibhuttena ananubhuuta.m, sabbassa sabbattena ananubhuuta.m''.

[03] ``handa carahi {handa ca hi (sii0 pii0)} te, maarisa, passa antaradhaayaamii''ti. `handa carahi me tva.m, brahme, antaradhaayassu, sace visahasii'ti. atha kho, bhikkhave, bako brahmaa `antaradhaayissaami sama.nassa gotamassa, antaradhaayissaami sama.nassa gotamassaa'ti nevassu me sakkoti antaradhaayitu.m.

[01] ``eva.m vutte, aha.m, bhikkhave, baka.m brahmaana.m etadavoca.m -- `handa carahi te brahme antaradhaayaamii'ti. `handa carahi me tva.m, maarisa, antaradhaayassu sace visahasii'ti. atha kho aha.m, bhikkhave, tathaaruupa.m iddhaabhisa"nkhaara.m abhisa"nkhaasi.m -- `ettaavataa brahmaa ca brahmaparisaa ca brahmapaarisajjaa ca sadda~nca me sossanti {saddameva suyyanti (ka0)}, na ca ma.m dakkhantii'ti. antarahito ima.m gaatha.m abhaasi.m --
[21] ``bhavevaaha.m bhaya.m disvaa, bhava~nca vibhavesina.m.
[22] bhava.m naabhivadi.m ki~nci, nandi~nca na upaadiyi''nti..

[03] ``atha ^a^T1.0597^ea^ ^a^M1.0406^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, brahmaa ca brahmaparisaa ca brahmapaarisajjaa ca acchariyabbhutacittajaataa ahesu.m -- `acchariya.m vata bho, abbhuta.m vata bho! sama.nassa gotamassa mahiddhikataa mahaanubhaavataa, na ca vata no ito pubbe di.t.tho vaa, suto vaa, a~n~no ^a^V1.0414^ea^ sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa eva.m mahiddhiko eva.m mahaanubhaavo yathaaya.m sama.no gotamo sakyaputto sakyakulaa pabbajito. bhavaraamaaya vata, bho, pajaaya bhavarataaya bhavasammuditaaya samuula.m bhava.m udabbahii'ti.

[03] 505^b^.^eb^ ``atha kho, bhikkhave, maaro paapimaa a~n~natara.m brahmapaarisajja.m anvaavisitvaa ma.m etadavoca -- `sace kho tva.m, maarisa, eva.m pajaanaasi, sace tva.m eva.m anubuddho, maa saavake upanesi, maa pabbajite; maa saavakaana.m dhamma.m desesi, maa pabbajitaana.m; maa saavakesu gedhimakaasi, maa pabbajitesu. ahesu.m kho, bhikkhu, tayaa pubbe sama.nabraahma.naa lokasmi.m arahanto sammaasambuddhaa pa.tijaanamaanaa ^a^P1.0331^ea^. te saavake upanesu.m pabbajite, saavakaana.m dhamma.m desesu.m pabbajitaana.m, saavakesu gedhimaka.msu pabbajitesu, te saavake upanetvaa pabbajite, saavakaana.m dhamma.m desetvaa pabbajitaana.m, saavakesu gedhitacittaa pabbajitesu, kaayassa bhedaa paa.nupacchedaa hiine kaaye pati.t.thitaa. ahesu.m ye pana, bhikkhu, tayaa pubbe sama.nabraahma.naa lokasmi.m arahanto sammaasambuddhaa pa.tijaanamaanaa. te na saavake upanesu.m na pabbajite, na saavakaana.m dhamma.m desesu.m na pabbajitaana.m, na saavakesu ^a^T1.0598^ea^ gedhimaka.msu na pabbajitesu, te na saavake upanetvaa na pabbajite, na saavakaana.m dhamma.m desetvaa na pabbajitaana.m, na saavakesu gedhitacittaa na pabbajitesu, kaayassa bhedaa paa.nupacchedaa pa.niite kaaye pati.t.thitaa. ta.m taaha.m, bhikkhu, eva.m vadaami -- i"ngha tva.m, maarisa, appossukko di.t.thadhammasukhavihaaramanuyutto viharassu, anakkhaata.m kusala~nhi, maarisa, maa para.m ovadaahii'ti.

[01] ``eva.m vutte, aha.m, bhikkhave, maara.m paapimanta.m etadavoca.m -- `jaanaami kho taaha.m, paapima, maa tva.m ma~n~nittho -- na ma.m jaanaatii'ti. maaro tvamasi, paapima. na ma.m tva.m, paapima, hitaanukampii eva.m vadesi; ahitaanukampii ma.m tva.m, paapima, eva.m vadesi. tuyha~nhi, paapima, eva.m hoti -- `yesa.m sama.no gotamo dhamma.m desessati, te me visaya.m upaativattissantii'ti. asammaasambuddhaava pana te ^a^M1.0407^ea^, paapima, samaanaa sammaasambuddhaamhaati pa.tijaani.msu. aha.m kho pana, paapima, sammaasambuddhova samaano sammaasambuddhomhiiti pa.tijaanaami. desentopi hi, paapima, tathaagato saavakaana.m dhamma.m taadisova adesentopi hi, paapima, tathaagato saavakaana.m dhamma.m taadisova. upanentopi hi, paapima, tathaagato saavake ^a^V1.0415^ea^ taadisova, anupanentopi hi, paapima, tathaagato saavake taadisova. ta.m kissa hetu? tathaagatassa, paapima, ye aasavaa sa.mkilesikaa ponobbhavikaa sadaraa dukkhavipaakaa aayati.m jaatijaraamara.niyaa -- te pahiinaa ucchinnamuulaa taalaavatthukataa anabhaava.mkataa aayati.m ^a^T1.0599^ea^ anuppaadadhammaa. seyyathaapi, paapima, taalo matthakacchinno abhabbo puna viruu.lhiyaa; evameva kho, paapima, tathaagatassa ye aasavaa sa.mkilesikaa ponobbhavikaa sadaraa dukkhavipaakaa aayati.m jaatijaraamara.niyaa -- te pahiinaa ucchinnamuulaa taalaavatthukataa anabhaava.mkataa aayati.m anuppaadadhammaati.
[03] ``iti hida.m maarassa ca anaalapanataaya brahmuno ca abhinimantanataaya, tasmaa imassa veyyaakara.nassa brahmanimantanika.mteva adhivacana''nti.
[06] brahmanimantanikasutta.m ni.t.thita.m navama.m.

[03] 506^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T1.0600^ea^ ^a^V1.0416^ea^ ^a^P1.0332^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano bhaggesu viharati susumaaragire bhesaka.laavane migadaaye. tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano abbhokaase ca"nkamati. tena kho pana samayena maaro paapimaa aayasmato mahaamoggallaanassa kucchigato hoti ko.t.thamanupavi.t.tho. atha kho aayasmato mahaamoggallaanassa etadahosi -- ``ki.m nu kho me kucchi garugaro viya {garu garu viya (sii0 pii0 .tiikaaya.m paa.thantara.m)}? maasaacita.m ma~n~ne''ti. atha kho aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano ca"nkamaa orohitvaa vihaara.m pavisitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. nisajja kho aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano paccatta.m yoniso manasaakaasi. addasaa kho aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano maara.m paapimanta.m kucchigata.m ko.t.thamanupavi.t.tha.m. disvaana ^a^M1.0408^ea^ maara.m paapimanta.m etadavoca -- ``nikkhama, paapima; nikkhama, paapima! maa tathaagata.m vihesesi, maa tathaagatasaavaka.m. maa te ahosi diigharatta.m ahitaaya dukkhaayaa''ti. atha kho maarassa paapimato etadahosi -- ``ajaanameva kho ma.m aya.m sama.no apassa.m evamaaha -- `nikkhama, paapima; nikkhama, paapima! maa tathaagata.m vihesesi, maa tathaagatasaavaka.m. maa te ahosi diigharatta.m ahitaaya dukkhaayaa'ti. yopissa so satthaa sopi ma.m neva khippa.m jaaneyya, kuto pana {kuto ca pana (syaa0)} ma.m aya.m saavako jaanissatii''ti? atha kho aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano ^a^T1.0601^ea^ maara.m paapimanta.m etadavoca -- ``evampi kho taaha.m, paapima, jaanaami, maa tva.m ma~n~nittho -- `na ma.m jaanaatii'ti. maaro tvamasi, paapima; tuyha~nhi, paapima, eva.m hoti -- `ajaanameva kho ma.m aya.m sama.no apassa.m evamaaha -- nikkhama, paapima; nikkhama, paapima! maa tathaagata.m vihesesi, maa tathaagatasaavaka.m. maa te ahosi diigharatta.m ahitaaya dukkhaayaati. yopissa so satthaa sopi ma.m neva khippa.m jaaneyya, kuto pana ma.m aya.m saavako jaanissatii'''ti?

[03] atha kho maarassa paapimato etadahosi -- ``jaaname kho ma.m aya.m sama.no passa.m evamaaha -- `nikkhama, paapima; nikkhama, paapima! maa tathaagata.m vihesesi, maa tathaagatasaavaka.m. maa te ahosi diigharatta.m ahitaaya dukkhaayaa'''ti. atha kho maaro paapimaa aayasmato ^a^P1.0333^ea^ mahaamoggallaanassa mukhato uggantvaa paccagga.le a.t.thaasi.

[03] 507^b^.^eb^ addasaa ^a^V1.0417^ea^ kho aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano maara.m paapimanta.m paccagga.le .thita.m; disvaana maara.m paapimanta.m etadavoca -- `etthaapi kho taaha.m, paapima, passaami; maa tva.m ma~n~nittho ``na ma.m passatii''ti. eso tva.m, paapima, paccagga.le .thito. bhuutapubbaaha.m, paapima, duusii naama maaro ahosi.m, tassa me kaa.lii naama bhaginii. tassaa tva.m putto. so me tva.m bhaagineyyo ahosi. tena kho pana, paapima, samayena kakusandho bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho loke uppanno hoti. kakusandhassa kho pana, paapima, bhagavato arahato ^a^T1.0602^ea^ sammaasambuddhassa vidhurasa~njiiva.m naama saavakayuga.m ahosi agga.m bhaddayuga.m. yaavataa kho pana, paapima, kakusandhassa bhagavato ^a^M1.0409^ea^ arahato sammaasambuddhassa saavakaa. tesu na ca koci aayasmataa vidhurena samasamo hoti yadida.m dhammadesanaaya. iminaa kho eva.m {eta.m (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}, paapima, pariyaayena aayasmato vidhurassa vidhuroteva {vidhurassa vidhuro vidhurotveva (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} sama~n~naa udapaadi.

[03] ``aayasmaa pana, paapima, sa~njiivo ara~n~nagatopi rukkhamuulagatopi su~n~naagaaragatopi appakasireneva sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m samaapajjati. bhuutapubba.m, paapima, aayasmaa sa~njiivo a~n~natarasmi.m rukkhamuule sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m samaapanno nisinno hoti. addasa.msu kho, paapima, gopaalakaa pasupaalakaa kassakaa pathaavino aayasmanta.m sa~njiiva.m a~n~natarasmi.m rukkhamuule sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m samaapanna.m nisinna.m; disvaana tesa.m etadahosi -- `acchariya.m vata, bho, abbhuta.m vata, bho! aya.m sama.no nisinnakova kaala"nkato! handa na.m dahaamaa'ti. atha kho te, paapima, gopaalakaa pasupaalakaa kassakaa pathaavino ti.na~nca ka.t.tha~nca gomaya~nca sa.mka.d.dhitvaa aayasmato sa~njiivassa kaaye upacinitvaa aggi.m datvaa pakkami.msu. atha kho, paapima, aayasmaa sa~njiivo tassaa rattiyaa accayena taaya samaapattiyaa vu.t.thahitvaa ciivaraani pappho.tetvaa pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya gaama.m pi.n.daaya paavisi. addasa.msu kho te, paapima, gopaalakaa pasupaalakaa kassakaa pathaavino aayasmanta.m sa~njiiva.m pi.n.daaya caranta.m; disvaana nesa.m ^a^T1.0603^ea^ etadahosi -- `acchariya.m vata, bho, abbhuta.m vata, bho! aya.m sama.no nisinnakova kaala"nkato, svaaya.m pa.tisa~njiivito'ti ^a^P1.0334^ea^. iminaa kho eva.m, paapima, pariyaayena aayasmato sa~njiivassa sa~njiivoteva {sa~njiivo sa~njiivotveva (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} sama~n~naa udapaadi.

[03] 508^b^.^eb^ ``atha kho, paapima, duusissa maarassa etadahosi -- `imesa.m kho aha.m bhikkhuuna.m siilavantaana.m kalyaa.nadhammaana.m neva jaanaami aagati.m vaa gati.m vaa. ya.mnuunaaha.m braahma.nagahapatike anvaaviseyya.m ^a^V1.0418^ea^ -- etha, tumhe bhikkhuu siilavante kalyaa.nadhamme akkosatha paribhaasatha rosetha vihesetha. appeva naama tumhehi akkosiyamaanaana.m paribhaasiyamaanaana.m rosiyamaanaana.m vihesiyamaanaana.m siyaa cittassa a~n~nathatta.m, yathaa ta.m duusii ^a^M1.0410^ea^ maaro labhetha otaara'nti. atha kho te, paapima, duusii maaro braahma.nagahapatike anvaavisi -- `etha, tumhe bhikkhuu siilavante kalyaa.nadhamme akkosatha paribhaasatha rosetha vihesetha. appeva naama tumhehi akkosiyamaanaana.m paribhaasiyamaanaana.m rosiyamaanaana.m vihesiyamaanaana.m siyaa cittassa a~n~nathatta.m, yathaa ta.m duusii maaro labhetha otaara'nti.

[03] ``atha kho te, paapima, braahma.nagahapatikaa anvaavisi.t.thaa duusinaa maarena bhikkhuu siilavante kalyaa.nadhamme akkosanti paribhaasanti rosenti vihesenti -- `ime pana mu.n.dakaa sama.nakaa ibbhaa ki.nhaa {ka.nhaa (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} bandhupaadaapaccaa ``jhaayinosmaa jhaayinosmaa''ti pattakkhandhaa adhomukhaa madhurakajaataa jhaayanti pajjhaayanti nijjhaayanti apajjhaayanti. seyyathaapi naama uluuko ^a^T1.0604^ea^ rukkhasaakhaaya.m muusika.m maggayamaano jhaayati pajjhaayati nijjhaayati apajjhaayati; evamevime mu.n.dakaa sama.nakaa ibbhaa ki.nhaa bandhupaadaapaccaa ``jhaayinosmaa jhaayinosmaa''ti pattakkhandhaa adhomukhaa madhurakajaataa jhaayanti pajjhaayanti nijjhaayanti apajjhaayanti. seyyathaapi naama kotthu nadiitiire macche maggayamaano jhaayati pajjhaayati nijjhaayati apajjhaayati; evamevime mu.n.dakaa sama.nakaa ibbhaa ki.nhaa bandhupaadaapaccaa ``jhaayinosmaa jhaayinosmaa''ti pattakkhandhaa adhomukhaa madhurakajaataa jhaayanti pajjhaayanti nijjhaayanti apajjhaayanti. seyyathaapi naama bi.laaro sandhisamalasa"nka.tiire muusika.m maggayamaano jhaayati pajjhaayati nijjhaayati apajjhaayati; evamevime mu.n.dakaa sama.nakaa ibbhaa ki.nhaa bandhupaadaapaccaa ``jhaayinosmaa jhaayinosmaa''ti pattakkhandhaa adhomukhaa madhurakajaataa jhaayanti pajjhaayanti nijjhaayanti apajjhaayanti. seyyathaapi naama gadrabho vahacchinno sandhisamalasa"nka.tiire jhaayati pajjhaayati nijjhaayati apajjhaayati, evamevime mu.n.dakaa sama.nakaa ibbhaa ki.nhaa bandhupaadaapaccaa ``jhaayinosmaa jhaayinosmaa''ti pattakkhandhaa adhomukhaa madhurakajaataa jhaayanti pajjhaayanti nijjhaayanti apajjhaayantii''ti.
[03] ``ye kho pana, paapima, tena samayena manussaa kaala"nkaronti yebhuyyena kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjanti.

[03] 509^b^.^eb^ ``atha ^a^M1.0411^ea^ ^a^V1.0419^ea^ ^a^P1.0335^ea^ kho, paapima, kakusandho bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho bhikkhuu ^a^T1.0605^ea^ aamantesi -- `anvaavi.t.thaa kho, bhikkhave, braahma.nagahapatikaa duusinaa maarena -- etha, tumhe bhikkhuu siilavante kalyaa.nadhamme akkosatha paribhaasatha rosetha vihesetha, appeva naama tumhehi akkosiyamaanaana.m paribhaasiyamaanaana.m rosiyamaanaana.m vihesiyamaanaana.m siyaa cittassa a~n~nathatta.m, yathaa ta.m duusii maaro labhetha otaara'nti. etha, tumhe, bhikkhave, mettaasahagatena cetasaa eka.m disa.m pharitvaa viharatha, tathaa dutiya.m, tathaa tatiya.m, tathaa catuttha.m. iti uddhamadho tiriya.m sabbadhi sabbattataaya sabbaavanta.m loka.m mettaasahagatena cetasaa vipulena mahaggatena appamaa.nena averena abyaabajjhena pharitvaa viharatha. karu.naasahagatena cetasaa...pe0... muditaasahagatena cetasaa...pe0... upekkhaasahagatena cetasaa eka.m disa.m pharitvaa viharatha, tathaa dutiya.m, tathaa tatiya.m, tathaa catuttha.m. iti uddhamadho tiriya.m sabbadhi sabbattataaya sabbaavanta.m loka.m upekkhaasahagatena cetasaa vipulena mahaggatena appamaa.nena averena abyaabajjhena pharitvaa viharathaa'ti.

[03] ``atha kho te, paapima, bhikkhuu kakusandhena bhagavataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena eva.m ovadiyamaanaa eva.m anusaasiyamaanaa ara~n~nagataapi rukkhamuulagataapi su~n~naagaaragataapi mettaasahagatena cetasaa eka.m disa.m pharitvaa vihari.msu, tathaa dutiya.m, tathaa tatiya.m, tathaa catuttha.m. iti uddhamadho tiriya.m sabbadhi sabbattataaya sabbaavanta.m loka.m mettaasahagatena cetasaa vipulena mahaggatena appamaa.nena averena abyaabajjhena pharitvaa vihari.msu. karu.naasahagatena cetasaa...pe0... muditaasahagatena cetasaa...pe0... upekkhaasahagatena cetasaa eka.m disa.m pharitvaa vihari.msu, tathaa dutiya.m, tathaa tatiya.m, tathaa catuttha.m. iti uddhamadho tiriya.m sabbadhi sabbattataaya sabbaavanta.m loka.m upekkhaasahagatena cetasaa vipulena mahaggatena appamaa.nena averena abyaabajjhena pharitvaa vihari.msu ^a^T1.0606^ea^.

[03] 510^b^.^eb^ ``atha kho, paapima, duusissa maarassa etadahosi -- `evampi kho aha.m karonto imesa.m bhikkhuuna.m siilavantaana.m kalyaa.nadhammaana.m neva jaanaami aagati.m vaa gati.m vaa, ya.mnuunaaha.m braahma.nagahapatike anvaaviseyya.m -- etha, tumhe bhikkhuu siilavante kalyaa.nadhamme sakkarotha garu.m karotha maanetha ^a^M1.0412^ea^ puujetha ^a^P1.0336^ea^, appeva naama tumhehi sakkariyamaanaana.m garukariyamaanaana.m maaniyamaanaana.m puujiyamaanaana.m siyaa cittassa a~n~nathatta.m, yathaa ta.m duusii maaro labhetha otaara'nti ^a^V1.0420^ea^. atha kho te, paapima, duusii maaro braahma.nagahapatike anvaavisi -- `etha, tumhe bhikkhuu siilavante kalyaa.nadhamme sakkarotha garu.m karotha maanetha puujetha, appeva naama tumhehi sakkariyamaanaana.m garukariyamaanaana.m maaniyamaanaana.m puujiyamaanaana.m siyaa cittassa a~n~nathatta.m, yathaa ta.m duusii maaro labhetha otaara'nti. atha kho te, paapima, braahma.nagahapatikaa anvaavi.t.thaa duusinaa maarena bhikkhuu siilavante kalyaa.nadhamme sakkaronti garu.m karonti maanenti puujenti.
[03] ``ye kho pana, paapima, tena samayena manussaa kaala"nkaronti yebhuyyena kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjanti.

[03] 511^b^.^eb^ ``atha ^a^T1.0607^ea^ kho, paapima, kakusandho bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho bhikkhuu aamantesi -- `anvaavi.t.thaa kho, bhikkhave, braahma.nagahapatikaa duusinaa maarena -- etha, tumhe bhikkhuu siilavante kalyaa.nadhamme sakkarotha garu.m karotha maanetha puujetha, appeva naama tumhehi sakkariyamaanaana.m garukariyamaanaana.m maaniyamaanaana.m puujiyamaanaana.m siyaa cittassa a~n~nathatta.m, yathaa ta.m duusii maaro labhetha otaaranti. etha, tumhe, bhikkhave, asubhaanupassino kaaye viharatha, aahaare pa.tikuulasa~n~nino, sabbaloke anabhiratisa~n~nino {anabhiratasa~n~niino (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}, sabbasa"nkhaaresu aniccaanupassino'ti.

[03] ``atha kho te, paapima, bhikkhuu kakusandhena bhagavataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena eva.m ovadiyamaanaa eva.m anusaasiyamaanaa ara~n~nagataapi rukkhamuulagataapi su~n~naagaaragataapi asubhaanupassino kaaye vihari.msu, aahaare pa.tikuulasa~n~nino, sabbaloke anabhiratisa~n~nino, sabbasa"nkhaaresu aniccaanupassino.

[03] 512^b^.^eb^ ``atha kho, paapima, kakusandho bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya aayasmataa vidhurena pacchaasama.nena gaama.m pi.n.daaya paavisi. atha kho, paapima, duusii maaro a~n~natara.m kumaaraka.m ^a^M1.0413^ea^ {kumaara.m (sii0 pii0)} anvaavisitvaa sakkhara.m gahetvaa aayasmato vidhurassa siise pahaaramadaasi; siisa.m vobhindi {siisa.m te bhindissaamiiti (ka0)}. atha kho, paapima, aayasmaa vidhuro bhinnena siisena lohitena ga.lantena kakusandha.myeva bhagavanta.m ^a^P1.0337^ea^ arahanta.m sammaasambuddha.m pi.t.thito pi.t.thito anubandhi. atha kho ^a^T1.0608^ea^, paapima, kakusandho bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho naagaapalokita.m apalokesi ^a^V1.0421^ea^ -- `na vaaya.m duusii maaro mattama~n~naasii'ti. sahaapalokanaaya ca pana, paapima, duusii maaro tamhaa ca .thaanaa cavi mahaaniraya~nca upapajji.

[03] ``tassa kho pana, paapima, mahaanirayassa tayo naamadheyyaa honti -- chaphassaayataniko itipi, sa"nkusamaahato itipi, paccattavedaniyo itipi. atha kho ma.m, paapima, nirayapaalaa upasa"nkamitvaa etadavocu.m -- yadaa kho te {yato te (ka0)}, maarisa, sa"nkunaa sa"nku hadaye samaagaccheyya. atha na.m tva.m jaaneyyaasi -- `vassasahassa.m me niraye paccamaanassaa'ti. so kho aha.m, paapima, bahuuni vassaani bahuuni vassasataani bahuuni vassasahassaani tasmi.m mahaaniraye apacci.m. dasavassasahassaani tasseva mahaanirayassa ussade apacci.m vu.t.thaanima.m naama vedana.m vediyamaano. tassa mayha.m, paapima, evaruupo kaayo hoti, seyyathaapi manussassa. evaruupa.m siisa.m hoti, seyyathaapi macchassa.
